date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a gentle breeze and pleasantly cool temperatures.
date_attribute.holiday: New Year's Day

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is New Year's Day holiday, and Lu Mingqiang's family is enjoying a rare full day of family time. He got up early to prepare for the day. In the morning, they flew kites at Wanlü Park. In the afternoon, they returned home to prepare and enjoy his favorite Hainanese chicken rice together. In the evening, they gathered around to watch TV programs, creating a warm and harmonious family atmosphere—a perfect respite amidst their busy work schedules.

events.name: Wake up early to prepare for family activities.
events.description: At 06:30 in the morning, Lu Mingqiang wakes up on time. After washing up, he helps his wife prepare breakfast and organize items for going out. He maintains a regular routine, waking up early even during holidays, reflecting the disciplined habits of an ISTJ.

events.name: Drive to Wanlv Park
events.description: At nine o'clock in the morning, Lu Mingqiang drove the family car from their home in Longhua District, accompanied by his wife Wang Lijuan, their eldest son Lu Zixuan, and their younger son Lu Zihan, heading to Wanlüyuan Park. On the way, the children excitedly discussed which kite to fly in the back seat.

events.name: Guidance on Flying a Kite
events.description: On the open grassland of Wanlü Park, Lu Mingqiang and his wife assembled a kite while explaining the techniques of flying to their children. He first helped his eldest son, Lu Zixuan, successfully launch a swallow-shaped kite into the sky. Then, with practiced skill, he sent a traditional sand swallow kite from his collection soaring into the air.

events.name: Family Picnic
events.description: The kite-flying activity lasted for nearly two hours. At noon, the whole family found a clean patch of lawn, spread out a picnic mat, and enjoyed sliced fruit, bread, and some traditional Hainan-style snacks brought from home.

events.name: Return home to prepare dinner.
events.description: Around three o'clock in the afternoon, the family drove back home. After a short rest, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to enter the kitchen to assist his wife in preparing dinner, specifically handling the chicken to make Hainanese chicken rice.

events.name: Enjoying a Hainanese Chicken Rice dinner.
events.description: At dinner time, the whole family gathered around the table to enjoy Hainanese chicken rice. The children eagerly shared amusing stories from their kite-flying adventures that day, while Lu Mingqiang also recounted memories from his own childhood. The dinner atmosphere was filled with warmth and joy.

events.name: Watch the New Year's Gala
events.description: After dinner, the whole family gathered in the living room to watch the New Year's special program on television. With the children snuggled beside their parents, Lu Mingqiang felt a profound and steady sense of contentment.

events.name: Talking with Father
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Lu Mingqiang made a brief phone call to his father Lu Jianguo, wishing him a happy New Year's Day and briefly chatting about the family activities of the day.

起始状态.所处地点: At home (No. 15 Jinmao Middle Road, Longhua District, Haikou City)
起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to spending the holidays with family.

结束状态.心情: Contentment, happiness, and a strong sense of family belonging.

state.今日运动: Approximately one hour of outdoor walking, with kite flying (light upper limb and core activity)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with light rain later, temperature slightly dropping.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first workday after the New Year's Day holiday, Lu Mingqiang returned to his daily commute and work routine. An afternoon rain revealed a water seepage issue on his balcony at home. While browsing the internet in the evening, he began to focus on health-related information, laying the groundwork for a future medical checkup.

events.name: Resume normal operations
events.description: At seven o'clock in the morning, after having breakfast, Lu Mingqiang drove his car to the company, with a one-way commute of ten minutes. He then changed into his work uniform and began his day's work.

events.name: Routine Equipment Inspection and Maintenance
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang partnered with his colleague Chen Jianguo to conduct routine inspections and tests on the transformers and cable reels in the company's warehouse, ensuring that the tools and equipment were in good condition.

events.name: Discovered balcony water seepage issue
events.description: After returning home from work in the evening, it began to rain. While checking the doors and windows, Lu Mingqiang noticed damp marks at the corner of the balcony wall. He initially concluded that rainwater had seeped in and decided to carry out repairs over the weekend.

events.name: Browsing the Internet for Health Information in the Evening
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang used his phone to browse news and electrical engineering forums, and searched for solutions to "water seepage in the corner of the balcony." By chance, he came across health-related articles, which led him to contemplate the importance of regular medical check-ups, subtly foreshadowing his subsequent plans.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to get to work.

结束状态.心情: Slightly concerned (about balcony water leakage and health), but generally at peace.

state.今日运动: Moving equipment at work (light physical labor)

2025-01.daily_overview: On weekdays, Lu Mingqiang conducts project surveys during the day and plans home repairs while discussing cost-saving measures in the evening, reflecting his pragmatic nature. Additionally, he communicates with his wife about reducing dining out to address future financial pressures.

events.name: On-site Survey of Project Community
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang, along with his colleague Chen Jianguo and apprentice Zhao Qiang, went to an old community to conduct preliminary surveys for the upgrade and renovation of electrical facilities, providing installation recommendations and recording data.

events.name: Maintenance Planning and Material Procurement
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang drove to the hardware and building materials store to purchase waterproof sealant, PVC drainage pipes, and other materials in preparation for repairing the balcony leak over the weekend.

events.name: Discuss the maintenance plan and expenses with my wife
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang mentioned to his wife Wang Lijuan the plan for repairing the water seepage on the balcony and discussed reducing the frequency of dining out to save expenses, making early preparations for the family's financial planning.

events.name: Temporary dietary adjustment
events.description: Due to discussions about expenses, the dinner was changed to simple home-cooked dishes. Lu Mingqiang ate less greasy food and began paying attention to dietary control.

起始状态.心情: Focus, contemplate work arrangements

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment from having things to do, with slight economic pressure.

2025-01.daily_overview: Over the weekend, Lu Mingqiang successfully repaired the balcony water leakage issue, gaining a sense of accomplishment. In the afternoon, due to fatigue, he temporarily canceled his originally scheduled running plan and opted for rest instead, reflecting the impact of the noise incident.

events.name: Check and locate the leakage point
events.description: At 9 a.m., Lu Mingqiang inspected the balcony and identified a crack at the drainage pipe joint as the root cause of water leakage.

events.name: Cut and replace aging water pipes
events.description: Lu Mingqiang used tools to cut off the old elbow and replace it with a new pipe fitting. His operation was clean and efficient, demonstrating the fundamental skills of a technical worker.

events.name: Perform waterproof sealing treatment
events.description: After replacing the pipe fittings, apply waterproof sealant to form a reliable waterproof layer, ensuring complete protection.

events.name: Site Cleanup and Flushing Test
events.description: After completing the repair, clean the site, conduct a water flushing test to confirm the success of the repair, and ensure that the corners remain dry.

events.name: Afternoon break canceled for running.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang had originally planned to go for a run. However, due to fatigue from maintenance work in the morning, he decided to rest temporarily, play building blocks with his second son, and adjust his exercise routine.

events.name: Contact Lin Feng online as a fellow player
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang confirmed his squash reservation for next week with his friend Lin Feng on WeChat, and they had a brief chat.

起始状态.心情: Ready to tackle the problem, with a slight sense of challenge.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, with a sense of accomplishment, and feeling affirmed in one's own abilities.

2025-01.daily_overview: In the new week, Lu Mingqiang devoted himself to the preliminary preparations for the community power grid renovation project. The high-intensity labor led to initial physical fatigue, and in the evening, he experienced slight emotional fluctuations due to project-related stress.

events.name: Project Initiation and Safe Power Shutdown
events.description: At 8:00 a.m., Lu Mingqiang's team arrived at the community, posted the power outage notice, and safely disconnected the main power switch.

events.name: Remove old electric meter boxes
events.description: After power outage, remove the old meter box and wiring swiftly and methodically.

events.name: Installation of New Distribution Box Base
events.description: Install the new distribution box base, ensuring it is level and plumb, with the incoming conduit pre-embedded.

events.name: Lunch and Work Discussion
events.description: Have lunch at a noodle restaurant at noon, discuss the afternoon work, and remind everyone of safety precautions.

events.name: The body begins to feel fatigued.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang felt soreness in his shoulders and lower back. His wife helped massage him, making him realize the need to pay attention to physical recovery.

events.name: Emotional Fluctuations
events.description: Due to project pressure, Lu Mingqiang felt slightly anxious before sleep, which was alleviated after a brief conversation with his wife.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to meet the challenge.

结束状态.心情: Tired but fulfilled, satisfied with the project progress, and slightly under pressure.

events.description: When laying new cables, Lu Mingqiang reminded the team to pay attention to safety and maintain neat wiring.

2025-01.daily_overview: During an emergency large-scale power outage repair mission, Lu Mingqiang's team conducted high-intensity operations under harsh conditions, successfully restored power supply, and received commendations. Extreme physical exhaustion and lower back discomfort have raised health concerns.

events.name: Received an emergency repair notification
events.description: In the morning, we received a repair request reporting a widespread power outage in an old residential area and immediately set out with the team to conduct emergency repairs.

events.name: On-site Inspection and Fault Diagnosis
events.description: Upon arrival at the scene for inspection, it was determined that the short circuit was caused by the aging and breakdown of the underground cable.

events.name: Accurately Locate Underground Cable Fault Points
events.description: Using instruments to pinpoint the fault location, approximately 1.5 meters beneath the garden walkway.

events.name: Formulate and implement emergency repair plans
events.description: Propose an excavation and repair plan, direct the excavator for digging operations, and prepare joint connection materials.

events.name: Connecting Operations in Harsh Environments
events.description: Working in a cramped space, kneeling to make cable intermediate joints, sweat soaking through the work clothes.

events.name: Strict Testing and Power Restoration
events.description: Insulation and withstand voltage tests were conducted. The switch was closed to restore power supply, and residents cheered in gratitude.

events.name: Wrapping up and intense fatigue
events.description: After completing the backfilling cleanup, I returned to the company to fill out the records, feeling an unprecedented level of fatigue with noticeable soreness in my lower back.

events.name: Health Alert
events.description: Decided to reduce the intensity of recent physical activities in the evening, focusing on lower back recovery, and planning to prioritize relevant examinations during the medical check-up.

起始状态.心情: Normal Working Condition

结束状态.心情: A profound sense of achievement and responsibility has been greatly satisfied, but the body is extremely fatigued, with discomfort in the lower back triggering initial health concerns.

state.今日运动: All-day high-intensity physical and mental exertion, prolonged bending, squatting, and kneeling operations.

2025-01.daily_overview: Returning to routine and planning, with regular work and study during the day, squash workouts and family financial meetings in the evening, and planning a desk for the son. The body recovers through adjustments, and the state on the final day aligns with the conclusion of a healthy condition.

events.name: Routine Inspection and Work Review
events.description: The morning shift team conducted a review of the emergency repair work, followed by a routine inspection of the electrical equipment on the engineering vehicles.

events.name: Encountering Difficulties While Reviewing for Exams
events.description: During the lunch break, I reviewed the "Senior Electrician Technician Assessment Guide" and encountered a difficult problem, planning to consult my master over the weekend.

events.name: Wednesday Squash Activity
events.description: Maintain a regular evening squash routine, pay attention to lumbar protection, perform thorough stretching after exercise, and alleviate fatigue.

events.name: Family Financial Planning Meeting
events.description: After exercising, I held a financial meeting with my wife to review expenditures, deciding to establish an education fund and implement budget austerity measures.

events.name: Plan a small desk for the second son.
events.description: After the meeting, plan to refurbish the old computer desk into a children's desk, measure the dimensions, and compile a list of tools.

events.name: Adjusting Health Habits
events.description: Before going to bed, I decided to start adding core exercises tomorrow and ensure a regular routine to prepare for the exam.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued physically, but mentally still quite alert.

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment and control from completing important family plans, with a clearer understanding of future challenges (exam preparation, health, finances), and no discomfort in the lower back.

state.今日运动: Daily work inspection (light intensity), one hour of squash in the evening (moderate intensity, with attention to lumbar protection).

2025-01.daily_overview: Today was an ordinary workday. Beyond his busy professional duties, Lu Mingqiang primarily handled two personal matters: first, to cope with the tightening family budget, he meticulously renewed his car insurance, saving a sum of money; second, in preparation for his personal hobby, he contacted fellow collectors and organized his collection. The overall pace was compact and pragmatic, aligning with his ISTJ personality traits, though his fatigue increased slightly due to exam preparation.

events.name: Getting up early to prepare for work
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, Lu Mingqiang woke up to the sound of his alarm clock. After quickly washing up and having a simple breakfast prepared by his wife, he changed into his work uniform and left the house promptly at 7:15. He then drove his own car to his company located on Haisheng Road in Xiuying District.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: During the day, Lu Mingqiang, assigned by his work team, partnered with his colleague Chen Jianguo to carry out the installation of indoor distribution boxes and wiring tasks at a newly built residential community in Haikou City. He worked skillfully, though recent fatigue from exam preparation caused slight lapses in concentration. He strictly adhered to safety protocols and collaborated seamlessly with his partner.

events.name: Contact fellow Tibetan art collectors to arrange a gathering.
events.description: During a break in his work schedule, Lu Mingqiang contacted fellow wine bottle collector Chen Jianguo via WeChat. After a brief exchange of pleasantries, they quickly arranged to meet the following afternoon at their usual neighborhood tea shop, known as "Dad's Tea Shop." There, they planned to share their collecting experiences and confirm which representative vintage Hainan local wine bottles each would bring for appreciation.

events.name: Organize the wine bottle collection
events.description: After returning home from work and finishing dinner, Lu Mingqiang took several representative old wine bottles from Hainan from the collection cabinet in the living room. Considering the tightened family budget and the lack of new acquisitions, he selected them with extra care this time. He gently wiped each bottle clean with a soft cloth to ensure they were in perfect condition, then carefully placed them into dedicated protective bags, preparing to share them with friends the next day.

events.name: Prepare the tools for desk renovation
events.description: After tidying up the wine bottles, Lu Mingqiang remembered his plan to refurbish the old desk for his younger son over the weekend. He retrieved sandpaper, a screwdriver, and other essential tools from the toolbox on the balcony, only to find that the eco-friendly varnish and brush were used up. He then walked to the hardware store near the residential complex to purchase them. After comparing prices, he selected the most cost-effective varnish and a brush, and also bought a pair of protective gloves on a whim.

events.name: Received a car insurance renewal reminder
events.description: Around 8 p.m., Lu Mingqiang received a renewal reminder text message from his car insurance company on his phone, notifying him that his vehicle insurance was about to expire at the end of the month and that he needed to proceed with the renewal as soon as possible. He immediately took note of the matter.

events.name: Compare Auto Insurance Plans
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang sat on the sofa and used his phone to browse the internet, carefully comparing the car insurance quotes and coverage options from multiple insurance companies. He focused on the coverage amounts of compulsory traffic insurance and third-party liability insurance, as well as the cost-effectiveness of various commercial add-on policies, silently calculating the costs in his mind.

events.name: Discussing Car Insurance Adjustments with My Wife
events.description: After checking the online information, Lu Mingqiang showed his phone to his wife Wang Lijuan, who was tidying up the kitchen. They had a brief discussion about their car insurance. Considering their current tight family budget, they unanimously decided to cut costs while ensuring basic safety by canceling some non-essential coverage, such as scratch insurance.

events.name: Online Auto Insurance Renewal
events.description: After reaching an agreement, Lu Mingqiang skillfully renewed the compulsory traffic insurance and sufficient third-party liability insurance for his car through the insurance company's mobile app. Following the decision, he canceled commercial add-ons such as scratch insurance and completed the online payment. The entire process took only about ten minutes.

events.name: Verify Policy and Record Savings
events.description: After the payment was completed, Lu Mingqiang did not immediately download the electronic insurance policy. Instead, he habitually took screenshots to save the payment receipt and details of the insurance coverage. He did a quick mental calculation and realized that by adjusting the coverage, his car insurance expenses for this year had decreased by approximately 15% compared to the previous year. He then took out the family financial ledger and solemnly recorded the amount saved under the "Budget Adjustment - Cost Reduction" column, feeling a sense of reassurance.

events.name: Evening Study and Exam Preparation
events.description: After handling miscellaneous tasks, Lu Mingqiang leaned back on the sofa and used his phone to review electrical engineering knowledge. However, due to increasing fatigue, his efficiency was low, and he only studied for half an hour. He then browsed some electrical engineering forums and local news.

events.name: Rest
events.description: At eleven o'clock, he washed up and went to bed to rest, conserving energy for the next day's work and the afternoon gathering. However, due to fatigue, he tossed and turned, unable to fall asleep, and eventually drifted off at 23:10.

起始状态.心情: Calm yet slightly fatigued, ready to begin the day's work.

结束状态.心情: Slightly satisfied, with a sense of practical small achievement from successfully saving household expenses, but with a noticeable feeling of physical fatigue.

state.今日运动: Daily work involves heavy physical labor, equivalent to moderate-intensity exercise.

2025-01.daily_overview: The busy workday concluded on Friday. In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang enjoyed a rare moment of leisure, savoring tea and appreciating porcelain vases with fellow collectors, temporarily setting aside the pressures of work and exam preparation, though he indulged a bit more in food and drink during the gathering. In the evening, he returned to his family role, making preparations for the upcoming family medical check-up and seeking advice for his subsequent exam studies.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang continued working with Chen Jianguo to complete the finishing touches on the electrical installation in the residential area from the previous day. In the afternoon, he was assigned to another location for routine equipment inspections. The work pace remained steady, but he began to experience slight soreness and tightness in his lower back.

events.name: Gathering with Fellow Tibetan Art Collectors at a Tea House
events.description: After work in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang drove directly to the tea shop where he had arranged to meet Chen Jianguo. They ordered their usual old-fashioned tea along with a few snacks, including greasy grilled fish pastries. They placed the old wine bottles they had brought with them on the table, carefully examining the craftsmanship, glaze, and historical traces on the bottles. In hushed tones, they exchanged stories about their collections, shared insights into market trends, and discussed "folk methods" for identifying authenticity. In the relaxed and nostalgic atmosphere, Lu Mingqiang temporarily forgot about the theoretical difficulties of his exam preparation and the financial pressures at home, though he ended up eating a little more than usual.

events.name: Ending the Gathering and Storing the Collection
events.description: The tasting and exchange lasted about two hours, and the sky outside gradually darkened. Lu Mingqiang bid farewell to Chen Jianguo, carefully packed the wine bottles he had brought, and took them home. Upon arriving, he did not place them randomly. Instead, he meticulously wiped each bottle according to their serial numbers and categories before returning them to their original positions in the display cabinet in the living room.

events.name: Online Communication with Fellow Collectors
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang sent Chen Jianguo several detailed photos of wine bottles taken that day on WeChat, particularly a close-up of a special mark on the bottom of one bottle. He also left a message thanking him for the relaxing gathering. Chen Jianguo replied promptly, and the two exchanged a few more brief words, agreeing to meet again when either of them finds a "good find."

events.name: Sketching a New Kite Design
events.description: After playing with his younger son for a while, Lu Mingqiang sat at his desk and used his phone to browse pictures and videos of traditional kite-making online. Recalling his son’s excitement when flying a kite at Wanlü Park on New Year’s Day, he took out an old notebook and, drawing from his experience, sketched a simple design for an improved swallow-shaped kite. He then took stock of the available materials in the storage room at home, such as old bamboo strips, colored paper, cotton thread, and glue.

events.name: Review electrical engineering knowledge
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang took out the review materials for the senior electrician technician certification and studied the theoretical section for about half an hour. He circled a few points he did not fully understand, planning to ask his mentor, Master Li, for guidance over the weekend. However, due to staying up late for a gathering, his efficiency was not high.

events.name: Notice of Temporary Overtime Work
events.description: At 10 p.m., Lu Mingqiang received a WeChat message from his squad leader, Zhang Tou, notifying him of an urgent repair task the next morning that required early arrival. He adjusted his work schedule accordingly.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the collection exchange after work, but feeling slight discomfort in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and fulfilled, with social hobbies satisfied and a clear plan for the weekend, but feeling slightly fatigued due to diet and staying up late.

state.今日运动: Daily work (equipment inspection, involving considerable walking), with mild lumbar movement.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, temperature 20-25°C, good weather for the weekend.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is a day off, with a clear theme divided into two parts: the morning is dedicated to an important family health activity—a comprehensive family medical check-up, while the afternoon is reserved for personal hobbies and career development preparations. Lu Mingqiang demonstrates his multiple responsibilities and attentiveness as a husband, father, and professional, though he feels slightly pressured due to unexpected overtime work.

events.name: Emergency Repair Task
events.description: At 6 a.m., Lu Mingqiang received a call from his team leader, requiring him to arrive early at the company to handle an unexpected electrical circuit failure. He hurriedly got up, drove to the company, and worked with his colleague Chen Jianguo to complete the repair within an hour, ensuring the residential area’s power supply remained normal. However, the soreness and tightness in his lower back intensified.

events.name: Comprehensive Family Health Check-up
events.description: After the repair, Lu Mingqiang and his family of four arrived at the Haikou Longhua District Physical Examination Center before 8 a.m. as scheduled. Guided by the staff, the family completed registration and received their examination forms in an orderly manner. Lu Mingqiang took the lead, undergoing blood tests, ultrasounds, electrocardiograms, internal and surgical examinations, among others, while his wife Wang Lijuan was primarily responsible for overseeing their two children as they completed assessments such as the child growth and development evaluation. The entire process lasted approximately three and a half hours. Although Lu Mingqiang found it somewhat time-consuming, he considered it necessary. During the examination, the doctor reminded him to pay attention to his lower back and weight.

events.name: Family Breakfast After Medical Examination
events.description: After completing all the fasting items, it was nearly 11 a.m. The whole family was a bit hungry. Lu Mingqiang took his family to a clean and spacious breakfast restaurant near the medical examination center, where they ordered Hainan noodles, porridge, and steamed buns, essentially combining breakfast and lunch. During the meal, his wife mentioned feeling a bit nervous about the blood draw, while their eldest son, Lu Zixuan, excitedly described the patterns he saw during the vision test. The atmosphere was relaxed, but Lu Mingqiang had little appetite due to discomfort in his lower back.

events.name: Procurement of Materials for Kite Making
events.description: After returning home to rest briefly after lunch, Lu Mingqiang remembered the materials needed for making a kite. He pulled out the previous inventory list and found that the colored paper was not vibrant enough, worrying that his son might not like it. So, he walked to the stationery store at the entrance of the residential complex and carefully selected a few sheets of bright red and bright yellow colored paper. He also bought a roll of stronger and more durable kite string, spending less than twenty yuan in total. This aligned with his current principle of tightening the family budget.

events.name: Preparing gifts for visiting the master
events.description: Thinking about visiting his master, Master Li, the next day to seek advice on exam preparation, Lu Mingqiang felt it would be inappropriate to go empty-handed. He deliberately took a detour to his regular old-fashioned tea shop and bought a box of his master’s favorite pineapple buns and egg yolk pastries, packaging them in the shop’s gift box. He knew his master was nostalgic and particularly fond of the flavors from this old establishment.

events.name: Make a phone appointment to visit the master.
events.description: Upon returning home in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang called Master Li. Over the phone, he respectfully explained that while reviewing the theoretical aspects for the senior electrician technician certification, he had encountered several bottlenecks. Merely studying the books had not provided clarity, so he wished to visit for guidance. Hearing it was a serious matter, Master Li gladly agreed and arranged to meet at his home the following afternoon. After hanging up, Lu Mingqiang felt much more at ease.

events.name: Evening Family Time and Rest
events.description: In the evening, the family had a simple dinner. Lu Mingqiang spent some time reading picture books with his younger son and supervised his elder son in completing his weekend homework. Due to lower back discomfort, he washed up and went to bed early at 22:00 to recharge for the next day.

起始状态.心情: Slightly hurried but organized, focusing on completing the medical examination procedures, with increased discomfort in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Feeling reassured and slightly expectant, I have taken care of the major family health matter and prepared for tomorrow's consultation, though I am troubled by lower back pain.

state.今日运动: Emergency repairs (heavy physical labor), walking for procurement (light activity)

2025-01.daily_overview: This Sunday was fulfilling and rewarding. In the morning, I focused on family matters, creating a study space for my younger son. In the afternoon, I sought guidance from my career mentor with specific questions, gaining valuable insights and experience. Our mentor-mentee bond was further strengthened, and my lower back discomfort was alleviated.

events.name: Polish and clean the old desk.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang moved the old computer desk from the corner of the balcony, which he intended to refurbish, to the center of the living room. He put on a mask and gloves, then carefully sanded the edges and corners of the desktop with sandpaper to remove all burrs and sharp parts, ensuring absolute safety for his son when using it. After sanding, he thoroughly wiped down the entire desk with a damp cloth, paying special attention to cleaning the dust from the crevices, all while being mindful to protect his lower back during the process.

events.name: Visiting the Master to Seek Advice
events.description: At two o'clock in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang drove to Master Li's home on Haifu Road in Meilan District, bringing snacks and review materials. Master Li warmly welcomed him inside. Without excessive pleasantries, Lu Mingqiang directly took out the review materials, pointed to several marked difficult problems, and raised his questions one by one, particularly regarding abstract theoretical calculations and complex fault analysis logic. He also mentioned that his lower back discomfort was affecting his review.

events.name: The master imparts experience and notes.
events.description: Master Li put on his reading glasses and, drawing on decades of hands-on experience, patiently explained the dry theories using vivid examples and metaphors. As he became more enthusiastic, he stood up and brought an old wooden box from his study, pulling out several yellowed electrical manuals and densely written notes. Pointing at the diagrams and records, he said, "These 'practical methods' and classic troubleshooting cases aren’t found in textbooks, but they’re essential for both exams and actual work!" Lu Mingqiang felt as if he had discovered a treasure trove and quickly took photos of the key points with his phone.

events.name: Master and Disciple Chatting Casually
events.description: After the main technical discussion concluded, the master and apprentice moved to the living room. They brewed the tea brought by Lu Mingqiang, enjoyed some snacks, and engaged in casual conversation. Master Li inquired with concern about the health of Lu Mingqiang’s father—his former colleague—after retirement, and asked about the studies and recent development of Lu Mingqiang’s two children. His words were filled with the care of an elder, and he advised Lu Mingqiang to pay attention to his health management.

events.name: Return home after the visit
events.description: The nearly two-hour visit concluded in a pleasant atmosphere. Lu Mingqiang repeatedly expressed his gratitude to his mentor before driving home with the precious old notebook (which Master Li insisted on lending him) and a sense of great fulfillment. On the way, he felt that much of the haze from his previous review had cleared, giving him more confidence for the exam, and the discomfort in his waist had slightly eased after the rest.

events.name: Apply the first coat of varnish to the desk.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang took advantage of the remaining daylight to apply the first coat of environmentally friendly varnish evenly on the desk he had sanded that morning, working in the well-ventilated balcony. He applied it meticulously, ensuring that even the corners were fully covered, before leaving it to dry on the balcony.

events.name: The wife buys school supplies for Zihan.
events.description: While Lu Mingqiang was out during the day, his wife Wang Lijuan also went alone to nearby stationery and bookstores. She carefully selected several picture books suitable for preschoolers, a box of colored markers, a stationery case printed with cartoon patterns, and a small backpack for Lu Zihan, who was about to start kindergarten.

events.name: Organize Master's Notes
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang did not watch television. Instead, he sat at the dining table, carefully reviewing the old notes borrowed from Master Li. He copied key formulas and case summaries into his own review notebook. Planning the focus of his studies for the next week, he felt his goals had become much clearer and stayed up late due to the sense of accomplishment.

起始状态.心情: Calm and prepared to handle household affairs and important visits, with slight relief in lower back discomfort.

结束状态.心情: Inspired and fulfilled, I gained valuable career guidance and emotional support, and have placed greater emphasis on health management.

state.今日运动: Light household chores (sanding, painting), driving to visit

2025-01.daily_overview: As the new week began, Lu Mingqiang made simultaneous progress in both his work and family financial planning. He proactively implemented the education savings plan and, due to preliminary feedback from his medical checkup, began earnestly examining his health issues. Together with his wife, he devised improvement measures, and his weight fluctuated slightly due to dietary adjustments.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Monday is typically the day for task assignments and preparations. Lu Mingqiang received the weekly work plan during the pre-shift meeting, then proceeded to inventory and maintain tools with his coworkers, preparing the materials and equipment required for the next day's fieldwork, while paying attention to lumbar protection during the work.

events.name: Open an Education Savings Sub-account
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang did not linger in the cafeteria. Instead, he walked to a bank branch near the company. Under the existing family savings account, he opened a new sub-account in the names of himself and his wife, Wang Lijuan, specifically labeled as the "Children's Education Fund." He transferred 800 yuan from his salary card to this new account, completing the first savings action as decided in the family financial planning meeting.

events.name: Further tighten personal and household budgets.
events.description: After returning from the bank, Lu Mingqiang operated on his phone and canceled an order for an antique wine bottle he had spotted online the previous week. He quietly reduced his monthly budget for wine bottle collecting from 300 yuan to 100 yuan. During dinner that evening, he proactively communicated with his wife and suggested adjusting the family’s monthly dining-out plan from the previously agreed-upon four times to only once at the end of the month for a family member’s birthday. His wife, Wang Lijuan, expressed support for this change.

events.name: Preliminary Review of Medical Examination Report
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang received a push notification on his phone from the medical examination center about the electronic report. He took the opportunity during his rest to open the report and skim through it. Although he couldn't understand many of the medical terms, phrases such as "overweight," "borderline blood lipids," and "recommendation to pay attention to the lumbar spine" caught his attention. He decided to review the report carefully with his wife after returning home in the evening.

events.name: Reviewing the medical examination report with my wife and developing a health plan.
events.description: After dinner, the children were playing in the living room, while Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan sat at the dining table, carefully reading the printed copies of the family’s physical examination reports (the electronic versions had been printed out) under the desk lamp. They focused on the issues in Lu Mingqiang’s report: overweight, borderline high blood lipids, and the examining physician’s note of "possible lumbar muscle strain." His wife was particularly concerned, especially about the lumbar muscle strain, which was directly related to his physically demanding job. The two agreed that starting next month, Lu Mingqiang must adjust his exercise routine by increasing brisk walking, reducing greasy food intake, and incorporating lower back stretches.

events.name: Integrate new content into organized review notes
events.description: After concluding the discussion on health topics, Lu Mingqiang took out his review notebook and organized the key points and insights he had learned from Master Li the previous day into clear notes, integrating them into the corresponding chapter of his study plan. Looking at the enriched notes, he felt that his goal of passing the exam was one step closer.

events.name: A temporary friend is visiting.
events.description: At 9 p.m., Chen Jianguo, a coworker, paid an unexpected visit to discuss a technical issue at work. They exchanged ideas for half an hour before Lu Mingqiang ended the conversation early due to discomfort in his lower back.

起始状态.心情: Monday's work state, with a slight sense of planning for the new week's affairs, accompanied by increased health concerns.

结束状态.心情: There is pressure but even greater determination; the implementation of financial planning brings a sense of control; health warnings prompt him to contemplate change, while lower back discomfort persists.

2025-01.daily_overview: On a damp and chilly Tuesday, Lu Mingqiang, amidst his routine work, began translating his health awareness into concrete actions. He utilized online resources to learn about health knowledge, taking the first step in researching ways to improve his physical condition, and canceled his originally planned run due to the weather.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Today's work task involves equipment maintenance and dust removal in an indoor power distribution room. The confined space requires prolonged bending or squatting during operations, which places a certain strain on the lower back. While performing the tasks, Lu Mingqiang instinctively paid more attention than usual to changing his posture and used a lumbar support belt in an attempt to provide protection.

events.name: Search for Health Management Information
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang did not watch TV as usual. Instead, he used his mobile phone to search carefully for information on "how to control blood lipids," "daily exercise methods to relieve lumbar muscle strain," and "healthy recipes suitable for workers." He saved several short videos and articles that seemed reliable, planning to review them in detail when he had time. He also discovered an online health consultation platform.

events.name: Try simple lower back stretches.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang recalled a simple lower back stretching exercise he had seen while searching earlier in the day. Leaning against the bedside, he tried it a few times and immediately felt stiffness and slight soreness in his lower back muscles. "It seems I really need to pay attention to this," he thought to himself, deciding to start learning more systematically tomorrow. Comforted by the stretching, he went to bed early.

events.name: Cancel the evening run.
events.description: Originally planning to go for a run in the evening, Lu Mingqiang decided to cancel due to light rain and discomfort in his lower back, opting instead to rest at home, which disrupted his regular exercise routine.

events.name: Online Health Consultation
events.description: During his break, Lu Mingqiang posted on a health forum to inquire about recovery methods for lumbar muscle strain. He received several similar suggestions from fellow workers, which strengthened his willingness to make changes.

起始状态.心情: Usually, the slightly subdued atmosphere due to rainy weather has heightened attention to health.

结束状态.心情: Beginning to pay attention to one's own health, with a slight sense of worry but a stronger willingness to change, feeling somewhat positive due to taking action.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today was a day when his body sent a clear warning. After intense outdoor work, Lu Mingqiang felt for the first time the health risks brought by his profession. This experience shattered his long-held belief that "my body is strong enough to endure it," becoming a key turning point in his health awareness as his lumbar strain officially manifested.

events.name: Discussing Health Topics with Colleagues
events.description: During lunch, Lu Mingqiang sat with his closest coworker, Chen Jianguo. He brought up the topic of his recent physical examination, which revealed high blood lipid levels and possible lumbar muscle strain. Upon hearing this, Chen Jianguo chuckled and remarked that in their line of work, it was common for people to develop issues with their waist and legs over time. He then shared some traditional methods he used to relieve fatigue, such as applying a hot water bottle and emphasizing the importance of core strength exercises in daily life. These practical insights made Lu Mingqiang feel that the advice was more genuine and credible.

events.name: Perform high-intensity outdoor operations
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang's team received an urgent task to replace an old outdoor transformer at an old residential community on Haisheng Road in the Xiuying District of Haikou City. This was a standard heavy-duty task, requiring prolonged bending to install the base and coordinating with teammates to move the heavy transformer body. Partnering with Chen Jianguo, Lu Mingqiang strictly followed safety protocols, but the continuous hours of high-intensity work far exceeded their usual routine.

events.name: First noticeable onset of low back discomfort
events.description: After completing the transformer replacement, while bending down to pick up the wrenches and screws scattered on the ground, Lu Mingqiang suddenly felt a distinct soreness and stiffness in his right waist, causing his movement to pause. He involuntarily hissed in pain and supported his waist with his hand. The discomfort persisted for several minutes.

events.name: Colleague Reminders and Self-Reflection
events.description: Chen Jianguo, standing nearby, immediately noticed Lu Mingqiang's unusual state. He walked over and handed him the blood-activating liniment he always carried, saying half-jokingly and half-seriously, "Take it easy, Brother Qiang. Don't push yourself just because you're young. In our line of work, the back is our 'capital'—if it gets damaged, we're in trouble." Lu Mingqiang stubbornly insisted, "It's fine, just an old issue. I'll be okay after some rest," but for the first time, he felt a flicker of doubt about his own words. That distinct, aching soreness felt like an unmistakable warning signal he could no longer ignore.

events.name: Informing Wife of Discomfort
events.description: After returning home from work in the evening, Lu Mingqiang proactively mentioned to his wife Wang Lijuan during dinner that he had experienced discomfort in his lower back during the day. Upon hearing this, his wife became very concerned and repeatedly urged him to take a day off the next day to go to the hospital for an X-ray, or at least to buy some high-quality medicated patches from the pharmacy. Seeing his wife's anxious expression, Lu Mingqiang felt even more uneasy. He agreed to buy the patches the next day and decided to adjust his exercise routine.

events.name: Cancel Squash Activity
events.description: Due to severe lower back pain, Lu Mingqiang has canceled tonight's scheduled squash activity and notified his squash partner Lin Feng via WeChat. Lin Feng advised him to rest and suggested trying swimming instead.

起始状态.心情: Usually, there are expectations for work, but there is a dull pain in the lower back.

结束状态.心情: Worried and vigilant, the physical discomfort made him confront occupational health risks for the first time, and he resolved to make changes, with lower back pain being particularly noticeable.

state.今日运动: High-intensity heavy manual labor (transformer replacement), lumbar strain onset

2025-01.daily_overview: The shadow of lower back discomfort persists, but Lu Mingqiang has not chosen complete rest. He continues his weekly squash sessions, albeit at a reduced intensity, and has begun taking protective measures at work. Meanwhile, he has partially accepted his wife's advice by purchasing medicated plasters, signaling a shift from "toughing it out" to "starting to address the issue."

events.name: Purchase of Plasters
events.description: On his way to work in the morning, Lu Mingqiang stopped his car in front of a pharmacy and went inside to buy several packs of medicated plasters for promoting blood circulation and removing stasis. He specifically asked the staff which type would be more effective for lumbar muscle strain, avoiding simply choosing the cheapest option, and inquired about daily care recommendations.

events.name: Daily Work (Pay Attention to Your Waist)
events.description: Today's work was relatively light, involving organizing and testing a batch of newly arrived electrical components in the warehouse. While bending over to move boxes, Lu Mingqiang noticeably slowed down and consciously used the strength of his legs to reduce the strain on his lower back. His coworker Chen Jianguo saw this and smiled knowingly, saying nothing more.

events.name: Wednesday Squash Activity (Intensity Adjusted)
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang arrived at the squash club as scheduled for his weekly practice match with his friend Lin Feng, but he mentioned in advance that he was experiencing some discomfort in his lower back. Before the match, he performed a thorough warm-up. During the game, Lu Mingqiang reduced the intensity of his movements and power, avoiding sharp turns, and focused primarily on practicing his technique. After the match, the two chatted in the locker room, where Lu Mingqiang briefly mentioned that his back was a bit uncomfortable. Lin Feng suggested he try swimming, as it puts less pressure on the back, and they exchanged tips on protective techniques.

events.name: The wife helps apply the medicated plaster.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang took a shower and asked his wife Wang Lijuan to help apply the medicated patch to the most painful area on his lower back. The herbal scent and warmth from the patch provided him with some relief. As she applied it, his wife repeatedly reminded him to take the issue seriously and suggested starting a family health diet.

events.name: Start keeping a health journal
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang began recording his daily weight, exercise, and lower back sensations in his phone's memo app, marking the first step in his health management.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly unwell, yet persisting with daily routines, with heightened awareness of health.

结束状态.心情: The body feels somewhat relieved after initial treatment, the mindset of accepting others' suggestions has become more open, and there is confidence in adjusting exercise routines.

state.今日运动: Squash (approximately 1 hour, reduced intensity), light daily work

2025-01.daily_overview: As the weekend and the Spring Festival approach, the financial pressure on families has intensified due to the increase in property management fees. Lu Mingqiang and his wife once again had to sit down and meticulously adjust their budget, cutting back on leisure expenses to cope with the rising fixed household expenditures. Their life appears more frugal, while health management continues to progress.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: On Friday, Lu Mingqiang mainly focused on wrapping up the week's work and filling out reports. He carefully reviewed the operational status of the equipment from the previous days' tasks to ensure no unresolved issues remained. Due to lower back discomfort, he minimized bending movements.

events.name: Discussing Spring Festival Goods Procurement
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan sat in the living room, took out paper and pen, and jointly discussed and drafted a detailed list of New Year goods based on their family budget and Hainan’s Spring Festival customs. The list included local chickens for preparing Hainanese chicken rice and white-cut chicken, vegetables, candies, melon seeds, Spring Festival couplets, and “Fu” character decorations. Each item was marked with a budget cap, and the total amount was strictly controlled within a certain range, with priority given to healthy ingredients.

events.name: Notice of Property Management Fee Increase
events.description: While riding his bicycle into the residential complex after work, Lu Mingqiang stopped in front of the bulletin board and noticed a new official notice posted by the property management. The notice stated that, due to increased maintenance costs for public facilities and rising labor expenses, the property management fee would be raised by 10% starting from March 1, 2025. He carefully read the entire notice, silently calculating the additional fixed monthly expense in his mind, feeling the weight of his family budget grow a little heavier.

events.name: Analyzing Finances with Wife to Address New Pressures
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang informed his wife about the increase in property management fees. After the meal, instead of resting, they took out the family's monthly income and expenditure record book to review together. They analyzed their current situation: income could not be increased in the short term, the education savings plan had just begun, there would be additional expenses during the Spring Festival, and now there was the added cost of property management fees. The conclusion was clear: they must further cut down on non-essential expenditures.

events.name: Decided to further reduce the leisure budget.
events.description: After detailed discussions, the two decided to further reduce the monthly leisure and entertainment budget on top of the previous cuts. Specific measures include: indefinitely postponing a planned family short trip (such as to nearby attractions) originally scheduled after the Spring Festival; exercising stricter control over children's snack and toy expenses, avoiding non-essential purchases; and reducing the frequency of dining out while cooking more healthy meals at home. They recorded the adjusted budget limits for each category in the family ledger.

events.name: Plan next week's household expenses.
events.description: Immediately afterward, they spread out the account books and calculators to meticulously plan the spending limits for various living expenses over the coming month (including the Spring Festival period), based on the family's annual income and adjusted fixed expenditures. These expenses included food costs, utilities, gas bills, and educational miscellaneous fees for their two children in the upcoming semester. They reached a consensus and emphasized the importance of investing in healthy eating.

events.name: Discuss visiting parents over the weekend
events.description: After addressing the pressing financial issues, the conversation shifted to family warmth. Lu Mingqiang discussed with his wife about taking their child back to his parents’ home in Meilan District for dinner this weekend. They decided to go on Saturday evening and planned to buy some seasonal fruits from the fruit shop downstairs to bring along. They also intended to seek advice from his parents on healthy recipes.

events.name: Evening Brisk Walking Attempt
events.description: As an alternative to running, Lu Mingqiang completed a 30-minute brisk walk around the residential area. His lower back felt acceptable, so he decided to incorporate it into his daily exercise routine.

起始状态.心情: The sense of relaxation on Friday, but with increasing economic pressure.

结束状态.心情: The sense of economic pressure has significantly increased, but through joint planning by the couple, a sense of control in coping and a tacit understanding of fighting side by side have been achieved, while health management continues to advance.

state.今日运动: Daily tasks (documentation and inspections, light intensity), 30-minute brisk walk in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, temperature 20-26°C, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-01.daily_overview: This was a Saturday filled with family warmth and fulfillment. The morning was dedicated to a collaborative father-son craft session, the afternoon brought the reassuring retrieval of a health checkup report, and the evening saw the passing down of profound professional legacy and spiritual support from father to son, along with the creation of a dedicated space for the younger child, all while initiating a commitment to healthy eating.

events.name: Making kites in collaboration with the eldest son.
events.description: In the morning, the sunlight was just right. Lu Mingqiang and his eldest son Lu Zixuan spread out the prepared materials on the living room floor. Lu Mingqiang carefully shaved bamboo strips with a knife, using a small flame to heat and shape them to create the kite frame. Under his guidance, his son excitedly cut colored paper and applied glue. As he worked, Lu Mingqiang explained the principles of kite balance and the techniques for attaching the bridle to his son. The father and son cooperated seamlessly, thoroughly enjoying their busy work, with Lu Mingqiang mindful to avoid bending over for extended periods.

events.name: Testing a kite in the open space of the residential area.
events.description: After the kite frame and covering were initially completed, the father and son eagerly rushed to the open space in the residential area downstairs for a test flight. During the first attempt, the kite veered to one side. Lu Mingqiang did not panic. He reeled in the kite and patiently adjusted the position of the bridle based on its flight posture, explaining to his son why such an adjustment was necessary. On the second attempt, although the kite did not fly very high or steadily, it managed to soar successfully. Lu Zixuan was overjoyed, clapping his hands and jumping with excitement.

events.name: Share the Joy of Creation
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang showed his wife Wang Lijuan and their younger son Lu Zihan the kite he had made with his older son that day. He recounted the amusing incident of how his son accidentally got glue everywhere during the making process, as well as the joy of successfully adjusting the bridle line. The whole family shared the happiness brought by this low-cost homemade activity. The dinner mainly consisted of vegetables and light dishes.

events.name: Explaining Family Finances to Children
events.description: During the relaxed atmosphere of dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his wife used simple words to explain to their two children that Mom and Dad were saving money for the family's future big plans (such as the older brother and younger sister's education and Dad's certification exams), so everyone needed to work together to save, such as reducing the frequency of buying new toys and dining out. The eldest son, Lu Zixuan, nodded with partial understanding, while the younger son remained focused on playing with the kite in his hands.

events.name: Going to parents' home for a family dinner
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang and his family of four drove to his parents' home located on Haifu Road in Meilan District. On the way, they bought a bag of oranges and apples at a fruit shop and chose healthy snacks.

events.name: Discussing Career Planning with Father
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang proactively explained to his father Lu Jianguo the company's policy of encouraging skill enhancement, which includes full funding and rewards for obtaining certificates. He detailed his specific plan to prepare for the Electrician Senior Technician Certificate, the theoretical difficulties he encountered, particularly the knowledge gaps he needs to address, and mentioned the impact of his lumbar strain.

events.name: Father Gifts Treasured Toolbox
events.description: Upon hearing this, Lu Jianguo's expression turned solemn. He set down his chopsticks, rose from his seat, and walked into his study. There, he retrieved an old toolbox, its surface wiped clean but its edges polished to a glossy sheen from years of use. Opening the box, he revealed neatly arranged items: the electrician's manual he had used when obtaining his technician certification, notebooks filled with personal insights and circuit diagrams, and several well-maintained old-fashioned analog multimeters, electrician's knives, and other tools. Pushing the toolbox toward Lu Mingqiang, his father spoke earnestly, "Theory is the foundation. I almost stumbled over this myself back in the day. Take these. Study the books diligently to solidify your foundation, and remember to take care of your health."

events.name: Warm Family Dinner
events.description: After receiving the toolbox from his father, the dinner atmosphere became even warmer and more harmonious. Mother Chen Xiuying kept serving dishes to her grandchildren, while everyone chatted about recent life updates and amusing anecdotes about the children, offering Lu Mingqiang silent yet powerful spiritual support. The dinner primarily featured healthy Hainanese cuisine.

events.name: Returning home to organize the gifts from my father
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his family drove back to their home. Upon arrival, Lu Mingqiang carefully carried the toolbox gifted by his father into his small workshop (a corner of the balcony) and placed it solemnly on the shelf. He briefly flipped through the manuals and notes inside, and the familiar handwriting and detailed records filled him with emotion and motivation.

events.name: Apply the second coat of varnish to the desk and arrange it.
events.description: The desk, which had been airing out all day, had its first coat of paint completely dried. In the evening, Lu Mingqiang applied a second coat of environmentally friendly varnish evenly on the balcony to ensure a smoother and more durable finish. After the paint dried (the next day), he and his son Lu Zixuan moved the desk to the corner reserved for Lu Zihan in the living room. They adjusted its position to ensure stability and checked that the desk lamp was properly connected to the power source.

events.name: Setting up a study corner for the youngest son
events.description: Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan arranged the newly purchased picture books, colored pens, and pencil cases neatly on the desk and the small bookshelf beside it. They adjusted the angle of the desk lamp to ensure the lighting was sufficient and soft. In this way, a cozy, practical, and safe little study corner was set up.

events.name: The youngest son experiences the new desk.
events.description: Looking at the newly arranged corner, his youngest son Lu Zihan excitedly ran over, sat down in his own little chair, and began flipping through the picture book with great concentration. His small hand pointed at the illustrations while he babbled softly. Lu Mingqiang watched his youngest son's joyful expression and, thinking of his father's support that evening, felt a sense of steadiness and satisfaction in taking step-by-step preparations for the family's future.

events.name: Start a Family Healthy Eating Plan
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang and his wife agreed to implement a one-week family healthy eating plan starting the next day, reducing oil intake and increasing the consumption of vegetables and fruits.

起始状态.心情: Relax, look forward to weekend family activities and gatherings, and maintain continuous health awareness.

结束状态.心情: Deeply inspired, filled with the warmth of family and the profound sense of professional heritage, I feel more confident about the future, and the condition of my waist has improved.

state.今日运动: Making kites (light handicraft activity), moving furniture, 15-minute brisk walking in the residential area

2025-01.daily_overview: The last Sunday before the Spring Festival revolves around the themes of "procurement" and "adjustment." In the morning, meticulous preparations were made for the upcoming festival with careful and budget-conscious shopping for New Year goods. In the afternoon, due to the persistent discomfort in the lower back, proactive measures were taken to explore methods for prevention and exercise. Health management has now entered an active phase, and a dietary plan has been initiated.

events.name: Large-scale Purchasing at the New Year Goods Market
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan, armed with a list prepared the night before, headed to a large local farmers' market in Haikou City. The market was bustling with crowds, and the festive atmosphere of the Chinese New Year was growing stronger. They weaved through the various stalls, with Lu Mingqiang utilizing his "eagle eye" and bargaining skills honed over years of shopping. He opted out of expensive seafood and carefully selected local Wenchang chicken, fresh vegetables, candies, melon seeds, Spring Festival couplets, "Fu" character decorations, and lanterns. Every expense was kept within the budget as much as possible, with priority given to healthy ingredients.

events.name: Organize and categorize New Year goods.
events.description: After returning home with the purchases, Lu Mingqiang and his wife sorted and organized the various bags of New Year goods together. The chicken that needed to be frozen was placed in the freezer, while the vegetables and fruits were stored in the refrigerator. Candy, snacks, Spring Festival couplets, and other festive items were carefully stored in the cabinet, ready to be taken out and arranged as the Spring Festival approached. At the same time, they cleared out any expired food items.

events.name: Family Frugal Leisure Day
events.description: In the afternoon, the family would have typically gone to a teahouse for "laoba tea" as per old habits, but to adhere to the tightened budget, they opted for a stay-at-home leisure activity instead. Wang Lijuan, the wife, used the ingredients purchased in the morning to prepare "Qing Bu Liang," a traditional Chinese dessert, while Lu Mingqiang spent time with their two children in the living room, watching television and enjoying low-cost family moments, all while avoiding oily snacks.

events.name: Decided to increase targeted waist exercises.
events.description: Although the discomfort in his lower back had lessened on his day off, it still lingered faintly. After several days of reflection and discussions with his coworkers, Lu Mingqiang realized that merely applying medicated plasters was insufficient—proactive prevention was essential. He decided to add some exercises targeting his core abdominal and lower back strength to his existing routine of running and squash. In the evening, he used his phone to search for videos on "rehabilitation exercises for lumbar muscle strain" and "beginner core strength training," bookmarking a few that appeared simple and easy to learn. He planned to start practicing them daily from the next day onward.

events.name: Communicating the final results of the medical examination with family members
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang informed his wife and children of the official results of the family's paper-based health checkup reports. He happily emphasized that everyone was generally in good health, with the children developing well. However, he candidly pointed out that due to work-related fatigue, his weight and blood lipid levels required control, and his lower back needed stronger protection. Taking this opportunity, he formally proposed a plan to increase exercise and adjust his diet, and decided to take the entire family for an annual health checkup in the future. Both his wife and children expressed their support, and the dinner featured mainly light dishes.

events.name: Begin the lumbar extension exercise.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang tried 10 minutes of waist stretching exercises, felt his muscles relax, and decided to persist with doing them once each morning and evening.

起始状态.心情: Preparing for Spring Festival purchases, with a touch of busy anticipation, and launching a health plan.

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction of completing the procurement, along with the determination to initiate the health management plan, brings a sense of well-being to the waist.

state.今日运动: Walking to purchase New Year goods (moderate-intensity walking), 10 minutes of waist stretching.
