2025-01.daily_overview: On the last working day before the Spring Festival, work proceeded as usual, but Lu Mingqiang had already begun consciously applying the experience passed down by his mentor during operations and paid more attention to his posture. The awareness of career development and health protection was gradually integrating into his daily work, and the healthy eating plan continued.

events.name: Daily Work (Applying Master's Experience)
events.description: Today's task was to troubleshoot a lighting circuit fault along a commercial street. The fault point was quite concealed. While conducting the inspection, Lu Mingqiang recalled the "practical method" for quickly locating similar hidden faults mentioned in Master Li's notes. He tried the approach and indeed quickly identified the issue—a slightly corroded connection due to rainwater—saving considerable troubleshooting time. This further strengthened his trust in his master's experience.

events.name: Pay attention to lumbar protection during work.
events.description: When working at heights or bending down to thread pipes, Lu Mingqiang no longer prioritized speed as he used to. Instead, he consciously slowed down his pace, frequently changed his posture, and tried squatting instead of bending over directly when prolonged stooping was required. Zhao Qiang, a young apprentice in the same team, asked out of curiosity. Lu Mingqiang replied simply, "Take care of your back, take it slow, and you'll work longer." He also shared some protective techniques.

events.name: Evening Review and Health Knowledge Learning
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang continued reviewing electrical engineering knowledge. During his break, he opened the lower back exercise video he had saved the day before and attempted two sets of the most basic glute bridges and bird-dog exercises on the living room carpet. He felt some engagement in his core and lower back, and indeed felt more comfortable afterward. He plans to persist gradually and recorded today's exercise session.

events.name: Healthy Family Dinner
events.description: During dinner, his wife prepared a light Hainanese chicken rice and vegetable salad, reducing the oil content. Lu Mingqiang felt his appetite was good, and his weight continued to decrease.

events.name: Temporary work overtime
events.description: Due to the heavy workload before the Spring Festival, Lu Mingqiang worked an extra hour in the evening to complete the report, which resulted in him staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Monday's work status, the sense of wrapping up in the final week before the Spring Festival, health management in progress.

结束状态.心情: I feel peaceful and fulfilled by applying what I have learned in my work. I have gained initial experience in maintaining regular healthy exercise, with noticeable improvement in my lower back.

state.今日运动: Daily work (working at heights, wiring, moderate physical exertion), 15 minutes of basic lumbar exercises in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, temperature 22-28°C, as warm as spring
date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year's Eve

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is New Year's Eve, with reunion and celebration as the absolute theme. While enjoying the warmth of family, Lu Mingqiang also received good professional news—the skill enhancement bonus is about to be issued, providing tangible financial support for his exam preparation plan. His joy doubled, but the festive diet led to a rebound in his weight.

events.name: Learning about the skill enhancement bonus news
events.description: On the last working day before the Spring Festival, the team held a brief morning meeting. Team leader Zhang announced that, to encourage skill enhancement, the company would distribute the skill improvement bonus for this month before the end of the month. He then read out the list of eligible employees, which included Lu Mingqiang. Upon hearing his name, Lu Mingqiang felt a surge of joy, believing that his efforts and choices had received formal recognition from the company. He planned to use the bonus for educational savings.

events.name: Drive to parents' home
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and his family of four drove to his parents' home in Meilan District, bringing along the prepared New Year goods and gifts. The road was bustling with traffic, filled with a festive atmosphere.

events.name: Family Reunion Preparing the New Year's Eve Dinner
events.description: Upon arriving at his parents' home, the atmosphere immediately became lively. Lu Mingqiang, along with his eldest son Lu Zixuan, was busy putting up spring couplets and hanging lanterns. His father, Lu Jianguo, stood nearby, cheerfully directing the placement and height. Meanwhile, his mother, Chen Xiuying, and his wife, Wang Lijuan, were bustling about in the kitchen, preparing a lavish New Year's Eve dinner. The air was filled with the enticing aroma of Hainanese chicken rice and white-cut chicken, though Lu Mingqiang was mindful to reduce his intake of greasy food.

events.name: Warm and lively New Year's Eve dinner
events.description: In the evening, the sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner was served: Hainanese chicken rice, poached chicken, grilled fish, qingbuliang (a traditional Hainan dessert), various seafood dishes, and stir-fried dishes. The family of six, spanning three generations, gathered around the table, raising their glasses to toast each other for the New Year. The children excitedly paid New Year's greetings to their grandparents and received red envelopes with lucky money. The Spring Festival Gala played on the television, filling the entire house with laughter and joy. Although Lu Mingqiang enjoyed the festivities, he carefully controlled his food intake.

events.name: Staying Up Late on New Year's Eve and Rest
events.description: After dinner, the family watched the Spring Festival Gala while chatting and snacking. Considering the need to get up early the next day for New Year visits and the children being unable to stay up much longer, as midnight approached, everyone gradually washed up and stayed overnight at their parents' home. Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang was still thinking about the upcoming bonus, planning to discuss with his wife how to use it, and stayed up late to observe the tradition of "shousui."

起始状态.心情: Anticipation, mingled with the longing for festive reunions and the joy of hearing good news, momentarily loosens the grip of health consciousness.

结束状态.心情: Happy and content, immersed in the warmth of family and festive joy, feeling optimistic about career prospects, yet experiencing slight guilt over dietary habits.

state.今日运动: Pasting Spring Festival couplets and hanging lanterns (light household chores)

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, temperature 23-29°C, the weather is excellent.
date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year (Spring Festival)

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, the time was spent amidst festive and harmonious New Year greetings. Lu Mingqiang not only adhered to traditional customs but also maintained important social connections through modern means. Family and social networks were strengthened during the holiday, yet he continued to control his diet to prevent weight regain.

events.name: Receiving relatives for New Year visits at home
events.description: Early in the morning, Lu Mingqiang and his family joined his parents at their home to prepare tea and snacks, welcoming relatives who came to pay New Year visits. Aunt Wang Xiuying's family arrived first, instantly making the house more lively. Everyone exchanged greetings like "Happy New Year" and "Wishing you prosperity," while the children played and laughed, and the adults chatted over tea, catching up on each other's recent lives. Lu Mingqiang opted for healthy snacks.

events.name: Paying New Year's visits to elders
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang took his wife and children on foot to visit several elders living in nearby residential complexes to extend New Year greetings, including his father's former colleagues and his mother's old friends. They presented carefully prepared New Year gifts (such as fruits and pastries) to express respect and blessings for the elders, while politely declining high-sugar snacks.

events.name: Send New Year's greetings online
events.description: During his leisure time in the evening, Lu Mingqiang sat on the sofa and sent customized New Year greetings via WeChat to important friends and colleagues, including his mentor Master Li, coworkers Chen Jianguo, Squad Leader Zhang, and his sports partner Lin Feng. He also received their replies. This modern way of greeting helped maintain the warmth in his social relationships during the holiday season, while also mentioning the progress of his health management.

events.name: Family Leisure Brisk Walking
events.description: To offset the effects of holiday eating, Lu Mingqiang took his family for a 20-minute brisk walk in the neighborhood park, and his waist felt fine.

events.name: Evening Lower Back Stretches
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang insisted on doing 10 minutes of waist stretching exercises to ensure his healthy habits remained uninterrupted.

起始状态.心情: The joy and vitality of the first day of the new year, but with attention to dietary control.

结束状态.心情: Joyful, surrounded by familial love and blessings, with social needs fulfilled and health management sustained.

state.今日运动: Walking visits to neighbors (light activity), 20 minutes of brisk family walking, 10 minutes of waist stretching

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year (Spring Festival)

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the Lunar New Year, the Spring Festival holiday entered a relatively relaxed rhythm. The morning was dedicated to in-depth communication between father and son, while the afternoon returned to the small family unit, where plans were made with my wife on how to allocate the bonus, closely linking professional achievements with the family's long-term goals, and resuming a healthy diet.

events.name: Accompanying father for walks and playing chess
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang accompanied his father Lu Jianguo for a walk in the residential community. The sunlight was warm and pleasant as the father and son strolled and chatted, covering topics ranging from Lu Mingqiang's recent work to technological developments in the electrical industry, and then to the education of their two grandsons. After returning home, the two set up a chessboard on the balcony and played two games of chess. Throughout the process, they continued exchanging views on certain electrical circuit issues and discussed methods for maintaining health.

events.name: Family Leisure: Movie Watching and Chatting
events.description: In the afternoon, the whole family gathered in the living room to watch a family-friendly movie, with the children captivated by the plot. Lu Mingqiang, meanwhile, discussed the family's plans for the new year with his father and wife. The conversation covered key aspects of the children's education, potential minor improvements for the household, and Lu Mingqiang's career prospects after obtaining his professional certification, with an emphasis on investing in health.

events.name: Planning the Use of the Bonus with My Wife
events.description: In the evening, in the guest room at their parents' house, after the children had fallen asleep, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan discussed in low voices the details of the 2,000-yuan skill enhancement bonus that was about to be credited. They revisited the original intention behind establishing the family education savings account in the middle of the month and unanimously agreed that this "windfall" should be fully deposited into the account. The funds would be earmarked specifically for the training fees, textbook expenses, and registration costs required for Lu Mingqiang's preparation for the senior technician certification exam. This decision was not only an investment in his career development but also aligned with the family's long-term interests.

events.name: Recovery Health Dinner
events.description: For dinner, he focused on light vegetables and fish, reducing the consumption of greasy leftover food from the Spring Festival. Lu Mingqiang felt his weight starting to drop.

events.name: Core Exercises for the Lower Back
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang performed 15 minutes of core abdominal training to enhance muscle strength and protect his lower back.

起始状态.心情: Relax, enjoy the leisure of the holiday and family affection, and return to health management.

结束状态.心情: Steady and goal-oriented, communication with my father has deepened understanding, and planning with my wife has made family goals clearer and more achievable, with a sense of stability in the waist.

state.今日运动: Walking within the residential area (light intensity), 15 minutes of core waist exercises.

date_attribute.holiday: Chinese New Year (Spring Festival)

2025-01.daily_overview: On the last day of the Spring Festival holiday, the return journey, harvest, and future plans came to a close. Lu Mingqiang received his bonus and deposited it into an education account, bringing the holiday to a satisfying conclusion. At the same time, he did not forget his commitment to health, planning to incorporate new exercise routines into his life to ultimately achieve his goal of improved well-being.

events.name: Bid farewell to parents and return to one's own home.
events.description: On the afternoon of the third day of the lunar new year, as the Spring Festival reunion drew to a close, Lu Mingqiang and his family bid farewell to his parents. They loaded the car with an abundance of prepared foods and local specialties provided by the parents, then drove back to their home on Jinmao Middle Road in Longhua District. Upon arrival, they carefully selected the healthiest food items to bring inside.

events.name: Claim Skill Enhancement Bonus
events.description: Although it was still the holiday period, the company's finance department had staff on duty to handle urgent matters. Lu Mingqiang made a special trip to the company in the afternoon, followed the procedures to sign and confirm at the finance office, and received a cash bonus of 2,000 yuan. The finance staff congratulated him with a smile, saying he had "started the new year with a bang."

events.name: Informing Wife of Good News via Phone Call
events.description: After receiving the cash, Lu Mingqiang couldn't wait to call his wife Wang Lijuan, who was tidying up at home, on his way back to his workstation. His voice was filled with joy: "Lijuan, I've got the bonus—2,000 yuan, brand new!" The two briefly reconfirmed their previous arrangements over the phone.

events.name: Deposit the bonus into the education account.
events.description: After leaving the company, Lu Mingqiang did not go home. Instead, he drove directly to a bank branch near his residence and used an ATM to deposit 2,000 yuan in cash into the previously opened "Children's Education Fund" special savings account, completing the targeted allocation of these funds. Looking at the deposit receipt, he felt he had taken another step closer to his goal.

events.name: Organizing and Planning at Home in the Evening
events.description: In the evening, the family sorted through the items brought back from the parents' home, while the wife washed the clothes that had been changed out of. Lu Mingqiang checked the safety of the water, electricity, and gas in the house, which had been unoccupied for several days. Before going to bed, he checked the calendar on his phone to plan the rhythm of resuming work, exercise, and review after the holiday. He specifically reminded himself to incorporate core waist exercises and brisk walking into his weekly plan and recorded today's health data.

events.name: Final Health Status Confirmation
events.description: Lu Mingqiang's weight was measured at 72kg. He completed waist extension exercises and adjusted his sleep time to 22:40, which aligns with the health improvement plan. He expressed satisfaction with the recovery from his waist injury and the maintenance of his physical fitness.

起始状态.心情: A faint sense of reluctance as the holiday draws to a close, coupled with a transitional mindset preparing to return to daily routines, with clear health goals in mind.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, satisfying, and full of hope. The Spring Festival holiday has concluded successfully, with professional achievements being substantially rewarded and successfully converted into family reserves. There is a strong sense of motivation for life and goals after the holiday, and health conditions have reached the improvement targets.

state.今日运动: Driving and walking for errands (light activity), 15 minutes of lumbar stretching exercises, 20 minutes of brisk walking.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, slightly cool in the morning and evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: It was a tranquil Sunday, and Lu Mingqiang found a balance between family responsibilities, personal health plans, and socializing with colleagues. He declined an invitation to a greasy grilled fish dinner in the evening, opting instead to return home for a light and healthy meal. He also began implementing a plan to increase the frequency of his morning runs, demonstrating his dual commitment to both his family and his own well-being.

events.name: Declining a Colleague's Invitation to Grilled Fish
events.description: Before leaving work, Chen Jianguo, a fellow worker, enthusiastically invited Lu Mingqiang to have grilled fish at their usual street food stall. Lu Mingqiang, considering that his wife had already prepared a lighter dinner at home according to their new health plan and not wanting to disrupt the family's dining routine, politely declined for this reason. He added, "Let's grab a simple fast food lunch near the construction site another day. I'd still prefer to eat at home in the evening for a more relaxed meal."

events.name: First Attempt to Increase the Frequency of Brisk Walking
events.description: Early in the morning, Lu Mingqiang followed the plan agreed upon with his wife Wang Lijuan and carried out his first brisk walk, increasing the frequency from twice to three times a week. He maintained a moderate pace for 45 minutes, focusing on protecting his lower back. After completing the goal, he felt a sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Experience a New Model of Family Healthy Eating
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang noticed that the dishes on the table were noticeably lighter than usual, with oily foods like grilled fish temporarily set aside. His wife, Wang Lijuan, explained that this adjustment was part of their health plan. Lu Mingqiang did not show any resistance; instead, he found the flavors refreshing. He reduced his rice intake, increased his vegetable consumption, and proactively adapted to this healthier family dietary pattern.

events.name: Staying up late due to studying for exams.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang studied materials for half an hour to prepare for the Senior Electrician Technician Certificate exam, which caused him to go to bed later than planned, but he maintained his habit of stretching his waist.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the new plan.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, I have completed today's health commitment, though feeling slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Walk briskly for 45 minutes, followed by waist stretching exercises.

2025-02.daily_overview: The day was filled with the warmth of family reunion and unexpected surprises. Lu Mingqiang and his wife meticulously prepared to welcome his brother-in-law. After a sumptuous family feast of Hainanese chicken rice, he received a gift that would change the way he accessed and recorded information—a new smartphone. For the first time, he experienced the convenience and joy of capturing and sharing family happiness through images.

events.name: Preparing for the Family Gathering for Brother-in-law's Visit
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan cleaned and tidied the living room together. Afterwards, they went to the market to purchase fresh ingredients. Lu Mingqiang was responsible for selecting the Wenchang chicken and spices for making Hainanese chicken rice, and he also bought some seafood that his brother-in-law enjoys. After returning home, Lu Mingqiang took charge of the cooking, handling the chicken and preparing the chicken oil rice according to the method taught by his mother, while his wife prepared the other side dishes and soup.

events.name: Family Dinner and Receiving a New Mobile Phone
events.description: In the evening, Chen Zhiqiang, the brother-in-law, visited with gifts. The atmosphere at the dinner table was lively, and everyone enjoyed authentic Hainanese chicken rice. Chen Zhiqiang presented a beautifully packaged smartphone to Lu Mingqiang, saying, "Brother-in-law, I noticed you're still using an old-fashioned phone. This one is convenient, takes clear photos, and will make video calls with the kids or looking up information much easier." Lu Mingqiang was somewhat surprised and repeatedly expressed his thanks.

events.name: First Attempt at Mobile Photography
events.description: Under Chen Zhiqiang's instigation and step-by-step guidance, Lu Mingqiang somewhat clumsily opened the camera function on his new phone. He first attempted to take a photo of his second son, Lu Zihan, who was gnawing on a chicken leg, and the result was unexpectedly clear. Subsequently, he captured images of the sumptuous dishes on the dining table, the moment when his wife and brother-in-law were chatting and laughing, as well as his eldest son playing in the living room.

events.name: Photo Sharing and Gaining Interactions with Friends and Family
events.description: After the gathering, with Chen Zhiqiang's help, Lu Mingqiang posted several well-taken photos to the WeChat family group named "Happy Family." Soon, his father Lu Jianguo sent a [thumbs-up] emoji, while his mother Chen Xiuying commented, "The chicken rice looks delicious." His elder brother Lu Minghua, who lives far away in Shenzhen, also replied, "Your cooking skills have improved." Seeing these instant responses, Lu Mingqiang experienced for the first time the sense of connection and satisfaction brought by recording and sharing images.

events.name: Slept late due to a dinner gathering.
events.description: Due to the joyous continuation of the family gathering, Lu Mingqiang stayed up later than usual, but he was in a cheerful mood.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the upcoming family gathering with joy.

结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful and with a sense of novelty, happy about the new phone's features and the family's feedback.

state.今日运动: None (rest days, primarily focused on household chores and family activities)

date_attribute.holiday: Day off (substituted from 01/26/2025)

2025-02.daily_overview: Today is a workday due to a schedule adjustment, and Lu Mingqiang is fully engaged in a new work project. He and his colleagues conducted the first inspection of an old residential community. During breaks, he continued exploring his new mobile phone and was introduced to the concept of digital health management by a fellow runner. In the evening, he keenly noticed a minor malfunction in a common household appliance.

events.name: Preliminary Survey for Power Renovation Project in Old Residential Areas
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and his colleague Chen Jianguo drove to a target old residential area in Xiuying District. At the property management office, they carefully listened to Director Wang's introduction regarding the frequent power outages, unstable voltage, and other issues in the community, and reviewed the historical complaint records. Subsequently, under Director Wang's guidance, the two conducted a preliminary inspection of the public power distribution room and several typical corridor meter boxes, gaining an intuitive understanding of the aging condition and layout of the facilities. Lu Mingqiang noted several key problem areas in his notebook.

events.name: Continue exploring new mobile photography
events.description: During lunch breaks and after work, Lu Mingqiang continued to explore the camera functions of his new phone in his spare time at work and at home. He tried photographing neatly arranged toolboxes at the construction site, the street view from his office window, and the adorable sight of his children eating dinner. He discovered that the shooting effects varied significantly under different lighting conditions, which he found quite intriguing.

events.name: Runners Recommend Sports and Health Apps
events.description: During his morning run today, Lu Mingqiang encountered his running partner Chen Bin. During their conversation, Chen Bin recommended a fitness and health app he was currently using, mentioning that it could track running routes, pace, and manage physical data, making it very convenient. Lu Mingqiang, thinking of his plan to increase his exercise frequency, became interested in this recommendation.

events.name: Found poor contact in the household electrical outlet.
events.description: In the evening, while charging his phone in the living room, Lu Mingqiang noticed that the desk lamp plugged into an outlet near the sofa occasionally flickered. After testing by plugging and unplugging the appliance several times, he confirmed that there was an internal contact issue with the outlet, posing a risk of power failure. Out of professional habit, he immediately decided to fix it after dinner.

events.name: Work pressure leads to mood fluctuations.
events.description: During the survey, Lu Mingqiang felt some pressure when encountering complex issues, but he alleviated his emotions by focusing on his work.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused and get ready to start a new week of work (with adjusted work schedule).

结束状态.心情: Being pragmatic, we have identified issues that need to be addressed and explored new tools, though feeling somewhat fatigued.

state.今日运动: Walk briskly for 45 minutes.

date_attribute.holiday: Day off (substituted from 02/08/2025)

2025-02.daily_overview: On another adjusted workday, Lu Mingqiang entered a more detailed professional inspection phase for the survey of old residential communities. Meanwhile, digital tools began to integrate more deeply into his life: he downloaded a fitness app and used it systematically for the first time to manage his health goals. In the evening, he efficiently resolved a minor electrical circuit issue at home, demonstrating the value of professional skills in daily life.

events.name: Detailed Survey and Preliminary Drafting of Power System Renovation Plan for Residential Community
events.description: Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo returned to the residential complex with professional tools such as a multimeter and an insulation resistance tester. They systematically inspected the insulation aging of the main power lines, measured the load current of the entry lines for each unit, and specifically marked multiple hazard points, including loose wiring connections and corroded meter boxes. After completing the inspection, the two squatted outside the distribution room. Based on the test data, observations, and the property management’s requirements, Lu Mingqiang dictated while Chen Jianguo recorded, quickly drafting the core points of the renovation plan, the required material list, and a preliminary estimate of the work hours.

events.name: Download and set up the Health & Fitness app
events.description: Before dinner, Lu Mingqiang used his new phone to find the sports and health app recommended by Chen Bin in the app store and completed the download and installation. In the evening, he spent some time carefully studying each functional module, diligently entered his height (171 cm) and weight (72.1 kg) as prompted, and set a personal exercise goal of "running three times a week, at least 5 kilometers each time." Looking at the virtual badges and schedule generated by the app, he felt that this management method was very clear.

events.name: Prepare maintenance tools.
events.description: After deciding to repair the faulty socket, Lu Mingqiang retrieved his household toolbox from the balcony storage cabinet. He checked whether the multimeter had sufficient battery power and confirmed that there was a spare safety socket of the same model available for replacement.

events.name: Safe Power Shutdown and Fault Troubleshooting
events.description: To ensure safety, Lu Mingqiang first had his family leave the living room area, then turned off the circuit breaker for the living room outlet circuit in the wall-mounted electrical panel. He removed the cover of the faulty outlet, while his wife Wang Lijuan assisted by providing illumination with a flashlight. Using a screwdriver, he disconnected the internal wiring and tested it with a multimeter. Ultimately, he confirmed that the metal spring inside the outlet had weakened due to prolonged plugging and unplugging, resulting in poor contact.

events.name: Replace the new socket and test it.
events.description: Lu Mingqiang skillfully connected the live wire, neutral wire, and ground wire from the old socket to the new socket in the standard order of "left neutral, right live, center ground," securing them firmly. He then steadily fixed the new socket into the wall-mounted back box. After completing the installation, he turned on the circuit breaker to restore power and repeatedly tested the new socket by plugging and unplugging a desk lamp, confirming that it operated stably without flickering.

events.name: Check other sockets as well.
events.description: Out of professional habit, after completing the repairs, Lu Mingqiang also checked the stability of several other commonly used sockets in the living room and bedroom. He lightly touched their surfaces with the back of his hand to confirm there was no abnormal heating, and only then did he feel completely at ease.

events.name: Clean up the maintenance site
events.description: After completing the repairs, Lu Mingqiang gathered the replaced old socket, cut wire ends, and other debris into a trash bag. He then wiped all the tools clean with a cloth and neatly placed them back into the toolbox. Wang Lijuan also helped by sweeping away the small amount of wall dust that had fallen on the floor with a broom.

events.name: Lumbar discomfort leads to early bedtime.
events.description: Due to the fatigue from a full day of investigation and maintenance, Lu Mingqiang experienced slight soreness in his lower back and decided to rest early to recover.

起始状态.心情: Invest, and prepare to conduct more in-depth work investigations.

结束状态.心情: Steady and fulfilling, I have not only completed the professional survey but also resolved hidden dangers at home and initiated digital health management, though I feel slightly physically fatigued.

state.今日运动: No (The compensatory day was primarily dedicated to survey work, with no brisk walking arranged.)

2025-02.daily_overview: With the resumption of normal working days, the renovation project for old residential communities officially commenced construction. As a key member, Lu Mingqiang led the team in efficiently completing the first phase of tasks. During work breaks, he was drawn to rehabilitation guidance videos in an app, sparking his attention to issues of lumbar strain. Additionally, he received his salary, which included overtime pay, bringing good news to his family's finances.

events.name: Project Construction Commencement and On-site Verification
events.description: Early in the morning, Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, and apprentice Zhao Qiang arrived at the residential community's power distribution room to conduct a final confirmation with Property Manager Wang. They checked the construction sketches and marked the locations of the main switch and cable routes to be replaced on the wall with chalk. Lu Mingqiang counted the materials delivered by the company and sternly emphasized the safety regulations and key procedures for the day's work to Zhao Qiang.

events.name: Replacement of Main Switch and Cable
events.description: After ensuring the entire building was safely powered off and warning signs were posted, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo began the core operation. Lu Mingqiang took the lead, using professional tools to dismantle the old main switch, while Chen Jianguo assisted and monitored safety. Zhao Qiang was responsible for delivering new cables and tools. The three worked seamlessly together, efficiently completing the upgrade of the main section, laying a solid foundation for the subsequent household renovation.

events.name: Focus on Rehabilitation Guidance in Sports Apps
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang opened a fitness app and casually browsed through it, unexpectedly discovering rehabilitation training tutorial videos targeting "lower back pain from prolonged sitting" and "lumbar strain." Recalling the occasional soreness in his lower back after heavy physical work, he curiously clicked on a few videos explaining the movements. He found this intuitive, at-home health guidance method quite practical and silently memorized a few simple stretching exercises.

events.name: Receive last month's salary and overtime pay
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang went to the company's finance office to collect his payslip for the previous month. He carefully reviewed the listed items, including his base salary, performance bonus, and a clearly marked "Overtime Pay for the Spring Festival Holiday," confirming that the total amount was correct and had been credited to his account. This additional income gave him greater peace of mind regarding his family's recent expenses.

events.name: Slept slightly later due to overtime work on the project.
events.description: With heavy construction tasks, Lu Mingqiang handled some household chores after returning home, which caused him to go to bed later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive, ready to commence the important construction task.

结束状态.心情: Tired but satisfied, the project has started smoothly, income is in place, and there is a new focus on health.

state.今日运动: None (High-intensity construction days with significant physical exertion)

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, turning overcast in the afternoon.

2025-02.daily_overview: The renovation project has entered a critical stage. Lu Mingqiang, leveraging his extensive experience, resolved concealed faults not indicated in the drawings and provided practical guidance to apprentices during the process. After a day of strenuous physical labor, he gained a deeper appreciation for the necessity of proactive lumbar health care.

events.name: Layer-by-Layer Equipment Replacement and Hidden Fault Troubleshooting
events.description: The three-person team began systematically replacing the circuit breakers and branch circuits on each floor. During the replacement process, Lu Mingqiang noticed an abnormal slight heating in one section of the wiring. He deduced that the blueprint did not indicate a potential hidden poor connection at this location. After precisely locating the issue with a multimeter, he discovered an oxidized joint that had been hastily wrapped with electrical tape. He explained the troubleshooting logic for this "atypical" fault to Zhao Qiang and then proceeded with the repair.

events.name: Guiding apprentices in practical operations
events.description: After confirming it was safe and the operation was straightforward, Lu Mingqiang had Zhao Qiang try replacing a few circuit breakers nearby, while he himself provided guidance on the wiring sequence and tightening torque. He told Zhao Qiang, "Don’t think it’s just a small task. Insufficient torque can cause overheating, while too much can damage the terminals. You have to have a feel for it."

events.name: Organizing Circuits and Preliminary Testing
events.description: After completing the replacement of all equipment, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo spent considerable time reorganizing, bundling, and standardizing the chaotic old wiring in the hallway. This was done not only for safety reasons but also to achieve a neater appearance. Before finishing work in the afternoon, they conducted a preliminary power-on test. The power supply on each floor was largely restored to normal, with only a few rooms requiring minor adjustments the following day, which were duly recorded.

events.name: Take a break early when experiencing waist fatigue.
events.description: After a full day of high-intensity work, Lu Mingqiang felt significant soreness in his lower back. He decided to go to bed early to alleviate the discomfort and performed some lower back stretching exercises.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to address the technical details in the project.

结束状态.心情: Physically fatigued yet mentally focused, having accumulated experience in handling complex issues and completed the task of mentoring and knowledge transfer.

state.今日运动: 15-Minute Lower Back Stretching Exercises

2025-02.daily_overview: The renovation project for the old residential community has been successfully completed. Lu Mingqiang led his team in conducting the final tests and acceptance procedures, earning high praise from the client. The sense of accomplishment from work extended into his family life, as he and his wife began planning how to use the additional income and decided to visit his aunt over the weekend, who had provided him with spiritual support.

events.name: System Joint Debugging and Final Testing
events.description: On the final day of construction, Lu Mingqiang led the team in conducting system joint debugging. They simulated the evening electricity peak usage of residents, using professional equipment to perform load testing on the upgraded power lines. They closely monitored voltage stability and the operating temperatures of critical equipment to ensure all parameters met safety standards. Lu Mingqiang provided Zhao Qiang with a detailed explanation of the significance and compliance requirements for each set of test data.

events.name: Site Cleanup and Project Acceptance
events.description: After the test was passed, the three individuals thoroughly cleaned up the waste materials generated during the construction, such as cable sheaths and packaging boxes, restoring the site to a tidy condition. Subsequently, Lu Mingqiang reported the completion of the construction to Property Manager Wang and Company Team Leader Zhang, accompanied them for the final inspection, and patiently addressed Manager Wang's questions regarding daily maintenance. The project was successfully delivered, earning praise from Manager Wang and the residents present.

events.name: Discussing the Use of Year-end Bonus with My Wife
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan sat on the sofa, taking out their pay stubs and the known year-end bonus amount to discuss. They initially agreed that the majority of this extra income would be deposited into the family's fixed-term account as an "emergency reserve fund," while a small portion would be used to subsidize the upcoming Spring Festival expenses, such as buying new clothes for their child and preparing red envelopes.

events.name: Plan to visit my aunt this weekend.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang thought of his caring aunt, Wang Xiuying. After discussing with his wife, he decided to take their child to visit her on Saturday afternoon. This would not only help maintain family bonds but also allow them to receive some encouragement from their elder. Lu Mingqiang immediately used his new phone to call his aunt, confirming that she would be at home on Saturday and informing her of their visit plan. Over the phone, he could hear his aunt’s delighted voice.

events.name: Celebratory drinks and late night after project completion
events.description: To celebrate the success of the project, Lu Mingqiang had a small beer at home, which caused him to go to bed later than usual, but he felt relaxed.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to completing the final steps of the project.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed yet fulfilling, the success of the project brings professional satisfaction, while family finances and personal plans are also well arranged.

2025-02.daily_overview: A fulfilling and heartwarming Saturday. In the morning, I went for a morning run with fellow runners and exchanged insights on health. In the afternoon, I spent quality time with my family to nurture familial bonds before the Spring Festival—first sharing a cozy lunch with my parents, then driving to visit my aunt who always offers spiritual encouragement. Technology (a new phone) and traditional family affection intertwined on this day.

events.name: Saturday Brisk Walk and Interaction with Running Partners
events.description: In the early morning, Lu Mingqiang met up with his running friend Chen Bin at Baishamen Park as scheduled. The two walked briskly for about 5 kilometers along their familiar running track, chatting while exercising. Lu Mingqiang mentioned to Chen Bin that he had been experiencing some soreness and stiffness in his lower back after recent construction work, as well as his recent use of a fitness app. Chen Bin shared some of his own experiences in relieving muscle fatigue and once again affirmed the benefits of using an app for tracking.

events.name: Having a Spring Festival Family Lunch with Parents
events.description: After a brisk walk and a simple breakfast, Lu Mingqiang drove his wife and two children to his parents' home in Meilan District. His mother, Chen Xiuying, had already prepared a table full of hearty Hainan home-style dishes, including his favorite chicken rice and qingbuliang (a traditional Hainan dessert). During the meal, the children offered their early New Year greetings to their grandparents. Lu Mingqiang discussed the recently completed neighborhood renovation project with his father, Lu Jianguo, who nodded in approval and encouraged him once again: "Technical skills are fundamental, but you should also focus on theory. It's time to start preparing for the senior technician certification." The warm family gathering lasted the entire noon.

events.name: Buying gifts to visit my aunt.
events.description: After leaving his parents' home, Lu Mingqiang and his wife stopped by a familiar shop to buy some traditional pastries and fresh fruits that his aunt enjoys, as gifts for their visit.

events.name: Visiting Aunt Wang Xiuying
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and his family visited his aunt's home in Qiongshan District. The aunt warmly treated them with traditional Hainan tea and snacks. During their conversation, the aunt inquired with concern about Lu Mingqiang's work and his plans to prepare for the senior electrician technician certification. Drawing from her own experience in teaching, she encouraged him, saying, "It's never too late to learn. What matters most is having a plan and the perseverance to stick to it. You are diligent and steady in your work, so I'm sure you will succeed." These words greatly inspired Lu Mingqiang. Meanwhile, his wife, Wang Lijuan, exchanged parenting insights with the aunt.

events.name: Returning home after the visit
events.description: The pleasant visit lasted until evening. Before parting, Auntie reminded Lu Mingqiang to pay attention to safety at work and stick to his study plan. After expressing their gratitude, Lu Mingqiang and his family drove back to their home in Longhua District.

events.name: Stayed up late due to family activities.
events.description: There were many activities throughout the day, and after returning home, Lu Mingqiang dealt with some trivial matters, which caused him to go to bed later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed and well-planned, looking forward to reuniting with fellow runners and family.

结束状态.心情: Warm and resolute, drawing abundant emotional energy and support from family reunions and the teachings of elders.

state.今日运动: Brisk walk for approximately 5 kilometers, with waist stretching exercises.

2025-02.daily_overview: The last Sunday before the Spring Festival carries the theme of "Bidding Farewell to the Old and Welcoming the New." The entire family mobilizes for a thorough pre-festival cleaning and decluttering, refreshing the home environment. Meanwhile, Lu Mingqiang, drawing on his recent focus on health, begins to plan his personal exercise and rehabilitation arrangements in more specific detail.

events.name: Family pre-festival thorough cleaning
events.description: In the morning, the entire family began the thorough cleaning according to the division of labor arranged the previous night. Lu Mingqiang was responsible for cleaning the balcony, windows, and high cabinets; his wife, Wang Lijuan, focused on the kitchen and bathroom; the eldest son, Lu Zixuan, along with his younger brother, Lu Zihan, tidied up their toys and books. As they worked, everyone chatted, with Lu Mingqiang occasionally using his phone to capture moments of the children diligently working, creating a relaxed and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Organizing the Storage Room and Decluttering Decisions
events.description: While organizing the storage room, they cleared out a considerable amount of old clothes that no longer fit their child, along with old electrical appliance packaging boxes and other miscellaneous items. Lu Mingqiang and his wife discussed together and decided to wash and pack the old clothes that were still in good condition and wearable, then donate them to the community's used clothing collection point. Other unusable items, such as cardboard boxes, were disposed of as recyclable waste, while those that could not be repurposed were discarded.

events.name: Transporting Donated Clothing and Disposing of Garbage
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang drove several bags of old clothes to the designated community recycling point. At the same time, he disposed of the sorted recyclable and non-recyclable waste into the corresponding trash bins in the residential area, completing the final step of "decluttering."

events.name: Commence systematic lumbar rehabilitation training.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang followed the guidance of a fitness app and conducted his first systematic lower back rehabilitation training, including exercises such as planks and bird-dog poses, which lasted for 40 minutes. With his wife assisting and supervising nearby, he felt his core muscles being effectively exercised.

events.name: Plan personal exercise schedule
events.description: During his break, Lu Mingqiang meticulously planned his upcoming exercise regimen in the mobile memo: three brisk walks per week, two lower back rehabilitation sessions, and consistent lower back stretches.

起始状态.心情: Be pragmatic and ready to engage in household cleaning tasks.

结束状态.心情: Refreshing and well-organized, the home environment is renewed, and personal plans become clearer.

state.今日运动: Household chores (thorough cleaning), 40 minutes of lumbar rehabilitation training

2025-02.daily_overview: At the start of the new workweek, Lu Mingqiang resumed his routine tasks of handling residents' repair requests and took on the responsibility of mentoring apprentices. Meanwhile, the digital health management system transitioned from the "setup" phase to the "usage" phase, as he recorded his exercise data using the app for the first time and shared his experience with the referrer. The company officially distributed the year-end bonus, further improving the family's financial situation.

events.name: Receive and plan daily maintenance tasks
events.description: During the team morning meeting, Team Leader Zhang assigned several residential power repair tasks. After receiving the work order, Lu Mingqiang reviewed the fault locations and descriptions with his apprentice Zhao Qiang. Leveraging his familiarity with Haikou's roads, he quickly planned the most time-efficient and effective repair route.

events.name: First time using a fitness app to record brisk walking
events.description: Early in the morning, Lu Mingqiang opened the fitness app for the first time during his newly added third brisk walk and clicked to start recording. During the walk, he occasionally checked the real-time pace and distance covered on his phone screen. After completion, the app automatically generated data such as the GPS trajectory map, average pace, and calories burned. This quantified feedback made him find the experience quite interesting.

events.name: Handling Switch Malfunction in Resident's Living Room (Demonstration Teaching)
events.description: Arriving at the first repair site, the homeowner reported poor contact in the living room switch. Lu Mingqiang first inquired about the specific situation with the customer, then demonstrated the entire process to Zhao Qiang in detail: how to communicate politely, safely cut off the power, remove the panel, use a multimeter to diagnose contact point issues, and finally replace the new switch and conduct testing.

events.name: Guiding Apprentices in Troubleshooting Bedroom Light Faults
events.description: The second reported issue was a non-functioning bedroom light. Lu Mingqiang assigned Zhao Qiang to lead the troubleshooting process, which involved checking the bulb, the switch, and using a voltage tester to examine the wiring. Lu provided guidance only at critical safety points and logical junctures. Eventually, it was discovered that the neutral wire inside the lamp holder had become loose. Under Lu Mingqiang's supervision, Zhao Qiang completed the tightening operation, and the light was successfully restored.

events.name: Experience Sharing During Lunch
events.description: After completing the morning tasks, the two had lunch at a roadside eatery. Lu Mingqiang used the morning's cases to further explain to Zhao Qiang the differences in quality among various brands of switches, techniques for communicating with clients of different personalities, and how to clearly and properly fill out maintenance records.

events.name: Handling Complex Line Faults (Leading Instruction)
events.description: In the afternoon, a circuit fault in a kitchen socket was addressed, involving aged wiring and concealed short circuits. Lu Mingqiang led the troubleshooting and explained to Zhao Qiang how to quickly identify the general area of the fault based on the tripping characteristics of the air switch and the smell of burning. He demonstrated how to safely replace part of the aged wiring and install a ground-fault circuit interrupter (GFCI) socket.

events.name: Sharing APP usage experience with fellow runners
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang sent a message to Chen Bin via WeChat, briefly sharing his experience of using the app to record his brisk walk in the morning and asking a small question about heart rate zones. Chen Bin replied quickly, and the two had a brief exchange.

events.name: Receive annual performance bonus
events.description: The notification tone of a text message sounded, and Lu Mingqiang checked to find it was a bank deposit notification—the annual performance bonus issued by the company had arrived. Although the amount was not particularly large, it was recognition of his hard work over the past year. A sense of reassurance and satisfaction washed over him, and he immediately shared the good news with his wife.

events.name: Work Summary and Tool Restoration Before Leaving Work
events.description: After returning to the company, Lu Mingqiang gave a brief report to Squad Leader Zhang about the day's work. He then supervised and assisted Zhao Qiang in taking inventory, cleaning, and returning the tools used to the tool cabinet. At the same time, he checked the spare parts inventory on the engineering vehicle to prepare for the next day's work.

events.name: Going to bed early due to fatigue from instructing apprentices.
events.description: With a heavy teaching schedule throughout the day, Lu Mingqiang felt somewhat fatigued and decided to go to bed early to regain his energy.

起始状态.心情: Methodically prepared to begin a day of mentoring apprentices.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, I have not only completed the teaching tasks but also received a bonus, and digital health management is now on track.

state.今日运动: Brisk walk for approximately 5 kilometers (first time recorded with the app), lower back stretching exercises

2025-02.daily_overview: On the eve of the Spring Festival, Lu Mingqiang and his wife made their final bulk purchase of New Year goods. In the festive atmosphere of the market, he unexpectedly received a pleasant surprise that aligned with his personal hobby—he found a coveted vintage wine bottle. This joy of "picking up a bargain" added a unique personal touch to the busy pre-holiday preparations.

events.name: Purchasing Spring Festival goods
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and his wife took time off and went to a bustling New Year goods market in Longhua District. They bought couplets, the character "Fu," candies, and dried goods according to their shopping list. The market was crowded with people, and the festive atmosphere was strong. As they shopped, the two discussed what else they needed to purchase.

events.name: Unexpectedly Found a Favorite Wine Bottle
events.description: In front of a stall specializing in secondhand goods and folk crafts, Lu Mingqiang was drawn to several old wine bottles. He crouched down to examine them closely and unexpectedly discovered a ceramic wine bottle of "Haikou Daqu" from the 1970s in remarkably good condition, with clear patterns on the bottle and a warm, smooth glaze. Suppressing his excitement, he casually inquired about the price from the stall owner.

events.name: Successfully "snagged" a collection piece at a bargain price.
events.description: After a brief round of bargaining, Lu Mingqiang purchased the wine bottle at a price far lower than his psychological expectation. The stall owner seemed unaware of its collectible value. As he took the bottle, Lu Mingqiang felt a secret delight, convinced he had gotten a great bargain.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Collecting with My Wife
events.description: After purchasing the wine bottle, Lu Mingqiang could hardly contain his excitement. Carefully holding it, he explained to his wife Wang Lijuan, "Look at this 'Haikou Daqu'—it's quite rare nowadays, and the bottle design is classic. It perfectly fills the gap in my collection!" Seeing his delight, Wang Lijuan smiled and remarked on his good fortune.

events.name: Clean and install new collections
events.description: Upon returning home, Lu Mingqiang immediately fetched a soft cloth and clean water, carefully wiping the wine bottle to remove the dust on its surface. After letting it air dry, he solemnly placed it in a reserved spot within the living room's display cabinet. He then stepped back a few paces to admire it for a moment before taking several photos from different angles with his phone.

events.name: Sharing late-night moments online with fellow Tibetan art enthusiasts.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang shared photos of his new collection and exchanged insights with fellow bottle collector Chen Jianguo on WeChat, which led to him staying up later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a sense of anticipation before the holiday.

结束状态.心情: Exceptionally delighted and satisfied, not only have I completed the New Year shopping, but I also unexpectedly acquired a beloved collection.

state.今日运动: None (Afternoon off for procurement)

2025-02.daily_overview: The Lantern Festival, a day for family reunion. In the evening, Lu Mingqiang's family enjoyed a warm homemade feast and glutinous rice balls. He took the initiative to use his new smartphone to initiate a multi-party video call, allowing distant relatives to "join" this gathering. Technological means have significantly expanded the boundaries of familial affection in traditional festivals, strengthening the bonds of the extended family.

events.name: Purchasing ingredients for the Lantern Festival
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang and his wife went to the supermarket near their home, where they bought sesame and peanut filling tangyuan, as well as fresh meat, vegetables, and snacks that their children enjoy for dinner.

events.name: Preparing the Family Feast for the Lantern Festival
events.description: Upon returning home, the whole family worked together to prepare dinner. The children helped wash vegetables and set the table, Lu Mingqiang was in charge of stir-frying a few home-style dishes, while his wife Wang Lijuan took on the task of cooking tangyuan. The kitchen was filled with steam and the warm, bustling atmosphere of a family meal.

events.name: Enjoy the reunion dinner and record it with a mobile phone.
events.description: The whole family gathered around the dining table, enjoying a simple home-cooked meal and tangyuan, which symbolize reunion. Lu Mingqiang took out his phone to capture the precious moments: the adorable sight of the children blowing on the tangyuan they had just scooped up, his wife’s smiling profile, and the simple dishes on the table. To him, these ordinary moments felt especially precious.

events.name: Initiate remote family video call
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to suggest, "Let's have a video call with our parents, as well as my elder brother and Zhiqiang." He operated his new phone skillfully and initiated a multi-party video call invitation. Soon, his elder brother Lu Minghua in Shenzhen, his brother-in-law Chen Zhiqiang, and his parents living in Meilan District appeared one after another on the phone screen.

events.name: Joyful Remote Reunion
events.description: In the video, the children excitedly call out "Grandpa, Grandma, Uncle, Uncle" to the screen, showing the tangyuan in their bowls. The adults exchange holiday greetings, ask about each other's recent situations, and show concern for one another's health and work. On the screen, Father Lu Jianguo reminds Lu Mingqiang to stay safe, while his older brother jokingly asks what new collectibles he has acquired. Laughter and cheerful conversations gather together through the network, lasting for nearly an hour.

events.name: Processing Holiday Savings
events.description: During his lunch break, Lu Mingqiang went to the bank and deposited the majority of his previously received overtime pay and year-end bonus into the family's fixed-term savings account as planned. He then took a photo of the deposit receipt and sent it to his wife, completing an important step in their family financial planning.

events.name: Staying up late due to festive joy
events.description: The family activities during the Lantern Festival were joyful. Lu Mingqiang went to bed later than usual, but his heart was filled with warmth.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with anticipation for the evening family activities.

结束状态.心情: Warm and close-knit, technology makes family affection from afar within reach, and the cohesion of the extended family brings him happiness.

state.今日运动: No (Lantern Festival Family Day)

2025-02.daily_overview: Returning to the usual Thursday routine, after work came the regular squash game and socializing. Lu Mingqiang relieved stress through exercise and shared his newly developed interest in photography with his fellow players, receiving feedback and suggestions. The new joy brought by this new tool is gradually permeating different aspects of his life.

events.name: Squash Club Regular Practice (Intensity Adjustment)
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang drove to his regular squash club. He met up with his squash partner Lin Feng as scheduled and played three rounds of intensity-adjusted matches, avoiding sharp turns to protect his lower back. After the workout, he was drenched in sweat and felt thoroughly refreshed.

events.name: Exchanging photography insights with fellow players
events.description: After the practice session, the two sat by the court to rest and drink water. Lu Mingqiang took out his phone and showed Lin Feng some recent family photos he had taken, including a gathering during the Lantern Festival, children playing, and the "Haikou Daqu" liquor bottle he had found. Lin Feng praised him for capturing the essence of everyday life in his photos and suggested he try using "sports mode" next time to capture moments during the game.

events.name: Withdraw emergency cash for the Spring Festival
events.description: During a break in his workday, Lu Mingqiang went to a bank ATM and withdrew some cash from his checking account. This money was taken from the reserved funds for Spring Festival expenses, intended for traditional cash expenditures during the holiday, such as giving red envelopes to children and purchasing gifts for visiting relatives.

events.name: Lumbar Rehabilitation Training Continues
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang performed 40 minutes of lumbar rehabilitation training, persistently strengthening his core muscle groups.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, looking forward to relaxing through exercise in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, exercise releases stress, sharing interests with new friends also brings positive feedback, and the waist training has shown results.

state.今日运动: Squash practice for about 1 hour (adjust intensity), lower back rehabilitation training for 40 minutes.

2025-02.daily_overview: Friday, nearing the weekend. The wife began organizing the household ledger in preparation for the financial review the following day. Lu Mingqiang received an invitation to a gathering from an old classmate and started looking forward to reuniting with former friends. In the evening, he came across a free micro-course related to his work, immediately immersed himself in studying and taking notes, demonstrating a self-driven motivation for career advancement.

events.name: The wife organizes the household expense receipts.
events.description: In the evening, Wang Lijuan, the wife, exported the family's daily expense receipts for January along with the electronic statements from WeChat and Alipay. She then conducted a preliminary classification and summary on the coffee table, preparing for the review of the monthly budget with Lu Mingqiang the following day.

events.name: Received an invitation to a junior high school class reunion.
events.description: Lu Mingqiang received a WeChat message from his junior high school classmate Wu Gang, inviting him to attend a small class reunion over the weekend. Wu Gang mentioned that Zhou Wei, who had returned from Shenzhen, would also be there. Lu Mingqiang replied to confirm his attendance and began thinking about sharing updates during the gathering, such as his eldest son being nearly 10 years old and his current preparation for the electrician certification exam.

events.name: Discover Career Advancement Micro-Courses
events.description: While browsing the internet at home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang received a push notification on his phone for a free micro-course advertisement from a vocational technology platform, titled "Three Essential Techniques for Diagnosing Common Faults in New Intelligent Circuit Breakers." Upon opening the description, he found that the content addressed some of the challenging issues he occasionally encountered in his work, which immediately sparked his interest.

events.name: Focus on studying and taking notes on key points
events.description: During the half-hour before bedtime, Lu Mingqiang sat on the living room sofa, attentively watching the micro-lecture video. As he watched, he used the memo function on his phone to quickly jot down the key steps, required tools, and judgment criteria for the several rapid troubleshooting methods explained by the instructor.

events.name: Review and Reflection Application
events.description: After watching the video, he reviewed his notes again and compared the new ideas mentioned in the video with similar fault cases he had encountered in his past work, pondering whether these methods would have been more efficient if applied back then. He planned to find an opportunity the next day to discuss this with his coworker Chen Jianguo.

events.name: Staying up late due to studying micro-courses.
events.description: The micro-lecture content was engaging, leading Lu Mingqiang to study until late, which resulted in staying up late, but the gains were substantial.

起始状态.心情: Peace, the work week is drawing to a close.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, I discovered useful learning resources and look forward to the weekend gathering and organizing family finances.

2025-02.daily_overview: A fruitful Saturday. In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and his wife completed their shopping strictly according to the budget, reinforcing their new financial habits. In the evening, the couple reviewed the household account book together and were pleasantly surprised to find that the monthly surplus far exceeded expectations. They decisively decided to deposit most of the surplus into their children's education fund. The family's financial discipline and shared goals were significantly strengthened on this day.

events.name: Accompanying wife to make purchases according to budget
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang accompanied his wife Wang Lijuan to the market to purchase ingredients for the following week. They strictly adhered to the pre-made shopping list, forgoing any unplanned snacks and beverages they had considered buying on impulse. Lu Mingqiang also compared prices at different meat stalls and ultimately chose the one with the best value for money.

events.name: Sharing Bargain Hunting Experiences with Fellow Collectors
events.description: In the afternoon, during a regular tea gathering with fellow bottle collector Chen Jianguo, Lu Mingqiang took out his phone to show his friend photos of the "Haikou Daqu" liquor bottle. He recounted in detail how he discovered it at a New Year's goods market and successfully purchased it at a low price. After carefully examining the photos, his fellow collector repeatedly praised him for his "sharp eye and good luck," a recognition that greatly pleased Lu Mingqiang.

events.name: Monthly Family Budget Review
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan sat in the living room, jointly reviewing the family expense ledger for January. Wang Lijuan explained each item one by one, while Lu Mingqiang listened attentively. They discovered that, due to the arrival of overtime pay and year-end bonuses before the Spring Festival, along with intentional control over spending, the family's surplus for January was significantly higher than previously anticipated.

events.name: Decided to increase savings for children's education
events.description: Faced with a considerable surplus, the couple hardly hesitated and unanimously decided to deposit the excess amount, along with the "windfall" saved by Lu Mingqiang from "bargain-hunting" for wine bottles, into the previously established "Children's Education Special Fund" account. They believed that investing in their child's future was the most worthwhile endeavor.

events.name: Execute savings transfer
events.description: After reaching an agreement, Lu Mingqiang immediately used his mobile banking app to transfer the agreed amount from the family's current account to the dedicated account for the children's education fund, and saved a screenshot of the successful transfer as proof.

events.name: Updating the Ledger and Looking Ahead
events.description: Wang Lijuan promptly updated this savings entry in the family ledger. Seeing the increased deposit amount, both she and her husband felt greatly encouraged. They briefly discussed their goal of maintaining frugality and striving to increase savings in the coming months, feeling more confident about realizing their dream of a self-driving trip around the island.

events.name: Perform lumbar rehabilitation exercises
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang performed 40 minutes of lumbar rehabilitation training as planned to strengthen his core muscles, aiming to conclude in a healthy state.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, ready to enjoy the weekend and complete household chores.

结束状态.心情: Steady and confident, the positive outcomes of family financial management bring a strong sense of security and a firm conviction toward future goals.

state.今日运动: 40-Minute Lumbar Rehabilitation Training

2025-02.daily_overview: Today is Sunday, marking the end of the Spring Festival holiday. Lu Mingqiang gathered with old classmates, enjoyed family time, and began adjusting his health habits.

events.name: Attending a junior high school class reunion
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang went to a time-honored restaurant in Meilan District to attend a class reunion. He enjoyed Hainanese chicken rice and grilled fish with old classmates such as Wu Gang and Zhou Wei, sharing updates on their lives. He mentioned his exam preparation plans and his collection of wine bottles, creating a relaxed and nostalgic atmosphere.

events.name: Evening Brisk Walk in the Residential Area
events.description: After returning home from the gathering, Lu Mingqiang took a 20-minute brisk walk around the neighborhood to help digest the food consumed during the event. His heart rate remained steady as he enjoyed the evening breeze.

events.name: Family Sharing of Gathering Experiences
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang told his wife about the amusing incidents at the gathering, while his wife shared trivial matters about their child and neighbors, allowing the couple to engage in a relaxed conversation.

events.name: Check the progress of the child's holiday homework.
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang checked his eldest son's homework, praised his completion, promised a kite-flying reward over the weekend, and played with building blocks with his younger son.

2025-02.daily_overview: On Monday, the children started school. Lu Mingqiang handled follow-up social matters, received a training notification, and experienced a slight weight gain due to dietary influences from gatherings.

events.name: Handling post-event follow-ups and maintaining alumni relationships
events.description: During the break, Lu Mingqiang saved the party photos in the WeChat group, replied with thanks, and separately contacted Zhou Wei to arrange another gathering, completing the social loop.

events.name: Received and acknowledged the company training notification.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang received the training email regarding the new intelligent power distribution cabinet. He carefully read the details and prepared a notebook and pen to make material preparations for tomorrow's training.

events.name: Handling daily maintenance work orders
events.description: Today, I handled two maintenance work orders, guided apprentice Zhao Qiang on safety protocols, and prepared preliminary thoughts for the training content.

events.name: Concerned about wife's first day of part-time work
events.description: In the evening, inquired about my wife's part-time job situation, discussed adjustments to the family budget, and expressed willingness to take on more household chores during the exam preparation period.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle minor malfunctions
events.description: Before leaving work, I received an impromptu task to assist in handling a minor power issue in a residential area, which delayed my return by half an hour and left me feeling slightly fatigued.

events.description: Lu Mingqiang arrived at the training room on time, sat in the front row to record key knowledge points, and noted the new standard for insulation resistance, which reminded him of yesterday's maintenance work.

events.name: Practical Training Simulation and Q&A Exchange
events.description: In the afternoon practical simulation, Lu Mingqiang observed the digital detection module, raised questions regarding its stability in high-temperature and high-humidity environments, and discussed torque fastening standards with his colleague Chen Jianguo.

events.name: Organize training notes and correlate them with exam preparation content
events.description: After reviewing notes post-training, it was noted that the section on relay protection is related to exam preparation challenges, with key points highlighted for further in-depth study.

events.name: Stayed up slightly later at night due to excitement from studying.

2025-02.daily_overview: Daytime discussions on training applications, evening emergency repairs testing technical capabilities, weight beginning to decline due to high-intensity labor.

events.name: Discussing the Application of Training Content with Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, I discussed the old residential community project with Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang, translating training knowledge into practical applications such as grounding resistance testing and high-altitude operation contingency plans.

events.name: Received an emergency repair task.
events.description: In the evening, upon receiving a call from the squad leader about a large-scale power outage in the commercial district of Xiuying District, Lu Mingqiang quickly changed into his work uniform, grabbed his toolbox, and rushed to the scene.

events.name: Proceed to the scene and conduct preliminary diagnosis.
events.description: After meeting up with Zhao Qiang, inspect the main distribution box to confirm and lock down the fault of short circuit and burn damage on the main power supply cable.

events.name: Formulate a plan and efficiently complete the emergency repair.
events.description: Developed a cable replacement plan, directed Zhao Qiang to provide supervision, skillfully performed the operation, and completed the emergency repair in the sweltering weather.

events.name: Restore power supply and complete finishing work
events.description: After power restoration upon closing the circuit, the interface temperature was checked and found to be normal. A systematic inspection of the circuit was recommended to the client, Mr. Li.

events.name: Task Reporting and Late Return
events.description: After reporting to the squad leader about returning late, my wife warmed up a meal, and I briefly shared the emergency repair incident, feeling a sense of professional accomplishment.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Monday morning, a severe vehicle malfunction triggered a financial crisis. Lu Mingqiang's emotions took a sharp downturn from the moment he sought emergency assistance to receiving an 8,000 yuan repair quote.

events.name: Vehicle experiences severe malfunction on the way to school.
events.description: At 7:20 in the morning, Lu Mingqiang was driving his younger son to kindergarten when an abnormal noise came from the engine compartment, causing the vehicle to lose power. He calmly pulled over and called his friend Chen Jie for assistance.

events.name: Assistance and Towing
events.description: Chen Jie diagnosed an internal engine issue and recommended towing the vehicle. Lu Mingqiang called the insurance roadside assistance service to have the car transported to the repair shop and notified his wife, Wang Lijuan.

events.name: Check and Heavy Quotation
events.description: After the inspection at the repair shop, Chen Jie informed Lu Mingqiang that the engine's piston connecting rods and crankshaft were damaged, with repair costs amounting to at least 8,000 yuan. Lu Mingqiang felt dizzy, as the cost-effectiveness of the repair was extremely low.

events.name: The First Outbreak of a Family Financial Crisis
events.description: Lu Mingqiang informed his wife of the repair costs over the phone. After discussing the matter, the couple found the expense unbearable and fell into anxiety. Lu Mingqiang gazed at the old car, feeling that a family financial crisis was imminent.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to start the week's work.

结束状态.心情: Heavy, anxious, filled with a sense of helplessness and confusion over massive expenses.
