2025-03.daily_overview: A typical family weekend involved participating in a meaningful community tree-planting activity in the morning, followed by handling several minor tasks related to household finances and long-term planning in the afternoon. This reflects a trend of family activities shifting toward low-cost and meaningful pursuits during periods of budget constraints.

events.name: Participate in community tree-planting activities
events.description: On Sunday morning, the Lu Mingqiang family arrived on time at the designated green space in their community. Under the guidance of property management and neighborhood office staff, the family worked together in a division of labor: Lu Mingqiang was responsible for digging holes and backfilling soil, his wife Wang Lijuan supported the sapling, while their two children, Lu Zixuan and Lu Zihan, excitedly helped fetch and water the plants. Together, they planted a small-leaf banyan sapling and hung an adoption plaque inscribed with the children's names. Seeing the bright smiles on the children's faces, Lu Mingqiang felt a long-lost sense of ease and satisfaction. He captured this heartwarming family moment with his phone. After the activity, the family returned home to clean their tools and clothing.

events.name: Organize and Share Tree Planting Photos
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang transferred the photos taken during the day from his phone and organized them briefly on the family computer. He selected several pictures of the children beaming with joy and the family working together to plant trees, sharing them in the family WeChat group that included his parents and older brother, as well as on his personal social media feed. He captioned the post: "Documenting a meaningful family activity—may the saplings grow strong alongside the children." Soon after, he received likes and comments from relatives and friends.

events.name: Procurement of ingredients for Hainanese chicken rice dipping sauce
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang, based on the dipping sauce recipe he had copied from his mother the previous week, checked the existing seasonings at home with his wife, Wang Lijuan. Upon discovering that fresh small green limes and fish sauce were missing, he rode his electric scooter alone to the familiar market near his home to make the purchases. While shopping, he instinctively compared the prices of green limes at several stalls and ultimately chose the one with the best value for money. This careful budgeting had recently become his consumption habit.

events.name: Register for Online Safety Protocol Training
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang followed the company's notice from last week and completed the registration for the online training on the new version of industry safety regulations on his mobile phone. He carefully filled in his personal information, confirmed the login method for the learning platform, and planned to utilize his time after work in the evenings and during spare moments for studying. This was not only for work purposes but also to prepare for the advanced technician certification exam. After successfully registering, he sent a screenshot to Team Leader Zhang for confirmation.

events.name: Weighing the side jobs introduced by peers
events.description: Throughout the afternoon, the compensation for the private job (approximately 1,500 yuan) introduced by his coworker Zhang Jianguo lingered in Lu Mingqiang's mind. On one hand, the money was highly appealing to his family, which was currently facing financial strain. On the other hand, he was well aware that company regulations strictly prohibited taking on private work. Moreover, he was fully committed to preparing for the senior technician certification exam and needed the weekends for review. More importantly, his strong sense of responsibility and dedication to quality, characteristic of his ISTJ personality, made him worry that accepting the job under tight deadlines and inadequate preparation might compromise construction safety and quality. All afternoon, he found himself repeatedly weighing the pros and cons in his mind.

events.name: Low back discomfort has intensified.
events.description: After several consecutive days of high-intensity electrical installation work, coupled with recent psychological stress, Lu Mingqiang felt a noticeable increase in soreness in his lower back (an old injury site) on Sunday, particularly when bending over to tidy up tree-planting tools. This made him somewhat alert. Considering his role as the family's primary breadwinner and main physical laborer, he decided he could no longer tough it out and would make time to visit the community hospital for a check-up tomorrow.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for weekend family activities.

结束状态.心情: Amidst the sense of fulfillment, there lingers a hint of concern over physical discomfort and the weariness of financial considerations.

state.今日运动: Tree planting activity in the morning (light physical labor), no dedicated physical exercise was conducted.

date_attribute.weather: Mostly sunny, slightly hot in the afternoon.

2025-03.daily_overview: At the start of a hectic workday, Lu Mingqiang efficiently handled multiple tasks, including vehicle insurance renewal, declining private side jobs, and undergoing medical check-ups. This demonstrated a rational decision-making process that adhered to principles under pressure, prioritized long-term planning (such as obtaining certifications), and emphasized family responsibilities (such as health). His communication with his wife also reflected the stability of their marital alliance.

events.name: Renew vehicle insurance online and enhance coverage
events.description: During a break in the morning, Lu Mingqiang used his phone to compare car insurance quotes from several insurance companies. Considering that his vehicle had recently undergone major repairs, he ultimately chose a company with a good reputation and reasonable pricing, completing the online insurance purchase through its official app. In addition to the mandatory compulsory traffic liability insurance, he increased the coverage of third-party liability insurance from 500,000 to 1 million yuan and specifically added spontaneous combustion insurance, striving for comprehensive coverage within his budget. When making the payment, he used his savings card to avoid any overdraft spending.

events.name: Handle the electronic insurance policy and inform the wife.
events.description: After completing the insurance purchase, Lu Mingqiang immediately sent a screenshot of the generated electronic policy to his wife Wang Lijuan's WeChat, with the message: "Car insurance is done. The third-party liability coverage has been increased to 1 million, and spontaneous combustion insurance has been added for extra protection." He then downloaded the electronic policy and saved it in both the family photo album on his phone and a folder named "Important Family Documents" on his computer.

events.name: Declining a Side Job Recommended by a Colleague
events.description: After careful consideration on Sunday, Lu Mingqiang called his colleague Zhang Gong, who had introduced him to the side job, during his lunch break. He explained his reasons for declining in a sincere tone: "Zhang Gong, I really appreciate you thinking of me. However, the timeline for this job is too tight, as I am currently focusing all my efforts on preparing for the advanced certification exam and need to study even on weekends. Moreover, the company has clear regulations prohibiting private side jobs. If any safety issues were to arise, it would be detrimental to both of us. I sincerely apologize." He also proactively recommended a skilled and experienced senior technician he knew, who had relatively more flexible availability, hoping to help Zhang Gong resolve the issue.

events.name: Explaining the Decision to Politely Decline Freelance Work to My Wife
events.description: During dinner at home that evening, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to bring up the matter of declining the side job to his wife, Wang Lijuan. He explained his considerations in detail: "Although the pay is substantial, it would violate company regulations on one hand, and on the other, it would interfere with my preparation for the certification exam. Lijuan, I know we’re financially tight right now, but obtaining the advanced certification will bring more stability in the long run. This money just doesn’t feel right to earn." After listening, Wang Lijuan put down her chopsticks and nodded. "You’re right. We shouldn’t earn money that breaks the rules. Focus on your studies—I’ll take care of things at home." Her understanding and support gave him a much greater sense of reassurance.

events.name: Go to the community hospital for a lumbar examination.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang requested a one-hour leave from his squad leader and went to the orthopedic clinic at the community hospital near his workplace. The doctor inquired in detail about the nature of his heavy physical labor job and conducted a physical examination, including pressure tests and range-of-motion assessments. The final diagnosis was [mild lumbar muscle strain]. The doctor analyzed that it might be caused by long-term strain combined with recent fatigue and stress.

events.name: Learn Lumbar Rehabilitation Stretching Exercises
events.description: After the diagnosis, instead of prescribing medication, the doctor taught Lu Mingqiang several sets of rehabilitation stretching exercises in the consultation room, targeting muscle relaxation and stability enhancement in the lumbar region. These included cat-cow stretches, supine knee-to-chest stretches, and several simple gluteal stretches. Lu Mingqiang learned attentively, following the doctor's demonstration twice, and recorded the key points and precautions of each exercise in his phone's memo app.

events.name: Discussing Adjustments to Household Chores and Work with My Wife
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang informed Wang Lijuan of the doctor's diagnosis and recommendations. After discussing the matter, they decided that Wang Lijuan would take on more of the heavy lifting and thorough cleaning tasks at home in the near future. Lu Mingqiang also mentioned that he would explain the situation to his team leader, Zhang Tou, at work the next day and request to temporarily avoid being assigned the heaviest carrying tasks to facilitate his recovery.

起始状态.心情: Slightly weary, yet determined to handle multiple tasks.

结束状态.心情: Feeling relieved (having declined private work and completed the check-up), confident about future recovery and family collaboration.

state.今日运动: Learned rehabilitation stretching exercises, did not perform regular physical activity.

2025-03.daily_overview: A day of balancing daily work and study. At work, I received a new business trip assignment. While preparing for the exam, I encountered a difficult problem and decided to seek help from my mentor. At the same time, I officially began implementing a lumbar rehabilitation plan. The pace of life is compact, and the goals are clear.

events.name: Encountering difficulties in revision, I decided to seek help from my mentor.
events.description: While reviewing the theory for the senior electrician certification at home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang encountered several challenging problems related to the coordination of new relay protection systems and the calculation of complex grounding systems, which went beyond the scope of his daily maintenance experience. After going through the textbook several times and still feeling confused, he closed the book and decided to call his mentor, Master Li, for guidance the next day.

events.name: Reporting First Attempt at Making Dipping Sauce to Mother
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang called his mother, Chen Xiuying, to report on their attempt to follow the recipe for the dipping sauce over the weekend. "Mom, we tried the recipe you gave us, and the flavor is about seventy to eighty percent similar. It just feels like it’s missing that rich, lingering aftertaste." His mother laughed on the other end of the line and patiently asked about the specific brands of fish sauce they used and the ripeness of the kaffir limes. She then offered a few tips, such as gently heating the fish sauce with sugar to dissolve it and adding the kaffir lime juice last. Lu Mingqiang took note of each suggestion.

events.name: Assigned to Sanya to support the project.
events.description: During the morning pre-shift meeting, Team Leader Zhang informed Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo that due to technical challenges encountered in a power capacity expansion project at a resort hotel in Sanya and the tight construction schedule, the company had assigned them to provide immediate support, which was expected to take three days. The two promptly handed over their current tasks. Lu Mingqiang returned home to quickly pack a change of clothes and toiletries, along with his commonly used toolkit.

events.name: Departing for the Sanya Construction Site
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo gathered at the company and set off for Sanya in an engineering vehicle. During the journey, based on limited project information, the two discussed potential technical challenges they might encounter (such as substandard grounding resistance, uneven load distribution, etc.) and preliminarily planned their troubleshooting approach. Outside the window, the scenery gradually shifted from urban landscapes to fields and coastlines.

events.name: Plan dedicated study time for exam preparation
events.description: During the car ride to Sanya, Lu Mingqiang recalled the freelance job he had declined. Far from feeling regret, he actually felt a greater sense of inner peace. He calculated that he would likely have to work overtime during the three evenings of this business trip, but upon returning, the weekend time that might have been spent on freelance work could now be more fully dedicated to his studies.

events.name: Begin performing lumbar rehabilitation exercises.
events.description: After settling into the makeshift dormitory at the Sanya construction site, Lu Mingqiang did not rest immediately as he usually would. Following the steps taught by the doctor the previous day, he carefully performed a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretching exercises in the open space beside his bed. His movements were somewhat unfamiliar, and he felt a distinct soreness and tightness in his muscles as he stretched. After finishing, he briefly noted in his phone's memo: [March 18th, evening, Sanya, completed stretching exercises, lower back feels slightly more relaxed.]

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to start the day's work.

结束状态.心情: A sense of excitement tinged with challenge due to new tasks, coupled with the steadfastness of adhering to a health plan.

state.今日运动: Complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretching exercises

2025-03.daily_overview: On his first day of external support work, Lu Mingqiang quickly identified project challenges with his solid technical skills. During work breaks, he proactively consulted his mentor on theoretical questions related to his exam preparation, integrating practice with theory. This allowed him to gain valuable guidance and spiritual encouragement, significantly boosting his confidence for the upcoming exam.

events.name: Investigate and resolve challenges in hotel power projects
events.description: Throughout the day, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo worked closely with the hotel's engineers to conduct a detailed inspection of the problematic power distribution system. Drawing on his experience, Lu Mingqiang focused on examining the grounding grid and the load distribution of the transformers. Ultimately, he identified that the issue was caused by corrosion of the original grounding body, which resulted in excessive resistance, along with unreasonable load design in some circuits. He proposed solutions, including installing additional grounding electrodes and adjusting the load in certain circuits, and led the local construction team to begin implementation.

events.name: Seek theoretical guidance from the mentor by integrating work-related issues
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang took his notebook and walked to a quiet spot at the construction site to call his mentor, Master Li. He first reported the grounding issue encountered in the Sanya project and then naturally brought up the theoretical difficulties in his exam preparation regarding the calculation and verification of complex grounding systems. "Master, I always feel that the formula in the book doesn't quite match the data measured on-site..."

events.name: The master addresses theoretical challenges by integrating case studies.
events.description: Master Li listened patiently on the phone. Instead of jumping straight to the formulas, he first shared a story from his youth about handling a grounding fault at a chemical plant. Using actual measurement data and post-analysis, he vividly explained the application prerequisites of theoretical formulas and the variables present on-site. [Mingqiang, what’s written in books is rigid, but the field is dynamic. You have to first understand why the site doesn’t follow the book before you can correctly apply what’s in the book.] Only then did he proceed to break down step by step the calculation problem that had puzzled Lu Mingqiang.

events.name: Receiving encouragement and affirmation from the master.
events.description: After answering the question, Master Li said earnestly, "It's the right approach to connect the problems you encounter in work with the knowledge from exam books. Theory is the wings of practice, enabling you to fly higher and more steadily. Stay patient and take it step by step. With your solid technical foundation, you will surely succeed." These words acted like a shot in the arm, instantly deepening Lu Mingqiang's understanding of abstract theories and boosting his confidence in exam preparation.

events.name: Coordinate with all project stakeholders to clarify requirements.
events.description: Upon arriving at the site in the morning, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo immediately held a meeting with the client representative, the supervisor, and the chief electrical engineer of the hotel project. They conducted a detailed review of the construction drawings and technical specifications, clarifying the specific technical standards for the capacity expansion and renovation as well as the urgent timeline requirements.

events.name: Purchase a lumbar support belt to assist with work.
events.description: Anticipating physically demanding tasks in the coming days, Lu Mingqiang took advantage of his lunch break to purchase a doctor-recommended topical anti-inflammatory analgesic ointment at a pharmacy near the construction site. Following the shop assistant’s advice, he also bought a simple lumbar support belt with steel bone reinforcement, which he planned to wear when bending over or carrying relatively light equipment to protect his lower back.

events.name: Handling emergency malfunctions during overtime at night
events.description: In the evening, due to the hotel's sudden need to add activities, the power system required urgent adjustments. Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo worked overtime late into the night, handling several unexpected minor malfunctions, which delayed their bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused and prepare to tackle technical challenges.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and invigorating, it brings the sense of achievement from solving technical problems and the clarity gained through the mentor's guidance, yet overtime work leads to fatigue.

state.今日运动: Due to intensive technical work throughout the day and overtime at night, only one set of rehabilitation stretching was completed in the evening.

date_attribute.weather: Haikou, cloudy turning overcast, humid and sultry

2025-03.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang is still providing support in Sanya, while at home in Haikou, his wife Wang Lijuan led a heartwarming family activity—recreating her mother's secret family dipping sauce recipe. This served both as an emotional bond and a low-cost source of family joy amid tightened budgets. Meanwhile, Lu Mingqiang continues to show signs of ongoing financial pressure in his work.

events.name: Organize the Master's answers into notes
events.description: In the dormitory that evening, Lu Mingqiang took out his exam preparation notebook and meticulously recorded the case study and theoretical key points explained by his mentor over the phone the previous day. He particularly used a red pen to highlight critical aspects such as [the discrepancy between on-site variables and theoretical formulas] and [the correction between measured and calculated grounding resistance]. This set of notes, which integrated real-world cases, proved more effective than any rote memorization.

events.name: Trying to recreate the family's secret dipping sauce recipe with my wife.
events.description: In her Haikou home, Wang Lijuan attempted to prepare a dipping sauce using ingredients purchased over the weekend and following her mother-in-law's latest instructions. She specifically called Lu Mingqiang, who was still in Sanya, and initiated a video call so he could provide [remote guidance]. Through the screen, the couple reminisced about the steps taught by his mother while discussing the ratio of fish sauce to sugar and the timing for squeezing in lime juice. The kitchen was filled with lighthearted laughter and the cheerful sounds of their children playing.

events.name: Handling Cable Tray Path Conflicts
events.description: During today's cable laying work, Lu Mingqiang's team discovered a severe conflict between the originally designed cable tray route and the already installed central air conditioning main pipeline. Instead of proceeding recklessly, Lu Mingqiang immediately halted the construction. He conducted an on-site inspection with Chen Jianguo and the general contractor's construction personnel, and based on experience, quickly proposed an alternative solution that bypassed the pipeline and utilized the existing steel structure for reinforcement. After confirmation by the designer, the solution was implemented, avoiding rework and delays.

events.name: Displaying signs of stress at work
events.description: In the afternoon at the construction site, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo were completing the wiring work for the high-voltage cabinets in the sweltering heat. During a break, Chen Jianguo mentioned his plan to take his family to the newly opened mall over the weekend. As Lu Mingqiang listened, he thought about the money spent on his car repairs, his tight budget, and the upcoming exam. Unable to hold back, he let out a soft sigh while looking at the tools in his hand. This subtle gesture was noticed by the observant Chen Jianguo.

events.name: Commence online safety protocol training.
events.description: Returning to the dormitory in the evening, Lu Mingqiang recalled the training. He opened the training app on his phone, logged in, and completed the first module, "General Principles and Basic Requirements." The content in the video course regarding "Safety Risks in the Application of New Technologies" resonated with his experience of handling complex circuits during the day. He promptly noted down his thoughts using the app's note-taking feature.

events.name: Temporarily changing dinner plans
events.description: Due to the delayed dinner service at the construction site canteen, Lu Mingqiang temporarily had a bowl of noodles at a nearby small eatery. It was simple but met his needs, reflecting the irregularity of meals during business trips.

起始状态.心情: Focus and continue to devote yourself to the work.

结束状态.心情: Work is effective but somewhat tiring; warm family videos have alleviated some of the longing, yet underlying stress remains.

state.今日运动: Complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretches.

2025-03.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang returned to Haikou after completing his support mission in Sanya, concluding his brief business trip. His colleague Chen Jianguo keenly noticed his low spirits and attempted to offer comfort. On the family front, the activity of recreating the family's traditional flavors was successfully completed, adding a bright spot to their otherwise tense lives.

events.name: Taste and Summarize the Results of Sauce Replication
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang returned home from a business trip. His wife, Wang Lijuan, served him Hainanese chicken rice mixed with a newly prepared dipping sauce. After tasting it carefully, Lu Mingqiang nodded with satisfaction: "Hmm, this time the flavor is much more authentic! Especially the layers of the aftertaste—it reminds me of how Mom used to make it." He emphasized that the process of exploring and recreating the family recipe together with his wife was more meaningful than the taste itself.

events.name: Properly preserve mother's handwritten recipe.
events.description: After the meal, Lu Mingqiang carefully wiped the handwritten recipe from his mother, which had become slightly soft from the kitchen steam, with a dry cloth. He then flattened it and placed it between the pages of an old book he seldom opened, before finally storing it in the drawer where important documents such as the household register and property deed were kept. This action was filled with a sense of ritual.

events.name: Complete the system joint debugging and acceptance of the Sanya project.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo, in coordination with the hotel's engineering department, conducted a full-load test and various protection function tests on the upgraded power system. The system operated stably, with all indicators meeting the required standards, and successfully passed the formal acceptance inspection by the project owner. The client manager came over specifically, patted Lu Mingqiang on the shoulder, and praised him for being "experienced and quick at solving problems."

events.name: After work, colleagues inquired with concern on the return journey.
events.description: In the afternoon, the two of them returned to Haikou by engineering vehicle. During the journey, Chen Jianguo finally couldn't hold back and asked Lu Mingqiang directly, "Brother Qiang, I've noticed you've been preoccupied these past few days, always sighing. Is something difficult happening at home? Talk to me, your brother." Lu Mingqiang gazed at the scenery flying past outside the window, remained silent for a few seconds, and still shook his head, "It's nothing major, just feeling a bit tired." Seeing this, Chen Jianguo didn't press further and simply said, "If there's anything, just let me know."

events.name: The child at home has a mild cold.
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang noticed that his younger son Lu Zihan had a slight runny nose. His wife suggested it might be due to the change in weather and mentioned she had been giving the child more water to drink. This made him somewhat concerned, but seeing that the child was still in good spirits put his mind at ease a little.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to going home, with a slight tension from wrapping up the project.

结束状态.心情: The ease of project completion intertwines with the solace of family warmth, yet economic pressures persist like background noise, while concerns over the child's health bring additional worries.

state.今日运动: Due to the long-distance journey, only simple lower back stretches were performed.

2025-03.daily_overview: A workday requiring overtime, though with slightly lower intensity than usual. Lu Mingqiang was teased by his coworkers for being distracted during inspection, and he encountered a bottleneck in his exam preparation. However, positive news came from the family front—the pottery piece he had previously participated in making was fired and ready to be picked up, adding anticipation for the weekend.

events.name: Seeking Assistance After Encountering Setbacks in Exam Preparation
events.description: While reviewing in the evening, Lu Mingqiang repeatedly made mistakes on several problems related to short-circuit current calculations, which left him feeling frustrated and defeated. He put down his pen, rubbed his temples, and decided not to push himself too hard. Instead, he took photos of the problems and his incorrect reasoning, sending them to his mentor, Master Li, via WeChat, along with the message: "Master, I'm stuck here and can't seem to get the right answer." Before long, Master Li replied with a voice message, pointing out a critical mistake in his formula application.

events.name: Retrieve Family Pottery Artwork
events.description: In the afternoon, Wang Lijuan, the wife, took some time to visit the Mission Hills Handicraft Workshop to retrieve the pottery works that the whole family had made together about two weeks ago. These included a somewhat clumsy but sturdy bowl made by Lu Mingqiang, as well as several abstract small animals shaped by the children. She happily shared photos of the pieces in the family group chat.

events.name: Displaying Family Ceramic Souvenirs
events.description: In the evening, after Lu Mingqiang returned home, he and his wife and children placed the retrieved pottery works on the display shelf next to the TV cabinet in the living room. The children excitedly pointed at their own creations and chattered away. Looking at the bowl, Lu Mingqiang recalled that laughter-filled weekend afternoon and felt a wave of warmth. These works have become cherished physical mementos of a low-cost family creative activity.

events.name: Appearing absent-minded during routine inspections
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo worked as a team to conduct a routine inspection of the distribution boxes in their assigned area. While checking the data, Chen Jianguo noticed that Lu Mingqiang was holding the logbook but seemed distracted, not responding until Chen called out "[Brother Qiang]" twice. Chen Jianguo joked, "[Lost your mind? Missing your wife? Or thinking about what to eat tonight?]" Lu Mingqiang forced a smile, said nothing, and lowered his head to continue recording.

events.name: Temporarily suspend rehabilitation stretching
events.description: Due to the pressure of overtime work and exam preparation, Lu Mingqiang felt slightly fatigued in the evening and temporarily decided to simplify his rehabilitation stretching routine. He only performed a few core exercises instead of the full set, reflecting a noise event within his habits.

起始状态.心情: Peacefully, welcome the weekend overtime work.

结束状态.心情: Review setbacks brought some frustration, but the warmth of family mementos and the timely assistance from my mentor served as a buffer, leaving me feeling slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Complete simplified lumbar rehabilitation stretches upon waking.

2025-03.daily_overview: A rest day entirely dedicated to family, with activities centered around the children and low-cost parent-child interactions. Visiting the saplings cultivates a sense of responsibility in the child, while the planned morning run was replaced by a gentler walk due to considerations for physical recovery, reflecting a shift in health management mindset.

events.name: Take the children to visit the young saplings.
events.description: In the morning, at the children's request, Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan took their two children to the community green space once again. They found the sapling planted the previous week, and the children eagerly took turns watering it. Lu Mingqiang checked whether the adoption plaque was securely fastened and took the opportunity to explain to the children how difficult it is for trees to grow, emphasizing the importance of caring for them like friends. Under the sunlight, the family gathered around the small sapling, creating a heartwarming scene.

events.name: Restorative Walk as an Alternative to Morning Running
events.description: Considering that his waist is still in the recovery phase, Lu Mingqiang postponed his weekend morning run with his running partner Chen Bin this week. However, he maintained his habit of waking up early and took a half-hour slow walk alone in the residential area while listening to safety procedure audio from a training app. After the walk, he still diligently completed a full set of waist stretches.

events.name: Homemade Afternoon Tea
events.description: In the afternoon, to save on expenses, Wang Lijuan prepared a simple tea at home, including fruits and homemade pastries, which the whole family enjoyed together, enhancing the joy of family interaction.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the weekend family time.

结束状态.心情: Calm and content, family activities bring pure joy.

state.今日运动: Take a 30-minute slow walk within the residential community and complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretches.

2025-03.daily_overview: The new week began with unexpected events: at work, he was temporarily assigned to a new project, while at home, a short circuit caused a power outage. Lu Mingqiang calmly handled the household crisis with his professional skills, and his lower back recovery showed initial progress. The companionship of his coworkers provided a slight relief to his tense nerves.

events.name: A sudden short circuit occurred in the kitchen circuit at home.
events.description: In the evening, while Wang Lijuan was using the kitchen multi-functional food processor, the socket suddenly emitted a series of sparks with a [bang], followed by a power outage throughout the entire house, plunging it into darkness. The children let out a frightened scream. Lu Mingqiang immediately stood up from the living room, remained calm, and first reassured his family to stay still. He then felt his way in the dark to the main electrical panel and inspected it with a flashlight, discovering that the leakage protector for the kitchen circuit had tripped. He initially concluded that the aging insulation of the old kitchen wiring had caused a short circuit during the recent humid [returning south weather].

events.name: Overtime debugging of the intelligent lighting system
events.description: Due to the urgent deadline for the new project, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo worked overtime that evening to debug the intelligent lighting control system in the hotel banquet hall. They needed to test dozens of circuits and scene modes one by one, identifying and fixing several false triggering faults caused by signal interference in the wiring. The work was meticulous and time-consuming.

events.name: Confiding some of my thoughts to my workmates
events.description: They didn't finish work until after eight in the evening. At the construction site entrance, Chen Jianguo handed a cigarette to Lu Mingqiang, and the two squatted by the roadside smoking. Under Chen Jianguo's persistent questioning of "Are we brothers or not?", Lu Mingqiang took a deep drag of his cigarette and finally said in a low voice, "My car broke down a while ago, cost a lot to fix, and I'm a bit short on cash right now. And I have to take that advanced certification exam soon—I'm really not confident about it. It's stressing me out." Hearing this, Chen Jianguo patted him on the shoulder.

events.name: Assess the Progress of Lumbar Rehabilitation
events.description: After nearly a week of consistently performing rehabilitation stretches and avoiding heavy physical labor, Lu Mingqiang felt that the soreness in his lower back had indeed eased, and the stiffness when bending over in daily activities had lessened. After evaluating his condition, he decided to continue adhering to his current rehabilitation plan and began considering whether, once he felt better, he could incorporate some gentle core strength exercises, such as planks, to prevent future recurrence.

events.name: Temporarily staying up late to handle work emails
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang had to stay up late to reply to an urgent email regarding a new project, which affected his sleep time.

起始状态.心情: The customary busyness of Monday

结束状态.心情: Fatigue after handling an emergency, but the situation is under control; pressure slightly relieved after confiding in coworkers, with additional fatigue from staying up late.

state.今日运动: Complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretches.

2025-03.daily_overview: While on a business trip, he focused on tackling new technical challenges. Concurrently, issues with the home electrical circuit prompted him to start planning a more comprehensive inspection and repair solution, reflecting his professional mindset as a technical worker and his habit of preparing for contingencies.

events.name: Investigate and diagnose challenges in new projects
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang conducted a detailed inspection at the new project site. He carefully examined the equipment layout in the distribution room, the installation of cable trays, and the condition of the grounding busbar. Drawing on years of experience, he quickly identified the core issue: a newly added set of large air conditioning units had caused severe local load imbalance, and the existing cable cross-section was insufficient. He clearly explained the problem and its potential risks to the on-site project manager and electrical engineer.

events.name: Develop a detailed construction plan
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang formulated a detailed solution in the temporary office based on the diagnostic results: laying a separate large-section cable for the newly added load and adjusting the switch setting values of some circuits. He compiled a list of required materials, including the cable model, length, and terminals, as well as the necessary specialized tools (such as a large-section cable crimping tool), and handed it over to the on-site material handler for preparation.

events.name: Plan a comprehensive inspection of the home electrical system.
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang took out paper and pen in his dormitory and began planning the electrical circuit inspection for his home. He decided not only to fix the faulty point in the kitchen but also to take this opportunity to conduct a comprehensive inspection of the wiring in high-usage areas such as the kitchen and living room. He listed the materials needed, including wires of specific specifications, new socket panels with leakage protection, insulating tape, and other supplies. He also considered which tools could be borrowed from the company and which ones he needed to purchase himself.

events.name: Communicate with running partners changed to evening exercise
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang chatted with his running partner Chen Bin via WeChat, mentioning that after recovering from his back injury, he might adjust his exercise time to the evening to better accommodate his work and health needs. Chen Bin expressed understanding and shared his experience with night running.

起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to tackle new technical challenges.

结束状态.心情: Thoughtful, immersed in both technical solutions and long-term planning for family safety, with expectations for adjustments in physical activity.

state.今日运动: Complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretches.

2025-03.daily_overview: The work progressed according to plan, with the team being led to implement the solutions. The guidance from coworker Chen Jianguo was simple yet powerful, further alleviating Lu Mingqiang's psychological pressure from an empathetic perspective and emphasizing the core value of "having technical skills."

events.name: Lead the team in implementing the renovation plan.
events.description: Throughout the day, Lu Mingqiang led several local electricians to carry out construction according to the plan he had formulated. The main tasks involved laying new cables and completing the wiring. This work was highly demanding, requiring precise crimping and insulation. Lu Mingqiang oversaw the entire process, personally handled critical steps, and explained technical points and safety regulations to the local workers.

events.name: Receive comfort and support from fellow workers.
events.description: During the lunch break in the temporary rest shed at the construction site, Chen Jianguo, while chewing on a steamed bun, said to Lu Mingqiang: "Brother Qiang, I understand you. The year before last, when my father was hospitalized, I also exhausted all my savings. Back then, just seeing the bills gave me a headache. But look, money spent can be earned again; what matters is that people are safe. As for your advanced certificate, take your time preparing for it. Rushing won't help. With your skills, who in our company or in this industry doesn’t recognize you? Don’t be too hard on yourself. There’s still a long way ahead." This sincere advice, grounded in personal experience, finally eased the furrow in Lu Mingqiang’s brow. He nodded without saying a word, but felt much warmer inside.

events.name: Try Simple Core Training
events.description: In the dormitory in the evening, Lu Mingqiang cautiously attempted a 30-second plank after rehabilitation stretching to test his lumbar endurance. He felt generally well but experienced slight soreness and decided to gradually increase the duration.

起始状态.心情: Calm and focused on the day's construction tasks.

结束状态.心情: Feeling reassured by the smooth progress of the work, comforted by the understanding and support of colleagues, and confident in the recovery of health.

state.今日运动: Complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretches, and attempt a 30-second plank hold.

2025-03.daily_overview: The support project concluded successfully, and I returned to Haikou with a sense of accomplishment. My colleague Chen Jianguo extended an invitation for a weekend gathering, aiming to help him unwind completely. The procurement of materials for household circuit maintenance has also been scheduled.

events.name: Complete System Testing and Acceptance
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang organized a comprehensive load test and stability monitoring of the upgraded power system. The newly installed cables exhibited normal temperature rise, all circuits maintained balanced loads, and the protection devices operated accurately. The project successfully passed the final acceptance, and the client representative highly commended Lu Mingqiang's team for their [swift diagnosis and efficient resolution] capabilities.

events.name: Return and Preliminary Summary of Project Experience
events.description: After completing the handover of work in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo returned to Haikou by car. During the journey, the two reviewed their experience of providing support. Lu Mingqiang mentally went through the complete case of handling [load imbalance causing cable overheating] once again, feeling that it would serve as excellent practical case study material for preparing for the senior technician examination.

events.name: Received an invitation to a gathering from work colleagues.
events.description: On Friday afternoon, as the week's work was drawing to a close, Chen Jianguo walked over and patted Lu Mingqiang on the shoulder: "Don't stay cooped up at home reading this weekend. Take half a day off for yourself. I'll call Gangzi (Wu Gang), and we'll meet at our usual spot for a cup of old man's tea. In the evening, we'll have a whole grilled fish—my treat! If there's anything bothering you, we can talk it over and figure things out together." Seeing the sincerity in Chen Jianguo's eyes, Lu Mingqiang smiled with a sense of ease for the first time that week and nodded in agreement.

events.name: Go to bed early to restore energy.
events.description: Due to exhaustion from consecutive business trips, Lu Mingqiang decided to go to bed early in the evening to prepare for tomorrow's work and gathering.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the project completion and returning home.

结束状态.心情: The sense of accomplishment from the project's success, along with the anticipation of meeting friends over the weekend, brings a slight fatigue yet a feeling of relaxation.

2025-03.daily_overview: The work proceeded in an orderly manner. After work, the tea chats with his coworker Chen Jianguo became an important emotional outlet. In the relaxed atmosphere and in the presence of a trusted colleague, Lu Mingqiang finally opened up, sharing his financial pressures and anxiety about exam preparation. He received empathetic listening and support, allowing his tense nerves to relax.

events.name: After-work Tea Gathering with Colleagues
events.description: After work on Friday, Chen Jianguo invited Lu Mingqiang to the familiar "Dad's Tea Shop" near their company as promised. They walked there together, ordered a pot of black tea along with a few plates of peanuts and chicken feet. Initially, they chatted about amusing incidents at the construction site during the week and the mischievous antics of their respective children, creating a relaxed atmosphere.

events.name: Share pressure with fellow workers
events.description: After a few cups of hot tea, encouraged by Chen Jianguo's look that seemed to say, "What can't we talk about between us?" Lu Mingqiang finally opened up. He detailed how the car repair had cost nearly eight thousand yuan, forcing him to dip into his younger son's education fund. Now, the family had to tighten their monthly budget, and he was worried that failing his upcoming exam would disappoint his family... All these pent-up thoughts poured out in one go.

events.name: Gain Empathy and Support
events.description: Chen Jianguo listened quietly, without interrupting or offering empty comfort. After Lu Mingqiang finished speaking, he shared his own similar difficulties from the past and then said, "Brother, I understand your struggles. But as I said before, you have skills, you’re hardworking, and you’re reliable—these are your greatest assets. This tough time will surely pass. If you ever face financial difficulties in the future, be sure to tell me. Don’t try to tough it out alone." This kind of support, built on empathy and understanding, made Lu Mingqiang feel immensely reassured.

events.name: The mood is eased.
events.description: After pouring out his feelings, Lu Mingqiang felt as if a corner of the heavy stone in his chest had been lifted, and his breathing became much easier. The two chatted for a while longer about their future plans, and after finishing their tea, they each went home. The evening breeze brushed against his face, and Lu Mingqiang felt his steps lighten a little.

events.name: Had a bit more snacks after the tea gathering.
events.description: During the tea gathering, Lu Mingqiang unconsciously ate more snacks and peanuts as a way to relieve stress.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of anticipation for the evening tea gathering.

结束状态.心情: Relieved and soothed, the pressure is effectively released after confiding, feeling the support of friendship.

state.今日运动: Complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretches upon waking up.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Saturday morning, I efficiently completed the safety upgrade of the household electrical circuit. This was a practical application of professional skills to ensure home safety and also fulfilled my responsibilities as a husband and father. In the afternoon, I handled work-related reimbursements and conducted a phased summary of this month's exam preparation, which made the process feel more systematic.

events.name: Purchase of Circuit Repair Materials
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang rode his electric bike to a familiar hardware and building materials store with a shopping list in hand. He checked the list and purchased sufficient quantities of materials, including national standard flame-retardant electrical wires, five-hole socket panels with leakage protection, insulating tape, and cable conduits. When checking out, the store owner recognized him as a regular customer and gave him a small discount.

events.name: Inspect and replace aging electrical wiring in the home.
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang turned off the main power switch and began the repair work. He first completely replaced the circuit in the kitchen where the short circuit had occurred, then opened the other outlet panels in the living room and kitchen one by one to inspect the internal wiring and insulation. He replaced two panels that showed signs of aging. His wife, Wang Lijuan, assisted by handing him tools and materials while ensuring their child stayed away from the work area.

events.name: Test the circuit and explain safety knowledge
events.description: After completing the repair, Lu Mingqiang closed the main power switch and used a multimeter and a voltage tester to check each newly replaced socket one by one, ensuring that the power supply was normal, the phase sequence was correct, and the leakage protection function was effective. After dinner, he specifically gathered the whole family and, using simple language combined with this short-circuit incident, explained essential electrical safety knowledge, such as [not touching electrical appliances with wet hands], [avoiding plugging too many high-power appliances into the same socket], and [immediately turning off the main switch upon noticing abnormalities (such as sparks or a burning smell)]. He particularly reminded the two children to follow these guidelines.

events.name: Handling Business Trip Reimbursement and Performance Applications
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang gathered the train tickets and accommodation invoices from his business trip to Sanya last week, along with the completed business trip subsidy application form. At the same time, based on the actual situation of solving key technical challenges in the support project, he drafted a brief performance bonus application statement, emphasizing the complexity of the issues and the benefits brought about by their resolution. He planned to submit all these documents to Team Leader Zhang for signature on Monday.

events.name: Conduct a monthly preparation summary
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang reviewed his study notes from March, focusing on the difficult problems explained by his mentor and the new regulations learned from online training. He felt that his overall understanding of circuit theory and safety regulations had become clearer compared to the beginning of the month, but there were still some calculation problems that needed improvement. He planned to shift his focus in April to practical skills and the review of complex case studies, and intended to find time to practice using the company's training equipment.

起始状态.心情: With a clear goal in mind, ready to take action to address home security issues.

结束状态.心情: The sense of responsibility and fulfillment from completing home maintenance tasks, coupled with the confidence of having a clear plan for the next stage of exam preparation.

state.今日运动: Household circuit inspection (moderate physical labor), considered as functional exercise.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, cool in the morning.

2025-03.daily_overview: A Sunday focused on personal physical and mental adjustment. Through an invigorating morning run, Lu Mingqiang effectively released the accumulated stress and anxiety from the past few weeks. Meanwhile, all online training courses were completed, marking a milestone in his learning progress. However, a phone call in the evening regarding vehicle re-repair cast a thin haze over his recently relaxed mood.

events.name: Morning Running Alleviates Stress
events.description: On Sunday morning, Lu Mingqiang woke up slightly earlier than his family and drove to Baishamen Park. He changed into his running shoes, opened a fitness app, and began jogging along the familiar track. The cool morning air, rhythmic breathing, and endorphins released from running gradually cleared his mind, allowing him to temporarily forget about bills, exams, and work challenges. After running about 5 kilometers, he was drenched in sweat but felt refreshed all over, with his anxiety greatly alleviated.

events.name: Complete post-run stretching.
events.description: After finishing his run, Lu Mingqiang performed thorough full-body stretches on the park lawn, with particular emphasis on stretching his waist and legs. The stretching helped relax his muscles, which had tightened during the run, leaving his body feeling more flexible and light.

events.name: Complete online training and review.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang utilized his spare time to complete the final module of the online safety procedure training on his phone. With this, all mandatory courses had been finished. He then spent another hour quickly reviewing the notes from the entire course, marking several points related to the senior technician examination that he was not entirely clear about. He planned to seek guidance from his mentor or the company's technical staff on these matters next week.

events.name: First Attempt at Community Swimming
events.description: Upon a friend's recommendation, Lu Mingqiang went to the community fitness center swimming pool in the afternoon and tried swimming for the first time as a rehabilitation exercise for his back injury. He swam breaststroke for 20 minutes and felt that the buoyancy of the water effectively alleviated the pressure on his lower back. With a positive experience, he is considering incorporating it as a long-term option.

events.name: Learned that the vehicle requires rework.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang received a call from the auto repair shop he had visited earlier. The person on the other end informed him that a sensor repaired during his last visit might not be stable enough and suggested he return to the shop for a recheck when convenient. It might need to be replaced, which would incur a cost of several hundred yuan. This unexpected piece of bad news, like a bucket of cold water, extinguished most of the good mood he had after his morning run, making him feel once again the weight of reality and the fragility of his budget.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to releasing stress through exercise.

结束状态.心情: Physically, I feel invigorated from exercise, but emotionally, I am once again disheartened by the rework notice, presenting a complex state of fluctuating emotions.

state.今日运动: Jog 5 kilometers at Baishamen Park, perform thorough post-run stretching, and swim for 20 minutes in the community pool.

2025-03.daily_overview: The last day of March, a workday full of twists and turns. In the morning, I was frustrated by the unexpected vehicle repair costs, but in the afternoon, I unexpectedly received a payslip that included travel allowances and performance bonuses, bringing a much-needed "timely rain" to the family finances. This unplanned income not only alleviated the pressure but also strengthened the couple's confidence in overcoming difficulties together, drawing a relatively positive conclusion to this challenging March.

events.name: Review of Monthly Learning Progress
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang sat alone in the rest area of the construction site, quietly reflecting on his exam preparation progress in March. Despite disruptions such as financial difficulties, business trips, and a back injury, he had persisted and completed most of his review plan. In particular, by consulting his mentor, he managed to connect several key theoretical challenges with practical work. He felt a sense of satisfaction with his perseverance under pressure and clarified his focus for April: prioritizing practical review.

events.name: Discovering unexpected income on the payslip.
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang checked his electronic pay stub for March through the company's app. He carefully reviewed the details: base salary, overtime pay... Then, he saw clearly marked items for [Sanya Business Trip Allowance] and a [Project Performance Bonus]. Combined, these two items added nearly two thousand yuan more to his total monthly income than he had expected. This discovery made him pause for a moment, followed by a surge of complex emotions—a mix of pleasant surprise and relief.

events.name: Discussing the Use of the Bonus with My Wife
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang eagerly showed Wang Lijuan the salary breakdown on his phone, his voice carrying a rare sense of relief: "Lijuan, look, there are additional travel allowances and bonuses this month." The couple leaned in together to look at the screen, both breaking into smiles. They quickly reached an agreement: the majority of this unexpected income would be immediately deposited into the bank to replenish the education reserve fund that had been used earlier for car repairs; the remaining small portion could be used to slightly relax the family's food budget for the month or be set aside as a contingency for potential vehicle repair costs.

events.name: Exchange training insights with colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break that day, Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, and apprentice Zhao Qiang were eating together in the cafeteria. Lu Mingqiang proactively brought up the recently completed online training, sharing one of its clauses concerning the [new ventilation requirements for confined space operations]. He discussed how strictly implementing this regulation would have affected a previous basement operation they had conducted. This kind of discussion, which combines new knowledge with past experience, solidifies the learning outcome.

events.name: Evening Walking Trial
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang took a 30-minute evening walk around the residential area as a new exercise routine following his recovery from a waist injury. He felt no discomfort in his waist and plans to maintain this activity weekly.

起始状态.心情: The gloom of Sunday prolonged by the news of vehicle rework.

结束状态.心情: Significant relief and uplift, the unexpected income brought tangible hope and confidence to overcome the difficulties.

state.今日运动: Complete a set of lumbar rehabilitation stretches in the morning and take a 30-minute brisk walk in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first workday of April, Lu Mingqiang and his wife reviewed their family finances on payday. The atmosphere was somewhat somber as they faced the additional burden caused by the unsuccessful car repair from the previous month, marking the beginning of a one-month period of financial austerity for the family.

events.name: Salary Deposit and Savings Consolidation
events.description: During the lunch break at home, Lu Mingqiang checked the arrival of his March salary via mobile banking. He then prudently transferred the majority of his travel allowance and this month's performance bonus into the family's joint savings account, consolidating the funds in preparation for the upcoming period of tightened budgeting.

events.name: Concern and Proactive Communication
events.description: After dinner, Wang Lijuan, while clearing the dishes, could not hide her worried expression and proactively suggested to Lu Mingqiang, who was sitting on the sofa looking at his phone, "Mingqiang, we really need to carefully review the accounts for March, so we can have a clear picture in our minds." Lu Mingqiang nodded, put down his phone, knowing that his wife was troubled by the wasted car repair expenses.

events.name: Monthly Household Income and Expenditure Review
events.description: Lu Mingqiang took out the family account book, which had been used for several years with its pages yellowed and edges curled, from the bedroom drawer. He sat side by side with his wife at the dining table. Together, they carefully reviewed the March utility bills for water, electricity, and gas, the tuition receipt for their eldest son, supermarket shopping receipts, as well as records of car fuel and maintenance expenses. The atmosphere was quiet and focused.

events.name: Analyze the Pressure of Rigid Expenditure
events.description: After checking, the two found that the utility bills had increased due to the gradually warming weather, while fixed expenses such as their child's tuition and the family's daily basic food costs stood like small mountains, leaving almost no room for reduction. Looking at the total expenses in the notebook, which were nearly equal to their income, especially the loss from the car repair, the two felt immense financial pressure.

events.name: Formulate the April austerity plan
events.description: Faced with potential additional expenses from the upcoming rainy season in Hainan (such as moisture-proof maintenance for vehicles and humidity protection for household appliances), as well as the immediate financial shortfall, Lu Mingqiang and his wife discussed the matter and jointly decided to strictly suspend all non-essential expenditures in April, including dining out and entertainment. Additionally, Wang Lijuan’s upcoming part-time earnings will be entirely allocated to cover the financial gap, helping them navigate through this difficult period.

events.name: Information Collection and Preliminary Planning for Exam Preparation
events.description: Late at night, after settling the children to sleep, Lu Mingqiang sat alone in front of the old computer in his study, searching online for information related to the [Hainan Province Senior Electrician Technician Examination]. He bookmarked the links he found for registration requirements, exam outlines, and past exam papers. On a piece of draft paper, based on his 60-hour workweek, he roughly outlined the possible time slots he could dedicate to studying after work and on weekends over the coming months.

events.name: Calculations on the Commute
events.description: During the brief 10-minute drive from his home in Longhua District to his company in Xiuying District in the morning, Lu Mingqiang kept replaying in his mind the figures from last night's account review with his wife and the preliminary draft of the study plan. He felt the weight of responsibility on his shoulders, but his ISTJ personality inclined him more toward seeking solutions rather than dwelling on anxiety.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a faint concern about this month's finances.

结束状态.心情: Prudent yet resolute, determined to address financial challenges and pave the way for career goals.

state.今日运动: Daily work involves heavy physical labor with no additional exercise.

2025-04.daily_overview: Wednesday's workload remained heavy, with Lu Mingqiang focusing on resolving several minor malfunctions at work. After finishing work, he conveyed the family's austerity decision to the children, shifting the family atmosphere from mere concern to a shared determination to cope together.

events.name: Official Declaration of Household Financial Austerity
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang opened a new page in the family ledger and wrote the words "Austerity" at the top in his neat, strong handwriting. He then put down his pen and said to his two sons, who were eating, "Zixuan, Zihan, for the next while, we'll need to be a bit more frugal at home. If you want to buy snacks or toys, please discuss it with Mom and Dad first, okay?" His wife, Wang Lijuan, gently added an explanation from the side.

events.name: Communicating Conservation with Children
events.description: The eldest son, Lu Zixuan, nodded with a vague understanding, while the second son, Lu Zihan, simply focused on eating his rice. Lu Mingqiang looked at his children, feeling somewhat uneasy, but he knew it was necessary. He briefly explained to the children the reasons why the family needed to cut back on expenses in the near future and, together with his wife, encouraged them to develop good habits of frugality from a young age.

events.name: Reflections During Work Breaks
events.description: During a lunch break while conducting routine maintenance at a construction site in Xiuying District, Lu Mingqiang sat in the shadow of an engineering vehicle, chewing on a steamed bun. Recalling the study plan he had made the night before and his family's tightened budget, he silently calculated the time ahead. He felt that the next few months would be exceptionally busy, yet his sense of purpose grew clearer.

events.name: Temporary Suspension Decision Regarding Squash Activities
events.description: In the evening, he sent a WeChat message to Lin Feng, his regular squash partner for every Wednesday: "Lin Feng, I won't be able to make it to the games tonight or for the next few weeks. I have a lot going on with family and work, so I need to tighten things up." After receiving a reply expressing understanding, he put down his phone. This meant that his main solo sports hobby was also temporarily put on hold due to budget tightening.

events.name: Conducted lumbar training in advance due to discomfort from a waist injury.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang felt a slight soreness in his lower back. Recalling his recovery period from a back injury, he decided to start functional training for his lower back ahead of schedule. He performed 20 minutes of bodyweight core stability exercises in his living room, emphasizing movement control and avoiding pain.

起始状态.心情: Determined and prepared to face a life of austerity

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but with a heightened sense of responsibility, a preliminary atmosphere of the family jointly addressing the crisis has taken shape.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the eve of the Qingming Festival, Lu Mingqiang discussed tomb-sweeping arrangements with his wife while also making the most of his time to advance his career development plan. He consulted company policies and registered for industry seminars, demonstrating practical and efficient action.

events.name: Discussing Family Arrangements for Qingming Festival
events.description: During breakfast, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan briefly discussed the arrangements for the upcoming Qingming Festival. It was decided that Lu Mingqiang would purchase flowers and fruits for the tomb-sweeping after work, while his wife would prepare incense and candles. At the same time, he called his parents to confirm the time for returning to their home for lunch after the tomb-sweeping tomorrow.

events.name: Stay updated on industry lecture information.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang saw a forwarded message in the company's industry exchange WeChat group: the Hainan Electric Power Industry Association would hold a lecture on "Transitioning from Frontline Technical Backbone to Team Leader" over the upcoming weekend. After carefully reading the lecture introduction, he found the content inspiring for his future career planning and completed the online registration through the provided link.

events.name: Consulting Firm Training Support Policy
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang made a special trip to the company's Human Resources Department. He found the colleague in charge of training and politely inquired whether the company offered support policies such as training subsidies or examination leave for employees pursuing the Senior Electrician Technician Certificate. He also asked in detail about the supporting documents the company needed to provide during the registration process. The colleague gave him a brief overview of the relevant policies.

events.name: Adjust Evening Leisure Activities for the Tightening Period
events.description: In the evening, to adhere to the tightened budget, Lu Mingqiang gave up the idea of possibly going to a movie or gathering with friends. He stayed at home, browsing some technical forums online while continuing to organize the exam materials he had collected over the past two days, categorizing and saving useful information into folders on his computer.

events.name: Exchanging exam preparation experiences with coworkers
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang shared his insights on today's policy consultation in the workers' WeChat group. His coworker Chen Jianguo replied with encouragement and reminded him to pay attention to the latest regulations for the theoretical exam. The two briefly exchanged messages for a few minutes.

起始状态.心情: Calmly and systematically arrange recent affairs.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, feeling like I've taken another small step forward in my career development.

state.今日运动: Daily work involves heavy physical labor with no additional exercise.

date_attribute.weather: On Qingming Festival, the weather is clear and sunny with a gentle breeze.
date_attribute.holiday: Qingming Festival

2025-04.daily_overview: During the Qingming Festival, Lu Mingqiang led his family in tomb-sweeping to honor their ancestors, followed by a warm family reunion at his parents' home. The traditional festival pressed pause on the hectic pace of life, bringing the comfort of family bonds.

events.name: Tomb Sweeping during Qingming Festival
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang drove his wife and two sons to the cemetery on the outskirts of Haikou City. In front of his grandparents' graves, he led the children in offering flowers, lighting incense and candles, and the family respectfully bowed. Pointing to the names on the tombstones, Lu Mingqiang recounted to the children stories of his ancestors' diligence and simplicity from his memory, conducting a silent education in family traditions.

events.name: Family Reunion Lunch at Parents' Home
events.description: After the tomb-sweeping, the whole family drove to their parents' home in Meilan District. Mother Chen Xiuying had already prepared a sumptuous lunch, featuring Lu Mingqiang's favorite Hainanese chicken rice, along with qingbuliang and several home-style stir-fried dishes. Three generations gathered around the dining table, chatting while eating. The conversation ranged from the children's studies to Lu Mingqiang's work, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Afternoon Conversation with Father
events.description: After lunch, Lu Mingqiang accompanied his father, Lu Jianguo, for tea on the balcony. His father inquired with concern about whether he had been overworked recently and his plans to obtain the senior technician certification. Lu Mingqiang gave a brief account, and his father, drawing from his experience as an old electrician, reminded him to pay attention to some of the older standards in the theoretical assessment. Meanwhile, his wife, Wang Lijuan, helped her mother-in-law wash dishes in the kitchen, discussing childcare and household matters.

events.name: Farewell and Homecoming
events.description: In the evening, amid his mother's reminder to [come back for dinner often], Lu Mingqiang and his family bid farewell to his parents and drove back to their home in Longhua District. The children quickly fell asleep in the car. Lu Mingqiang and his wife exchanged a knowing smile—despite financial pressures, the warmth of family reunions remained priceless.

events.name: Leisure During Festivals
events.description: In the evening, with no additional entertainment plans, Lu Mingqiang spent some time browsing news online at home, while his wife accompanied the children watching cartoons. The holiday allowed this family, which was in a period of austerity, to temporarily ease their tense nerves.

起始状态.心情: Solemn and composed, preparing for the tomb-sweeping ceremony.

结束状态.心情: Warm and relaxed, immersed in the satisfaction of family reunion.

state.今日运动: Walking for tomb-sweeping, light physical activity

2025-04.daily_overview: On the second day of the Qingming holiday, after executing his savings plan as scheduled, Lu Mingqiang began organizing the storage room at home to alleviate the frustration brought by financial pressure. This unexpectedly led him to discover new possibilities for revitalizing idle assets and increasing his income.

events.name: Implement an austerity savings plan.
events.description: In the morning, after confirming that the April salary had been fully credited to the account and setting aside the necessary funds for household expenses, Lu Mingqiang, as agreed with his wife, transferred 1,000 yuan from the family joint account to the emergency savings account via mobile banking. Looking at the successful transfer notification, he felt that the first substantial step had been taken toward tightening the budget.

events.name: Relieving stress through physical labor
events.description: Thinking of the failed car repair bill and his tight budget, Lu Mingqiang felt a wave of frustration. He decided to find something to do, so he changed into a set of old clothes and began organizing the storage room at home, which was cluttered with miscellaneous items. He hoped to distract himself through physical labor while also seeing if there was anything that could be [turned from waste into treasure].

events.name: Discover Idle Items
events.description: In the dusty storage room, Lu Mingqiang unearthed several old items: a bulky analog multimeter purchased years ago that is now obsolete; several non-insulated old-fashioned screwdrivers, the use of which is strictly prohibited in current work; and a few common liquor bottles of ordinary appearance that duplicate his existing collection. He weighed each one in his hand, assessing their value.

events.name: Discuss new ideas with my wife
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang showed his wife Wang Lijuan a few items he had cleared out and said somewhat uncertainly, "Lijuan, look at these old things. They're just gathering dust. Didn't you mention before that it's quite convenient to sell second-hand items online these days? How about... we give it a try?" He brought up the idea of using the money from selling unused items to supplement the household income.

events.name: Decided to try selling online
events.description: Wang Lijuan was very supportive upon hearing this and encouraged him to give it a try. She mentioned that some people in their residential community were also selling second-hand children's items. Driven by his wife's encouragement and the practical financial pressure, Lu Mingqiang—a skilled worker unfamiliar with online transactions—decided to try selling idle tools and wine bottles online as a new exploration to increase the family's income.

events.name: Preliminary Sorting of Items for Sale
events.description: Action speaks louder than words. After dinner, Lu Mingqiang brought the old screwdrivers and several liquor bottles he had dug out to the living room, carefully wiping them clean with a cloth. As he cleaned, he silently appraised them in his mind, pondering how to describe these old companions that had been with him for many years.

起始状态.心情: Relaxing on vacation, yet with underlying economic pressure.

结束状态.心情: The slight excitement and anticipation brought by discovering new possibilities have sparked motivation for action.

state.今日运动: Organizing the storage room is equivalent to moderate-intensity household chores.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the last day of the holiday, Lu Mingqiang, under his wife's [technical guidance], began learning how to use second-hand trading platforms. At the same time, he did not neglect his career development and made a special trip to visit his mentor to seek advice on exam preparation, making the day both fulfilling and busy.

events.name: Learning to Use Second-hand Trading Platforms
events.description: In the morning, under the on-site guidance of his wife Wang Lijuan, Lu Mingqiang downloaded a mainstream second-hand trading platform app on his smartphone. He followed the procedures to register an account, complete real-name verification, and carefully read the platform rules and transaction guidelines. Wang Lijuan explained the basic processes of posting items, taking photos, setting prices, communicating with buyers, and shipping the goods.

events.name: Screening and Cleaning Items for Sale
events.description: After learning the basic operations, Lu Mingqiang carefully selected a few more items from the toolbox and collection cabinet. He chose the old multimeter, several specialized wrenches of specific models that were now rarely used, and two empty wine bottles that were in good condition but had been emptied of their contents. He gathered tools and cleaning agents and began meticulously cleaning and maintaining these items [in preparation for listing them].

events.name: Visiting the Master to Seek Guidance on Exam Preparation
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang contacted his master, Master Li, in advance by phone and visited him with some fruits. In the living room of his master's home, he elaborated on his intention and determination to apply for the senior electrician technician certification. He humbly sought advice on the key points of the theoretical exam, the challenging aspects of the practical assessment, and how to effectively balance exam preparation with his current high-intensity workload.

events.name: Obtaining the Master's Valuable Advice
events.description: Master Li was pleased to see his apprentice's ambition. Drawing from his own past exam experience, he offered Lu Mingqiang many practical suggestions: for the theoretical part, focus on the latest national standards and specifications; for practical skills, simulate troubleshooting complex malfunctions as much as possible; he also reminded him to take care of his health, emphasizing that the long preparation period requires perseverance. The master and apprentice talked for a long time, and Lu Mingqiang felt greatly enriched and more confident.

events.name: Weekend Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang prepared a simple dinner. At the table, he shared the insights he had gained from consulting his master during the day and also mentioned learning the [new skill] of selling second-hand items. His eldest son, Lu Zixuan, curiously asked his father what he planned to sell, creating a relaxed and lively atmosphere in the household.

起始状态.心情: Positive, ready to learn new things and visit teachers and mentors.

结束状态.心情: Feeling enriched and deeply inspired, I have gained strength from my master and am filled with anticipation for new endeavors.

state.今日运动: Visiting the master on foot, light physical activity
