2025-04.daily_overview: The new week began with rain. During the day, Lu Mingqiang was busy preparing for emergency repairs during the rainy season. In the evenings, with his wife's assistance, he took [product photos] of idle items, as new challenges in both life and work unfolded simultaneously.

events.name: Emergency Work Deployment for the Rainy Season
events.description: In the morning, the company held an emergency safety meeting in response to the upcoming continuous rainy weather. Foreman Zhang issued emergency response instructions to Lu Mingqiang's team, clarifying the shift schedule and key inspection areas for the next two weeks. After the meeting, Lu Mingqiang, along with his long-time partner Chen Jianguo and apprentice Zhao Qiang, carefully inspected all equipment on the emergency repair vehicle and personal protective gear to ensure readiness for immediate deployment.

events.name: Attempting to photograph an item but encountering difficulties
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang began trying to take photos of the cleaned multimeter, screwdriver, and wine bottle. He took several shots with his phone, but always felt the lighting was too dim and the background too cluttered. The resulting images were far less clear and appealing than those showcased by other sellers on the platform, which left him somewhat frustrated.

events.name: The wife lends a helping hand.
events.description: After returning home from work, Wang Lijuan noticed her husband Lu Mingqiang frowning at his phone and offered to help. She fetched several sheets of white paper to serve as a background, adjusted the angle of the desk lamp, and carefully wiped the surface of the item with a damp cloth. After some adjustments, the photos she took turned out much clearer and more organized. Watching from the side, Lu Mingqiang said admiringly, "You really know how to handle things."

events.name: Crafting Product Descriptions
events.description: With good photos in hand, Lu Mingqiang began writing product descriptions. Drawing on the rigorous and pragmatic traits of his ISTJ personality, he truthfully detailed each item's brand, model, specifications, years of use, current condition, and any minor flaws (such as scratches or paint chips). He also specifically explained the applicable scenarios for vintage tools and the categories of collectible bottles.

events.name: Evening walking attempt canceled due to rain.
events.description: The original plan was to take a brisk walk around the neighborhood after dinner, but as the rain showed no signs of letting up, Lu Mingqiang considered his ongoing recovery from a back injury and the unfavorable weather. He decided to cancel the exercise and instead perform some simple back stretches at home.

起始状态.心情: Slightly solemn due to rainy weather and work alerts.

结束状态.心情: With the help of my wife, I solved the problem and felt reassured and grateful.

state.今日运动: There are light physical activities such as equipment inspections at work, with no additional exercise.

2025-04.daily_overview: Thunderstorm weather increases the risk of circuit failures. During a tense work interval, Lu Mingqiang officially released the first batch of idle item information. Meanwhile, his wife started a new part-time job, bringing new adjustments to the rhythm of family life.

events.name: Release the first batch of idle goods.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang operated a second-hand platform app on his phone. He referred to the prices of similar items on the platform and set what he considered reasonable prices for his old multimeter, several screwdrivers, and two liquor bottles. Then, he uploaded the photos he had prepared the night before along with the detailed descriptions he had written, and clicked [Publish]. Seeing the [Publication Successful] prompt, he let out a long sigh of relief, having taken the first step from idea to action.

events.name: The First Day of My Wife's New Part-time Job
events.description: This afternoon marked the first day that Wang Lijuan, my wife, provided cleaning services for two regular households. She had prepared the cleaning tools in advance. When she returned home in the evening, though somewhat tired, she appeared cheerful and briefly shared with Lu Mingqiang the details of her first day’s work and the basic situation of the employer families.

events.name: Discussing Adjustments to Family Division of Labor
events.description: After dinner, since Wang Lijuan would return late from her part-time job, the two formally sat down to discuss adjustments to the division of household responsibilities. It was preliminarily decided that on the afternoons when Wang Lijuan worked part-time, Lu Mingqiang would try his best to leave work early or arrange for time off to pick up their younger son, Lu Zihan, from kindergarten. As for dinner preparation, the two would coordinate based on who arrived home first, with the earlier one taking the initiative to start cooking.

events.name: Purchase exam preparation materials
events.description: Late at night, following the recommendation of his master, Master Li, and based on information he had gathered online, Lu Mingqiang placed an order on an e-commerce platform for several core textbooks, including "Advanced Electrician Technician Theory Exam Question Bank" and "Power System Relay Protection." He also purchased a well-reputed set of practical skill video tutorials. After completing the payment, he felt that his path toward exam preparation had become more concrete and clear.

events.name: Handling Nighttime Repair Calls
events.description: Shortly after 11 p.m., Lu Mingqiang was awakened by the ringing of the telephone. It was a call from the company dispatcher, informing him that a residential community in Longhua District had experienced a power outage due to a lightning strike. He immediately became alert, gathering details over the phone while quickly putting on his clothes to head out. His wife was also roused from sleep and quietly got up to help him prepare a flashlight and raincoat.

起始状态.心情: Slightly fatigued due to insufficient sleep from overnight emergency repair tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Emergency Repair Site / On the Way Home
结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted to the extreme, yet a sense of fulfillment arises from the professional duty of completing the task.

state.今日运动: High-intensity emergency repair operations at night entail enormous physical exertion.

2025-04.daily_overview: During the continuous heavy rain, Lu Mingqiang undertook a high-difficulty emergency repair of an outdoor high-voltage power line, with the harsh weather and hazardous environment testing both his technical skills and willpower.

events.name: Emergency Repair of Lightning Strike Faults on High-Voltage Lines
events.description: In the morning, a high-voltage line in Xiuying District tripped due to a lightning strike from the previous night. Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, and Zhao Qiang quickly drove to the scene. Although the rain had eased slightly, the utility poles were slippery. Lu Mingqiang put on a full set of insulated protective gear and skillfully climbed the pole to conduct an inspection. At a height of over ten meters, he worked in the light rain, meticulously checking the insulators and line connections one by one, eventually discovering an insulator that had been punctured by lightning. Chen Jianguo directed operations from the ground, while Zhao Qiang was responsible for passing tools and ensuring safety supervision.

events.name: Collaborative Operations in the Rain
events.description: Replacing damaged insulators is a delicate task. Lu Mingqiang steadied himself high above the ground, carefully removing the damaged component with tools before installing a new one. Rainwater trickled down the edge of his safety helmet, demanding his full concentration. Below, Chen Jianguo operated the insulated aerial lift to assist, while constantly reminding him of safety precautions via walkie-talkie. After more than two hours of intense work, the fault was successfully resolved, and power supply to the area was restored.

events.name: Tired Lunch Break and Item Consultation
events.description: Returning to the company's temporary rest area at noon, Lu Mingqiang was soaked through, cold, and exhausted. He changed out of his wet clothes, and as he was nibbling on a piece of bread, his phone vibrated. He glanced at it and was surprised to see a buyer on the second-hand platform inquiring about the details of his old screwdriver. His spirits lifted slightly, and he carefully replied to the buyer's questions.

events.name: The First Day of Handling New Family Division of Labor
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang, having expended considerable energy during the emergency repairs in the morning, explained the situation to his team leader and was allowed to leave work a bit earlier than usual. He drove directly to the kindergarten to pick up his younger son, Lu Zihan, and brought him home. This was his first time solely responsible for picking up the child and preparing dinner, and he appeared somewhat flustered. Nevertheless, he managed to cook porridge and stir-fry a simple vegetable dish in the end.

起始状态.心情: Physically exhausted, but recovered after rest.

结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted, yet intertwined with the sense of accomplishment from completing a daunting task and the pleasant surprise of receiving an item inquiry.

state.今日运动: All-day high-intensity, high-risk outdoor emergency repair operations

2025-04.daily_overview: Wang Lijuan's part-time job has been progressing smoothly, prompting the family to hold a small meeting to clarify the new division of labor. Meanwhile, Lu Mingqiang shared his plans to prepare for the exam among his coworkers and received support from those around him.

events.name: The wife's part-time job is on track.
events.description: Wang Lijuan provided cleaning services for her second regular household and gradually became familiar with the workflow. The employer expressed satisfaction with her diligence and attention to detail. This means the family now has a relatively stable additional source of income each month. Though modest, it serves as an important supplement for the household during this period of financial constraint.

events.name: Formally finalize the adjustment plan for household division of labor.
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan formally finalized the family division of labor adjustment plan due to part-time work: Lu Mingqiang is responsible for picking up their younger son and preparing dinner every Tuesday and Thursday afternoon; Wang Lijuan is responsible for transporting their elder son and leading dinner preparations on non-part-time days. Household chores are shared by both, with whoever has time taking care of them.

events.name: Explaining the New Family Arrangements to the Children
events.description: The two adults called the two children over and, as if holding a small family meeting, explained the changes in the family's schedule after their mother started her new job. Lu Mingqiang said to his eldest son, Lu Zixuan, "If Dad gets off work early, he will come back to cook. You need to finish your homework first." Then he patted his younger son's head. The children nodded understandingly.

events.name: Support and Communication Among Colleagues
events.description: At lunch in the company cafeteria, Lu Mingqiang sat at a table with his closest coworker Chen Jianguo and apprentice Zhao Qiang. He casually mentioned his plan to take the senior technician certification exam. Chen Jianguo was very supportive and shared the experience of a friend who had taken the exam, reminding Lu Mingqiang to pay attention to some easily overlooked new regulations. Zhao Qiang looked impressed and said, "Master Lu, you're really amazing! Can I ask you questions in the future if I don't understand something?" This made Lu Mingqiang feel recognized.

events.name: Received the first order on the second-hand platform
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang was pleasantly surprised to find that an old screwdriver and a liquor bottle he had listed on a second-hand platform had been purchased, with the buyer having already made the payment. Feeling both delighted and slightly nervous, he quickly began figuring out the next steps and shared the good news with his wife.

events.name: Video call with my brother to discuss career development.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang proactively made a video call to his elder brother Lu Minghua in Shenzhen, sharing his progress in preparing for the senior technician certification and his attempts at a side business. His brother encouraged him and suggested that he could explore some online training resources. The two chatted for about 20 minutes, strengthening their familial bond.

起始状态.心情: Steady, adapting to the new pace of life

结束状态.心情: Feeling gratified and motivated, with smooth family collaboration, supportive work environment, and initial success in side ventures.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Friday, Lu Mingqiang practiced a new division of household labor, experiencing the [new role] of picking up the children and preparing dinner. At the same time, he made preparations for the weekend's professional development lecture and his son's technology project.

events.name: Implementing New Division of Labor: Picking Up Children and Preparing Dinner
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang left work on time and drove to the kindergarten to pick up his young son, Lu Zihan. Seeing his father arrive, Lu Zihan was overjoyed. Upon returning home, Lu Mingqiang put on an apron and, under his son’s [supervision], attempted to prepare a relatively substantial dinner: steamed fish and stir-fried vegetables. Although his cooking skills were not as good as his wife’s, his son thoroughly enjoyed the meal.

events.name: Preparing for the weekend lecture
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang found a clean work uniform (he felt it was appropriate to wear work attire for an industry lecture) and ironed it neatly. Then, he checked the transportation route from his home to the conference room of the Hainan Provincial Electric Power Industry Association on his phone, calculated the departure time, set an alarm, and ensured he would not be late the next day.

events.name: Responding to the Eldest Son's Plea for Help
events.description: The eldest son, Lu Zixuan, brought the registration form for the school's Science and Technology Festival to him, hoping his father could help with a small science project. Lu Mingqiang initially thought it was a trivial matter for children and didn't pay much attention. However, upon seeing his son's enthusiastic eyes and his wife's encouraging gaze, his attitude softened, and he agreed to think of a solution together over the weekend.

events.name: Pack the first second-hand order.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang followed the platform's tutorial and gathered old newspapers and bubble wrap. He carefully wrapped the sold screwdriver and liquor bottle separately, placed them into a small cardboard box, sealed it with tape, and prepared to contact a courier for shipping the next day.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, having successfully fulfilled new family responsibilities, and looking forward to weekend activities.

2025-04.daily_overview: A fulfilling and meaningful Saturday. In the morning, Lu Mingqiang attended an industry transformation lecture, broadening his professional horizons. In the afternoon and evening, he took on the roles of a [tutor] and [technical consultant], guiding his son to complete a science and technology festival project, enjoying a rare moment of parent-child collaboration.

events.name: Attend the Lecture on [Transitioning from Technical Backbone to Team Leader]
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lu Mingqiang arrived at the lecture venue on time. He listened attentively and took detailed notes on topics such as team safety management, work coordination, communication with young employees, and career development planning. For a worker like him who had always been immersed in technical work, this knowledge was both fresh and challenging, prompting him to start considering possibilities beyond the technical path.

events.name: Communicating with Colleagues Outside of Work
events.description: After the lecture, Lu Mingqiang met Zhang Jianguo, a colleague who had also come to attend the lecture, outside the venue. The two briefly exchanged thoughts on the lecture content, both sighing that "managing people as a team leader is harder than doing the work oneself," yet acknowledging the usefulness of such knowledge. This conversation made him feel less isolated within his professional circle.

events.name: Sharing Lecture Insights with My Wife
events.description: After returning home in the evening, at the dinner table, Lu Mingqiang proactively shared with his wife Wang Lijuan the content of today's lecture, as well as his vague thoughts and concerns about possibly pursuing a management position in the future, mainly worrying about his low educational background and poor communication skills. His wife encouraged him: "Take it step by step. Learning more is always beneficial."

events.name: Guiding my son to complete the science fair project
events.description: After the meal, Lu Mingqiang kept his promise and worked with his son, Lu Zixuan, on a small science and technology project. He retrieved old wires, small light bulbs, batteries, a switch, and cardboard from the toolbox and storage room. First, he assumed the role of a technical advisor, explaining basic circuit principles and electrical safety knowledge to his son, with particular emphasis on operational standards.

events.name: Father and Son Collaborate to Create [Bright Cottage]
events.description: Under Lu Mingqiang's guidance, Lu Zixuan built a model house with cardboard and attempted to connect the circuit himself. Lu Mingqiang observed from the side, offering hints only when his son encountered difficulties, insisting that he complete the task independently. After several attempts, when Lu Zixuan pressed the switch and the small light bulb illuminated inside the cardboard house, both father and son smiled happily. They named their creation [Bright Cottage].

events.name: Family Showcase and Joyful Moments
events.description: After completing the work, Lu Mingqiang and his son presented the [Bright House] to Wang Lijuan and their younger son Lu Zihan. Lu Zixuan excitedly explained the production process and gave a demonstration. The whole family was delighted with his achievement, and the living room was filled with laughter and joy—a rare moment of warmth and happiness amid the recent tense life.

events.name: Issue the first second-hand order
events.description: Before heading out in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang scheduled a courier pickup through a mobile app, handed over the packed cardboard boxes to the courier, and completed a crucial step in the second-hand transaction—shipping.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to attending the lecture and enjoying family time.

结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of accomplishment and happiness, with an inspiring career and harmonious family relationships.

state.今日运动: Attended a lecture in the morning (prolonged sitting), engaged in light housework and parent-child activities in the afternoon.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Sunday, with heavy rain pouring down, Lu Mingqiang braved the storm during the day to carry out a challenging emergency repair of water accumulation in a cable trench. In the evening, he organized the newly arrived exam preparation materials and formulated a detailed study plan for the upcoming week.

events.name: Emergency Repair of Water Accumulation in Cable Trenches in Old Residential Areas
events.description: In Longhua District, an old residential community experienced a multi-household power outage due to severe water accumulation in the cable trench caused by continuous heavy rain. Lu Mingqiang's team was responsible for the emergency repair. On-site, drainage was carried out first, after which Lu Mingqiang put on bulky waterproof clothing and descended into the narrow, damp, and stuffy cable trench. The confined space inside the trench forced him to work in a half-squatting position, carefully inspecting and replacing the water-damaged cable joints. The working conditions were extremely harsh, and the repair lasted for several hours, only completed by evening.

events.name: Fatigue after high-intensity emergency repairs
events.description: After returning home from completing the emergency repair, Lu Mingqiang felt a dull ache in his lower back. His entire body was soaked with sweat and dampness, leaving him utterly exhausted. The prolonged and demanding work in such harsh conditions had taken a significant toll on his physical strength. His wife quickly urged him to take a hot shower and prepared a pot of ginger soup for him.

events.name: Received and organized study materials for exam preparation.
events.description: In the evening, the exam textbooks and video tutorials purchased online a few days ago arrived one after another. After taking a shower and resting for a while, Lu Mingqiang mustered his energy, moved all the materials to his desk, and sorted the textbooks according to the exam syllabus. He gently touched the brand-new pages, feeling that his goal was now within reach.

events.name: Develop a detailed weekly study plan
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang consulted his work schedule and formulated a detailed study plan for the upcoming first week: study one theoretical chapter each on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday evenings; review and practice problems on Tuesday and Thursday evenings if he gets off work early; and dedicate half a day on weekends to watching practical operation videos and conducting simulation exercises. He wrote the plan in his notebook, determined to follow it strictly.

events.name: Confirm receipt of payment for second-hand transaction
events.description: Before going to bed, he checked his phone and found that the second-hand trading platform and the bank had sent consecutive text messages, notifying him that the buyer had confirmed receipt of the item from the transaction he had initiated two days earlier, and the payment of 328 yuan had been credited to his account. This served as a small yet tangible encouragement for him.

起始状态.心情: Relax, but be aware that there may be emergency repair tasks.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted with back discomfort, yet mentally resolute due to clear plans and side income.

state.今日运动: All-day high-intensity, high-difficulty outdoor emergency repair operations, resulting in physical exhaustion.

2025-04.daily_overview: In the new week, Lu Mingqiang spent his time managing side income, registering for a skills competition, and having in-depth discussions with his wife about his exam preparation plan. The main thread of his life unfolded clearly between coping with immediate pressures and pursuing long-term goals.

events.name: Plan the career development path
events.description: During a break in his workday, inspired by a weekend lecture, Lu Mingqiang used his mobile phone to search online for the detailed application requirements for the Senior Electrician Technician Certificate, as well as the common pathways and requirements for transitioning from a senior technician to a technical management position (such as a team leader) within the industry. He saved useful webpage links and information summaries, and began to consider longer-term plans in light of his own circumstances.

events.name: Handling the First Side Income
events.description: After getting off work in the evening, Lu Mingqiang transferred the 328 yuan received from the second-hand platform into the WeChat change account used for daily household expenses via mobile banking. After completing the transfer, he deliberately showed the transaction record and transfer screenshot to his wife, Wang Lijuan, and remarked with some emotion: "I never expected that these old items taking up space could actually be sorted out and exchanged for some grocery money." His wife was also delighted.

events.name: Decided to register for the skills competition
events.description: Workmate Chen Jianguo informed Lu Mingqiang that the company was about to hold the "Power Craftsman Cup" skills competition, where outstanding performers would not only receive bonuses but might also be awarded training opportunities. Encouraged by Chen Jianguo, Lu Mingqiang felt this was a good opportunity to test his technical skills and decided to sign up. He used his spare time in the evenings to review several complex fault cases he had previously handled.

events.name: Have an in-depth discussion with my wife about the exam preparation plan.
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang had a serious conversation with his wife. He explained in detail the arrangements for preparing for the senior technician exam over the next few months: it would require a significant amount of time for reading, practicing questions, and hands-on training. He might not be able to spend as much time with the family in the evenings and on weekends as before, and he would need his wife to take on more household responsibilities. Wang Lijuan expressed her complete understanding and support, assuring him to focus on his studies with peace of mind, as she would take care of everything at home.

events.name: Commence implementation of the learning plan.
events.description: After the conversation, Lu Mingqiang began his first night of formal study according to his weekly plan. He opened the "Advanced Electrician Technician Theoretical Exam Question Bank," starting from the first chapter, and took notes while reading. Although some concepts were unfamiliar, he remained deeply engaged in his learning.

起始状态.心情: There is still slight discomfort in the lower back, but the spirit is high and ready to start a new week of hard work.

结束状态.心情: Firm and goal-oriented, feeling the full support of my wife, the journey of exam preparation has officially commenced.

state.今日运动: Daily physical activities at work, with lower back discomfort limiting additional exercise.

2025-04.daily_overview: On a clear weekday, Lu Mingqiang worked intensely on transformer replacement until late at night, while his family life sought a new balance through continuous fine-tuning. He shared successful experiences in selling idle items, bringing a glimmer of brightness to the tightened household finances.

events.name: Optimize the Family Dinner Process
events.description: During breakfast, Wang Lijuan mentioned that she gets off work late on her part-time days, making it quite rushed to prepare dinner. Lu Mingqiang proactively suggested that on days when he doesn't work overtime, he could come home earlier to prepare some simple meals, or use the weekend to prepare more semi-finished ingredients (such as chopped meat and washed vegetables) to store in the refrigerator. The two quickly agreed on a new collaborative process for dinner preparation.

events.name: Sharing Successful Side Hustle Experiences
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang brought up the topic of selling idle items again. He described the entire process in detail to his wife, from taking photos and writing descriptions to communicating with buyers, packing, and shipping. He concluded, "It seems that as long as the items are genuine and the descriptions are clear, there will always be someone who recognizes their value." This small success gave him more confidence in earning additional income in his spare time.

events.name: Emergency Repair of Overloaded Transformer in Commercial District
events.description: In the afternoon, a transformer in a commercial district of Haikou overloaded and burned out due to a sharp increase in electricity consumption, causing a widespread power outage. Lu Mingqiang led his team to rush to the scene. He was responsible for fault analysis, confirmed the plan to replace the transformer, and personally took charge of key operations such as hoisting the new transformer and performing high-voltage wiring, while instructing apprentice Zhao Qiang to assist. The work continued late into the night.

events.name: Returning Home Late at Night
events.description: It was nearly midnight when Lu Mingqiang finished the emergency repairs. He drove home, dragging his exhausted body. His wife and children had long since fallen asleep, but the light in the living room was still on for him, and a bowl of warm qingbuliang was covered on the dining table. He quickly finished it, washed up, and gently lay down. Though his body was utterly exhausted, he felt a sense of peace in his heart, thinking of the warmth of his family and the smile on his wife’s face when he shared his [successful experience] with her during the day.

events.name: Received new inquiry regarding second-hand items
events.description: During a break in the emergency repairs, Lu Mingqiang checked his phone and found that the old multimeter he had listed for sale had received several more inquiries from potential buyers, asking about its accuracy and whether it was still functional. Taking advantage of the rest period, he provided professional and sincere responses to each inquiry.

起始状态.心情: Steady, prepared to handle potentially high-intensity work

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted to the extreme, yet inwardly warmed and fulfilled by family support and progress in side endeavors.

state.今日运动: High-intensity emergency repair operations at night result in significant physical exertion, with no additional exercise.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, muggy in the afternoon with possible showers.

2025-04.daily_overview: It was an ordinary workday, but the family's good news alleviated the dreariness of the early rainy season. During a break at work, Lu Mingqiang learned that his son had won an award, filling his heart with pride. After work, he attempted to plan some healthy activities, but exhaustion forced him to give up.

events.name: The Achievements and Pride of a Son
events.description: The results of the school's Science and Technology Festival were announced. During his lunch break, Lu Mingqiang received a call from his son, whose voice was filled with excitement and pride as he announced that his "Bright Cabin" project had won the "Best Practice Award." Listening to his son describe the judges' praise, Lu Mingqiang couldn't help but smile. This award was not just about craftsmanship; it was also recognition of his son's hands-on skills and understanding. Though his work clothes were still stained with grease, Lu Mingqiang felt more satisfied in that moment than he would have with any certificate. He thought to himself that he must properly praise his son over the weekend.

events.name: Financial Reflections After Monetizing Idle Assets
events.description: After the payment for disposing of the idle old household appliances arrived a few days ago, Lu Mingqiang looked at the small sum of money added to his mobile banking account, feeling somewhat unsettled. In the past, he had always adhered to the older generation's notions of "repairing and patching things up to last another three years" and "keeping things just in case they might be useful." However, this successful transaction made him start pondering the cluttered spaces in his home: the old fan in the attic, the replaced tires in the garage, the toys his children had outgrown... He realized that these "reserve items" not only took up space but also represented a hidden form of waste. A simple idea began to take shape in his mind: rather than letting things gather dust, it would be better to convert them into tangible money to supplement the household budget.

events.name: Preparing for the Senior Technician Certification: Taking the First Step
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang did not go online or watch television as usual, but instead retreated to the study at home. He rummaged through a drawer and pulled out a printed copy of the examination syllabus for the senior electrician technician certification, reading it carefully. Circuit analysis, relay protection, power systems… some terms were familiar, while others felt somewhat unfamiliar. He fetched a notebook and, based on the exam schedule and his own weak areas, meticulously drafted a study plan from April to September, breaking down the monthly tasks into weekly segments. Next, he went online to search for and download electronic versions of relevant textbooks and several sets of past exam papers, organizing them by category and placing them in the most prominent spot on his desk. Looking at the preliminary plan, he felt a long-lost sense of steadiness, one born of having a clear goal.

events.name: Routine Maintenance and Physical Warning Signs
events.description: Today's work primarily involved conducting preventive inspections and recording parameters at a distribution room in Xiuying District scheduled for renovation. While bending over to examine the internal wiring of the low-voltage cabinet, Lu Mingqiang felt a slight soreness and tightness in his lower back. He paused for a moment, straightened up to stretch, and the discomfort subsided. He didn’t pay much attention to it, attributing it to improper posture while moving equipment the day before. Yet, this fleeting sensation, like a small stone dropped into a calm lake, left behind subtle ripples.

events.name: Attempted evening brisk walking but gave up due to fatigue.
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang originally planned to take a 20-minute brisk walk around the neighborhood to relieve work stress. However, halfway through, he felt increased soreness and stiffness in his lower back, compounded by the fatigue from the day’s work. In the end, he decided to give up and head straight home to rest. This made him realize that his physical condition requires more attention.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation of the workload intensity during the rainy season.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and proud, yet with a distinct sense of physical fatigue.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, work involves moderate physical activity.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast, muggy and humid, with light rain in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: An ordinary day filled with practical satisfaction. The wife's part-time income brought tangible peace of mind, while Lu Mingqiang, during work breaks, instinctively fulfilled his duties as a skilled worker—maintaining tools and contributing to healthy social interactions.

events.name: The sense of fulfillment from the first part-time income
events.description: In the evening, Wang Lijuan handed the few hundred yuan she had earned from her part-time housekeeping work during the first week to Lu Mingqiang. The amount was not large, but the bills were crisp and neatly arranged. Sitting together on the sofa, Lu Mingqiang held the stack of banknotes, feeling the weight they carried. They discussed and agreed that this extra income would not be used for daily expenses for the time being. Instead, it would be saved as part of the family’s emergency fund to handle unexpected situations, such as the car repair they had faced previously. The feeling of jointly planning for their family and gradually increasing their savings brought both of them a profound sense of reassurance.

events.name: Maintain tools during idle time
events.description: After several consecutive days of emergency repairs came to a temporary halt, the afternoon tasks for the team were not particularly demanding. Instead of taking a break, Lu Mingqiang pulled his apprentice Zhao Qiang along and busied themselves in the company's tool room. He meticulously inspected each pair of insulating gloves for any damage, tested every voltage detector for sensitivity, lubricated the tensioning devices, and checked whether the materials in the emergency repair kits were complete. He even climbed onto the engineering vehicle to inspect the tire pressure and the reserve fuel. Chen Jianguo passed by and teased him, saying, "You care more about these iron tools than your own wife." Without looking up, Lu Mingqiang replied, "If the tools aren't in good condition, what can we do when a real fault occurs? The rainy season is coming—it's better to be prepared." This was a habit he had developed over years of work and a reflection of his sense of responsibility toward his profession.

events.name: Discussing safety during the rainy season with coworkers during lunch.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang chatted with his coworker Chen Jianguo while eating in the cafeteria, exchanging safety precautions for outdoor work during the rainy season, such as anti-slip measures and insulation equipment checks. This brief social interaction made him feel the support of the team and also alleviated his work pressure.

events.name: Stumbled Upon a Healthy Recipe
events.description: While browsing the internet in the evening, Lu Mingqiang happened upon an article about low-cost nutritious meals. Inspired by financial pressures, he decided to try incorporating more vegetables into his family's diet to reduce dining-out expenses and privately planned to implement this during his weekend grocery shopping.

起始状态.心情: Steady, prepared for work

结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, jointly planning family finances with one's spouse brings a sense of security.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise; work involves light physical activities such as tool maintenance.

date_attribute.weather: Thunderstorms turning to cloudy, with exceptionally muggy weather.

2025-04.daily_overview: A workday spent navigating minor setbacks and routine social interactions. The small frustrations of helping a child with homework serve as reminders of life's challenges, yet the anticipation of a planned gathering with old friends brings hope for the weekend. The workload remains heavy, and the sense of physical fatigue continues to accumulate.

events.name: Frustrations and Coping Strategies in Tutoring Homework
events.description: While checking Lu Zixuan's math homework in the evening, an application problem about the perimeter of a shape stumped Lu Mingqiang. He held a pencil and drew on scratch paper for a long time, but the formula didn’t seem to match. His son watched him eagerly, and he felt somewhat embarrassed. In the end, he honestly admitted, "Dad has forgotten this knowledge point a bit. Let’s look it up together." He took out his phone to search for the solution method and, after figuring it out, patiently explained it to his son. Later, he discussed with Wang Lijuan that in such situations, they could either address the issues collectively over the weekend or seek help from retired teacher Wang (Wang Jianguo) in the neighboring unit. He realized that he couldn’t be the child’s "teacher" in every aspect.

events.name: Meeting an Old Friend
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang realized it had been a while since he had a good chat with his coworker and old friend Chen Jianguo. He picked up his phone and sent a WeChat message to Chen Jianguo: "Old Chen, are you free tomorrow afternoon, Saturday? Let’s meet at the usual spot for a cup of tea and a chat." Shortly after, Chen Jianguo replied: "Sure, I actually have something I’d like to get your opinion on. Let’s meet at Xiuying Old Wharf Tea Shop at 3 p.m." With just a few simple messages, their weekend leisure and social plans were set.

events.name: Frequent operations before the rainy season
events.description: The weather was unusually muggy, a sign of an impending thunderstorm. Lu Mingqiang's team handled three power line tripping incidents today caused by dampness or small animals, keeping them on the move across different districts of Haikou. Climbing up and down, they sweated profusely, their work uniforms repeatedly soaked and dried. By the end of the shift, he felt more exhausted than usual, and that vague, dull ache in his lower back had returned. He attributed it to the humid, hot weather and the physical exertion.

events.name: Canceling kite-flying plans due to weather conditions.
events.description: Lu Mingqiang had originally planned to go kite-flying over the weekend, but upon seeing the thunderstorm forecast, he made a last-minute decision to cancel and switch to indoor activities. This left him somewhat disappointed, but he was even more concerned about the potential impact on his work.

events.name: Self-Regulation During Emotional Fluctuations
events.description: Due to fatigue and lower back discomfort, Lu Mingqiang felt somewhat down in the evening. He briefly relaxed by listening to light music, but the effect was limited, leading him to realize the need for more rest.

起始状态.心情: Slightly weary, looking forward to the weekend.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary, but feeling somewhat relaxed at the thought of tomorrow's gathering.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, high-intensity outdoor electrical maintenance work

date_attribute.weather: Mostly cloudy with brief afternoon sunshine, overall cool and comfortable.

2025-04.daily_overview: A typical, relaxed Saturday in Haikou. In the morning, household chores were taken care of; in the afternoon, I enjoyed a rare leisurely time with old friends at a tea shop, discussing technology and venting about life. In the evening, I returned home to share stories with my wife and children and plan activities for the next day.

events.name: Weekend Housework and Travel
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan divided the tasks and worked together to clean the house and wash the clothes that had accumulated over the week. Lu Mingqiang was responsible for mopping the floor and checking whether several switch panels in the house were loose. By the time they finished, it was almost noon. After 2 p.m., he changed into clean, casual clothes, said goodbye to his wife, and drove the family's somewhat old car from Jinmao Middle Road in Longhua District to a traditional tea shop near Haisheng Road in Xiuying District.

events.name: Tea Gathering of Old Friends
events.description: When Lu Mingqiang arrived at the tea shop, Chen Jianguo had already secured a window seat and ordered a pot of black tea along with a few snacks. As soon as they met, their conversation began with the recent high-intensity work, each venting about the bizarre malfunctions and difficult clients they had encountered. The topic then shifted to family matters, with Chen Jianguo recounting his son’s mischievous antics, while Lu Mingqiang shared the joy of his son Lu Zixuan winning an award. The atmosphere was relaxed and comfortable, with the tea in their cups being refilled again and again.

events.name: Technical Exchange: Water Heater Selection Recommendations
events.description: Midway through the conversation, Chen Jianguo mentioned that the water heater at his home, which had been in use for many years, was constantly malfunctioning, and he wanted to replace it with a new one. However, the overwhelming variety of options on the market left him feeling confused. Lu Mingqiang immediately perked up and began analyzing the situation in detail from an electrical and safety perspective: "Storage water heaters are cheaper but consume more electricity and heat up slowly. Instant water heaters are more energy-efficient but require higher electrical standards—your old house's wiring needs to be checked first... Gas water heaters are the most efficient, but installation requires venting, which can be a bit troublesome." He also recommended suitable capacities and brands based on the number of people in Chen Jianguo's household and their usage habits. Chen Jianguo nodded repeatedly and said, "I came to the right person for advice—you're more reliable than a salesperson!"

events.name: Homecoming Sharing
events.description: They chatted for nearly two hours before settling their bills separately and leaving. Lu Mingqiang drove home, where Wang Lijuan was preparing dinner. While helping to pick vegetables, he shared some interesting highlights from the afternoon conversation with his wife, especially the amusing anecdote about Chen Jianguo’s son. The kitchen was filled with the aroma of food and the sound of lighthearted conversation.

events.name: Planning weekend activities with my wife in the evening.
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang discussed tomorrow's family shopping and activity arrangements with his wife. They decided that if the weather is good, they would go to the park to fly kites in the afternoon, which filled him with anticipation for Sunday.

events.name: Briefly contact fellow players
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang sent a message to his squash partner Lin Feng on WeChat, inquiring about the arrangements for next week's squash activity. However, due to his unhealed back injury, he decided to temporarily refrain from participating and to stay in touch.

起始状态.心情: Relax, the leisurely feeling of the weekend

结束状态.心情: Joy, the satisfaction after socializing and the warmth of family

state.今日运动: No specific exercise routine, primarily engaged in household chores and driving.

date_attribute.weather: The day was clear and sunny, but the weather changed abruptly in the evening, with heavy rain pouring down.

2025-04.daily_overview: This Sunday was split into two distinct parts: the daytime was an orderly family affair, filled with shopping, household chores, and parent-child interactions; the night, however, was disrupted by a sudden downpour and urgent repair tasks. Lu Mingqiang transitioned from being a father and husband back to his role as a frontline power worker, braving the wind and rain to safeguard the city's electricity supply.

events.name: Household Purchasing and Chore Allocation
events.description: In the morning, the whole family mobilized for the weekly grocery shopping at the supermarket. Lu Mingqiang pushed the shopping cart, while Wang Lijuan selected items according to the shopping list. The two children lingered in the snack section but were strictly limited in their choices. In the afternoon, the entire family engaged in a thorough cleaning. Lu Mingqiang took on the heavy-duty tasks, such as moving furniture and cleaning high windows. Wang Lijuan was responsible for detailed cleaning. Lu Zixuan was assigned to organize his own desk and toys, while Lu Zihan, under her mother's guidance, neatly arranged the slippers. Although the children occasionally "helped in a counterproductive way," the atmosphere of family collaboration was excellent.

events.name: Emergency Repair on a Rainy Night
events.description: It was past nine in the evening, and a violent storm was raging outside. Lu Mingqiang’s phone rang urgently—it was a dispatch call from the company: in Meilan District, a tree branch had broken and fallen onto power lines in an old residential area, causing a widespread blackout that required immediate repair. He quickly changed into his work uniform, grabbed his toolkit, and rushed out the door. Upon arriving at the scene, he found Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang had just arrived as well. The rain was heavy, requiring extra caution with safety measures. Lu Mingqiang operated an aerial work vehicle to ascend to the broken line, the rain beating down so hard he could barely keep his eyes open. Carefully, he used an insulated rod to remove the wet branch, and with the assistance of his coworkers, performed emergency wrapping and securing of the damaged line. After nearly four hours of intense work, power was restored to the affected area around one in the morning. Exhausted and chilled to the bone, he returned home, taking a quiet hot shower to avoid waking his family.

events.name: Low back discomfort intensified after emergency repair.
events.description: After the emergency repairs were completed, Lu Mingqiang felt a significant increase in lower back pain, to the point where he could barely stand upright. He endured the pain and made his way home, which left him deeply concerned about his health condition.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy family time.

结束状态.心情: Extreme fatigue but a sense of solidity after completing the task, with the body, especially the lower back, feeling heavy and painful.

state.今日运动: High-intensity nighttime outdoor power emergency repairs involve immense physical exertion.

date_attribute.weather: Heavy rain turning to overcast, with humid weather.

2025-04.daily_overview: It was a day filled with frustration and harsh reality. The complete write-off of the car not only meant a financial loss but also shook Lu Mingqiang's confidence in his conservative financial decisions. When he confessed the situation to his wife that evening, the family's financial pressure suddenly became concrete and acute.

events.name: Vehicle Malfunction Recurrence and Ominous Premonition
events.description: While driving to work in the morning, as he passed over a gentle slope, the transmission once again produced a severe jolt and abnormal noise, causing the car to lurch forward abruptly. Lu Mingqiang's heart sank along with it. The major repair in March had cost a considerable amount of money, yet it seemed the issue had not been resolved at all. Throughout the day, this thought weighed on his mind like a heavy stone. After work in the afternoon, he decided he could no longer delay taking action.

events.name: Seek help from friends, conduct a thorough inspection
events.description: Lu Mingqiang did not go to his usual repair shop. Instead, he called his friend Chen Jie, who worked at "Swift Auto Service Center," and briefly explained the situation. Chen Jie told him to drive the car over directly. Upon arriving at the shop, Chen Jie personally took charge, lifting the car up for a thorough inspection. Lu Mingqiang watched from the side, feeling anxious and uneasy.

events.name: Cruel Diagnosis: Beyond Repair Value
events.description: The inspection lasted nearly an hour. Chen Jie crawled out from under the car, dusted off his hands, and pulled Lu Mingqiang aside with a grave expression. "Brother Qiang, we've been friends for so many years, so I'll be straight with you." He pointed at the car. "The transmission is severely worn—fixing this part will just lead to other failures. The chassis is rusted, the suspension bushings are completely aged, and the engine is in poor condition. This car has reached its age; it's plagued with problems all over." He paused before delivering the crucial line: "Putting more money into repairs is just a bottomless pit—it's not worth it. My advice is to stop repairing it."

events.name: Frustration, Regret, and Acceptance of Reality
events.description: Chen Jie's words felt like a bucket of cold water, drenching Lu Mingqiang to the bone. He recalled that in March, he had used the family's emergency fund to repair the car. Although his wife hadn't said anything at the time, he remembered the worry in her eyes. Now, that money had essentially gone down the drain. A strong sense of defeat and regret over his poor decision washed over him. After a long silence, he finally asked in a hoarse voice, "So... what do we do with the car now?"

events.name: Discussing Countermeasures and Future Plans
events.description: Chen Jie suggested either selling it as scrap metal at a low price or checking if any used car dealers would buy the parts. Lu Mingqiang’s mind was in turmoil. After a brief discussion, he thanked Chen Jie, hailed a taxi, and headed home. The whole way, he kept thinking: without the car, how would he commute to work? (Even though it was only a ten-minute drive, what about windy or rainy days?) How would he take his family out on weekends? Should he buy another car? Where would the money come from? The family’s financial situation was already tight…

events.name: Confessing to the Wife and Discussing Countermeasures Together
events.description: When he returned home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang’s expression was grim. Wang Lijuan noticed something was wrong and asked with concern. Taking a deep breath, Lu Mingqiang recounted the entire incident—how the car was completely totaled and the repair money had gone to waste. He hung his head, not daring to meet his wife’s eyes, like a child who had done something wrong. To his surprise, Wang Lijuan did not complain. After a moment of silence, she sighed and said, "The money is spent, and that’s that. What matters is that you’re safe. We’ll figure something out about the car." The two sat on the sofa and began to painstakingly discuss their future transportation arrangements: Lu Mingqiang could ride an electric scooter or carpool with coworkers to work; on weekends, they would avoid long trips or take public transportation; at the same time, they would need to tighten their spending to prepare for possibly buying another car in the future or relying on public transportation long-term. That night, the family’s financial pressure became starkly real.

events.name: Listen to music to soothe when feeling down.
events.description: Late at night, Lu Mingqiang found it difficult to fall asleep due to stress and guilt. He put on headphones and listened to a few pieces of light music, briefly easing his emotions, but the sense of anxiety still lingered.

起始状态.心情: Worried about Car Issues

结束状态.心情: Heavy-hearted, frustrated, and filled with worry and guilt over the family's financial situation.

2025-04.daily_overview: Amid the damp, rainy weather and continuous emergency repair work, physical exhaustion reached a new peak. The shadow of the car being scrapped had not yet dissipated, and the heavy pressure of work followed closely. Lu Mingqiang relied on his sense of responsibility and commitment to his family to keep himself going, but his body had already sent clear warning signals.

events.name: Emergency Repair of Lightning Strike Faults on High-Voltage Lines
events.description: Early in the morning, they received a notification that a high-voltage line in the suburbs was suspected of being struck by lightning, requiring an urgent inspection. Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, and Zhao Qiang drove to the site with professional equipment. The on-site environment was complex, with the lines erected over muddy fields. Wearing heavy raincoats and insulated boots, they trudged through the difficult terrain to conduct the inspection and safety assessment. Their preliminary judgment indicated the need to replace some damaged insulators and cables. Rain and sweat mixed together, making the work exceptionally arduous.

events.name: The Weary Body and the Persistent Heart
events.description: The nearly half-month-long emergency repairs during the rainy season, coupled with the emotional blow of his car being scrapped the day before, left Lu Mingqiang feeling an unprecedented level of exhaustion. While moving materials at the construction site in the afternoon, he clearly felt the soreness in his lower back and shoulders turn into a persistent ache, leaving him with little strength. After returning home from work in the evening, he didn’t even feel like talking much. As hot water washed over his stiff muscles during his shower, he felt a wave of weakness wash over him. Seeing his pale complexion, his wife Wang Lijuan asked him to lie face down on the bed and massaged his shoulders and back with firm pressure. With his face buried in the pillow, Lu Mingqiang muttered, "This body of mine doesn’t seem as strong as it used to be." Wang Lijuan chided him affectionately, blaming him for pushing himself too hard. But Lu Mingqiang replied, "I have no choice. The family depends on this. Besides, when I think about how the lines we repair can light up other people’s homes, the exhaustion feels worth it." These words were meant for his wife, but also for himself—a way of using responsibility to push back against the warnings from his body and the pressures of life.

events.name: Start paying attention to waist protection movements.
events.description: At work, Lu Mingqiang deliberately adjusted his posture to avoid bending over for too long and reminded his apprentice Zhao Qiang to pay attention to safety, reflecting his gradually increasing awareness of health.

起始状态.心情: Weary, gloomy

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted to the extreme, the mind wrestles between a sense of duty and a feeling of powerlessness.

state.今日运动: High-intensity outdoor power emergency repair and heavy physical labor

date_attribute.weather: The rain gradually subsided, turning to overcast skies as the weather began to clear.

2025-04.daily_overview: A day marked by both chaos and high intensity. The family schedule was disrupted by sudden work changes, but emergency measures were promptly activated. Physical exertion at work reached its peak, and with the improvement in weather, the prolonged battle of emergency repairs finally approached its conclusion. An evening meal of grilled fish provided a brief respite for the weary body and mind.

events.name: Sudden Overtime and Family Emergencies
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang received a sudden notification that the high-voltage line fault identified the day before yesterday required immediate replacement work, necessitating overtime in the afternoon. Unfortunately, Wang Lijuan had a pre-scheduled part-time housekeeping job in the afternoon. After discussing, they realized their schedules conflicted. Lu Mingqiang immediately called his mother, Chen Xiuying, who lived in the Meilan District, explained the situation, and asked her to come over in the afternoon to help look after their younger son, Lu Zihan. Without hesitation, his mother agreed. Afterward, both Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan felt it necessary to establish a more reliable emergency contact list, including their parents and trustworthy neighbors.

events.name: The Battle on High-Voltage Lines
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and his team began the high-voltage line replacement work at the suburban construction site. This was a task that combined heavy physical labor with technical skill. They needed to climb nearly twenty-meter-high utility poles, operate heavy tensioners under the scorching sun (the sun emerged after the rain, making it exceptionally sultry), move cables, and perform precise wiring and insulation work. Lu Mingqiang remained on the pole for nearly three hours, his thick work clothes soaked through with sweat, and the strain on his back and waist was immense. With every exertion, he could feel his muscles protesting.

events.name: Relaxation after the completion of the emergency repair period.
events.description: With the repair of the major faulty lines completed, the peak period of emergency repairs during the prolonged rainy season has essentially come to an end. Before finishing work in the afternoon, Team Leader Zhang Jianguo held a brief post-shift meeting, during which Lu Mingqiang reported on the overall situation of the repairs. After work, Lu Mingqiang, physically and mentally exhausted yet feeling a sense of relief, took the initiative to invite Chen Jianguo. The two went to a familiar food stall near the company, ordering a grilled fish and several bottles of chilled beer. They spoke little, mostly focusing on eating and occasionally clinking their bottles. This simple dinner seemed to mark the end of the tense period and served as a reward for their hard work.

events.name: Discussing Occupational Risks with Chen Jianguo During Dinner
events.description: While eating grilled fish, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo discussed the risk of lumbar injuries. Both sighed over the hardships of heavy physical labor and agreed to pay more attention to protection in the future. This topic continued to be discussed in the following days.

起始状态.心情: Slightly hectic due to an unexpected overtime arrangement.

结束状态.心情: Relaxation after extreme exhaustion, accompanied by a slight sense of accomplishment from completing a challenging task.

state.今日运动: Extremely high-intensity high-altitude electrical work and heavy physical labor

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, with a noticeable rise in temperature.

2025-04.daily_overview: A day that plunged abruptly from the tranquility of completing work into a health crisis. The sudden onset of back injury brought not only excruciating pain but also profound fear for his professional future. On this day, Lu Mingqiang transformed from a worker who considered himself healthy into a patient in need of care.

events.name: Complete the final repairs and testing.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and his team conducted final tightening, equipment installation, and comprehensive insulation resistance tests on the high-voltage lines that had been replaced the previous day. The weather was favorable, and the work proceeded smoothly. Team leader Zhang Jianguo supervised on-site. In the afternoon, a power-on test was carried out, and the lines operated stably, marking the successful completion of the emergency repair task. Lu Mingqiang looked at the restored power indicator light and breathed a sigh of relief.

events.name: A catastrophic moment: The sudden onset of a back injury
events.description: Just as all the work was completed, Lu Mingqiang descended from the utility pole. The moment his feet touched the ground and he was about to straighten up to gather his tools—a tearing, sharp pain suddenly shot through the left side of his waist! The pain was so intense that his vision went black instantly, his knees buckled, and he nearly collapsed to the ground. He gasped sharply, his entire body frozen in place, completely unable to stand upright. He could only barely manage to support himself by leaning against the tire of the work vehicle.

events.name: Emergency Hospitalization and Diagnosis
events.description: Seeing this, Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang nearby rushed over to support him. Lu Mingqiang's face turned deathly pale, with cold sweat beading on his forehead, and he could barely speak. Chen Jianguo acted decisively, and together with Zhao Qiang, they helped him into the engineering vehicle and rushed him to the emergency department of the nearest Haikou City People's Hospital. Throughout the journey, Lu Mingqiang curled up in pain in the back seat. Beyond the agony, his mind was filled with fear: if his back were to be permanently damaged, how would he continue climbing poles in the future? How would he support his family?… After an examination, the emergency doctor diagnosed him with acute lumbar muscle strain accompanied by fascial inflammation, a relatively severe condition. The doctor sternly warned him that he must immediately cease all heavy physical labor, strictly adhere to bed rest, and undergo systematic treatment. Otherwise, the injury could become chronic and even affect his ability to continue his current work.

events.name: Notify Family and Report to the Unit
events.description: After receiving initial treatment (medication application and prescription) at the hospital, the pain slightly eased, but Lu Mingqiang still could not walk normally. With a heavy heart, he called his wife Wang Lijuan, trying to speak calmly as he told her that he was at the hospital, had suffered a back injury, and needed to rest for a period of time. On the other end of the line, Wang Lijuan’s voice immediately filled with anxiety. Meanwhile, Chen Jianguo reported Lu Mingqiang’s work-related injury to the team leader Zhang Jianguo, formally initiating the company’s work injury handling procedures.

events.name: The Beginning of Being Confined to Bed
events.description: In the evening, with the support of his wife, Lu Mingqiang moved back home with great difficulty and lay down on the bed. Even while lying flat, a persistent dull pain in his lower back made him hesitant to turn over. He stared blankly at the ceiling, feeling trapped and powerless in bed, while worries about his future work weighed heavily on his mind, plunging his mood to its lowest point. Wang Lijuan busied herself helping him, fetching medicine and pouring water, her eyes filled with deep concern.

events.name: Reflecting on Work Habits Amidst Pain
events.description: While lying in bed, Lu Mingqiang repeatedly recalled the moment of injury and realized that long-term improper posture was the main cause. He resolved to completely change his working methods after recovery.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to complete the final tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: On the bed in the bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Severe pain, fear, anxiety, and profound unease about one's career prospects.

state.今日运动: None, acute lumbar sprain, unable to move.

2025-04.daily_overview: A day of enduring pain and restricted movement. The sense of physical fragility was more intense than ever before. Beyond bearing the illness, Lu Mingqiang was forced to confront reality: calculating the income loss due to sick leave, studying insurance terms, with both the financial and psychological pressures on the family surging dramatically.

events.name: Strict Bed Rest and Agitated Mood
events.description: Lu Mingqiang strictly followed the doctor's orders, maintaining a supine position for almost the entire day. The pain in his lower back had slightly eased but remained noticeable, with any attempt to turn slightly to the side causing sharp stinging sensations. His wife, Wang Lijuan, took leave from work to care for him at home, handling his three daily meals, helping him turn over, and applying medication. For most of the time, Lu Mingqiang could only stare at the ceiling or mindlessly scroll through news and short videos on his phone. The physical confinement and idleness left him feeling extremely irritable, and his temper had become somewhat short.

events.name: Turbulent Thoughts: A Double Blow of Financial and Health Woes
events.description: The time spent lying in bed felt exceptionally long. Lu Mingqiang's thoughts involuntarily drifted toward unpleasant matters. He repeatedly recalled the scrapped car, calculating the money lost on repairs and the substantial expense of possibly needing to buy a new vehicle in the future. Soon after, the pain from his back injury pulled him back to reality—how long would this injury require rest? How much sick leave pay would he receive? If there were lasting effects, would he still be able to do heavy labor in the future? These two questions weighed on him like two mountains, making it hard to breathe. For the first time, he realized with such clarity that he, the so-called "pillar" of his family, was actually very fragile.

events.name: Proactively Understand Your Rights: Sick Leave and Insurance
events.description: To combat his anxiety, Lu Mingqiang decided to take the initiative to clarify the situation. He first called the company's human resources department on his phone, inquiring in detail about the wage calculation standards during sick leave (as a percentage of the base salary), the payment schedule, and the materials required for work-related injury insurance reimbursement. After hanging up, he messaged his coworker Chen Jianguo on WeChat to confirm whether the company had purchased additional group accident insurance for them. Upon receiving an affirmative response, he asked Wang Lijuan to help find the insurance policy that had been lying in the drawer, unexamined in detail. Leaning their heads together, they read through the insurance coverage, claim conditions, and procedures word by word.

events.name: Calculate the Realistic Pressure
events.description: Based on the information obtained from the Human Resources Department, Lu Mingqiang made a rough mental calculation of how much his income would decrease this month due to his back injury. Comparing this with the mortgage payments, daily expenses, and the costs for his child, the gap in the numbers tightened his heart. He glanced at his wife, who was bustling in and out, and thought of her meager part-time income and the increased burden she carried. A deep sense of guilt and a feeling of helpless anxiety welled up inside him.

events.name: Family Care
events.description: In the afternoon, upon hearing the news, parents Lu Jianguo and Chen Xiuying made a special trip from Meilan District. The mother brought pork rib soup that had been simmered for hours and Lu Mingqiang's favorite Hainanese chicken rice, while the father frowned and, drawing on his experience as an experienced electrician, admonished him: "A muscle or bone injury takes a hundred days to heal, and the lower back is especially not to be taken lightly. This time, you must recover thoroughly!" Their parents' care warmed Lu Mingqiang's heart a little, but it also made him feel more like a burden to his family.

events.name: Search for rehabilitation videos online
events.description: To pass the time and seek hope, Lu Mingqiang began searching online for rehabilitation training videos for lumbar muscle strain. He bookmarked several professional tutorials and planned to implement them step by step after recovery, marking the beginning of his multi-day study plan.

起始状态.心情: Pain, irritability, anxiety

结束状态.心情: Fatigue, shrouded by the pressures of reality, and burdened with guilt toward family.

state.今日运动: None, strict bed rest

2025-04.daily_overview: On the second day of bed rest, the pain slightly subsided, but his mental activity became more complex. While reflecting on the cause of the injury and feeling the warmth of family, a profound sense of professional crisis drove him to seek information online. Eventually, within the long-neglected circle of his personal hobby, he found a slight emotional outlet and a sense of belonging.

events.name: Reflecting on the Causes of Injuries and Occupational Risks
events.description: As the pain subsided into a persistent, dull ache, Lu Mingqiang found himself with more mental energy to reflect. He began to recall the exact moment of his injury, as well as the vague discomfort he had felt in his lower back before. He realized that this was not a mere accident, but rather the culmination of years of accumulated strain on his body—caused by long-term heavy physical labor, frequent climbing, work at heights, and possibly improper posture when exerting force. For the first time, he seriously contemplated the meaning of the term "occupational disease." He searched on his phone for "lumbar muscle strain" and "occupational protection for electricians," and the information he browsed only deepened his sense of unease.

events.name: The Embrace of Family Warmth
events.description: Wang Lijuan, his wife, provided meticulous care around the clock. After school, their eldest son Lu Zixuan would quietly enter the bedroom to show his father the drawings he made at school or tell him a joke. Their younger son Lu Zihan, taught by his mother to be quiet, would crouch by the door, peeking at his father with wide eyes. The companionship and understanding of his family were Lu Mingqiang’s greatest comfort during his illness, and they made him even more eager to recover quickly so he could once again be the one to shelter his family from life’s storms.

events.name: Try brief activities and visits from friends.
events.description: In the evening, with the support of his wife, Lu Mingqiang attempted to sit up extremely slowly, then placed his feet on the ground, stood for a few minutes on the floor at home, and tried to take a few steps while leaning against the wall. His waist remained stiff, sore, and swollen, but the severe pain had lessened. This small progress gave him hope. Soon after, his coworker Chen Jianguo and apprentice Zhao Qiang visited him together after work, bringing fruits and telling him that everything in their work team was normal, so he could rest and recover without worry. The visit and encouragement from his old friends made him feel that he was still connected to the outside world.

events.name: Return to Hobbies, Find Solace
events.description: In the evening, to distract himself from the pain and anxiety, Lu Mingqiang logged into the enthusiast forum for bottle collectors he had bookmarked on his phone. It had been a long time since he last visited. Browsing through the pictures of newly acquired vintage Hainan wine bottles, identification tips, and market discussions shared by fellow collectors, he felt a familiar sense of warmth. He noticed a local collector with the username [Old Chen] showcasing a rare gourd-shaped Hainan rice wine bottle, which piqued his interest. Unable to resist, he left a comment under the post asking for details and expressing his admiration. Unexpectedly, [Old Chen] replied quickly, and the two gradually shifted from public comments to private messages. Their conversation gradually expanded from wine bottles to recent life updates, and Lu Mingqiang couldn’t help but confide in this like-minded online friend he had never met about the frustration of being bedridden due to his back injury. [Old Chen] shared his own experience of using heat therapy for back pain in the past and some amusing collecting anecdotes to comfort him. After this online exchange, Lu Mingqiang surprisingly felt much more relaxed, as if he had rediscovered a mental sanctuary of his own, free from the pressures of work and family.

events.name: Plan to gradually increase rehabilitation activities.
events.description: Based on the brief daytime activities, Lu Mingqiang discussed with his wife and planned to gradually increase their walking time by a few minutes each day starting tomorrow, aiming to restore their mobility. This has become part of their cross-day rehabilitation plan.

起始状态.心情: Still feeling unwell, but slightly calmer than the day before.

结束状态.心情: Complex, with the warmth of family, concerns about one's career, and fleeting moments of tranquility found in hobbies.

state.今日运动: Minimal indoor assisted walking for a few minutes

2025-04.daily_overview: This was a day that could mark a significant turning point in one's life. Lying in his sickbed, Lu Mingqiang received a call from his brother in Shenzhen. A proposal for a business partnership, emerging at his lowest point, shone like a powerful beam of light into the dimming horizon of his life, clouded by injury and financial crisis, stirring immense waves in the stagnant lake of his heart.

events.name: Engage in Rehabilitation Activities and Family Communication
events.description: On the third day of bed rest, Lu Mingqiang felt an improvement in his physical condition. Encouraged and assisted by his wife, he attempted very slight ankle flexing and leg raising exercises in bed to prevent muscle atrophy. His son, Lu Zixuan, voluntarily brought his homework and sat quietly by the bed to work on it, occasionally asking his father how to write a character. The warmth and support of his family served as a crucial driving force in his recovery.

events.name: Brother's Daily Greetings and Emotional Sharing
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Minghua, his elder brother, made his routine weekly call from Shenzhen. Usually, Lu Mingqiang would only share good news and avoid mentioning troubles. However, this time, under his brother’s concerned inquiries, the accumulated frustrations of recent days—his fear of the back injury, worries about the car being scrapped, and concerns over the family’s finances—burst forth like a floodgate opening. He couldn’t help but pour out his heart to the brother he trusted most. On the other end of the line, his brother listened quietly.

events.name: Business Proposal During a Downturn
events.description: After listening to his younger brother's outpouring, Lu Minghua fell silent for a moment, then his tone turned serious and resolute: "Mingqiang, I have an idea. Hear me out." He suggested that instead of continuing to risk heavy manual labor in Haikou, the two brothers should partner up and open a "Community Appliance Repair Service Center" in Haikou. Lu Minghua would provide most of the startup capital and handle the business model design, while Lu Mingqiang would leverage his solid electrical skills and local connections to take charge of technical operations and daily management. The elder brother outlined the preliminary business scope (ranging from household appliance repairs to small-scale circuit installations), site selection strategies, and profit models. This proposal completely took Lu Mingqiang by surprise.

events.name: Surging with emotion in solitary contemplation
events.description: After ending the call with his brother, Lu Mingqiang lay alone on the bed, his mind buzzing. His brother’s words had dropped a heavy stone into his heart. Opening his own repair shop? Becoming his own boss? Wasn’t this exactly his dream of [owning his own repair workshop within the next 10 years]? It was just that he had always thought it was something far off in the future. How much risk was involved? How much investment would be needed? Could he manage a shop on his own? Could he make it without the stable salary and company platform? Countless questions flooded his mind, but at the same time, an unprecedented sense of excitement and hope brought by this possibility struck him with great force. For the first time, he was seriously considering the idea of [leaving his stable job to start his own business].

events.name: Preliminary Discussion with Wife
events.description: In the evening, Wang Lijuan returned home from work and took care of him as he finished his meal. Lu Mingqiang held his wife’s hand and relayed his brother’s proposal to her in its entirety. After listening, Wang Lijuan was first surprised, then also fell into deep thought. The two engaged in a preliminary, cautious discussion about this sudden possibility: How much financial risk could the family bear? What if the business failed? After Lu Mingqiang’s back injury recovered, would he be able to endure the exhaustion of the initial stages of starting a business? On the other hand, if it succeeded, not only could Lu Mingqiang’s dream be realized, but the family’s income might also see a qualitative improvement. More importantly, he could break free from his reliance on heavy manual labor. This topic opened a window of unknowns but also hope for this struggling family.

events.name: In-depth discussion with my wife on the pros and cons of starting a business
events.description: Late at night, Lu Mingqiang and his wife continued discussing the details of starting a business, weighing the pros and cons. They decided to begin gathering more information the next day, which would become part of their cross-day assessment.

起始状态.心情: Recovering slowly, with a hint of annoyance.

结束状态.心情: Agitated, filled with contemplation and deliberation about the future, anxiety intertwined with intense hope.

state.今日运动: Mild Leg Exercises in Bed

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast with evening showers.
