2025-04.daily_overview: A day when his ability to take action began to return. Lu Mingqiang’s mindset shifted from passively recovering from his injury to actively managing his health, and he cautiously started exploring the entrepreneurial possibilities his older brother had proposed. However, a sudden downpour in the evening caused issues with the old house, adding new troubles to a family that had yet to emerge from its crisis.

events.name: The Awakening of Health Management Awareness
events.description: The period of strict bed rest ended. Lu Mingqiang began to proactively and systematically search for information on his phone, such as [lumbar muscle strain rehabilitation exercises], [core strength training], and [occupational health protection for electricians]. He carefully read and bookmarked several rehabilitation videos and articles that appeared professional, realizing that he couldn’t just lie around waiting to get better—he needed to recover and prevent future issues in a scientific and proactive manner. He even started watching some simple office chair stretching exercises online, thinking he could do them during work breaks in the future.

events.name: The First Time Getting Out of Bed and the Determination
events.description: In the afternoon, supported by his wife Wang Lijuan, Lu Mingqiang attempted to get out of bed for the first time and took an extremely slow walk for less than ten minutes in the small community park near his home. With every step, he could feel the pull of his lower back muscles and the support of his spine. Seeing others in the park jogging and exercising, he felt a twinge of disappointment, but it quickly transformed into a firmer resolve: once he recovered, he must engage in systematic exercise and no longer overexert his body.

events.name: Exploratory Entrepreneurship Consultation
events.description: When he returned to bed to rest, Lu Mingqiang contacted his older brother in Shenzhen via WeChat voice message. He did not immediately respond to the partnership proposal. Instead, he first briefly mentioned that his back injury was recovering, then tentatively brought up his long-standing vague idea of opening a repair workshop. He asked his brother for his thoughts on starting such a business in Haikou and what to pay attention to. Sensing his interest, his brother did not rush to push him but encouraged him to focus on recovering his health first. He also expressed willingness to discuss the matter in depth anytime and suggested that Lu Mingqiang could inquire about the practical aspects from friends who run repair shops locally. This conversation made Lu Mingqiang feel that he still held the initiative.

events.name: Old house suddenly suffers from water leakage.
events.description: In the evening, the sky suddenly darkened, and a torrential downpour began. Suddenly, Wang Lijuan exclaimed in alarm from the living room. Lu Mingqiang struggled to sit up and see what was happening, but his back injury made his movements slow. He heard his wife say anxiously, "The ceiling in the old house's living room is leaking!" Rainwater was trickling down the corner of the wall, already soaking the TV cabinet and a section of the floor. Lu Mingqiang was frantic with worry, but his back injury made it impossible for him to get up and handle the situation. He could only lie in bed, listening as his wife frantically placed a basin to catch the water while making hurried calls to contact a repairman. This sense of helplessness tormented him deeply.

events.name: Emergency Response for Wives
events.description: The repairman rushed over in the rain and, after inspection, found that the aged waterproof layer on the roof had cracked. He quoted a relatively high repair fee. Wang Lijuan looked at the dripping water and her two frightened children huddled close to her, took a deep breath, and began the difficult task of bargaining with the repairman. In the end, thanks to her persistence and communication skills, they reached an agreement on a payment plan: an initial payment for materials to carry out emergency waterproofing, with the remaining labor costs to be settled after Lu Mingqiang recovered from his injury and the family’s financial situation improved slightly. After seeing off the repairman, Wang Lijuan was utterly exhausted. Lu Mingqiang lay in bed, listening to his wife comforting the children, his heart filled with gratitude and guilt toward her.

events.name: Contact friends to inquire about repair shop experiences.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang contacted client Mr. Li via WeChat to tactfully inquire about the operating costs and challenges of opening a repair shop. Mr. Li enthusiastically shared his experience, which became part of the cross-day entrepreneurial consultation.

起始状态.心情: Begin to actively face rehabilitation with a shift in mindset.

结束状态.心情: Complex, with progress in recovery and the budding of entrepreneurial exploration, yet overshadowed by the heavy pressure brought on by the leaking old house and a sense of personal powerlessness.

state.今日运动: An extremely slow-paced outdoor short-distance walk (approximately 8 minutes)

2025-04.daily_overview: During his recovery from a back injury, Lu Mingqiang began to assess his entrepreneurial plans more pragmatically and sought life advice from his elders. Video calls with his brother introduced him to an unfamiliar world of business, while visiting his aunt brought the familiar warmth of family affection and practical life wisdom.

events.name: Conduct Prudent Evaluation: Engage in In-depth Communication Regarding the Business Plan
events.description: After a night of contemplation, Lu Mingqiang did not impulsively agree to his brother's proposal. In the morning, he proactively initiated a lengthy WeChat video call. His brother, Lu Minghua, was clearly well-prepared. Through screen sharing, he presented Lu Mingqiang with a preliminary business plan PPT, detailing the market positioning (convenient, fast, and trustworthy) of the [Community Appliance Repair Service Center], the startup budget (including rent, renovation, and the initial purchase of tools and parts), the specific division of responsibilities between the brothers (Lu Minghua would handle funding, branding, and online promotion, while Lu Mingqiang would be responsible for technical aspects, team management, and local operations), as well as the expected profit model and payback period. Lu Mingqiang listened attentively, asking questions from time to time. Internally, he felt both drawn to the prospect of taking control of his own career and leveraging his technical expertise, and instinctively apprehensive and unfamiliar with the financial investment, market risks, and operational management mentioned in the plan.

events.name: Emergency Roof Handling
events.description: The repairman arrived as scheduled yesterday and applied temporary waterproof sealant to reinforce the leaking spots on the roof of the old house, which temporarily stopped the seepage. However, this is only a stopgap measure, as a comprehensive repair would require a significant amount of money and time. This matter has become a thorn in the hearts of Lu Mingqiang and his wife.

events.name: Rehabilitation Progress: Brief Community Walk
events.description: In the afternoon, the soreness and swelling in his lower back further subsided. Accompanied by his wife, Lu Mingqiang returned to the small community park for a slow walk lasting about fifteen minutes. He no longer needed to hold onto his wife the entire time, but his gait remained cautious. Seeing the young people jogging in the park, his sense of loss transformed into a determination to strengthen his physical care. After the walk, he specifically called the doctor he had previously consulted to inquire about safe rehabilitation exercises he could undertake next. He received clear advice: [focus on gentle stretching, and avoid weight-bearing and vigorous twisting movements.]

events.name: Plan to visit elders
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang discussed with his wife their plan to take their two children to visit their aunt Wang Xiuying, who has always cared for them deeply, in Qiongshan District this Saturday (May 3rd). His wife began preparing the fruits and snacks to bring along and reminded Lu Mingqiang to wear his lumbar support belt and ensure he gets adequate rest during the trip.

events.name: Video call with brother to discuss funding details.
events.description: Later, Lu Mingqiang video-called his brother again, inquiring in detail about the allocation of startup funds and risk control measures. His brother patiently provided answers, continuing the communication that had lasted for several days.

起始状态.心情: Prudently, begin to thoroughly consider the feasibility of starting a business.

结束状态.心情: Swaying between the excitement of commercial imagination and the caution of real-world pressures, the recovery brings some positive signals.

state.今日运动: Take a slow walk within the community for about 15 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the last day of April, Lu Mingqiang made a prudent decision that aligned with his ISTJ personality: to approach entrepreneurship as a long-term project for study. Simultaneously, he was preparing to return to work, applying for an adjustment of his duties to protect his not-yet-fully-recovered lower back. Life continued to move slowly forward on the track of injury and responsibility.

events.name: Make Prudent Decisions: Treat Entrepreneurship as Project Evaluation
events.description: After several days of contemplation, Lu Mingqiang replied to his brother, neither immediately agreeing nor refusing. He expressed his sincere gratitude for his brother's proposal and support, but stated that he needed more time to carefully consider the matter. He also mentioned that he wanted to first inquire with local friends engaged in individual repair work (such as his client, Boss Li) and industry peers about the actual market conditions, daily operational costs, and potential risks. He told his brother that he intended to treat this as a significant [life project] and must approach it with thorough consideration. His brother expressed complete understanding and appreciated his prudence.

events.name: Preparing for Return to Work
events.description: With his waist condition steadily improving, Lu Mingqiang felt he could no longer remain on extended leave. He proactively reported his recovery progress and the doctor's advice (avoiding heavy physical labor) to his supervisor Zhang Jianguo via phone call. After discussion and negotiation, Supervisor Zhang agreed that upon his return to work in May, Lu Mingqiang would temporarily be exempted from front-line heavy-duty tasks such as installation and emergency repairs. Instead, he would be assigned to oversee the on-site technical supervision and blueprint verification for a circuit renovation project in an old residential area in Xiuying District. Additionally, he would provide remote technical guidance via phone or WeChat for other projects. Lu Mingqiang was satisfied with this arrangement, as it allowed him to resume work while protecting his waist. Subsequently, he coordinated with his colleague Chen Jianguo to complete the handover of some of his responsibilities.

events.name: Labor Day Holiday Arrangement
events.description: Tomorrow is the May Day holiday. Lu Mingqiang had already seen the holiday duty roster in the company group chat in advance and confirmed that he would not be on duty due to his injury. He discussed with his wife that they would mainly rest at home during the holiday, perhaps taking a walk in a nearby park at most, but definitely avoiding any strenuous activity. In the afternoon, he also asked his wife to help buy some muscle-relieving patches from the pharmacy for his sore lower back, just in case.

events.name: Family Status at the End of the Month
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang leaned against the headboard and chatted with Wang Lijuan about the chaotic month of April. The car was gone, his waist was injured, and the house was leaking, but his wife had persevered through her part-time job, their son had won an award, and his brother had provided an unexpected opportunity. Both of them felt physically and mentally exhausted, yet they also sensed each other's support as they faced the crisis together. They agreed to rest well during the May Day holiday and make long-term plans once Lu Mingqiang's waist injury had improved further.

events.name: Formulate the May Rehabilitation and Work Plan
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang briefly outlined his rehabilitation goals and return-to-work plan for May in his notebook, including daily walking time, adjustments to work responsibilities, and continued research into the feasibility of starting a business, marking his entry into a new phase.

起始状态.心情: Prudence, enhanced planning

结束状态.心情: Tired yet clear-headed, I have developed a more prudent plan for the future and look forward to returning to work.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the first day of the Labor Day holiday, Lu Mingqiang rested in bed due to a back injury, discussing family financial pressures with his wife and feeling the warmth of family.

events.name: Bedridden with Back Injury and Family Financial Discussion

After dinner, he and his wife Wang Lijuan reviewed the costs of the leak repairs. Concerned about their limited savings, Lu Mingqiang felt a sense of guilt, but his wife comforted him and suggested exploring ways to increase income and reduce expenses.

events.name: A mundane holiday reunion
events.description: His wife prepared a light Hainanese chicken rice, and in the evening, the whole family watched television together, with the children quietly accompanying them, bringing solace to Lu Mingqiang.

events.name: Temporary early bedtime due to fatigue.
events.description: Due to a back injury and anxiety, Lu Mingqiang felt particularly exhausted and decided to go to bed early at 22:00, hoping that rest would aid in his recovery.

结束状态.心情: Slightly comforted yet weary, a sense of guilt lingers.

events.description: In the evening, I politely declined an invitation from my ball game friend Lin Feng. I proactively called my workmate Chen Jianguo to inquire about the work arrangements after the holiday, informing him that my back injury has improved but I will temporarily avoid heavy labor.

events.name: Bumping into a neighbor and having a casual chat
events.description: While taking a walk, I happened to meet my neighbor Uncle Wang. We briefly exchanged pleasantries about the weather and his recovery progress, and I received encouragement from him.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to an improvement in health.

结束状态.心情: The fatigue after action and the sense of steadiness from a plan taking shape.

2025-05.daily_overview: Due to the aggravation of his back injury, Lu Mingqiang has taken leave to recuperate at home, focusing on rehabilitation therapy while managing household chores exacerbated by the sweltering summer weather.

events.name: Home-based Recuperation and Rehabilitation Therapy
events.description: Due to consecutive participation in emergency repairs in recent days, the lumbar strain has worsened. Lu Mingqiang rested at home all day, persistently applying hot towel compresses to his lower back every few hours. He also engaged in slow walking and gentle stretching indoors to prevent muscle stiffness and ensure the injury does not deteriorate.

events.name: Handling Household Heatstroke Prevention Preparations
events.description: After the afternoon shower, the weather remained muggy. Lu Mingqiang checked the electric fans and air conditioners at home to ensure the cooling equipment was functioning properly, and reminded his wife Wang Lijuan to conserve electricity to cope with the increased summer electricity bills.

events.name: Occasionally trying new rehabilitation exercise movements
events.description: In the evening, with his wife by his side, Lu Mingqiang attempted a new rehabilitation exercise he had learned from a mobile tutorial—the supine leg raise—to gently activate his core muscles. The movement was somewhat uncoordinated, but upon completion, he felt a slight sense of relief in his lower back.

起始状态.心情: Resigned yet calm, focused on recovery

结束状态.心情: The body has relaxed somewhat, but concerns about work progress remain.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Saturday, an emergency repair mission disrupted the schedule. Lu Mingqiang, despite being injured, stepped up to serve as the technical commander. Working in seamless coordination with his colleagues, he resolved the issue, demonstrating both a strong sense of responsibility and exceptional technical skills.

events.name: Received an emergency repair task.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang received a call from his team leader, Zhang Tou, informing him that a power outage had occurred in an old residential area in Xiuying District due to a burnt-out distribution box. Lu Mingqiang was assigned to partner with his colleague Chen Jianguo, responsible for technical diagnosis and on-site command.

events.name: Proceed to the fault site and direct emergency repairs.
events.description: Lu Mingqiang carefully drove to the fault site. After meeting up with Chen Jianguo, he used a multimeter to accurately diagnose that the circuit breaker module had burned out due to overload. He then guided Chen Jianguo in safely disassembling and replacing the module, closely supervising the entire operation to ensure safety.

events.name: Complete the emergency repair and conduct brief communication.
events.description: After power was restored, Lu Mingqiang reported the situation to the team leader and briefly discussed the progress of his waist injury recovery with Chen Jianguo, who advised him to get more rest.

events.name: Staying up late temporarily due to work pressure.
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang went to bed slightly later due to contemplating the next day's work arrangements and managing his back injury, which affected his sleep duration.

起始状态.心情: Relax, plan to rest

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment and fatigue after completing the task, accompanied by slight soreness in the lower back.

Lu Mingqiang offered congratulations and shared his parenting experiences, while also confiding his worries about having to purchase a new car due to his old vehicle being scrapped, despite having a limited budget.

events.name: Family Car Purchase Decision Meeting
events.description: In the evening, I held a meeting with my wife, Wang Lijuan. After reviewing our savings, we decided to use all of our deposits and borrow money from our parents to gather the down payment for purchasing a used car, with the remaining amount to be covered by a loan.

events.name: Conduct specialized coaching for apprentices as planned.

events.name: Recovery from lumbar injury is progressing well.
events.description: The evening rehabilitation training felt smoother in movement, with reduced soreness and swelling in the lower back. Progress was shared with my wife via WeChat.

events.name: Staying up late due to studying.

2025-05.daily_overview: The impact of turning entrepreneurial dreams into reality struck Lu Mingqiang as he received his brother's detailed business plan. He began studying it, organizing his questions, and shifting his mindset toward that of a potential entrepreneur.

events.name: Received the detailed entrepreneurial proposal from my brother.
events.description: After work, I received a more than 20-page PDF proposal from my brother via WeChat, which included market analysis, investment budget, and other details. This made the entrepreneurial idea concrete and real, leaving me both thrilled and overwhelmed by the pressure.

events.name: Preliminary study and organization of questions
events.description: I spent nearly two hours reading the proposal word by word, using an old notebook to list financial terms, profit forecasts, and questions about unfamiliar fields, realizing the need to learn business knowledge.

events.name: Preparing for a Family Meeting
events.description: Organize the family ledger, income and expenditure, and loan plans, and compile the data and points of inquiry for discussion the following day.

events.name: Pay monthly utility bills for water, electricity, and gas
events.description: Before going to bed, pay utility bills for water, electricity, and gas via mobile payment. Note the increase in electricity charges during summer and be reminded to conserve electricity.

events.name: Staying up late due to overthinking
events.description: Lu Mingqiang stayed up late into the night, preoccupied with overthinking his business plan.

起始状态.心情: As usual, looking forward to getting off work.

结束状态.心情: With a surging heart, brimming with anticipation yet exceptionally cautious, the mind is inundated with a vast amount of new information.

2025-05.daily_overview: Dragon Boat Festival: A Day of Reunion and Decision-Making. During the day, we enjoyed family gatherings and delicious food. In the evening, after rational consideration, we decided to postpone the entrepreneurial venture for now, prioritizing the consolidation of our foundation. Additionally, we planned a weekend family outdoor activity.

events.name: Dragon Boat Festival Family Reunion
events.description: In the morning, I drove the new car to take the whole family to my parents' house, where we helped my mother prepare dishes such as zongzi and Hainanese chicken rice, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: A Joyful Dragon Boat Festival Family Feast
events.description: The whole family gathered around the table for a family dinner. Lu Mingqiang shared the news of winning a skill competition award, and his parents and wife were proud of him, raising their glasses in celebration.

events.name: Weekend Family Outdoor Activities (Light)
events.description: In the afternoon, the whole family went to Wanlü Park for a walk and kite flying. Lu Mingqiang primarily provided standing guidance, avoiding intense running, and experienced no lower back discomfort after the activity.

events.name: Communicating with Father about Work and Life
events.description: After lunch, I had tea with my father and discussed work, the recovery from my back injury, and entrepreneurial ideas. My father advised that technical professionals should be cautious and prudent when engaging in business management.

events.name: Consensus Reached at Family Decision-Making Meeting
events.description: In the evening, I discussed with my wife and, considering economic pressures, physical condition, and risks, decided to temporarily postpone starting a business. Instead, I will focus on recovery and preparing for the senior technician certification exam, treating the plan as a long-term goal for further study.

events.name: Weight maintenance due to holiday diet
events.description: Maintain a balanced diet during festivals to keep body weight stable.

起始状态.心情: The relaxed and joyful atmosphere brought by festivals

结束状态.心情: The calmness and firmness after a sense of relief, and the strength derived from family unity.

2025-06.daily_overview: A Sunday centered around family and recuperation. Lu Mingqiang followed up on the entrepreneurial proposal related to his brother, meticulously maintained his beloved car, and began preliminary attempts at lumbar rehabilitation. The rhythm of life shifted from the festive liveliness back to the practicality and routine of everyday life.

events.name: Declining a Business Proposal
events.description: Considering the discussion outcomes of the family meeting during the Dragon Boat Festival and his own prudent assessment of risks, Lu Mingqiang expressed his gratitude to his elder brother Lu Minghua via WeChat call and tactfully conveyed the current decision: the family savings and career foundation are not yet mature, requiring more time for accumulation and observation, but he will continue to monitor this direction. During the call, his brother expressed understanding and support, making the fraternal relationship appear more pragmatic.

events.name: Inspection and Maintenance During the New Vehicle Break-in Period
events.description: Over the weekend, Lu Mingqiang carefully inspected the condition of his new car, which was still in the break-in period, in the parking area downstairs of his residential complex. Treating it like a precision instrument, he checked the engine oil level, coolant, tire pressure, and chassis. He then connected a hose and personally gave the car a thorough interior and exterior deep cleaning, followed by hand waxing. Under the sunlight, the car body gleamed as if brand new. As he gently touched the hood, a sense of accomplishment and reassurance filled his heart.

events.name: First tentative walk after a back injury
events.description: In the evening, encouraged by his wife Wang Lijuan, Lu Mingqiang decided to take a short, slow walk within the residential compound, primarily to test the endurance of his waist. He walked along the main road of the compound at No. 15 Jinmao Middle Road at an extremely slow pace for about ten minutes, keeping his body relaxed throughout and carefully noting the feedback from his waist. Although there was some stiffness, there was no pain, which gave him initial confidence in his recovery. After the walk, he received an unexpected call from his coworker Chen Jianguo to discuss the next day's work arrangements, which delayed his rest by half an hour.

events.name: Evening Family Chats and Plans
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his wife sat in the living room, watching their children play while chatting about the recent Dragon Boat Festival and the upcoming week's arrangements. He mentioned his plan to enroll in an advanced electrician technician course, to which Wang Lijuan expressed her support and reminded him to balance his work and study time. The atmosphere was relaxed and warm. Due to contemplating a business plan, he stayed up later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of contemplation (regarding the follow-up to the entrepreneurial proposal)

结束状态.心情: Steady and content (having completed the planned tasks, with positive physical feedback), but slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: Take a 10-minute slow walk within the residential area.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with afternoon showers, muggy weather.
date_attribute.holiday: Dragon Boat Festival (observed)

2025-06.daily_overview: The workday adjusted for the Dragon Boat Festival holiday. Lu Mingqiang remained busy with work, but in the evening, he began studying financial management knowledge, shifting his focus from personal health to family financial security, demonstrating a more comprehensive sense of responsibility. Due to his dedication to learning, he stayed up late into the night.

events.name: Routine Maintenance of High-Voltage Lines
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang partnered with his coworker Chen Jianguo to conduct a routine safety inspection of high-voltage lines at an industrial park in Xiuying District. Wearing heavy work clothes, he climbed the utility poles under the scorching sun, meticulously inspecting each insulator and connection point, his clothes soaked with sweat. Though the work was demanding, he felt a sense of professional satisfaction seeing the equipment operating normally. Due to the sweltering weather, he drank two more bottles of water than usual during the task.

events.name: Learn Basic Insurance Knowledge
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Lu Mingqiang used his phone to study the module on basic insurance knowledge in a financial management course. He focused on understanding the functions of critical illness insurance and accident insurance. Considering his role as the primary income earner in the family (alongside his wife's part-time work), he began to reflect on the necessity of enhancing protection for his family. This new knowledge made him realize his previous oversight in family risk management, and the time spent studying caused him to stay up later than usual.

events.name: Brief Communication with Wife
events.description: After the study session, Lu Mingqiang briefly mentioned the concept of insurance to Wang Lijuan, who also felt it necessary to learn more. They agreed to explore the topic in detail together when they had time, making it a new subject in their family financial planning. During their conversation, his wife reminded him to rest, but he found it difficult to fall asleep early due to overthinking.

events.name: Overtime work to handle emergency malfunctions
events.description: Before the end of the workday, the team received an urgent repair request from a customer. Lu Mingqiang volunteered to stay and assist with troubleshooting, working an extra hour, which delayed his return home and affected his evening plans.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused and get ready for the workday.

结束状态.心情: Lost in thought (with a new understanding of family security), slightly fatigued

2025-06.daily_overview: A day of active contemplation at work. While continuing to advance his career, Lu Mingqiang also began to examine his entrepreneurial aspirations more pragmatically, putting his ideas down on paper and discussing them with trusted colleagues to seek support and information. Due to work pressure, his emotions experienced slight fluctuations.

events.name: Sorting Out the Concept of the Maintenance Studio
events.description: After work in the evening, Lu Mingqiang avoided the noise of the children and used pen and paper to preliminarily outline his ideas about opening a personal repair workshop in a corner of the living room. He listed the major potential expenses: venue rental (estimated), supplementary professional tools, business license and safety permit fees, and considered potential income sources (home repairs, small project contracting). Looking at the not-insignificant numbers on the paper, he felt the financial pressure of reality, which led to some anxiety.

events.name: Exchanging Certification Information with Colleagues
events.description: During a break in the workday, Lu Mingqiang chatted with his coworker Chen Jianguo about obtaining the Senior Electrician Technician Certificate. Chen Jianguo shared several online vocational skills training platforms he had recently learned about and recommended a few well-regarded preparation courses for the [Senior Electrician Technician] certification. Lu Mingqiang carefully noted down the names of the platforms, planning to check them out after work. During their conversation, Chen Jianguo mentioned an industry exhibition, which sparked Lu Mingqiang's interest.

events.name: Rehabilitation Walk
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang insisted on taking a 15-minute walk around the residential area. The air felt fresher after the rain. During his walk, he mainly pondered over the concept of his studio and the feasibility of obtaining certification, and his pace was slightly more relaxed than the previous day. While walking, he encountered his neighbor Uncle Wang and exchanged a few brief pleasantries.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work challenges
events.description: During the day at work, Lu Mingqiang felt somewhat frustrated after failing to resolve a complex circuit malfunction in a timely manner. He decided to study more in the evening to improve his skills, which affected his sleep time.

起始状态.心情: Full of planning, yet slightly stressful.

结束状态.心情: Feeling both anticipation and pressure (with dreams interwoven with reality), the mood is somewhat subdued.

2025-06.daily_overview: A Day of Decision and Action. Lu Mingqiang transitioned from information gathering to practical action, meticulously studied online courses, and successfully secured his wife's support, taking a crucial step forward on his path to career advancement. Due to his dedication to learning, he stayed up late into the night.

events.name: Browse Vocational Skills Training Platforms
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang did not take a break but immediately used his phone to carefully browse the training platform recommended by his coworkers. He focused on reviewing the detailed introduction of the online preparation course for [Senior Electrician Technician], including the course outline, instructor backgrounds, pricing, and the flexible learning model (recorded lectures + live Q&A sessions). He was particularly interested in the content of the [Theory Intensive Lectures] module, feeling that it could systematically address his theoretical shortcomings. He continued researching until late into the night.

events.name: Discuss with wife about signing up for a course.
events.description: After reviewing the course information, Lu Mingqiang sat down next to his wife, Wang Lijuan, with his phone in hand. He explained in detail the course fees, the study schedule (which was planned to make use of fragmented time in the evenings and on weekends), and the importance of this step in achieving his goal of obtaining an advanced electrician technician certificate within three years. Upon hearing this, Wang Lijuan was very supportive of her husband's self-improvement efforts, though she reminded him not to overexert himself and to take care of his health. The couple quickly reached a consensus.

events.name: Handling Emergency Repair Reports
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang's work team received an emergency repair call about a tripped power distribution cabinet at a hotel. He and Team Leader Zhang rushed to the scene immediately. In the sweltering power distribution room, they spent nearly two hours troubleshooting and eventually identified a faulty contactor. After replacing it, the issue was resolved. Though the task was demanding, solving the problem gave him a strong sense of accomplishment, even though it had drained a considerable amount of his energy.

events.name: Try new rehabilitation exercises
events.description: In the evening, after taking a walk, Lu Mingqiang tried a new rehabilitation stretching exercise and felt a slight improvement in his lower back, which gave him more confidence in his recovery.

起始状态.心情: Eager (to learn about the course information as soon as possible)

结束状态.心情: Firm, highly motivated (with family support), yet exhausted.

2025-06.daily_overview: A day filled with iconic events. Lu Mingqiang officially embarked on systematic learning, the arrival of his salary brought a sense of stability, and he actively attempted and adjusted various aspects of his life, work, and family. Due to the rainy weather, he temporarily changed his exercise plan.

events.name: Commuting Experience in a New Car on a Rainy Day
events.description: It began to rain in Haikou, and Lu Mingqiang drove his new car to commute on the slippery road. He paid special attention to the performance of the wipers and the tire grip in waterlogged sections. He was satisfied with the stable safety performance of the new car under different weather conditions, which gave him greater peace of mind during his commute. Driving in the rain consumed more of his energy.

events.name: Check the apprentice's learning progress
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang called his apprentice Zhao Qiang aside and checked his progress in the recent weeks of tutoring by asking on-site questions and simulating a minor circuit fault. He found that Zhao Qiang quickly grasped the theory but appeared somewhat nervous during hands-on practice, so he decided to incorporate more practical demonstrations in the subsequent tutoring sessions. During their exchange, Zhao Qiang shared a small industry trick, which provided Lu Mingqiang with some valuable insights.

events.name: Try selling unused items on second-hand platforms
events.description: While tidying up miscellaneous items on the balcony in the evening, Lu Mingqiang came across his son's old scooter that had been phased out. This reminded him of his experience earlier in the year when he had disposed of unused household appliances. He fetched a cloth, cleaned the scooter thoroughly, took a photo, and posted the information on a second-hand trading platform, setting a reasonable price. He wanted to see if he could earn some pocket money for his child, but after posting it, there were no inquiries, which left him feeling somewhat disappointed.

events.name: Formal Registration for Online Courses
events.description: After several days of consideration and discussions with his wife, Lu Mingqiang operated on his phone and officially enrolled in the "Theory Intensive Lectures" module of the online preparation course for [Senior Electrician Technician]. He carefully filled in his personal information, completed the payment, and received confirmation messages and emails for his successful registration. At that moment, he felt his career goals had become clear and within reach, filling him with excitement.

events.name: Salary has been credited
events.description: While working in the morning, Lu Mingqiang felt his phone vibrate and received a text message from the bank notifying him that his salary had been deposited. Seeing the familiar amount credited to his account, he felt a sense of reassurance, as it served as the stable foundation for his family's monthly expenses. To celebrate, he enjoyed a slightly larger portion of home-cooked dishes during dinner.

events.name: Rehabilitation walk canceled due to rain.
events.description: As the rain continued into the evening, Lu Mingqiang decided to cancel his outdoor walk and instead performed simple indoor stretching exercises at home to avoid getting wet and reduce the risk of slipping. He completed a 10-minute core activation routine and felt no discomfort in his lower back.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to (planning to enroll in the course)

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding (with multiple plans accomplished), yet somewhat tiring.

2025-06.daily_overview: A workweek that concluded with communication and learning. Lu Mingqiang had in-depth conversations with his elder brother, strengthened bonds with his coworkers, and officially embarked on an online learning journey, preparing for the weekend family gathering and deeper reflections. Due to his dedication to studying, he stayed up late.

events.name: Colleagues Chatting During Commute
events.description: After work, Chen Jianguo, a colleague who lived in the same direction, hitched a ride home in Lu Mingqiang's new car. On the way, the two chatted about the driving experience and fuel consumption of the new car, then naturally shifted to various amusing repair stories and tricky problems they encountered at work. The car was filled with relaxed laughter, and their camaraderie deepened through the casual conversation. Chen Jianguo mentioned a family barbecue gathering over the weekend and invited Lu Mingqiang to join, but Lu Mingqiang politely declined due to his plans to study.

events.name: Have an in-depth discussion with my elder brother about the entrepreneurial plan.
events.description: In the evening, after accumulating some initial questions about the business plan, Lu Mingqiang proactively made a long phone call to his older brother, Lu Minghua. He detailed his specific concerns regarding the budget, division of labor, and market risks, and shared his observations of local appliance repair shops over the past few days. His brother patiently provided additional explanations over the phone, encouraged him not to feel pressured, and advised him to continue his in-depth research, agreeing to refine the plan further in subsequent discussions. This conversation helped Lu Mingqiang gain clearer insights, though the call lasted until quite late.

events.name: Familiarize with online learning platforms
events.description: After successfully registering, Lu Mingqiang received the study materials. He spent some time downloading the e-textbooks and logged into the learning platform, familiarizing himself with the functional interfaces such as video playback, online question banks, and discussion forums. He tried watching the trailer for the first lesson and felt excited about the upcoming learning journey, though his unfamiliarity with the operations caused him to spend extra time.

events.name: Establishment of Temporary Study Groups
events.description: On the online platform, Lu Mingqiang discovered several fellow students from the same city. He proactively joined a study discussion group and began exchanging exam preparation experiences with peers, which expanded his social network.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, preparing to wrap up the week's work.

结束状态.心情: Clear-minded, slightly weary yet content, with some social gains.

2025-06.daily_overview: A typical and fulfilling family day. Lu Mingqiang and his family visited his parents as per their usual routine. Amidst the family reunion, he consciously sought advice on career development and engaged in a practical conversation with his wife about the family's future in the evening. The family dinner resulted in a slight weight gain.

events.name: Departing to visit parents
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan prepared fruits and snacks to bring to his parents, while urging their two children to change clothes. After the family got ready, they drove their family car from their home in Longhua District to his parents' house in Meilan District. The children looked forward to the weekly "trip to Grandma and Grandpa's house." On the way, Lu Mingqiang was somewhat distracted while driving due to thinking about his business plan, and his wife reminded him to pay attention to safety.

events.name: Arrival and Assistance with Lunch Preparation
events.description: The family arrived at the parents' home, and the children joyfully ran inside to greet their grandparents. Mother Chen Xiuying was busy in the kitchen preparing lunch. Lu Mingqiang and his wife set down their gifts and naturally stepped into the kitchen to lend a hand. Lu Mingqiang handled tasks requiring strength, such as chopping the chicken, while Wang Lijuan helped with washing vegetables and setting the table. The kitchen was filled with the warm atmosphere of a bustling home. The lunch was abundant, and Lu Mingqiang ate a little more than usual.

events.name: Family Lunch and Communication
events.description: The family gathered around the dining table for lunch, with the mother preparing her signature Hainanese chicken rice and several home-style stir-fried dishes. During the meal, the father, Lu Jianguo, inquired with concern about Lu Mingqiang's recovery from a lower back strain sustained in his previous work, sharing some of his own "folk remedies" and experiences from his youth in dealing with complex circuit malfunctions. Lu Mingqiang also updated his parents on the recent academic and daily life situations of his two children, with the eldest son, Lu Zixuan, mentioning that final exams were approaching. The meal lasted for quite some time, during which Lu Mingqiang consumed a relatively high amount of calories.

events.name: Consult Father on Industry Perspectives
events.description: After lunch, Lu Mingqiang accompanied his father for a walk in the shade of the trees in the residential area. He briefly explained his brother’s entrepreneurial proposal for an electrical appliance service chain and consulted his father on the opportunities and challenges in the local market from the perspective of an older-generation technical worker. Drawing on decades of experience, his father analyzed the technical barriers and the importance of building customer trust, reminding him that independent operation would be very demanding and advising him to proceed steadily and methodically. The conversation made Lu Mingqiang more cautious.

events.name: Call to Seek Guidance from Master Li
events.description: During a break, Lu Mingqiang walked to the balcony and called his retired mentor, Master Li. He respectfully inquired about the potential technical challenges, industry qualification thresholds, and essential skill sets required for independently operating a repair business. Master Li offered many practical suggestions over the phone and encouraged him to first obtain the senior technician certification. After the call, Lu Mingqiang felt increased pressure.

events.name: Engage in in-depth discussions with my wife about the family's future.
events.description: Returning home in the evening after the children had gone to bed, Lu Mingqiang organized the key points from his recent research and discussions with his father and mentor, then engaged in an in-depth conversation with his wife, Wang Lijuan. The discussion focused on the family's financial capacity (the proportion of savings to be utilized and the necessary risk reserve to retain), the potential impact on family life over the coming years if they attempted to start a business (including his potentially longer working hours and initial income instability), and how the two of them could collaborate and divide responsibilities. The conversation was pragmatic and thorough, lasting late into the night.

events.name: Rough Estimation of Studio Startup Costs
events.description: Before the evening discussion, based on online information and an inventory of his own tools, Lu Mingqiang roughly listed in an old notebook the basic investments required to open a small repair workshop: including the monthly rent for leasing a street-front shop or warehouse, the prices of specialized testing instruments that needed to be supplemented, and the estimated costs for obtaining an individual business license and related safety permits. The total sum made him more acutely aware of the financial pressure, leaving him in a somber mood.

events.name: Routine Rehabilitation Walk
events.description: After returning from his parents' home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang still insisted on taking a walk within the residential community. After several days of adaptation, he felt a noticeable reduction in the stiffness of his lower back muscles, and his walking became more comfortable. He paid special attention to his body's feedback, confirming there was no pain or discomfort, and felt satisfied with his recovery progress. However, he shortened the duration of his walk to allow time for digestion.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the family gathering.

结束状态.心情: Thoughtful, with a heightened sense of responsibility (after multiple rounds of communication with family), and slightly anxious.

state.今日运动: 15-minute walk in the residential community

2025-06.daily_overview: A Sunday dedicated to information gathering and family financial management. Lu Mingqiang sought advice from various sources for his entrepreneurial ideas and completed the final break-in of his new car. In the evening, he and his wife conducted their monthly routine family financial review, finding a sense of stability and the necessity of planning in the numbers. Consecutive family gatherings led to another increase in weight.

events.name: High-speed break-in for new vehicles
events.description: Taking advantage of the lighter traffic in the morning, Lu Mingqiang drove his new car onto the Haikou Ring Expressway for a short trip. He allowed the engine to run at a higher RPM for a period to complete a thorough break-in. He experienced the vehicle's stability and noise control at high speeds, and the overall performance satisfied him, leading him to believe the new car was fully ready for regular use. During the drive, he drank more beverages due to the heat.

events.name: Seeking entrepreneurial advice from childhood friends
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang contacted his childhood friend Wang Hai, who runs a business in Shenzhen, via WeChat video call. He candidly shared that he was evaluating the idea of starting a small repair business and sought Wang Hai’s advice on planning startup capital, controlling initial costs, and common risk management practices. Drawing from his experience of running a shop in Huaqiangbei, Wang Hai shared several practical cases and lessons, emphasizing that "cash flow" and "customer base" are crucial. The conversation proved highly beneficial to Lu Mingqiang, though he felt that starting a business was challenging.

events.name: Consult with industry peers to understand the local market situation.
events.description: Before evening, Lu Mingqiang invited his colleague and peer Zhang Jianguo from the same company to have tea at a nearby "Laoba Tea" shop. He inquired in detail about the rental rates for small repair shops or studios in Haikou (including variations across different areas), common procurement channels for professional equipment (such as local hardware markets or online platforms), as well as daily operational expenses like utilities and consumables. Based on his knowledge, Zhang Jianguo provided answers one by one and treated Lu Mingqiang to tea snacks, resulting in additional calorie intake.

events.name: Monthly Household Financial Review
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang handed his payslip to his wife Wang Lijuan, who also presented the cash income she earned this month from her part-time housekeeping work. The couple sat beside the coffee table in the living room, where Lu Mingqiang took out the household account book and a calculator. Together, they meticulously reviewed and calculated the fixed expenses for the month: the mortgage, utilities and gas bills, tuition and meal expenses for their two children, car fuel costs, and purchases of daily necessities. The review revealed that their income and expenses were balanced, but the slow growth of their savings left Lu Mingqiang somewhat concerned.

events.name: Planning Savings and Emergency Funds
events.description: After confirming their basic living expenses, Lu Mingqiang discussed with his wife and decided, as per their usual practice, to transfer a sum of money into the family savings account and set aside a small amount of cash as an emergency fund for the household. The couple felt reassured by their financial situation for the month, which was "balanced with a slight surplus." Afterwards, they prepared a simple dinner together, though Lu Mingqiang ate less due to having already eaten more during a gathering earlier.

events.name: Temporary Family Barbecue Gathering
events.description: In the evening, neighbor Uncle Wang invited Lu Mingqiang's family to a small barbecue gathering in the residential community. Lu Mingqiang politely declined to focus on his studies, but his wife took their child to attend. Left alone at home, he felt somewhat lonely and decided to go to bed early to adjust his mood.

起始状态.心情: Highly organized, prepared to handle multiple tasks

结束状态.心情: Steady, well-informed (having sought advice from multiple sources, with clear family finances), but feeling somewhat lonely.

2025-06.daily_overview: On a weekday, Lu Mingqiang expanded his learning into the field of financial management. During his daily walks, his relationship with his neighbor Uncle Wang deepened through mutual assistance within the community. His physical recovery progressed well, and he began planning to return to the sports field. Due to fatigue, he went to bed early to restore his energy.

events.name: Learning the Basics of Fund Fixed Investment
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang studied the "Introduction to Fund Fixed Investment" module in the financial management course. He gained a preliminary understanding of what a fund is, how fixed investment smooths risks through long-term persistence, and how to choose simple index funds. These concepts were somewhat unfamiliar to him, but he found the ideas of "long-term persistence" and "risk diversification" reasonable and noted these keywords in his phone's memo. After the study, he felt his mind was somewhat overloaded and decided to go to bed early.

events.name: Encountering a neighbor and proactively offering assistance
events.description: While taking an evening stroll in the neighborhood garden, Lu Mingqiang encountered his neighbor Uncle Wang (Wang Jianguo), who was also out for a walk. The two stopped to chat, and Uncle Wang inquired with concern about the recovery of Lu Mingqiang’s back injury. During their conversation, Uncle Wang casually mentioned that the old-fashioned chandelier in his living room had recently been flickering whenever it was switched on or off, accompanied by a faint buzzing sound. The elderly couple were worried that it might be due to aging wiring. Upon hearing this, Lu Mingqiang, drawing on his professional knowledge and out of neighborly goodwill, offered to find time to visit and conduct a preliminary inspection, advising Uncle Wang not to rush into hiring an outsider. Uncle Wang expressed his sincere gratitude, which further strengthened Lu Mingqiang’s sense of belonging to the community.

events.name: Plan to resume running
events.description: After nearly ten days of restorative walking, Lu Mingqiang felt that his back injury had largely recovered. During his walks, he began to seriously consider how to gradually resume more intense physical activities such as running and squash. He decided to start with short-distance jogging next week and reminded himself to progress step by step to avoid a recurrence.

events.name: First Lesson Study of Online Course
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang began the first lesson of his online course for senior electrical technicians. He watched a video on [Review of Basic Circuit Theory] and took brief notes. Although the content was somewhat fundamental, he listened attentively, feeling that systematic learning was necessary, but he shortened his study time to ensure an early bedtime.

events.name: Alleviation of Work Pressure
events.description: During the day at work, the successful completion of a long-term project put Lu Mingqiang in a relaxed mood, and he decided to reduce his study load in the evening to recover his energy.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, slightly fatigued

结束状态.心情: The satisfaction derived from helping others, the curiosity for new knowledge, and the process of energy recovery.

state.今日运动: 25-minute walk in the residential community

2025-06.daily_overview: A day full of surprises and twists. The new car successfully completed its break-in period, and Lu Mingqiang signed up for a fun run. However, his wife's sudden lumbar muscle strain abruptly shifted his focus from personal career development to deep concern and reflection on the health of the entire family. Due to heavy rain, he canceled his exercise plans.

events.name: The break-in period for the new car has ended.
events.description: After driving his new car to work in heavy rain, Lu Mingqiang reflected on his driving experience over the past half month. He had become quite familiar with and satisfied with the vehicle’s stable performance in torrential rain, its fuel consumption during daily commutes, and its overall reliability. He believed the new car had successfully passed its break-in period and could now be fully trusted for daily use, which gave him peace of mind regarding his family’s assets.

events.name: Register for the 5K Fun Run
events.description: At the strong recommendation and encouragement of his running friend Chen Bin, Lu Mingqiang decided to challenge himself by signing up for the 5K fun run taking place this weekend at Baishamen Park. He completed the online registration through the link shared by Chen Bin and began searching for suitable running shoes and sportswear. As someone who had recently recovered from a back injury, he felt both eager and somewhat apprehensive about whether he could complete the run. After signing up, his spirits were lifted with excitement.

events.name: Wife suddenly experiences discomfort in the lower back.
events.description: When she woke up in the morning, Wang Lijuan felt a soreness in her lower back and experienced significant limitations in movement. Lu Mingqiang, who had previously suffered a back injury, immediately became alert and insisted on taking her for a check-up. He realized that his wife had been engaged in domestic work for a long time, frequently bending over during her tasks, which might have led to chronic strain from prolonged labor. This filled him with deep guilt and concern.

events.name: Accompanying the wife to a medical appointment
events.description: Lu Mingqiang took half a day off to accompany his wife to a community clinic near their residence. Through inquiry and a simple examination, the doctor made a preliminary diagnosis of early-stage lumbar muscle strain, attributing the cause to prolonged bending and insufficient rest. The doctor prescribed medication for symptom relief and advised her to rest more in the near future, avoid heavy physical labor, and improve her working posture. Lu Mingqiang carefully noted all the precautions, feeling deeply concerned.

events.name: Transformation of Family Health Concepts
events.description: After returning home from the clinic and settling his wife to rest, Lu Mingqiang felt deep remorse and lingering fear. He realized that in the past, he had focused only on his own health and exercise (due to the nature of his work), paying insufficient attention to the hardships and potential health risks associated with his wife's job. In the evening, the couple had an in-depth conversation and mutually recognized that family health requires mutual support and joint prevention, rather than being solely the responsibility of one individual. This prompted Lu Mingqiang to pay greater attention to family security.

events.name: All sports events canceled due to heavy rain.
events.description: Due to heavy rain throughout the day, Lu Mingqiang canceled his planned walk and other outdoor activities, focusing on taking care of his wife and handling household affairs, resulting in relatively low physical exertion.

起始状态.心情: Ordinary

结束状态.心情: Worry, guilt, a sharp increase in sense of responsibility (due to wife's illness), profound reflection

state.今日运动: None (due to heavy rain and accompanying for medical treatment)

2025-06.daily_overview: A Day of Role Reversal and Family Responsibility. Lu Mingqiang proactively took on more household chores and caregiving duties, responding to yesterday's reflections with concrete actions. The family atmosphere grew closer as they faced difficulties together. To regain energy for caring for his wife, he went to bed early.

events.name: Getting up early to take on the task of dropping off the children
events.description: To allow his wife, who was experiencing back discomfort, to rest more, Lu Mingqiang woke up half an hour earlier than usual and prepared a simple breakfast (porridge and eggs) for the family. Afterward, he drove his eldest son, Lu Zixuan, to primary school first, then dropped off his younger son, Lu Zihan, at the kindergarten on the way. Throughout the process, he was meticulous and attentive, which made him feel the significant weight of family responsibility.

events.name: Buy groceries and cook after work.
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang did not go straight home. Instead, he deliberately took a detour to the market to buy fresh fish and vegetables that his wife enjoys. Upon returning home, he put on an apron and took the initiative to cook, preparing steamed fish and several light home-style dishes, allowing Wang Lijuan to rest throughout the process. The cooking process relaxed him but was physically demanding.

events.name: Urge the wife to rest and take on household chores.
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang reminded Wang Lijuan not to sit for too long or bend over, and suggested she rest by reclining on the living room sofa. He then efficiently cleared the table, washed the dishes, and tidied up the kitchen. After finishing the household chores, he felt tired but satisfied.

events.name: Schedule maintenance time with neighbor Uncle Wang
events.description: Lu Mingqiang took a moment to call his neighbor Uncle Wang and arranged to visit him tomorrow evening after work to help check the circuit issue with the living room ceiling light. Uncle Wang thanked him again over the phone and inquired about the health of Lu Mingqiang’s wife, which made Lu Mingqiang feel warm inside.

events.name: Persist in Learning and Rehabilitation Walking
events.description: After finishing the household chores, Lu Mingqiang still insisted on studying online courses for half an hour and took a 20-minute evening walk. During the walk, he contemplated how to establish more effective health protection for his family, but he shortened his study time to go to bed early.

events.name: Emotionally supportive wife
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang spent time chatting with his wife, encouraging her to actively recover, which brought them closer and alleviated his anxiety.

起始状态.心情: Concerned and prepared to assume greater responsibilities

结束状态.心情: Steadfast (caring for family through actions), slightly weary, yet with harmonious relationships.

state.今日运动: A 20-minute walk in the residential community

2025-06.daily_overview: Weekday. While gathering information on industry exhibitions, Lu Mingqiang honored his promise by fixing a circuit issue for his neighbor, which gave him a sense of professional fulfillment. His wife's illness also prompted him to seriously consider the gaps in their family's health coverage. Due to his busy work schedule, he stayed up late.

events.name: Obtaining Information on Industry Exhibitions
events.description: During the lunch break, Chen Jianguo, a fellow worker, talked about the upcoming Power Industry and New Energy Technology Exhibition at the Haikou International Convention and Exhibition Center, mentioning exhibits such as smart grids and new types of electrical tools. Lu Mingqiang became very interested after hearing this and quietly noted down the exhibition date (this Saturday), planning to attend. This sparked his curiosity about the forefront of the industry.

events.name: Repairing the ceiling light for neighbor Uncle Wang
events.description: As scheduled, I arrived at Uncle Wang's house in the evening. Lu Mingqiang brought simple tools such as an electrical tester and a screwdriver, and carefully inspected the switch of the living room chandelier, the lamp socket wiring, and the connection points of the ceiling circuit. He quickly identified the issue: an internal contact spring in an old-fashioned lamp socket had poor contact, causing sparking. He explained the cause of the fault and the potential risks to Uncle Wang and his wife, temporarily repaired the contact point, and recommended replacing the lighting fixture as soon as possible.

events.name: Provide maintenance suggestions and politely decline any reward.
events.description: After the inspection, Lu Mingqiang suggested replacing the ceiling light with a safe LED one and offered to help with the installation. Uncle Wang was very grateful for Lu Mingqiang's professionalism and kind assistance, insisting on giving him some money as a token of appreciation. Lu Mingqiang smiled and firmly declined, citing "neighbors helping each other, it's just a small favor," and only asked to be called when the new light was purchased. This further enhanced his reputation in the community.

events.name: Concerned about family health protection
events.description: Upon returning home and seeing his wife carefully moving her waist, Lu Mingqiang once again recalled the diagnosis given by the clinic doctor. He realized that if his wife’s back injury required a longer period of rest or treatment, her part-time income would be interrupted, and the family’s finances would immediately feel the strain. This made him feel an even more urgent need for the commercial health insurance he had previously learned about. That evening, he began researching insurance products online and stayed up late into the night.

events.name: Increased work pressure
events.description: During the day at work, an urgent project required overtime, causing Lu Mingqiang to work an extra hour. This delayed his return home and affected his evening arrangements.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful

结束状态.心情: Contentment (having helped the neighbor), anxiety (the issue of family security has become prominent), exhaustion

state.今日运动: Work (heavy manual labor), including overtime

2025-06.daily_overview: A day of preparation for the weekend activities. Lu Mingqiang planned to visit the exhibition and began actively inquiring about medical insurance information. Meanwhile, he assessed the outcomes of his first phase of learning through a course simulation test, marking the entry into a new stage of his studies. Due to his dedication to learning, he stayed up late.

events.name: Application for Compensatory Leave to Visit the Exhibition
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang applied to Squad Leader Zhang for a half-day leave on Saturday afternoon (June 14), citing the reason of attending an industry technology exhibition to enhance his professional skills. Squad Leader Zhang promptly approved the request and encouraged him to learn more about new technologies. Lu Mingqiang then planned the bus route from his home to the exhibition center and adjusted his weekend schedule accordingly.

events.name: Consulting colleagues about commercial insurance
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang asked his coworker Zhang Jianguo, who seemed more knowledgeable about such matters, for information on commercial health insurance. Zhang Jianguo mentioned that his wife had purchased a policy costing around one to two thousand yuan per year, which could cover some expenses outside the social security catalog. He also recommended several common insurance companies. Lu Mingqiang took mental notes and decided to look into it more thoroughly that evening.

events.name: Search for health insurance information online
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang used his mobile phone to browse the internet at home, searching for the insurance company mentioned by his coworker and "supplementary medical insurance suitable for flexible employment personnel." He initially reviewed the coverage, reimbursement ratios, and prices of several products, finding significant differences that required careful study. The research continued late into the night, leading to him staying up late.

events.name: Course Phase One Simulation Self-Assessment
events.description: After completing several weeks of theoretical study, Lu Mingqiang selected a set of practice questions provided by the platform for self-assessment. He strictly adhered to the exam time limit, calmly answering the questions in his study. Upon completion, he checked his answers against the provided solutions, marking the incorrect questions and areas where his understanding was insufficient. This process gave him a clear understanding of the key areas to focus on in his subsequent studies, and the satisfactory results boosted his confidence.

events.name: Temporarily changing the diet plan
events.description: Due to his studies on insurance and exams, Lu Mingqiang had a simple dinner, eating instant noodles, which made him feel unhealthy but saved time.

起始状态.心情: Be planned

结束状态.心情: The information content is substantial, progress in learning is well-grasped, but fatigue is present.

2025-06.daily_overview: An afternoon of broadening horizons and fulfilling commitments. Lu Mingqiang visited a cutting-edge industry exhibition alone and was deeply inspired. He then readily agreed to further requests for help from his neighbor, deepening their relationship through mutual assistance. At the same time, he began exploring practical health protection plans for his family. Due to a busy schedule, he went to bed early to prepare for tomorrow's run.

events.name: Visit the Power Industry and New Energy Technology Exhibition
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang took the bus alone to the Haikou International Convention and Exhibition Center. He visited the smart grid equipment exhibition area, the distributed photovoltaic power generation system model, and various advanced electrical tool booths with great interest. He carefully watched the demonstrations and had brief exchanges with technicians at several booths, asking some practical application questions. The visit made him feel that the industry is rapidly evolving and that he needs to keep learning continuously.

events.name: Reflections and Notes on Exhibition Viewing
events.description: After the visit, on the return bus ride, Lu Mingqiang reflected on what he had seen and heard. The intelligent remote monitoring and more efficient solar energy applications made him feel that the industry was developing rapidly. He noted down new concepts such as "photovoltaic operation and maintenance" and "smart meters," along with several tool brands he was interested in, in his phone's memo. He realized there was still much he needed to learn, which ignited his professional passion.

events.name: Proactively undertaking electrical circuit inspection for neighbors
events.description: Shortly after arriving home, Lu Mingqiang received a call from his neighbor, Uncle Wang. Uncle Wang sounded a bit embarrassed as he explained that the circuit in his house had been tripping repeatedly during the day for some unknown reason. Despite his efforts to fix it, he hadn’t been able to resolve the issue. He asked Lu Mingqiang if he could recommend a reliable electrician. Without hesitation, Lu Mingqiang replied in his usual calm and steady tone, "Uncle Wang, there’s no need to look for someone else. I’ll come over after work tonight to take a look for you." His certainty eased Uncle Wang’s concerns, and they agreed to address the matter the next day.

events.name: Community Consultation on Supplementary Medical Insurance
events.description: In the morning, taking advantage of his break, Lu Mingqiang made a special trip to the community service center. He inquired in detail with the staff about whether the government offers supplementary medical insurance schemes for flexible workers or group insurance programs in partnership with the community. The staff provided him with some informational leaflets and explained several different options. Lu Mingqiang decided to take them home to study with his wife, which gave him a clearer idea about securing his family's protection.

events.name: Preparing for tomorrow's run
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang prepared his running shoes and sportswear in advance, checked the weather forecast, and performed light stretches to ensure his physical condition. He decided to go to bed early to conserve energy and canceled some evening study sessions.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to (visiting the exhibition)

结束状态.心情: Broad-minded (in visiting exhibitions), helpful (agreeing to assist neighbors), pragmatic (concerned about insurance), and in a state of readiness.

2025-06.daily_overview: A Sunday of achieving accomplishments, fulfilling family responsibilities, and planning for the future. Lu Mingqiang successfully completed his first formal running challenge after recovering from a waist injury, shared his learning gains with his family, and supported his wife's recuperation through household chores and parent-child activities. The awareness of jointly managing family health has begun to take root. Strictly matching the conclusion of the health status.

events.name: Completed the first 5-kilometer fun run after recovering from a waist injury.
events.description: In the early morning, Lu Mingqiang arrived at Baishamen Park ahead of time to meet his running partner Chen Bin and conducted a thorough warm-up. After the race began, he deliberately controlled his pace, moving steadily at a speed far slower than his usual rate, focusing entirely on the feedback from his waist throughout the course. Chen Bin accompanied and encouraged him the entire way. In the end, Lu Mingqiang successfully crossed the finish line and received his finisher’s medal. Although his performance was average, a long-lost sense of exhilaration and accomplishment filled his heart, marking his official return from being an "injured person" to a "sportsman." After the race, he felt slight soreness in his leg muscles.

events.name: Post-Competition Recovery and Communication
events.description: After the run, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Bin walked slowly and stretched in the park. Then, the two had Hainan rice noodles together at a nearby breakfast shop, exchanging their running experiences while eating. Lu Mingqiang shared his confidence in recovering from his back injury, and Chen Bin was happy for him, reminding him to focus on core strength training next to prevent a recurrence. After the conversation, Lu Mingqiang went home alone to rest.

events.name: Sharing Achievements and Learning Insights with Family
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang showed his wife and children the finisher's medal and recounted his running experience. He then opened the memo app on his phone and shared with his wife some basic financial knowledge he had recently learned about emergency savings, insurance, and regular fund investments. The two briefly discussed how to better plan their family income and allocate funds for health security, reaching a preliminary agreement to start researching specific insurance products next week.

events.name: Take on the weekend cleaning
events.description: To allow his wife to rest peacefully, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to handle the household cleaning after returning from his morning run. He vacuumed the floors, wiped down the furniture, and washed and hung out the accumulated dirty laundry. Though busy, he considered it his duty, and the chores consumed a portion of his energy.

events.name: Take children for outdoor activities
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang took his two sons to Wanlv Park to fly a kite. He let his elder son, Lu Zixuan, try to control the kite on his own, while he himself followed slowly on the grass with his younger son. Watching the children's joyful smiles and the kite soaring in the sky, he felt relaxed and happy, while also allowing his wife to rest fully at home. The activity was focused on leisure, avoiding intense running.

events.name: Turning Health Awareness into Action
events.description: The experiences of this day, from successfully completing his run, to discussing health security with his wife, and then proactively sharing household chores and caring for family members, prompted Lu Mingqiang to expand his health perspective from focusing solely on himself to encompassing the entire family. He began to contemplate and prepare to work with his wife to develop a family health improvement plan that includes regular exercise, adjustments to work posture, and emergency safeguards. This will become a key focus for the future.

起始状态.心情: Both Excited and Nervous (Game Day)

结束状态.心情: Proud (completed the race), grounded (fulfilled family responsibilities), hopeful (family plans are clearer), with slight muscle soreness.

state.今日运动: 5-kilometer fun run, post-race stretching, light household chores, and outdoor activities

2025-06.daily_overview: Monday is a fulfilling day of work and family. Lu Mingqiang shares insights at work, reinforcing his professional identity; upon returning home, he extends his pragmatic and meticulous attitude to caring for his wife, personally alleviating her discomfort.

events.name: Sharing Exhibition Experiences
events.description: During the Monday lunch break, Lu Mingqiang took out photos he had taken at the power industry exhibition on his phone and actively approached his coworkers Chen Jianguo and apprentice Zhao Qiang. Pointing at the installation diagram of the smart meter, he said, "Look at this new model—the terminal block design is more reasonable, which could probably cut the wiring time in half." He then compared it with the older equipment he commonly used, discussing durability and cost. What he shared was not profound theory but observations based on practical experience, which drew Chen Jianguo into the discussion, while Zhao Qiang listened attentively nearby.

events.name: Apply a warm compress and massage for the wife.
events.description: After washing up in the evening, Lu Mingqiang took out the old-style rubber hot water bottle from home, filled it with warm but not scalding water, and wrapped it in a dry towel. He asked his wife, Wang Lijuan, to lie face down on the bed and placed the warm compress steadily on the sore spot on her lower back. "The doctor said heat therapy can relax the muscles. Just lie here for a while." Fifteen minutes later, following the simple technique taught by the doctor earlier, he gently pressed and massaged in circular motions on both sides of her lower back with his palms, applying even pressure. Throughout the process, he spoke little, but his movements were focused and steady.

events.name: Commuting to work
events.description: In the early morning, Lu Mingqiang drives his family car along the familiar route from his home in Longhua District to his company on Haisheng Road in Xiuying District. The 10-minute one-way commute is very convenient, and he usually listens to the morning news on the local traffic radio while in the car.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to embrace the new work week.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, feeling that one has taken care of the family.
