2025-06.daily_overview: After a long workday, Lu Mingqiang stayed late due to urgent repair overtime, resulting in a late night. Nevertheless, he still fulfilled his responsibilities as a father by picking up his child and supervising their studies, allowing his hardworking wife to take a breather. The interplay between family roles and work pressures was evident.

events.name: Handle emergency repair tasks and work overtime.
events.description: In the afternoon, the company received an emergency repair report about a tripped circuit breaker in a residential area's distribution box. Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo were dispatched to the scene. In the stuffy distribution room, they skillfully troubleshooted the issue and ultimately identified an aged air switch as the cause. After replacing the switch, they spent an additional half-hour inspecting the complex wiring, which delayed their departure from work.

events.name: Pick up children and supervise their studies
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang drove punctually to the primary school and kindergarten to pick up his eldest son Lu Zixuan and his younger son Lu Zihan. Upon returning home, he first settled his younger son to play with building blocks, then sat beside his eldest son to supervise him in completing his math and Chinese homework. When Lu Zixuan encountered a word problem he couldn’t solve, Lu Mingqiang did not provide the answer directly. Instead, he guided the child to read the problem repeatedly and identify key information, ultimately allowing the child to solve it on his own. While checking the homework, he was meticulous, pointing out even a single typo and asking his son to correct it. “Your mother has been having back discomfort this week, so I’ll be taking more responsibility for your studies. You should also be more self-disciplined,” he said to his son.

events.name: Fatigued from overtime work, he fell asleep during a brief evening rest.
events.description: After supervising homework, during the gap when his wife was preparing dinner, Lu Mingqiang sat on the living room sofa. He intended to browse news on his phone, but due to exhaustion from the day, he inadvertently dozed off for twenty minutes, until his wife woke him up for dinner.

起始状态.心情: Slightly weary but with clear goals

结束状态.心情: A sense of fulfillment from having fulfilled one's responsibilities, yet tinged with fatigue.

2025-06.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang conducted a practical financial projection for his entrepreneurial dream, staying up late to calculate costs, which resulted in insufficient sleep. The process of rational calculation gave him an unprecedented clarity about the cost of his dream, but it also increased his fatigue.

events.name: Calculating startup costs late into the night
events.description: In the evening, after his child had fallen asleep, Lu Mingqiang turned on the family laptop that had been in use for several years. Following the scattered notes on his phone, he clumsily yet earnestly began creating a table in Excel. The first column listed the items: shop rental deposit and advance payment, second-hand repair bench and tools, initial batch of commonly used spare parts, business license registration fees... The second column recorded his estimated costs. He added them up one by one, arriving at a figure for the startup capital. Then, he calculated another set of numbers: how much would be needed for household savings, monthly mortgage and car loan payments, living expenses, and the child’s tuition if there were no stable income for six months. Finally, he placed the two figures side by side and stared at the screen in silence for a long time. The table was not particularly well-designed, but the numbers were clearly laid out. Deep in thought, he did not finish until the early hours of the morning.

events.name: A brief conversation during a work break
events.description: During lunch at a fast-food restaurant near the construction site, Chen Jianguo, a fellow worker, asked Lu Mingqiang what he had been jotting down on his phone recently. Lu Mingqiang simply replied, "Just thinking about the future and doing some calculations," before steering the conversation toward the work they had to do in the afternoon. His ISTJ personality made him uncomfortable discussing things too much before they took shape.

events.name: Due to staying up late, I occasionally lose focus during daytime work.
events.description: During the afternoon work, Lu Mingqiang nearly connected the wires incorrectly while installing a switch due to lack of sleep. Fortunately, he realized it in time and reminded himself to stay focused.

起始状态.心情: Thinking, with a touch of exploratory excitement, yet slightly drowsy.

结束状态.心情: Solemn, the pressure of reality becomes tangible, compounded by the fatigue from staying up late.

2025-06.daily_overview: This day was filled with the warmth of neighborhood assistance and candid communication within the family. From reminding his wife and helping neighbors to engaging in deep conversations with his wife about future plans, Lu Mingqiang's actions consistently revolved around the family and community relationships he cherished, leading to a slightly later bedtime due to contemplation.

events.name: Remind Wife to Pay Attention to Work Posture
events.description: Before heading out in the morning, Lu Mingqiang noticed his wife Wang Lijuan bending over to tidy up her cleaning toolkit. He stopped and reminded her, "Lijuan, when you go to work today, remember to use long-handled mops and brushes as much as possible. Avoid squatting or bending over deeply. The doctor said you need to be careful." Wang Lijuan nodded in agreement.

events.name: Supermarket Shopping and Encountering a Friend
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang did not go directly home but drove to a large supermarket near his residential community. Pushing a shopping cart, he skillfully selected daily necessities such as rice, cooking oil, and toilet paper according to the list his wife had written. He also specifically weighed two jin of pork ribs, which his wife enjoys, and fruits favored by the children. While checking out, he unexpectedly ran into his junior high school classmate Wu Gang. The two exchanged brief greetings and agreed to meet for a weekend tea gathering.

events.name: Repaired the neighbor's electric fan and received a gift in return.
events.description: While parking in the residential complex, I happened to run into Uncle Wang, a neighbor, who was looking troubled while carrying an old electric fan. Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to approach and ask about the situation. He learned that the fan had stopped working, and Uncle Wang couldn’t find anyone to repair it. Lu Mingqiang said, "Uncle Wang, leave it here. I’ll come take a look after dinner tonight." After dinner, he arrived at Uncle Wang’s home with his toolbox. After removing the back cover of the fan, he quickly used a multimeter to identify a section of wiring that had poor contact due to aging. Skillfully, he cut away the worn part, reconnected the wires, and secured them tightly with electrical tape. Once powered on, the fan resumed spinning. Throughout the repair process, Uncle Wang handed him tools and chatted about daily life, praising Lu Mingqiang’s technical skills repeatedly. As Lu Mingqiang was leaving, Uncle Wang insisted on giving him a bag of homegrown mangoes as a token of gratitude.

events.name: Have an in-depth discussion with my wife about entrepreneurial ideas.
events.description: After the children had fallen asleep, Lu Mingqiang brought his laptop to the living room and showed his wife the cost calculation sheet he had prepared. He candidly shared his research and ideas from the past month, as well as his hesitation upon seeing the figures for startup capital and the family’s emergency fund. "Lijuan, I want to give it a try, but I’m afraid that if it fails, we might lose our savings and drag you and the children down with me." Wang Lijuan carefully reviewed the table and remained silent for a moment before saying, "I trust your skills, but running a business isn’t just about technical expertise. The risks are high, and I don’t want you to overwork yourself. Maybe... we should think about whether there’s a safer path? For example, you could get a certification first to increase your salary." The conversation ended without a conclusion, but both understood each other’s concerns and support, and it continued until late into the night.

起始状态.心情: A calm mind, with a few pending tasks on the mind, feeling slightly fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Complex, encompassing both the satisfaction of helping others and anxiety about the future, yet feeling somewhat more grounded due to communication.

2025-06.daily_overview: Friday was a day interwoven with learning gains, work emergencies, and family warmth. The completion of the financial management course brought new knowledge, while the urgent repair tested professional skills. The aroma of home-cooked dishes and conversations with family at the dinner table formed the most solid backdrop of life, and sleep came slightly earlier due to relaxation.

events.name: Complete financial planning course learning
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang finished watching the last video of the introductory financial management course while wearing headphones. He opened the memo app on his phone and reorganized the scattered notes he had previously taken, such as "emergency funds should cover 3-6 months of living expenses" and "do not invest in what you don’t understand," into a few major principles he could remember. He felt he had gained some new understanding of managing money, but he was well aware that he was still far from putting it into practice and decided to set it aside for the time being.

events.name: Driving a new vehicle to perform emergency repairs.
events.description: As the workday was nearing its end, the team received a notification that a dedicated power line at a factory in the suburbs had malfunctioned, causing production to halt. Lu Mingqiang drove his own car, carrying Chen Jianguo and their tools, and rushed to the scene. With roads clear during non-commute hours, the new car proved faster and more agile than the company's engineering vehicle, allowing them to arrive earlier than expected and saving valuable time for troubleshooting. However, during the drive, he also thought about the additional monthly expenses for the car loan and fuel.

events.name: Planning Weekend Parent-Child Activities
events.description: During the interval waiting for the power-on test at the emergency repair site, Lu Mingqiang took out his phone and briefly noted in the memo: "Sunday, Wanlüyuan, take Xuanxuan for photos. Prepare: water, snacks, power bank, tissues." Thinking about the promise he made to his son last week, the corners of his mouth lifted slightly.

events.name: Financial and Risk Discussion with Spouse
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang once again took out the calculation sheet and sat down with his wife. They discussed each item one by one: If they used most of their savings, how would they afford extracurricular classes or better schools for their two children in the future? What if the studio had no business in the first six months—where would the family's living expenses come from? Wang Lijuan also mentioned that her part-time income was unstable. The deeper they delved into the discussion, the more tightly Lu Mingqiang furrowed his brows. The romantic vision of starting a business was gradually overshadowed by the practicalities of daily life. However, after the discussion, they decided to revisit the matter over the weekend.

events.name: Prepare a family dinner and rest early.
events.description: After the discussion came to a temporary pause, Lu Mingqiang tied on an apron and walked into the kitchen. He cooked a pot of fragrant Hainanese chicken rice, with tender chicken and rice fully absorbing the aroma of chicken oil. He also stir-fried some green vegetables and prepared a seaweed egg drop soup. As the family gathered around the table for the meal, he asked his wife how her waist had been feeling that week and discussed whether they should go to the hospital for a follow-up checkup next week. The eldest son, Lu Zixuan, excitedly talked about school matters, while the younger son, Lu Zihan, ate with his mouth full of rice. The warmth of the family temporarily dispelled the heavy topics about the future. Due to the exhaustion of the day, he went to bed earlier than usual.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, with a slight sense of fulfillment after studying.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary, but the warmth of family brings solace, making thoughts on entrepreneurship more prudent.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Saturday, Lu Mingqiang balanced personal growth with family responsibilities. He organized financial knowledge in preparation for a family trip, and after a run, he confronted his own health risks, marking the beginning of seeking professional help. His weight slightly decreased due to exercise.

events.name: Organize Financial Planning Course Knowledge
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang spent some time transcribing the notes on financial management from his phone's memo app into an old notebook. He wrote slowly, recalling the course content as he went, trying to grasp concepts like "compound interest" and "risk diversification." In the end, he wrote down his conclusion: "At this stage, the focus should still be on increasing income (obtaining certifications for salary raises) and practicing forced savings. Investment carries high risks, so it's best to avoid it for now."

events.name: Prepare items for Sunday outing
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and his wife went through the items they needed to bring for their trip to the park the next day. They packed a water bottle, washed fruits, and small packets of biscuits. Lu Mingqiang made sure to check whether the power bank for the camera and phone was fully charged. Wang Lijuan smiled and remarked that he was being more meticulous than when preparing for a business trip.

events.name: Seeking Advice on Core Training After Running
events.description: In the evening, as the sun slanted westward and the heat subsided slightly, Lu Mingqiang went for a 5-kilometer run at Baishamen Park. While stretching after the run, he felt a familiar soreness and tightness in his lower back, which reminded him of his previous lower back injury. He picked up his phone and sent messages on WeChat to Chen Bin, whom he often ran with, and Lin Feng, a squash friend who was knowledgeable about fitness. He briefly explained his situation: engaging in heavy physical work, having a history of lower back injury, and experiencing discomfort in his lower back after running. He asked them if they had any suggestions on protecting his lower back through strength training.

events.name: Pay the summer electricity bill advance deposit
events.description: As Hainan enters the height of summer and air conditioning usage becomes frequent, Lu Mingqiang has prepaid double the usual amount into his household electricity account via a mobile app to ensure there is no power outage due to unpaid bills.

events.name: Feeling tired from running, I relaxed by watching TV in the evening.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang did not study. Instead, he watched two episodes of a TV series with his wife to relax and recharge for the activities of the following day.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the morning of your day off.

结束状态.心情: Slightly concerned (about the lower back), but somewhat reassured due to taking action, and relaxed after exercise.

2025-06.daily_overview: A pure family day. Lu Mingqiang temporarily set aside work pressures and future plans, devoting his time entirely to his son. As they explored new hobbies together, the bond between father and son quietly deepened, bringing joy and restoring regular sleep patterns.

events.name: Guiding my son to photograph the silhouette of a palm tree
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang took his eldest son, Lu Zixuan, to Wanlv Garden. He found a row of tall palm trees and had his son stand with his back to the sun. "Xuanxuan, look. When you take a photo like this, both the trees and the person become black silhouettes, but the sky is very bright. Isn’t it beautiful?" He crouched halfway down and demonstrated how to frame the shot with his phone. Lu Zixuan excitedly took the phone to try it himself, while Lu Mingqiang guided him on the angles from the side.

events.name: Photographing Lotus Flowers and Parent-Child Communication
events.description: They walked to the pondside where lotus flowers were in full bloom. Lu Mingqiang taught his son to zoom in with the phone camera to capture close-up shots. "Yes, keep your hand steady." During breaks from filming, the father and son sat in the shade of a tree on the lawn, drinking water and eating fruit. Lu Zixuan chattered away about the football match in his class and amusing stories about his deskmate. Lu Mingqiang listened most of the time, occasionally asking a question, with a rare, completely relaxed smile on his face.

events.name: Returning Home in the Evening to Share the Achievements
events.description: Returning home in the evening, during dinner, Lu Mingqiang projected the photos he had taken that day onto the television. He flipped through them one by one, commenting on which had good lighting and which could be improved in composition. His wife, Wang Lijuan, and their younger son, Lu Zihan, also watched with great interest. Lu Zixuan proudly pointed out which photos he had taken himself. The small living room was filled with laughter and cheerful conversation.

events.name: Due to outdoor activities, going to bed early in the evening.
events.description: Due to the numerous activities during the day, Lu Mingqiang felt somewhat fatigued and went to bed earlier than usual in the evening to ensure adequate rest.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed and happy, looking forward to some quality time alone with my son.

结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, joy, and the sense of fulfillment brought by family time.

state.今日运动: A walk in the park for about 2 hours.

2025-06.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Lu Mingqiang received professional health advice from a friend. This provided him with a concrete and actionable plan to shift his health management from passive response to proactive prevention, allowing him to feel grounded despite his busy work schedule.

events.name: Received core training guidance
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang saw a WeChat message from Lin Feng. Lin Feng had sent several instructional video links for exercises, including the plank and bird-dog pose. The text provided detailed explanations of the movement essentials, breathing methods, and common mistakes, with particular emphasis on "engaging the core" and "maintaining a neutral spine, avoiding arching the lower back." It also recommended starting with short durations and low sets, highlighting that the key lies in the quality of the movements. Lu Mingqiang replied with thanks and saved the videos.

events.name: Routine Work and Safety Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, the work team attended the monthly safety meeting organized by the company. Team Leader Zhang emphasized heatstroke prevention and electrical safety during high-temperature operations in summer. Lu Mingqiang listened attentively and noted the key points in his work notebook.

events.name: Purchase ingredients for heat-relief beverages after work and coincidentally meet a coworker.
events.description: The weather was scorching hot. On his way home from work, Lu Mingqiang stopped by the vegetable market and bought some mung beans and rock sugar. He planned to ask his wife to cook some mung bean soup to help the whole family beat the heat. At the entrance of the market, he ran into his coworker Zhang Jianguo, and the two briefly exchanged updates about their recent work.

events.name: I stayed up a bit later at night due to learning new knowledge.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang watched the video sent by Lin Feng and attempted to grasp the key points of the movements, which led to him falling asleep slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Steady, ready to get to work.

结束状态.心情: Steady and practical, I have obtained useful information and feel more confident about health management.

2025-06.daily_overview: On days without any special events recorded, life continues to operate as usual. The main themes of the day consist of high-intensity work, daily care for family, and repeated internal deliberations, leading to an early bedtime due to fatigue.

events.name: Handling daily maintenance tasks and experiencing discomfort due to heatstroke.
events.description: Today's task involved replacing the corridor lighting wiring in an old residential building. Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo worked as a team, climbing up and down the stuffy stairwell to replace the aging electrical wires and sound-activated switches. Their work clothes were soaked with sweat. In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang felt slightly dizzy, suspected to be a mild case of heatstroke. He promptly rested and rehydrated, which alleviated the symptoms.

events.name: Concerned about wife's lumbar recovery
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang asked his wife how her back felt after doing housekeeping work that day. Wang Lijuan said that using long-handled tools had helped somewhat, but she still felt a slight ache in her lower back after bending over to wipe the corners of the table in the afternoon. Upon hearing this, Lu Mingqiang weighed the factor of "family resilience to risks" even more heavily in his considerations of entrepreneurial risks.

events.name: Evening self-study but rested early due to discomfort.
events.description: After the child fell asleep, Lu Mingqiang originally intended to study the electronic version of the "Electric Power Safety Technical Specifications" that he had downloaded on his phone. However, due to discomfort from heatstroke during the day and feeling fatigued, he decided to go to bed early to regain his strength.

起始状态.心情: Calm, but slightly uncomfortably hot.

结束状态.心情: Feeling slightly fatigued, I went to bed early due to physical discomfort and have become more attentive to health matters.

2025-06.daily_overview: This was a day for making crucial decisions. After nearly a month of careful deliberation, Lu Mingqiang pragmatically and responsibly set aside his adventurous entrepreneurial dream. At the same time, he took the first steps toward two more tangible goals—health protection and skill enhancement—though sleep came later than usual due to the new challenges.

events.name: Paying Car Loans and Refueling Cards
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang paid his monthly car loan via mobile banking. In the afternoon after work, he refueled his car and topped up his fuel card with 500 yuan. Watching the changes in his account balance, he keenly felt the ongoing financial pressure brought by his new car.

events.name: Decided to shelve the entrepreneurial plan
events.description: After careful consideration, Lu Mingqiang made his final decision. He wrote in his phone's memo: "Entrepreneurship idea (studio) — postponed. Reasons: 1. Significant funding gap; using savings carries high risks. 2. Insufficient family emergency funds; weak risk resilience. 3. Two young children require a stable environment. New direction: 1. Focus on current job and strive to obtain an advanced technician certification. 2. Strengthen family savings and optimize expenditures." This decision brought him a tinge of disappointment, but more than that, it gave him a sense of relief after unburdening himself and a renewed sense of responsibility toward his family.

events.name: First Attempt at Core Strength Training
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang laid out a yoga mat (previously bought by his wife) on the living room floor. He opened the video sent by Lin Feng and followed along to do a plank. He tried hard to tighten his abdomen, but within less than 30 seconds, he began to tremble, and his lower back showed signs of sagging, so he quickly stopped. Next, he attempted the bird-dog exercise but found it somewhat difficult to coordinate his limbs. The first training session lasted only a short time, but he deeply felt the weakness of his core muscles.

events.name: Clarify Learning Objectives
events.description: While showering after the training session, Lu Mingqiang reflected on his years of practical experience and realized that theoretical calculations and the new national standards were his clear weaknesses. After drying his hair, he sat at his desk and wrote on the first page of a new notebook: "Goal for preparing for the senior technician certification: 1. Strengthen foundational electrical theory (Ohm's Law, power calculations, etc.); 2. Thoroughly study the latest safety standards; 3. Learn the principles of simple relay protection. Time: After 9 p.m. every night, half a day on Sundays."

events.name: Due to training excitement, I communicated with my wife until quite late.
events.description: After the training, Lu Mingqiang shared his experience of core training and preparation plan with his wife. They discussed family support, which led to staying up later than usual.

起始状态.心情: With the thoughts of having made a decision, feeling somewhat relieved.

结束状态.心情: Firmness after setting goals, mingled with a touch of apprehension toward new challenges (training and learning), yet remains positive.

state.今日运动: First Core Training (Plank, Bird Dog), approximately 15 minutes

2025-06.daily_overview: Following the decision came the concrete action plan. Lu Mingqiang began to implement the new focal points of his life—health, social connections, and learning—into specific details. Whether it was reaching out to friends, consulting with mentors, or ordering textbooks, each step reflected his ISTJ-style organization and pragmatism, along with a disciplined sleep schedule.

events.name: Review the Core Training Experience
events.description: Upon waking up, Lu Mingqiang felt a slight soreness and tightness in his abdomen and back. He recognized this as a normal reaction from his training, which also confirmed that his core strength indeed needed improvement. He decided to persist with this training, scheduling it 2-3 times per week as an important measure to prevent work-related strain.

events.name: Contact colleagues to propose a dinner gathering.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang sent messages to Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang on WeChat respectively: "Jianguo/Zhao Qiang, are you free this Saturday afternoon? Let's have grilled fish at the usual spot (that big open-air restaurant in Xiuying District) and relax a bit." He quickly received affirmative replies from both of them.

events.name: Consult and purchase study materials
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang consulted his master, Master Li, and his coworker Chen Jianguo via WeChat about textbooks for the senior technician certification exam. Master Li recommended "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering (Fifth Edition)" and "Illustrated Guide to Safety Technical Specifications for Power Engineering Construction." Chen Jianguo sent a link to a question bank he had previously used. Lu Mingqiang promptly ordered the printed textbooks on an online shopping platform and downloaded the electronic version of the specification document.

events.name: Due to muscle soreness, perform light stretching in the evening.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang performed simple stretching exercises to alleviate muscle soreness after core training and promote recovery.

起始状态.心情: Muscles slightly sore, yet brimming with vitality.

结束状态.心情: The work is substantial, the plan is progressing, and there is slight physical discomfort but it is manageable.

state.今日运动: None, heavy physical labor throughout the day, light stretching in the evening.

2025-06.daily_overview: Friday's workload remained heavy, but Lu Mingqiang had already begun preparing for weekend leisure and long-term learning. He carefully compared training courses, reflecting his consistent prudence in spending, and went to bed slightly earlier due to relaxation.

events.name: Browse Online Training Courses
events.description: During a work break, Lu Mingqiang opened several vocational skills training websites on his phone. He carefully compared the outlines, instructor introductions, and user reviews of several online courses for senior electrician technicians. A systematic course offered by a certain electric power vocational college had comprehensive content but cost nearly a thousand yuan; another platform offered several free open courses, but the content was relatively fragmented. He bookmarked the links to the free courses, added the paid course to his shopping cart without completing the payment, and planned to think it over further or see how effective self-study with textbooks might be.

events.name: Complete this week's work summary
events.description: Before leaving work, Lu Mingqiang gave Squad Leader Zhang a brief report on several maintenance and installation projects completed this week and signed off on the work log.

events.name: Family evening chat and early rest
events.description: After dinner, the family sat in the living room with the air conditioner on. Wang Lijuan, the wife, shared an amusing incident she encountered during her part-time job during the day, while the two children giggled while watching cartoons. Lu Mingqiang listened, occasionally chiming in, savoring this ordinary yet precious family moment. Due to an event over the weekend, he went to bed earlier than usual.

events.name: Evening study session temporarily canceled due to fatigue.
events.description: Originally scheduled to study in the evening, Lu Mingqiang decided to rest and adjust his state due to fatigue from work during the day.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, feeling slightly fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed, with a warm family atmosphere, looking forward to the weekend.

state.今日运动: None, heavy physical labor throughout the day

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast with rain in the afternoon, the weather becoming somewhat cooler.

2025-06.daily_overview: Saturday was a trio of family communication, health planning, and gathering with friends. Lu Mingqiang gained understanding from his father, jointly formulated a practical health plan with his wife, and received emotional support during a meal with his coworkers. The main thread of his life became clearer, though he stayed up late due to the gathering.

events.name: Informing Father of the Decision
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang took his children to visit his parents. While the children were playing with their grandparents, he called his father, Lu Jianguo, out to the balcony and candidly shared his decision to give up his recent entrepreneurial plans and instead focus on obtaining professional certifications and saving money. His father patted him on the shoulder and said, "Qiangzi, you're thinking the right way. We are skilled workers, and our craftsmanship is our foundation. First, establish solid roots, and opportunities will come later. I support you." His father's understanding dispelled the last bit of hesitation in his heart.

events.name: Develop a family health plan with your wife
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and his wife had a serious conversation about health issues. He mentioned his underlying lower back injury and the core training he had started, while Wang Lijuan also talked about the recurring strain in her lower back. Both reached a consensus: health is the foundation of family stability. They discussed and formulated several plans: Lu Mingqiang would run 2–3 times a week and incorporate core training; Wang Lijuan would make sure to use assistive tools at work and perform daily lower back stretches; and the family would engage in at least one outdoor activity per month (such as walking or flying kites).

events.name: Three Colleagues Gather for Grilled Fish Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, and Zhao Qiang met up at their regular street-side eatery in Xiuying District. As expected, Chen Jianguo brought the fish he had caught himself for the restaurant to prepare. The aroma of charcoal-grilled fish filled the air, while chilled beer helped beat the summer heat. The three chatted about amusing stories from the company and difficult clients. Lu Mingqiang asked Zhao Qiang how he was adjusting to living alone in Haikou, while Chen Jianguo teased Lu Mingqiang for being "mysterious" lately, joking that he must be secretly working on his abs. The atmosphere was relaxed and lively, with the fatigue of work melting away amid laughter and conversation. The gathering lasted until late in the evening.

events.name: Develop a Weekly Study Plan
events.description: After returning home from the dinner gathering, though it was a bit late, Lu Mingqiang still sat down at his desk. He took out a sheet of A4 paper and drew a simple table listing the seven days of the week. Considering that he worked six days a week, nearly ten hours each day, he fixed his study time from 9:00 p.m. to 10:30 p.m. every evening, as well as the entire Sunday morning. From Monday to Saturday evenings, he scheduled tasks such as reading a specific chapter of the textbook, completing corresponding exercises, and reviewing regulations. Sundays were reserved for summarizing and taking mock tests. He neatly posted this schedule on the wall in front of his desk.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, planning the day's activities

结束状态.心情: It was a very fulfilling and grounding experience, with the support of family, the companionship of friends, and a clear path for the future, though I felt slightly full from the dinner gathering.

state.今日运动: Core training (plank, bird-dog) for approximately 20 minutes, completed in two sets.

2025-06.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for rest and preparation. Lu Mingqiang maintains friendships online, makes material preparations offline for the upcoming systematic study, and organizes and archives recent reflections. Everything is building momentum for the new phase, with a regular sleep schedule.

events.name: Share photos of the gathering in the WeChat group
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang posted several photos from last night's gathering in a small WeChat group consisting only of himself, Chen Jianguo, and Zhao Qiang. He added a caption: "The fish was fresh, the wine was strong. Thanks, Brother Jianguo, for the fish!" Chen Jianguo quickly replied with a grinning emoji, while Zhao Qiang said, "Thank you, Brother Mingqiang and Brother Jianguo. Next time, it's my treat." This simple interaction extended the warmth of the gathering.

events.name: Prepare the study notebook
events.description: Lu Mingqiang took out two brand-new hardcover notebooks. He affixed a label reading "Theory & Standards" to the cover of the first one, planning to record key learning points, important formulas, and standard provisions. On the cover of the second notebook, he attached a label titled "Mistakes & Difficulties," specifically intended for organizing errors from practice exercises and knowledge points that were hard to understand. He enjoyed this kind of orderly beginning.

events.name: Organize entrepreneurial idea notes
events.description: He gathered all his entrepreneurial ideas, research information, cost estimates, and family opinions, which were scattered across his phone memos, computer Excel spreadsheets, and random notes on paper, and briefly recorded them in the back section of an old notebook. At the end, he wrote: "June 2025, postponed after thorough consideration. Requires a more detailed business plan, more precise positioning, and sufficient funding. To be revisited when conditions are ripe in the future." Then, he placed the notebook in the corner of his bookshelf.

events.name: Accompany the child in completing the craft assignment
events.description: In the afternoon, the eldest son, Lu Zixuan, needed to complete a handicraft assignment on an environmental protection theme. Lu Mingqiang helped his son collect plastic water bottles and cardboard boxes, guiding him to use glue and scissors to create a simple "sorting trash bin." Although the final product was not particularly exquisite, the process of collaboration between father and son was filled with joy.

events.name: Due to weekend rest, light running is performed in the evening.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang went for a light 3-kilometer jog at Baishamen Park to maintain his exercise routine while keeping the intensity low to avoid fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the weekend morning

结束状态.心情: Ready and looking forward to the new week of learning, relaxed after exercise.

state.今日运动: Light jogging for 3 kilometers, park trail

2025-06.daily_overview: On the last day of June, Lu Mingqiang officially announced his exam preparation plan to his family and received their full support. This meant that his daily routine would undergo a clear change from that day onward, with evenings increasingly dedicated to studying, and the family collectively working to create a quiet environment for him. The state strictly aligns with the conclusion of the health status.

events.name: Announcement of Study Plan to Seek Support
events.description: During the Sunday family dinner, Lu Mingqiang solemnly said to his wife and two children, "Dad needs to prepare for a very important technical exam over the next few months, so I'll need more time in the evenings and on weekends to study. Mom will have to work a bit harder to take care of you. Xuanxuan, you need to be more self-disciplined in completing your homework, and Hanhan, you must listen to Mom and your brother. Let's work hard together, okay?" Wang Lijuan immediately expressed her support, "Focus on your studies, I’ll take care of things at home." The two children also nodded understandingly. At that moment, the family became his solid support in his pursuit of progress.

events.name: Received salary
events.description: Today is the company's payday. Lu Mingqiang received a bank deposit notification on his phone. He glanced at the amount, calculating in his mind how much to save this month and how much to set aside for household expenses, car loan payments, and other fixed expenditures.

events.name: Execute the Evening Study Plan on the First Day
events.description: At 9 p.m., Lu Mingqiang sat down at his desk on time, opened the newly purchased *Fundamental Theory of Electrical Engineering* and the notebook labeled "Theory & Standards." Following the schedule posted on the wall, he began studying the first chapter, "Basic Concepts and Laws of Electric Circuits." He read slowly, copying down important concepts and formulas as he went. When he encountered a calculation example he didn’t fully understand, he reviewed it several times and marked it in his "Mistakes and Difficulties" notebook. The hour and a half of study time passed quickly.

events.name: Due to study schedule, sleep time is adjusted regularly.
events.description: After finishing his studies, Lu Mingqiang went to bed on time to ensure he would be energetic the next day, reflecting the regular sleep pattern of a healthy state.

起始状态.心情: Solemnly, ready to embark on a new stage.

结束状态.心情: Calm and resolute, I have taken the substantive first step in my exam preparation plan, with the support of my family serving as motivation.

state.今日运动: None, full-day heavy physical labor

2025-07.daily_overview: On weekdays, after completing his daily electrical maintenance work, Lu Mingqiang engages in swimming exercises in the evening and devotes time to his personal development plan: he is seriously contemplating entrepreneurial ideas for the first time and making detailed preparations for the advanced technician certification exam as well as crafting traditional kites. His eldest son, Lu Zixuan, has started his summer vacation, leading to increased family interactions in the evenings.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Wake up at 6:30 in the morning, wash up and have a simple meal, then ride an electric bike to the company located at No. 28 Haisheng Road, Xiuying District for work at 7:30. During the day, complete the scheduled tasks of electrical machinery installation and maintenance. At noon, have a simple lunch with fellow worker Chen Jianguo near the construction site.

events.name: Regular Swimming
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang went to the community swimming pool near his home. Following his Tuesday routine, he swam for 40 minutes, focusing on technical details and breathing rhythm to relieve work fatigue and maintain physical fitness.

events.name: Developing entrepreneurial ideas
events.description: After swimming home, he browsed industry forums in his study and came across some cases of skilled workers starting their own businesses. Combining his years of experience with his vision of "having his own repair workshop in the next 10 years," he formally conceived the idea of starting a personal studio for the first time. He took out his work logbook and meticulously recorded the motivation, potential directions, and initial concerns of the idea.

events.name: Search for kite making materials
events.description: Afterwards, he searched online for detailed tutorials on making large sand swallow kites, structural diagrams, and skeleton tying techniques, saving useful graphic and textual materials to his phone in preparation for the weekend handicraft activity.

events.name: Develop a study plan
events.description: To achieve the goal of [obtaining the Senior Electrician Technician Certificate within three years], Lu Mingqiang developed a detailed three-week theoretical study plan based on textbooks and online courses. He allocated the content of [Electrical Theory] and [New Technical Standards] to each weekday evening and weekend, and clearly defined daily learning objectives.

events.name: Develop a Practical Training Plan
events.description: Meanwhile, based on the examination syllabus and his own weak areas, he developed a specialized practical skills training plan lasting over three months in his work logbook. The plan clearly outlined key practice items and their schedules, such as troubleshooting distribution system faults and wiring secondary circuits.

events.name: Family Evening Time
events.description: After dinner, I discussed the day's work and the children's summer vacation arrangements with my wife Wang Lijuan, assisted my eldest son Lu Zixuan with his homework, and put my younger son Lu Zihan to bed. I rested at approximately 22:30.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to start the day's work.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled, looking forward to personal planning.

state.今日运动: Swim for 40 minutes

2025-07.daily_overview: On weekdays, Lu Mingqiang is occupied with electrical installation tasks during the day. During his lunch break, he takes time to purchase materials for kite-making over the weekend. In the evenings, he continues researching entrepreneurial procedures and follows his routine of playing squash to relieve stress, while also trying out new core training exercises.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Get up at 6:30 in the morning and arrive at the post by 7:30 to participate in the distribution box installation project of a commercial building in Xiuying District. During work breaks, discuss technical details with fellow workers. Due to the heavy workload, have a quick lunch at the construction site.

events.name: Procurement of Kite Materials
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang rode an electric bike to the traditional handicraft material store on Bo'ai South Road in Haikou City. Based on information he had previously gathered, he carefully selected flexible bamboo strips, specially made silk paper, high-strength nylon thread, adhesive, and traditional pigments such as red, black, and blue.

events.name: Research on Business Startup Procedures
events.description: After getting off work in the evening, he concentrated on searching online at home for the procedures to establish a personal studio or individual business in Haikou City, including the processes for business license registration, tax registration, and other formalities, as well as the special qualifications required for the electrical maintenance industry. He focused on reviewing information from the local government service platform and took brief notes.

events.name: Squash Exercise and Core Training
events.description: As per his Wednesday evening routine, Lu Mingqiang went to the squash club and engaged in an intense match with his friend Lin Feng. After the game, he attempted to incorporate core training exercises such as planks for ten minutes to enhance lumbar stability and sought advice on techniques from Lin Feng.

起始状态.心情: Stay alert and ready to handle daily tasks.

结束状态.心情: Relax, feeling refreshed in body and mind after exercise.

state.今日运动: 1 hour of squash, 10 minutes of core training.

2025-07.daily_overview: The thunderstorm weather brought inconvenience to outdoor work. During the day, Lu Mingqiang handled indoor maintenance tasks. In the evening, he canceled swimming due to the rain and instead deepened his market research for entrepreneurship. He also cleared the workspace for kite making and began studying the advanced technician course.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Due to thunderstorms in the morning, the scheduled outdoor cable laying task was adjusted to indoor power distribution cabinet maintenance. Lu Mingqiang and his partner Chen Jianguo worked inside the customer's factory building, had their own packed lunch in the break room at noon, and discussed the impact of weather on their work.

events.name: Discussing entrepreneurial ideas with colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang discussed his idea of opening a repair workshop with his closest coworker Chen Jianguo in the break room, asking for his views on the local market and the challenges of working independently. Based on his experience, Chen Jianguo offered practical advice and also mentioned some troubles encountered by peers who had gone solo.

events.name: Continue entrepreneurship research
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang continued to browse the internet to investigate the market demand for local electrical repair and home appliance maintenance, the competitive landscape among peers, and the pricing standards. He also researched potential risks associated with small-scale entrepreneurship, such as unstable customer sources and financial pressures, and took brief notes.

events.name: Prepare the Kite Workbench
events.description: After dinner, he cleared a space in one corner of the living room, moved aside the coffee table and miscellaneous items, laid out old newspapers and plastic sheets, and prepared tools such as scissors, utility knives, rulers, and sandpaper to create a tidy workbench for making a kite.

events.name: Commence theoretical study
events.description: Subsequently, Lu Mingqiang watched the online course video for Chapter 1 of [Electrical Engineering Theory], studying the basic concepts of circuits and Ohm's Law, and diligently recorded formulas and key points in his notebook. Due to the rain, swimming was canceled, which left him feeling somewhat dull.

起始状态.心情: Focus, adjust work plans according to weather conditions.

结束状态.心情: Steadfast, with progress in learning but a slight sense of regret.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Friday, a workday, Lu Mingqiang efficiently completed his tasks for the week. In the evening, he had a preliminary discussion with his wife about his entrepreneurial ideas and sketched a design for a kite. However, due to unexpected overtime to address a minor technical issue, he went to bed slightly later than usual.

events.name: Wrapping Up Daily Work
events.description: Completed the circuit renovation project for a shop in Xiuying District, and reported this week's work to Team Leader Zhang. Before leaving work, inspected the tools to prepare for next week's summer power supply maintenance project.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle malfunctions
events.description: While leaving work in the evening, Lu Mingqiang received a call from a client reporting a minor malfunction. He promptly returned to the site, spent 20 minutes troubleshooting and fixing the issue, ensuring the equipment operated normally. This demonstrated his strong sense of responsibility.

events.name: Conceptualize Studio Positioning
events.description: After returning home in the evening, based on the research conducted in the previous days, Lu Mingqiang initially conceived the positioning of the studio: focusing on electrical fault diagnosis and repair for households and small shops, while also handling simple home appliance installations. He briefly explained his idea to his wife, Wang Lijuan, seeking preliminary feedback and discussing the potential impact on their family life. His wife expressed support but reminded him to carefully assess the risks.

events.name: Draw a kite sketch
events.description: Afterward, he referred to the blueprint on his phone and sketched a preliminary design draft of a large swallow kite on paper. He determined key dimensions such as the wingspan and body length, marked the positions of the main frame and cross frame, and contemplated how to ensure balance and sturdiness.

events.name: Family Relaxation
events.description: Watched a TV program with my wife, discussed our child's summer vacation arrangements, and planned a weekend family gathering at our parents' home. Due to fatigue from overtime work, I went to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend

结束状态.心情: Warm, with smooth family communication but slightly fatigued.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Sunday, a day off, Lu Mingqiang and his family drove their new car to his parents' home in Meilan District for a family gathering, enjoying their time together. Meanwhile, he had scheduled a car maintenance appointment and began preparing materials for kite-making. Due to the slightly excessive food consumption during the gathering, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Family Dinner
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and his family drove their private car to his parents' home in Meilan District. His parents had prepared a sumptuous meal including Hainanese chicken rice and other home-cooked dishes. During the meal, everyone chatted about work, children, and education in a warm atmosphere. His father, Lu Jianguo, also inquired about Lu Mingqiang's work situation, and Lu Mingqiang enjoyed some extra servings of the delicious food.

events.name: Schedule Vehicle Maintenance
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang checked the mileage of his family car and found that it was approaching the maintenance interval. He then contacted his acquaintance Chen Jie, an auto repair technician, via WeChat to schedule a vehicle maintenance appointment for July 7th.

events.name: Prepare kite materials
events.description: After dinner, he spread newspapers on the living room floor and neatly arranged the pre-purchased materials and tools such as bamboo strips, cotton thread, alcohol lamps, and pliers. He then rewatched the kite-making tutorial video saved on his phone to familiarize himself with the steps for tying the frame.

events.name: Learning of a relative's visit
events.description: Mother Wang Xiuying called to inform that the younger aunt (mother's younger sister) will return from abroad to visit relatives and plans to have a family dinner on the evening of July 13. Lu Mingqiang expressed that he would arrange time to attend and began considering gift preparations.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, looking forward to the family gathering.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, with harmonious family relationships.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Sunday, with intermittent showers, Lu Mingqiang proceeded with the scheduled vehicle maintenance as planned. During the maintenance interval, he learned simple self-inspection methods from Chen Jie. In the afternoon, after returning home, he began formally constructing the kite frame. However, due to the time-consuming maintenance, he went to bed slightly later than usual.

events.name: Vehicle Maintenance
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang drove his personal car to the [Swift Auto Service Center] located in the Meilan District. His friend Chen Jie performed routine maintenance on the vehicle, including an oil change and oil filter replacement, and inspected key components such as the tires and brakes. The entire process went smoothly and was reasonably priced.

events.name: Learn Vehicle Self-Inspection
events.description: During the maintenance interval, Chen Jie explained and demonstrated some simple daily vehicle self-inspection methods to Lu Mingqiang, such as checking tire pressure, oil dipstick, and coolant, to help him better maintain his family assets.

events.name: Maintenance completed
events.description: After the maintenance was completed, Chen Jie explained the specific items and the vehicle's condition. Lu Mingqiang confirmed the details were correct and paid the fee via mobile payment. After a brief exchange of pleasantries, the two bid farewell. The discussion on maintenance details had taken a slightly longer time.

events.name: Set maintenance reminders
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang set a reminder on his phone calendar for the estimated mileage and time of the next maintenance, based on the current service mileage and Chen Jie's suggestion.

events.name: Begin making the kite frame.
events.description: In the afternoon, he lit the alcohol lamp and carefully heated the bamboo strips evenly over the flame. Once they softened, he bent them into the required arcs for the main body of the swallow kite according to the design blueprint, using a damp cloth to cool and set the shape. This process was repeated multiple times to ensure the precision of the curves.

events.name: Family Communication
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang mentioned the vehicle maintenance status and costs to his wife, reassuring the family about their financial situation, and they discussed plans for the following week.

起始状态.心情: The plan is clear

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment, with smooth progress in craftsmanship.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Monday, a workday, Lu Mingqiang handled routine power maintenance tasks during the day. In the evening, he continued with kite-making, completing the binding of the frame. He also found time to study electrical theory. However, due to work fatigue, his weight slightly decreased.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Resuming the work pace, participating in the preliminary preparations for the company's new summer power supply guarantee project, and inspecting and maintaining some commercial power distribution facilities in Xiuying District, with a relatively heavy workload.

events.name: Tying the Kite Frame
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang placed the pre-bent longitudinal main bamboo strips and transverse support strips in a cross pattern, tightly binding them together using water-soaked cotton thread in a crisscross method. He bound them meticulously, ensuring the joints were secure and flush. After completing the binding, he checked the stability of the framework and used a ruler to measure the diagonals to ensure symmetry.

events.name: Theoretical Learning
events.description: During the break from tying, he took the opportunity to watch an online course segment on Chapter 2 of [Electrical Engineering Theory], reviewing the basics of alternating current. However, due to fatigue, his learning efficiency was average.

起始状态.心情: Focus, get into work mode

结束状态.心情: Patience, enjoying the craftsmanship process yet feeling slightly fatigued.

2025-07.daily_overview: Thunderstorm weather triggered an emergency repair task. As a technical backbone, Lu Mingqiang, along with his colleague Chen Jianguo, efficiently handled a power outage in an old residential area, demonstrating solid skills and emergency response capabilities. They worked late into the night, and Lu's weight dropped due to exhaustion.

events.name: Emergency Repair Task
events.description: While working in the morning, Lu Mingqiang received an urgent call from his team leader, Team Leader Zhang, notifying him that an old residential area in Longhua District had experienced a power outage of unknown cause due to thunderstorms. He quickly gathered his tools, met up with his partner Chen Jianguo, and drove an engineering vehicle to the scene.

events.name: On-site Investigation and Diagnosis
events.description: Upon arrival, under the guidance of Property Manager Wang, they carefully inspected the site using tools such as a multimeter and determined that the main line had short-circuited due to insulation damage from aging. After discussing with Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo decided to replace a section of the aging cable and reported the plan to Team Leader Zhang.

events.name: Repair completed
events.description: After the company urgently delivered the materials, the two workers cut off the power supply under safe conditions, removed the old cables, laid and connected the new ones. Working in seamless coordination, they efficiently completed the replacement. Subsequently, an insulation test was conducted, and the power was successfully restored by closing the circuit breaker.

events.name: Wrapping Up and Reporting
events.description: After cleaning the site, explain the precautions to Property Manager Wang and complete the maintenance record. Return to the company to provide an oral report to Team Leader Zhang, and return the cleaning tools to their designated places. By this time, it was already past the normal off-duty hours. Due to the urgency of the task, the swimming exercise was missed.

events.name: Rest after returning late
events.description: I arrived home by electric vehicle at nearly 9:30 p.m. After a simple meal, I shared my emergency repair experience with my wife, then took a shower and rested. Due to fatigue from staying up late, my bedtime was delayed.

起始状态.心情: Stay alert, be prepared to handle daily tasks.

结束状态.心情: Tired but satisfied, with an enhanced sense of professional value.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Wednesday, a workday, Lu Mingqiang was officially appointed as a technical core member of the summer power supply project, taking on increased responsibilities. During his evening squash training, he tried new core strengthening techniques to prevent lower back injuries, but his mood fluctuated slightly due to work-related stress.

events.name: Served as a project backbone
events.description: In the morning, Squad Leader Zhang officially appointed Lu Mingqiang as the technical backbone of the Xiuying District commercial area support team. He provided a detailed explanation of the project background, support area, and time requirements, and assigned Lu Mingqiang to lead workers such as Zhao Qiang. Lu Mingqiang collected the project materials and special inspection equipment, clarified responsibilities with the team members, and felt increasing pressure.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: In the afternoon, the team conducted the first special inspection of the assigned area, using an infrared thermometer to examine power distribution equipment and record basic data, which was a demanding task.

events.name: Squash and Core Training
events.description: As per the usual routine, I went to the squash club in the evening and played against Lin Feng. He attempted to apply the core strength training techniques he saw online last week, incorporating plank exercises during warm-up and rest intervals to enhance lumbar stability and prevent old injuries. I felt more stable in my footwork and exchanged fitness insights with Lin Feng, experiencing emotional relief after the exercise.

起始状态.心情: Responsible, embracing new challenges with a hint of nervousness.

结束状态.心情: Positive, energy recovery after exercise

2025-07.daily_overview: On weekdays, Lu Mingqiang conducts special power protection inspections during the day, while multitasking in the evenings: making kite wings, celebrating his wife's award, learning about insurance, and repairing his son's toys, demonstrating his ability to balance work and family life, though he indulged slightly more in celebratory meals.

events.name: Special Patrol for Power Supply Security
events.description: The team continued conducting special inspections of the power supply equipment in the commercial district of Xiuying District, monitored the load conditions using a temperature measuring instrument, and found no abnormalities. The work proceeded smoothly.

events.name: Making Kite Wings
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang repeated the steps of baking and bending to create two pairs of symmetrical wing frame bamboo strips. He then bound them to both sides of the main frame, adjusted the dihedral angle, and secured them with cotton thread, repeatedly comparing to ensure symmetry between the left and right sides.

events.name: News of Wife's Award
events.description: Wife Wang Lijuan returned home from work and excitedly showed the family that she had received a joint commendation from clients for her high-quality housekeeping services. She was awarded the "Community Service Star" honorary certificate and a bonus by the community housekeeping service center. The whole family was proud of her, and they added extra dishes to dinner to celebrate.

events.name: Understanding Supplemental Medical Insurance
events.description: Seizing this opportunity, Lu Mingqiang conducted a preliminary online search via his mobile phone regarding the necessity, costs, and coverage of purchasing supplementary medical insurance for domestic service personnel, in preparation for household risk management.

events.name: Morning Run Appointment
events.description: Arranged a morning run with my running friend Chen Bin this Saturday at Baishamen Park via WeChat, confirming the specific time and location to maintain the exercise routine.

events.name: Repairing Toy Cars
events.description: The youngest son, Lu Zihan, sought help with a non-functioning electric toy car. Lu Mingqiang took out his toolbox, spread newspapers on the living room floor, opened the car’s casing, and used a multimeter to troubleshoot. He discovered a loose solder joint on a power wire. After re-soldering the connection and applying lubricating oil, he successfully repaired the toy car. His son happily resumed playing with it, and his wife smiled with relief.

起始状态.心情: Steady, start the day's work.

结束状态.心情: Gratifying, with a warm family and a wife who is well-regarded.

2025-07.daily_overview: On a Friday workday, Lu Mingqiang confirmed the weekend family dinner arrangements. After work, he visited his parents and discussed technical issues with his mentor. The warmth of family bonds and the master-apprentice relationship enriched his evening, but the gathering's food led to a weight gain.

events.name: Routine Work and Special Inspections
events.description: Completed this week's special power supply inspection task. All data is normal. Reported the progress to Team Leader Zhang. The work has concluded smoothly.

events.name: Confirm Family Dinner
events.description: After discussing with his wife, he decided that the whole family would attend the dinner for his sister-in-law's family visit on the evening of the 13th. He confirmed through his mother and inquired about the restaurant location and time.

events.name: Prepare items for morning running.
events.description: In the evening, I found my running gear and shoes, checked the battery level of my sports watch, and prepared for the morning run the next day, but due to fatigue, my enthusiasm for exercise was somewhat lacking.

events.name: Visiting Parents
events.description: After work, I went to the fruit store to buy fresh local fruits, then met up with my wife and children downstairs at my parents' home. The family enjoyed the Hainanese chicken rice prepared by my mother, while my father inquired about his power supply project and shared his experiences. The atmosphere was warm, and we ate quite a lot.

events.name: Visiting the Master
events.description: After leaving his parents' home, he went alone to the residence of his master, Master Li, who lived in the same residential complex. He presented some fruits, and the master and apprentice drank tea while chatting. Master Li inquired about his progress in the advanced technician course, emphasizing the importance of integrating theory with practice. Lu Mingqiang then sought advice on several confusions he had encountered in his recent work.

events.name: Return Home Exchange
events.description: On the drive home, I shared with my wife the insights gained from conversations with my father and mentor. Reflecting on the importance of support from elders, I considered how to apply these lessons to my work and professional certification studies. I went to bed slightly later than usual.

起始状态.心情: Plan weekend arrangements

结束状态.心情: Enriching, with gains in both family bonding and technical exchange.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Sunday morning, the showers paused briefly, allowing Lu Mingqiang to go for a morning run with friends to relax. During the day, he prepared Hainan specialty gifts for his aunt. During a special patrol, he successfully predicted and addressed an overheating issue with a transformer, demonstrating the sharp insight of a technical expert. His weight remained stable after exercising.

events.name: Morning Run
events.description: Woke up at 6:00 in the morning and drove an electric vehicle to Baishamen Park to meet Chen Bin after the rain stopped. The two jogged along the trail, chatting about work, family, and running experiences while enjoying the fresh air and the pleasure of exercise. They ran approximately 5 kilometers.

events.name: Breakfast Exchange
events.description: After the run, we had Hainan noodles and chilled soy milk at a nearby breakfast shop, continuing to chat and relax before saying goodbye and returning home.

events.name: Preparing Gifts for Visiting Relatives
events.description: In the morning, after discussing with my wife, I went to the market and purchased premium Xinglong coffee and coconut candy as Hainan specialty souvenirs for my sister-in-law who is returning to her home country.

events.name: Addressing Transformer Potential Hazards
events.description: In the afternoon, due to the requirements of the power supply guarantee project, Lu Mingqiang led his team to conduct a special inspection. Using an infrared thermometer, they detected an abnormally high temperature at a connection point of the main transformer in a shopping mall, which was approaching the safety threshold. He concluded that this was caused by a sudden surge in load and immediately reported it to Team Leader Zhang. He then coordinated with the electrician from the client unit to perform an emergency tightening operation during the low electricity consumption period (late at night). This successfully eliminated the overheating risk and prevented a potential power outage.

起始状态.心情: Refreshing, looking forward to the morning run.

结束状态.心情: Proud, with remarkable work achievements

2025-07.daily_overview: On Sunday, his day off, Lu Mingqiang spent the daytime refining the kite frame. In the evening, he gathered with his entire family, including his parents and aunt, for a meal, which strengthened their familial bonds and allowed them to enjoy warm, quality time together. However, due to the late-night dinner and the food consumed, he gained some weight.

events.name: Improve the Kite Frame
events.description: In the morning, he continued crafting the short bamboo strips needed to support the head and tail of the swallow kite. He carefully heated these delicate components to create subtle curves, then secured them to the corresponding positions on the main frame, shaping the three-dimensional contours of the head and tail. The progress proceeded smoothly.

events.name: Family Dinner
events.description: In the evening, I took my wife and two children to dine with my parents and aunt at a local specialty restaurant in Haikou. My aunt shared her experiences of living abroad, while Lu Mingqiang introduced his work and family situation. Although there was initial awkwardness from not having seen each other for many years, the bond of blood gradually warmed the atmosphere, making it harmonious, and the meal was abundant.

events.name: Gift Giving and Farewell
events.description: After the dinner gathering, Lu Mingqiang and his family escorted his aunt and parents back to their residence. Upon parting, he presented his aunt with the prepared Xinglong coffee and coconut candy, agreeing to keep in touch. His aunt encouraged him to work diligently and take good care of his family.

起始状态.心情: Relax and prepare for the family gathering

结束状态.心情: Warm and full of family affection

In the evening, he inspected the balance of the kite frame and systematically reviewed advanced technician course materials, gradually entering a state of focused learning. His weight slightly decreased due to the previous day's gathering.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Participated in the company's new distribution box replacement project, guided apprentice Zhao Qiang in practical operation techniques, and ensured stable work progress.

events.name: Check the kite frame
events.description: After work, he hung up the initially completed kite frame to observe its balance and symmetry from various angles. He suspended the frame from its central point using a fine thread to check for levelness, and used a small knife and sandpaper to adjust any uneven binding points or bamboo splinter burrs, ensuring perfection.

events.name: Theoretical Learning and Review
events.description: In the evening, study Chapter 2 of [Electrical Engineering Theory] on alternating current and three-phase circuits, read the textbook, and complete the exercises. Subsequently, conduct a systematic review of the theories and new standards learned in the previous two weeks, organize notes, and list difficult points for future inquiries, ensuring high learning efficiency.

events.name: Review safety procedures
events.description: Focus on reviewing electrical safety operation procedures and case studies of accidents. Understand and memorize them by integrating with your own work experience, and contemplate how to apply them in complex operations.

events.name: Family Casual Conversation
events.description: While chatting with his wife about last night's family gathering, he expressed his feelings about how time flies and how precious family bonds are. They looked through the photos from the gathering and planned to share them with their family members. They went to bed at their usual time.

起始状态.心情: Returning to the work rhythm

结束状态.心情: Focus, and learning yields results.

2025-07.daily_overview: On Tuesday, a workday, Lu Mingqiang visited a master craftsman during the day to learn entrepreneurial lessons, and in the afternoon, he completed the reinforcement of the kite frame. In the evening, he celebrated his wife's award and engaged in an in-depth discussion with her about family insurance and the monthly financial review, reflecting practical family financial management. He also resumed his exercise routine, strictly adhering to the conclusion of his health recovery phase.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: Completed the electrical circuit upgrade for a small commercial shop in Xiuying District this morning, with the work proceeding smoothly.

events.name: Visiting a Master Craftsman to Seek Guidance
events.description: During the lunch break, I made a special visit to Zhang Jianguo, a senior master craftsman in the company who had previously attempted to start his own business before returning. At a tea shop, I listened to his experiences and lessons learned from his failed entrepreneurial venture, focusing on understanding the significant challenges he faced in the early stages of independent operation, such as customer resources, financial pressure, and personal energy constraints. This gave him a clearer understanding of the risks associated with entrepreneurship, leading him to decide to postpone his plans for the time being.

events.name: Regular Swimming
events.description: After work, go to the community swimming pool for a 40-minute swim, focusing on stretching and relaxation to alleviate work fatigue and maintain an exercise routine.

events.name: Complete the kite frame
events.description: After returning home from swimming, the frame shape was finally confirmed to be correct. White latex glue was reapplied to all critical binding points for reinforcement. Once the glue had dried, gentle pressure was applied to check for firmness. At this point, a structurally solid and accurately shaped large swallow kite frame was completed, ready for the next step of covering the surface.

events.name: Core Training
events.description: After dinner, perform a 10-minute home core workout, including planks and bird-dog exercises, with a focus on proper form to prevent lower back injuries.

events.name: Celebrating My Wife's Award
events.description: To celebrate Wang Lijuan being awarded the "Community Service Star," Lu Mingqiang helped prepare a more sumptuous dinner than usual. The whole family gathered around the table in a warm and joyful atmosphere, sharing in the happiness of the wife's achievement.

events.name: Discussing Home Insurance
events.description: After dinner, I had a detailed discussion with my wife about family health risks, particularly the potential accidents or health issues she might face due to her work as a domestic helper. We preliminarily determined the budget for purchasing supplementary medical insurance and identified the core coverage needs.

events.name: Monthly Household Income and Expenditure Review
events.description: Subsequently, Lu Mingqiang and his wife conducted a monthly review of their household income and expenses, verifying this month's salary income, daily expenditures, his wife's bonus, and savings status to ensure the family's financial stability and to plan the budget for the next month.

起始状态.心情: Consider Career and Family Planning

结束状态.心情: Pragmatic, with clear family finances and marital unity.

2025-07.daily_overview: As a day in a busy workweek, Lu Mingqiang spent the daytime wrapping up the commercial power supply project in Xiuying District. In the evening at home, he demonstrated a pragmatic and forward-thinking side, organizing his market research notes for entrepreneurship while preparing for weekend family activities. At the same time, a physical signal during a squash workout prompted his attention to occupational health management.

events.name: Complete the final report on the power supply guarantee project.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang submitted all the compiled special inspection records, temperature measurement data, and hidden danger handling reports to Team Leader Zhang and the company's Engineering Department. During the team meeting, he provided a concise summary of the overall situation of this support work, focusing on sharing practical experience in quickly locating and handling the overheating hazard of a transformer under extreme weather conditions, which earned recognition from his colleagues.

events.name: Organizing entrepreneurial market research notes during the lunch break
events.description: During the brief break after lunch, Lu Mingqiang took out his notebook in the construction site's rest area. He organized the information he had collected about Haikou's local power maintenance market from online searches and casual conversations with colleagues, systematically listing the strengths and weaknesses of starting his own business.

events.name: Received the award sharing from my wife.
events.description: While working in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang received a WeChat message from his wife, Wang Lijuan, informing him that she had shared the good news of his being awarded the "Community Service Star" with family and friends, and had forwarded their congratulations. He quickly replied with a thumbs-up emoji, feeling happy for his wife.

events.name: Prepare kite materials after work.
events.description: After returning home from work, Lu Mingqiang used the time before dinner to inspect the kite he would need for the weekend in his study. He then took out the frame of the large swallow-shaped kite he was working on, carefully cut the specially made white silk paper to the required dimensions, and prepared a paste of moderate consistency.

events.name: Squash Exercise and Seeking Advice on Waist Protection
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang went to the squash club as usual for his weekly workout. During the warm-up, he felt a slight soreness and stiffness in his lower back, so he proactively reduced the intensity of his play, focusing more on technique practice. During a break, he asked his fellow player Lin Feng for advice on how to improve his movements to reduce strain on his lower back. After the workout, he performed an extended stretching session.

events.name: Cook Mung Bean Soup to Relieve Summer Heat
events.description: After returning home from exercise, Lu Mingqiang felt parched with a dry mouth. He cooked a pot of mung bean soup using the household's regular stock of mung beans and rock sugar, then chilled it in the refrigerator.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to face the daily routine.

结束状态.心情: Enriched and slightly contemplative, beginning to pay attention to lumbar health.

state.今日运动: One hour of squash training, focusing on skill practice and stretching.
