2025-07.daily_overview: Work has returned to the routine of inspection and maintenance. Lu Mingqiang's reflections on entrepreneurship have entered a more pragmatic phase. He not only exchanges views with trusted colleagues but also actively seeks advice from experienced mentors on technical and managerial challenges. He understands that dreams require a solid foundation.

events.name: Complete daily line inspection tasks
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang partnered with his colleague Chen Jianguo to conduct routine safety inspections and basic maintenance on the electrical lines in two old residential communities in Meilan District, Haikou City, replacing several aging air switches.

events.name: Handling Emergency Repair Tasks
events.description: In the afternoon, an urgent repair call was received regarding a power outage in a certain residential area. Lu Mingqiang had to work an extra hour to go and handle the situation. He quickly identified and fixed the fault, which resulted in a delayed end to his workday.

events.name: Drinking Laoba Tea with Colleagues While Discussing Entrepreneurship
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang invited his fellow worker Chen Jianguo to a casual gathering at their usual Dad's Tea Shop near the construction site. He discussed the current state of the maintenance industry in Haikou, seeking his old friend's views and suggestions. Their conversation was practical and grounded.

events.name: Consult the master on theoretical difficulties
events.description: While studying electrical engineering theory at home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang encountered several complex circuit analyses and difficult-to-understand clauses in the updated safety regulations. He then called his retired master, Master Li, for guidance and received clear explanations.

events.name: Consultation on Studio Design Issues
events.description: After consulting on theoretical issues, Lu Mingqiang sent a simple sketch of the lighting circuit renovation for the maintenance workshop to Master Li via WeChat, and then visited his master's home in person to seek advice, ultimately obtaining practical renovation suggestions.

events.name: Browse the wine bottle collection forum
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang habitually browsed the internet on his phone, entering the bottle collection enthusiasts' forum he frequently visited. He looked through the new collections and transaction information shared by fellow enthusiasts to relax.

起始状态.心情: Focus, plan to consult the master with questions.

结束状态.心情: I have benefited greatly and gained a clearer understanding of technology and entrepreneurship.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise regimen; daily work involves physical labor.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny to cloudy, with a light breeze in the evening.

2025-07.daily_overview: Friday serves as a prelude to harvest and relaxation. Professionally, Lu Mingqiang's dedicated efforts received formal recognition at work; at home, he meticulously prepared for weekend parent-child activities; and in his personal hobbies, there was an unexpected surprise. On this day, he seamlessly transitioned between different roles, leading a fulfilling and hopeful life.

events.name: Complete the weekly work summary and equipment inventory
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang assisted Team Leader Zhang in summarizing this week's work within the team, and he also inventoried and maintained the commonly used tools and equipment to prepare for next week's tasks.

events.name: Objectively assess one's own capabilities
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang sat alone under the shade of a tree, silently assessing his core technical capabilities and knowledge gaps in his mind, drawing on his years of experience in electrical machinery installation and repair.

events.name: Received customer thank-you letter and leadership commendation.
events.description: In the afternoon, the company leadership read aloud a written letter of appreciation from the property management of a commercial plaza in Xiuying District during the morning meeting. The letter specifically commended Lu Mingqiang for his outstanding performance and responsible attitude in the power supply project. Amid the applause of his fellow workers, Lu Mingqiang felt somewhat embarrassed.

events.name: Celebrate with colleagues and plan mentorship case studies
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang and his coworker Chen Jianguo met up as planned at their usual street food stall. They ordered grilled fish and beer, reflecting on the high-intensity yet highly rewarding task. Lu Mingqiang planned to compile the experience into case studies to guide new apprentices.

events.name: Preparing for Weekend Family Activities
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang inspected and organized the kite to be used over the weekend, reminded his wife to prepare the picnic mat, and packed drinking water and some simple snacks into his backpack.

events.name: Discovering Rare Wine Bottles
events.description: While scrolling through his phone before bed, Lu Mingqiang came across a well-preserved 1980s Haikou Daqu ceramic wine bottle on a local second-hand trading platform. This was exactly the style he had been searching for on his collection list, so he decided to contact the seller the next day.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, wrapping up work.

结束状态.心情: Joyful and excited, there is both the satisfaction of having one's work recognized and the delight of discovering a coveted collection.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, gentle breeze, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-07.daily_overview: A typical Lu Mingqiang-style family day off. The whole family mobilized for a trip to Wanlv Park to enjoy quality parent-child time—flying kites, having a picnic, and sharing stories—simple yet filled with laughter. Along the way, they ran into a fellow sports enthusiast, and a brief exchange of greetings added a touch of social interaction to the family day.

events.name: Weekend Family Breakfast
events.description: On Saturday morning, the family woke up half an hour later than usual. Wang Lijuan, the wife, prepared a simple breakfast. The whole family gathered around the dining table, discussing the details of their upcoming trip to the park, while the children were filled with excitement.

events.name: Drive to Wanlv Park
events.description: A little after nine in the morning, Lu Mingqiang drove his family car, carrying his wife and two children, from their home in Longhua District to Wanlv Garden. The road was a bit congested, and the children excitedly chatted in the back seat.

events.name: Kite Flying Lesson on the Lawn
events.description: Upon arriving at Wanlü Park, Lu Mingqiang found an open grassy area. He skillfully assembled a traditional eagle-shaped kite and then, like a patient coach, taught the children basic skills such as judging wind direction and holding the line. The family took turns trying, with laughter echoing continuously.

events.name: Family Picnic and Storytelling Session
events.description: After the kite-flying activity concluded, the family rested on a picnic blanket under the shade of the trees. As they ate and chatted, Lu Mingqiang shared stories with the children about his childhood experiences of making kites, enjoying a relaxed and pleasant family time.

events.name: Bumping into Badminton Partner Lin Feng
events.description: At Wanlü Park, Lu Mingqiang ran into his squash friend Lin Feng, who was also taking a walk with his family. They exchanged a few brief greetings and chatted about recent sports activities and family life.

events.name: Return home after the event.
events.description: Around three o'clock in the afternoon, the event concluded. Lu Mingqiang and his wife packed up all the items, including the kite and picnic mat, and carefully checked that no trash was left on the grass. Then, the family drove back home.

events.name: Organizing Photos and Repairing Kites
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang carefully stored the kite away and noticed that the bridle of the small kite had some slight wear. He then fetched tools to perform a simple repair. Meanwhile, his wife Wang Lijuan organized and shared the photos taken during the day with their family.

events.name: An Evening Tipple
events.description: After the children fell asleep, Lu Mingqiang took out a bit of baijiu and sipped it with some peanuts, reminiscing about the pleasant family moments from the day. He then took out his phone again to look at the page of the wine bottle he had his eye on.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to Family Day

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, tired but happy.

state.今日运动: Outdoor kite flying and running, light activities for about 2 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny and hot, with intense ultraviolet radiation in the afternoon.

2025-07.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for personal adjustment and family care. Lu Mingqiang focuses on his own health through exercise and proactively extends this care to his family, making a refreshing summer beverage for them for the first time. From seeking advice to putting it into practice, this reflects his pragmatic and family-oriented character.

events.name: Regular squash workout
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang went to the squash club for his weekly solo training session. He places great emphasis on maintaining physical fitness and stroke rhythm, viewing it as essential preparation for physically demanding work and a way to relax both mind and body.

events.name: Seeking Advice from Lin Feng's System on Preventing Lower Back Injuries
events.description: After the workout, Lu Mingqiang proactively approached Lin Feng, who was also a fellow player and had experience as a fitness coach. He provided a detailed description of the discomfort in his lower back after recent work sessions and before exercise, and sought advice on scientific methods to prevent the recurrence of lower back injuries and strengthen core strength.

events.name: Learn Core Training Exercises at Home
events.description: Based on Lu Mingqiang's work requirements, Lin Feng conducted a live demonstration in the club's rest area and provided detailed explanations of several targeted and easily performable core training exercises suitable for home practice, such as dynamic planks, bird-dog exercises, and single-leg glute bridges. Lu Mingqiang recorded the key points using his mobile phone and attempted to practice the exercises on the spot.

events.name: Take the initiative to share household chores and suggest cooking barley water.
events.description: Returning home in the evening and seeing his wife Wang Lijuan busy in the kitchen, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to propose making barley water to relieve the summer heat, expressing his willingness to share household chores and show care for his family.

events.name: Procurement of ingredients for food preparation
events.description: Before dinner, Lu Mingqiang followed a simple tutorial he found on his phone, went downstairs to the vegetable market near the residential area, and bought an appropriate amount of Job's tears and a small packet of rock sugar.

events.name: First attempt at brewing barley water
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang tied on an apron and followed the tutorial steps in the kitchen, clumsily but earnestly rinsing the barley, measuring the water and rock sugar proportions, and carefully controlling the heat to simmer the mixture.

events.name: Chilling and Tasting
events.description: After the boiled barley water was chilled in the refrigerator, the whole family gathered around to taste it. Although it was not perfect for the first attempt and the sweetness was slightly mild, everyone found it refreshing and thirst-quenching, offering praise one after another. Lu Mingqiang felt satisfied and happy in his heart.

events.name: Help my wife tidy up the kitchen
events.description: After finishing the barley water, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to clean the bowls, chopsticks, and cooking pot, allowing his wife, who had been busy all day, to take a rest.

events.name: Interact and play with children
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang spent some time playing with building blocks on the living room floor with his two sons, listening to his eldest son share amusing stories from school.

events.name: Self-Check on Review and Exam Preparation Progress
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang followed his study plan and completed the learning of the final theoretical module for the week. He also conducted a self-assessment using the mock test questions included with the textbook, marking the incorrect answers for further review.

起始状态.心情: Leisure, planned exercise, and household affairs

结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment, satisfaction with health management and family interaction.

state.今日运动: Played squash for one hour and learned core training movements for approximately 20 minutes.

2025-07.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Lu Mingqiang adopted a more pragmatic mindset. He transformed his weekend reflections and observations into action, rationally analyzed the shortcomings in his entrepreneurial endeavors, actively planned for health management, and continued to advance his exam preparation and hobbies. The main threads of his life progressed steadily along the tracks of work and study.

events.name: Analyze one's own personality and market shortcomings
events.description: During his commute to work and lunch breaks, Lu Mingqiang continued to delve deeper into his entrepreneurial plan. He was acutely aware that his introverted and pragmatic personality made him less adept at expressing himself and actively promoting his ideas. With limited existing client resources and a lack of ability to independently develop the market, he felt somewhat discouraged.

events.name: Morning run plan canceled due to showers.
events.description: Originally planning to go for a morning run, Lu Mingqiang switched to core training at home due to morning showers, avoiding the inconvenience of outdoor exercise.

events.name: Form a preliminary self-assessment report
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang gathered in his study the scattered analyses and reflections on the market, his own capabilities, and personality from the past week or so, compiling them into a simple self-assessment and market analysis report in his notebook.

events.name: Organize Core Training Plan
events.description: Following Lin Feng's advice and the mobile phone recording, Lu Mingqiang opened a new page in his notebook and organized a simple, practical home-based core training plan suitable for himself, initially outlining a weekly training schedule.

events.name: Designing the Pattern for a Swallow Kite
events.description: Before dinner, Lu Mingqiang took out the already air-dried kite frame. Referring to the traditional swallow kite pattern saved on his phone, he lightly sketched the outline of the swallow's body, wing patterns, and decorative motifs on the stretched silk paper surface with a pencil.

events.name: Purchase a yoga mat
events.description: To make his core workouts more comfortable at home, Lu Mingqiang made a detour after work to a nearby sporting goods store and purchased a cost-effective basic yoga mat.

events.name: Study the General Provisions of the Safety Regulations
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang followed his study plan, carefully reading the general provisions, general safety requirements, and basic terminology definitions of the "Electrical Safety Regulations." He sought to understand the content in the context of practical scenarios and took notes accordingly.

起始状态.心情: Returning to the Calmness of a Working State

结束状态.心情: Rational and methodical, turning ideas into reality step by step.

state.今日运动: 15-Minute Home Core Training

2025-07.daily_overview: Rational analysis extended to a deeper level. Lu Mingqiang not only recognized the limitations of technology but also became aware of the gaps in management. He shared this weighty assessment with his closest partner, facing reality together. Meanwhile, health plans and personal interests progressed step by step, reflecting the multi-threaded balance of life.

events.name: Reflecting on the Gaps in Management Experience
events.description: During a small-scale renovation project at work today that required coordination among multiple parties, Lu Mingqiang realized that aside from technical skills, he had almost no experience in scheduling, task allocation, and cost estimation. This made him more acutely aware of the significant challenges he would face in running his own business in the future.

events.name: The second son, Lu Zihan, has a mild cold.
events.description: The second son had a slight fever in the evening, so Lu Mingqiang and his wife took turns caring for him, taking his temperature and administering medicine, which delayed their bedtime. They did not rest until the child's condition stabilized.

events.name: Preliminary discussion with my wife in the evening
events.description: After the child fell asleep, Lu Mingqiang took out his self-assessment notes and had a candid discussion with his wife, Wang Lijuan, about the analysis results and the practical challenges of opening a studio. They discussed whether the family finances could support the risks of starting a business, and his wife advised caution and further accumulation of resources.

events.name: First Attempt at Home Core Training
events.description: After the conversation, Lu Mingqiang laid out the newly purchased yoga mat in the living room. Following the key movement instructions provided by Lin Feng and his own planned routine, he attempted core training for the first time. He performed dynamic planks and glute bridges, and although his form was not entirely standard, he persisted and completed the exercises.

events.name: Draw the main color scheme for the kite.
events.description: After finishing his training and during the break, Lu Mingqiang went to the study, took out traditional Chinese painting pigments, carefully mixed the black and gray colors needed for the main body of the swallow, and used a medium-sized brush to apply the main tones to the swallow's body and wings, ensuring the colors were even and rich.

events.name: Pay Attention to Children's Homework
events.description: When his eldest son Lu Zixuan brought a craft project from his summer homework for guidance, Lu Mingqiang temporarily set aside his tasks and, with his tools and patience, instructed his son on how to cut and paste the materials more securely.

events.name: Review the Electrical Work Safety Regulations
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang focused on reviewing the specialized regulations in the "Safety Regulations" concerning electrical work, including life-saving procedures such as power outage, electricity verification, and grounding wire installation, reinforcing his memory by relating them to his own experiences.

起始状态.心情: With a hint of contemplation, preparing to face practical issues.

结束状态.心情: Slightly heavy but steady, feeling supported after sharing pressure with a partner, and experiencing a slight sense of accomplishment upon completing the first training session.

state.今日运动: Approximately 15 minutes of core training at home (plank, glute bridge)

2025-07.daily_overview: Through continuous analysis and deliberation, Lu Mingqiang began to shift his focus toward actionable and concrete plans. Whether it was the frequency of health training or the depth of exam preparation, both reflected the planning and execution skills characteristic of his ISTJ personality. The improvement in his squash training also provided him with positive feedback.

events.name: Refine the details of the kite
events.description: In the evening, after the main colors had dried, Lu Mingqiang switched to a fine brush, dipped it in thick ink, and meticulously depicted the eyes, sharp beak, layered feathers, and the intricate patterns on the wings of the sand swallow, striving for precision and vividness in every stroke.

events.name: Refine the Core Training Plan
events.description: Based on his initial experience yesterday, Lu Mingqiang found more detailed core training tutorial videos online. He planned a clearer weekly training schedule in his notebook, taking into account his work and lifestyle rhythm, and preliminarily determined the number of sets and rest intervals for each exercise.

events.name: Execute the second core training session
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang once again laid out his yoga mat and proceeded with his training according to the new plan. He attempted three sets of planks and three sets of glute bridges. Although it remained challenging, with noticeable soreness in his waist and abdomen, he felt slightly more accustomed to it compared to the first time.

events.name: Review the working at heights procedures.
events.description: During his pre-sleep study session, Lu Mingqiang reviewed the safety requirements for working at heights, the correct procedures for wearing and inspecting safety harnesses, and the inspection and usage standards for common tools. Drawing from his own experience, he simulated more standardized operational steps.

events.name: Squash training condition is improving.
events.description: The evening squash training proceeded as usual. After several days of focusing on his lower back and initiating core training, Lu Mingqiang felt significantly better than last week. He was fully engaged in this session, playing several scoring matches with Lin Feng, both of them sweating profusely and thoroughly enjoying themselves. After the workout, the two had a simple bowl of qing bu liang at a nearby tea restaurant near the club and chatted about family matters and their children's summer vacation plans.

起始状态.心情: Steady, focused on plan execution

结束状态.心情: Refreshing and satisfying, the dopamine released after exercise and the sense of control from advancing plans bring joy.

state.今日运动: Squash training for 1.5 hours, approximately 20 minutes of home core training.

2025-07.daily_overview: This was a day for making critical decisions. After nearly a month of research and reflection, Lu Mingqiang wrote a rational conclusion in his notes: to set aside his entrepreneurial dream. At the same time, the external world presented a new temptation—a high-salary job offer to poach him. After family discussions and personal deliberation, he once again chose stability and deepening his expertise. The dream was not extinguished; it had simply found a more realistic path.

events.name: Make the decision to put entrepreneurship on hold
events.description: In the evening, after completing the day's study in his study, Lu Mingqiang reviewed the research notes and analysis reports from the past month. He remained silent for a long while before finally writing his conclusion in the notebook: temporarily set aside the entrepreneurial plan and prioritize obtaining the senior technician certificate and accumulating capital over the next 1–3 years. After writing it down, he felt a sense of relief, along with a tinge of regret.

events.name: Draw the decorative patterns and inscriptions on the kite
events.description: After making his decision, Lu Mingqiang shifted his attention to the kite as a form of relaxation. On the blank spaces of the kite's wings and tail, he meticulously painted traditional patterns of red auspicious clouds, blue bats, and pink peonies. On the tail, he neatly wrote the four characters "Ping An Gao Fei" in regular script.

events.name: Organizing a collection of incorrect questions for exam preparation
events.description: He compiled the questions he had answered incorrectly during his previous practice tests, particularly those related to safety regulations and practical applications, into a dedicated notebook. He copied down the questions and their correct answers, and also noted the reasons for his mistakes and the correct approach to solving them.

events.name: Schedule and Collect for Tea Gathering with Like-minded Friends
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang contacted his workmate and fellow collecting enthusiast Chen Jianguo via WeChat to confirm that everyone would be available tomorrow afternoon, and they agreed to meet at the old dad tea shop in Qiongshan District that they often frequent.

events.name: Received a job offer from a competitor
events.description: While working in the afternoon, a senior technician who had earlier established his own repair workshop called him. The technician praised his skills and character, offered a salary 15% higher than his current one along with more flexible working hours, and enthusiastically invited him to join by switching jobs.

events.name: Discuss in detail with the wife the pros and cons of poaching.
events.description: Upon returning home from work, Lu Mingqiang immediately informed his wife, Wang Lijuan, about the matter. As they prepared dinner, they discussed it in detail: while the higher income was certainly appealing, what about the stability of the new studio? Would it affect their family life? Their current work platform was stable, and the team was familiar.

events.name: Personal Weighing and Final Decision
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang pondered alone on the balcony. He reviewed the thoughts he had just clarified—at this stage, he should focus on deepening his technical expertise and relying on the platform. Although new opportunities were tempting, they were essentially still "working for others" and might lead to the loss of the existing team's synergy and the company's resource support. He valued long-term stability and growth opportunities more.

events.name: Declining a Job Offer
events.description: Around nine o'clock in the evening, Lu Mingqiang called the senior master. He began by sincerely expressing his gratitude for the other party's appreciation and invitation. Then, he politely explained that he currently prefers to stay on his current platform, focusing on improving his technical skills and preparing for the senior technician certification, and has no immediate plans to change jobs.

events.name: Calculate Household Fixed Expenses
events.description: After making this decision, to be more thorough, Lu Mingqiang referred to the household account book from the past few months and meticulously listed all fixed expenses, including monthly mortgage payments, car loan installments, tuition fees for his two children, basic living costs, and support for his parents. He then calculated the minimum average monthly expenditure required to maintain the family’s basic operations.

起始状态.心情: Calmness, facing choices

结束状态.心情: Steadfast and clear-headed, having made two decisive choices (putting entrepreneurship on hold and declining job offers), the direction is now more defined, and the heart feels more settled.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise

2025-07.daily_overview: Friday is a day that intertwines pragmatic action with the joy of life. Lu Mingqiang translates decisions into concrete actions: building a robust risk firewall for his family and offering professional advice for a friend's business. Meanwhile, the long-awaited collectible finally arrives, bringing a satisfying conclusion to a week of hard work.

events.name: Pasting the main body of the kite
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang began the crucial step of kite making—pasting. Using a brush dipped in paste, he carefully adhered the pre-cut and painted silk paper onto the main frame of the kite, ensuring the surface was smooth and even, free from wrinkles or air bubbles.

events.name: Examine the drawing effect and allow it to dry.
events.description: After completing all the drawing work, Lu Mingqiang lifted the kite and examined the overall effect from different angles. He then performed fine touch-ups on areas where the colors were slightly faint and placed it in a well-ventilated area to dry.

events.name: Playing chess with neighbor Wang Jianguo
events.description: After dinner, I ran into my neighbor Wang Jianguo in the residential community. We played a game of chess under the pavilion, exchanged local news and family matters, and enjoyed a harmonious relationship.

events.name: Review typical accident cases
events.description: During the evening study session, Lu Mingqiang focused on reviewing the typical power accident cases provided in the training materials, analyzing the causes of the accidents and preventive measures, while reflecting on the real-life cases shared by his mentor.

events.name: Discussing the Use of the Bonus with My Wife
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan once again discussed how to use the "Community Service Star" bonus. They reached a consensus: half would be used to subsidize household expenses for the month and improve meals, while the other half would be deposited into the family's emergency fund account.

events.name: Selecting Supplemental Medical Insurance for Wife
events.description: After the meal, Lu Mingqiang carefully compared several supplementary medical insurance products for flexible workers on his mobile insurance app, focusing on the coverage, premiums, and convenience of claims settlement.

events.name: Complete the insurance application and make the payment.
events.description: After selecting the product, Lu Mingqiang carefully filled in the insurance information for his wife Wang Lijuan on his mobile phone. He repeatedly verified the coverage terms, sum insured, and payment method, and completed the payment of the first premium via mobile banking.

events.name: Explain the insurance policy matters to the wife
events.description: After the payment was successfully completed, Lu Mingqiang sent the screenshot of the electronic insurance policy to his wife Wang Lijuan and verbally explained to her that the insurance had taken effect, the specific coverage details, and the follow-up payment reminders.

events.name: Safeguard your policy information properly.
events.description: Subsequently, Lu Mingqiang downloaded the electronic insurance policy and saved it in the "Important Documents" folder on the family computer. At the same time, he recorded the policy number and the insurance company's customer service phone number in the "Family Notebook" kept in the living room.

events.name: Contact and arrange a wine bottle transaction
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang contacted the seller through the platform, inquired in detail about the specific features of the wine bottle, and arranged to meet for the transaction at a pavilion in an old residential area in Meilan District at 5:30 p.m. that day.

events.name: Complete the wine bottle transaction
events.description: After work in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang drove his car to the agreed location in Meilan District. He successfully met with the seller, carefully inspected the wine bottle again under natural light, and after confirming its excellent condition, completed the transaction via mobile payment.

events.name: Cleaning and Storage of Newly Acquired Collections
events.description: Returning home with the prized wine bottle, Lu Mingqiang eagerly began the cleaning process. He carefully washed both the interior and exterior of the bottle with water and a soft cloth to remove dust, then meticulously wiped it dry. Throughout the entire process, he remained highly focused.

events.name: Share the Joy of Collecting
events.description: After cleaning, Lu Mingqiang opened the collection cabinet in his living room, carefully selected a prominent central position, and placed the precious Haikou Daqu ceramic wine bottle there. He then took a photo and shared it in the collection WeChat group, which garnered likes from friends in the circle.

起始状态.心情: Expectation, planning to accomplish multiple tasks

结束状态.心情: Enriching and joyful, it encompasses both the sense of responsibility in fulfilling family protection and the satisfaction of acquiring beloved collections.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise

2025-07.daily_overview: The pace of Saturday became more relaxed. In the morning, I wrapped up tasks related to personal interests, while the afternoon was dedicated to a profound tea gathering among old friends. Lu Mingqiang not only shared the joy of his collections but also offered practical advice for his friend's business using his professional expertise, adding a new dimension to their friendship through mutual support. The career plan after the decision also became clearer.

events.name: Adjust your mindset and clarify your career path.
events.description: After waking up, Lu Mingqiang felt much more at ease. The decision to put his entrepreneurial plans on hold and decline the job offer had freed him from his inner turmoil. He re-planned his career development path and wrote down his core goals in his notebook: fully preparing for the senior technician certification exam, working hard to increase his savings, and continuously building industry connections and accumulating professional networks.

events.name: Handle the pasting details and allow to dry in the shade.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang carefully inspected the main body of the kite that had been pasted the night before. Using tweezers, he delicately handled several minor edge lifts and then placed it in a ventilated, dust-free corner of the living room to dry in the shade.

events.name: Calculate the bridle point positions of the kite
events.description: While waiting for the kite to dry in the shade, Lu Mingqiang spread out another completed small kite on the living room floor. Based on its dimensions, weight distribution, and his years of flying experience, he carefully calculated and marked multiple attachment points for the bridle lines using a measuring tape and pencil.

events.name: Summary of Practical Assessment Key Points
events.description: Taking advantage of the morning leisure time, Lu Mingqiang summarized the key steps and scoring points that might be involved in the practical assessment based on the training content and his years of experience, and repeatedly simulated the process in his mind.

events.name: Attending a Tea Gathering with Fellow Collectors
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang left his home and drove his private car to the old dad tea shop in Qiongshan District, where he had arranged to meet Chen Jianguo.

events.name: Tea Gathering: Exchange on Collection and Work
events.description: The two met at a teahouse, ordering partridge tea and several snacks. Chen Jianguo showed photos of a rare vintage wine bottle he had recently acquired, while Lu Mingqiang shared his joy over obtaining a bottle of Haikou Daqu the previous day. The conversation then shifted to work, with Lu Mingqiang discussing new safety regulations and Chen Jianguo complaining about the trivialities of his hardware business.

events.name: Providing Professional Advice for a Friend's Store Expansion
events.description: During the tea conversation, Chen Jianguo formally proposed that the hardware store intended to undertake a small-scale expansion by adding categories of household electrical tools and common accessories, seeking Lu Mingqiang's opinion. Lu Mingqiang, drawing on the most frequently purchased tool brands and models by electricians in his work as well as the needs of ordinary households for DIY projects, provided specific and practical suggestions for product selection and inventory preparation.

events.name: The tea gathering has concluded.
events.description: After nearly two hours of conversation, the tea gathering concluded. Lu Mingqiang bid farewell to Chen Jianguo, and both felt that the exchange had been highly fruitful. Lu Mingqiang then drove back to his home in Longhua District.

events.name: Politely Declining Job Offer When Communicating with Colleagues
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang briefly mentioned on WeChat to his closest colleague Chen Jianguo that he had declined a job offer the previous day, stating that he still felt more secure with his current team and platform and wished to continue working with everyone. Chen Jianguo replied, expressing understanding and support.

events.name: Study the exam syllabus and make preliminary plans
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang took out the official syllabus booklet for the Senior Electrician Technician exam and carefully studied it to understand the specific requirements and weightings of theoretical knowledge and practical skills. On his August calendar, he used a pencil to preliminarily outline the weekly learning priorities.

起始状态.心情: Relax and get ready to enjoy weekend socializing.

结束状态.心情: Joyful and fulfilling, friendships deepen through mutual support, and career planning becomes clearer.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise

2025-07.daily_overview: A tranquil Sunday at home. Lu Mingqiang was immersed in the final stage of his handicraft, savoring the sense of accomplishment as his creation neared completion. Meanwhile, he had cultivated consistent habits of caring for his family (by preparing barley water) and managing his own health (through core training). His exam preparation had also entered the final sprint phase of review and consolidation.

events.name: Sewing the Kite Bridle
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang began the final step of kite making—installing the bridle lines. He selected sturdy nylon thread and, following the pre-calculated points, carefully sewed secure fixing loops onto the kite frame with a needle. He then threaded multiple bridle lines through these loops one by one, tying them with professional sailor's knots to ensure even distribution of tension across each line.

events.name: Boil Job's Tears Water Again
events.description: During the afternoon break, Lu Mingqiang decided to make barley water once more. Drawing from his previous experience, he operated more skillfully this time and successfully brewed a large pot of barley water with a well-balanced taste. It received unanimous praise from his family, who planned to make it a regular summer beverage.

events.name: Perform weekend core training
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang laid out his yoga mat in the living room and began his third core training session of the week. He attempted to increase the duration of his plank hold and learned a new Russian twist exercise. Although he performed it somewhat unsteadily, he persisted and completed the planned number of sets.

events.name: Quickly review and connect exam preparation knowledge
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang quickly reviewed all the notes, highlighted key points, and error collections compiled throughout the revision phase. He made a concerted effort to connect the scattered knowledge points in his mind—such as safety regulations, practical skills, accident case studies, and circuit principles—into a cohesive knowledge framework, aiming to identify and fill any gaps.

events.name: Family Shared Breakfast
events.description: In the morning, the family enjoyed the Hainan rice noodles breakfast prepared by his wife. Lu Mingqiang and his wife discussed the general arrangements for the upcoming week.

events.name: Tutoring children with their summer homework
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang reviewed the completion status of his eldest son Lu Zixuan's summer homework and provided guidance on some hands-on practice questions.

events.name: Family Movie Night
events.description: In the evening, the whole family watched an animated film together, enjoying a relaxing and pleasant family time. The children watched with great interest, and Lu Mingqiang and his wife also relaxed their minds.

events.name: Evening Stroll with My Wife
events.description: After the children went to sleep, Lu Mingqiang and his wife took a half-hour walk in the residential community, sharing their experiences and reflections from the week to strengthen their marital bond.

起始状态.心情: Tranquility, Enjoying Weekend Family Time

结束状态.心情: Calm and content, the handiwork is nearing completion, and habits are being formed.

state.今日运动: Approximately 25 minutes of core training at home

2025-07.daily_overview: The start of the new week revolves entirely around the word "preparation." The kite entered a phase of fine-tuning, while exam preparation shifted from knowledge review to mental and material readiness. Lu Mingqiang methodically advanced each plan, demonstrating the characteristic rigor and foresight of an ISTJ.

events.name: Preliminary Testing of Kite Balance
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang connected the bridle lines to a main control line. Standing in the center of the living room, he gently lifted the air-dried kite by the main control line, carefully observing its posture to preliminarily assess its balance. Noticing that one side was slightly heavier, he noted down the bridle line numbers that might require fine-tuning in his notebook.

events.name: Participated in a two-day power distribution room renovation project.
events.description: The company has undertaken an urgent power distribution room renovation project, requiring two consecutive days of work. Today, preliminary surveys and preparations were conducted, during which Lu Mingqiang and the team formulated the construction plan and safety measures.

events.name: Adjusting Exam Preparation Mentality and Checking Supplies
events.description: Lu Mingqiang realized that the end of the month was approaching, and the exam was also drawing near. He deliberately stopped intensive practice sessions and focused primarily on mental adjustment. He checked whether the required documents and stationery for the exam were placed in a conspicuous spot on his desk and planned the route to the examination venue in advance, along with an alternative route.

events.name: Search and organize exam preparation materials
events.description: He searched online for free online courses for the senior electrician technician exam, as well as mock question banks and exam experience sharing posts on various forums. He then organized and saved useful instructional video links and PDF materials into a browser folder.

events.name: Seek exam preparation experience from the master and fellow workers
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang sent WeChat messages to his master, Li Shifu, and his coworker, Chen Jianguo, respectively, to ask for their experiences in preparing for the senior technician certification exam and the key points to note during the practical assessment. He received straightforward and practical advice from them.

events.name: Handle daily maintenance work orders
events.description: During the day, I worked normally and partnered with Zhao Qiang to handle three cases of tripped meter boxes reported by residents.

起始状态.心情: Steady and composed, settling into the rhythm of work and study for the new week.

结束状态.心情: Be well-prepared and maintain a calm state of mind.

2025-07.daily_overview: Amid the coolness brought by the passing showers, Lu Mingqiang continued to refine his work and plans. The kite string, after fine adjustments, approached perfection, and to prepare more systematically for the exams, he ordered new textbooks. Life, in his hands, was like the kite string, being adjusted bit by bit into its optimal state.

events.name: Processing the details of kite wing pasting
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang began pasting the details such as the curved framework of the kite wings. This was the most demanding part, testing both patience and craftsmanship. He needed to meticulously paste small pieces of silk paper onto the complex curves without any tears or wrinkles, a task that took nearly an hour to complete.

events.name: Fine-tune the suspension line length
events.description: According to yesterday's test notes, Lu Mingqiang made precise length adjustments to the two slightly tight control lines. He untied the knots, remeasured and trimmed the lines with a ruler, reattached them, and then repeated the pulling test until the kite could maintain a stable tilt angle.

events.name: Complete the power distribution room renovation project
events.description: Working at the construction site all day, Lu Mingqiang completed the upgrade and renovation of the power distribution room together with the team. They worked until evening, and the project concluded smoothly. Lu Mingqiang felt tired but satisfied.

events.name: Reviewing work in preparation for the tea gathering
events.description: Thinking about tomorrow's tea gathering with Chen Jianguo, Lu Mingqiang briefly reviewed the market situation of electrical accessories he encountered at work before going to bed, as well as the differences in demands among various clients, to prepare some possible suggestions for his friend.

events.name: Place an order to purchase exam preparation materials.
events.description: Based on the previously identified gaps in the materials and following his mentor’s advice to "return to the textbooks," Lu Mingqiang placed an online order for two latest official theoretical textbooks for senior electrician technicians and one practical case analysis collection. He completed the purchase using mobile payment.

events.name: Participate in the maintenance of public lighting in the residential community
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang, at the request of Property Manager Wang, took advantage of a work break to help repair two non-functioning streetlights in the residential area by replacing the ballasts.

起始状态.心情: Focus, plan to handle detailed work

结束状态.心情: Meticulous and methodical, the dedication to craftsmanship and learning instills a sense of reliability.

2025-07.daily_overview: A Wednesday filled with value and a sense of accomplishment. The morning's work was steady and solid, while the afternoon tea gathering allowed Lu Mingqiang to appreciate the weight of professional expertise within friendship. Drawing on his years of experience, he lit a beacon for his friend's business. This feeling of being needed and able to help others left him deeply fulfilled.

events.name: Simulated Flight Testing and Fine-Tuning
events.description: In the evening, to better simulate real flight conditions, Lu Mingqiang asked his wife Wang Lijuan to assist by using a fan to create a subtle simulated airflow in the living room. Holding the kite string, he carefully observed the kite's response in the airflow. After noticing a slight leftward deviation, he adjusted the angle of the right-side bridle line. Upon retesting, the deviation disappeared.

events.name: A Monthly Tea Appointment
events.description: After work in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang went directly to the tea shop he often visited with Chen Jianguo.

events.name: Tea gathering for in-depth discussions on business operations
events.description: The two met and ordered tea and snacks. Chen Jianguo once again elaborated in detail on his specific ideas and concerns regarding the expansion of his hardware store. Lu Mingqiang, drawing on over a decade of industry observation, provided a detailed analysis of the brand preferences and purchasing habits of local electricians, decorators, and ordinary households in Haikou for commonly used electrical tools and consumables. He also offered practical suggestions on product selection, sourcing channels, and pricing strategies.

events.name: Experience the satisfaction brought by professional value.
events.description: After returning home from the tea gathering, Lu Mingqiang recalled the conversation from earlier in the day. Not only was he pleased to have been able to help his friend, but he also deeply felt that his professional skills had become valuable "capital" in another context, which brought him great spiritual satisfaction.

events.name: Squash Training and Equipment Updates
events.description: As usual, he engaged in his evening squash training. During his last session in July, he felt improvements in both his endurance and reaction time. After the workout, while checking his equipment, he noticed that the overgrip was severely worn. Upon returning home, he compared prices online and placed an order at a sports equipment website he frequently shops from, purchasing a new overgrip and a pair of professional squash shoes.

events.name: Complete the distribution box upgrade project
events.description: During the day, Lu Mingqiang, as the lead technician, guided apprentice Zhao Qiang in completing the upgrade and renovation project for a distribution cabinet at an old vegetable market in Xiuying District. The entire process, from dismantling the old cabinet to installing the new one and conducting wiring tests, was carried out seamlessly.

起始状态.心情: Steady, looking forward to communicating with friends.

结束状态.心情: The joy of being fulfilled and valued, with professional competence recognized and applied.

2025-07.daily_overview: The last day of July is a time for wrapping things up and making plans. The large swallow kite, which took nearly a month to complete, is finally ready and awaits its flight. The family finances have been clearly sorted out through the joint efforts of the couple. Most importantly, a detailed day-by-day battle plan has been formulated for the core goal of August—systematic exam preparation. With his consistent pragmatic approach, Lu Mingqiang brings this month to a close and sounds the horn for the next.

events.name: Complete Kite Making and Storage
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang conducted a final comprehensive inspection of the entire kite control system, confirming that all knots were secure and reliable. He neatly wound the main control line onto the reel, carefully rolled up the large swallow kite—meticulously crafted and painted with the phrase "Fly High in Safety"—and wrapped it in old newspaper to prevent deformation from compression. With this, the entire process of production and debugging was successfully completed.

events.name: Perform end-of-month core training
events.description: In the evening, I performed a 20-minute home core workout as planned to strengthen my core and abdominal muscles. The exercises included planks, glute bridges, and bird-dogs, and I felt an improvement in the stability of my core and waist.

events.name: Make final preparations before the exam
events.description: He organized the necessary documents and stationery for the exam and placed them into a dedicated file folder. Then, he quickly reviewed the key knowledge points and his collection of incorrect questions before closing the book. After that, he listened to some light music on his phone to relax his mind appropriately.

events.name: Collect monthly bills
events.description: Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan each organized their electronic payment records from their mobile phones, identified paper bills for utilities such as water, electricity, and gas, as well as payments for their child's extracurricular classes for the current month, and placed them together on the living room coffee table.

events.name: Couple reviews monthly income and expenses
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Lu Mingqiang and his wife sat in the living room, cross-checking the household ledger against all the collected bills to verify the income and expenses for the month, ensuring the data was accurate.

events.name: Calculating Balances and Analyzing Expenditures
events.description: After verifying all items, the two individuals used a calculator to sum up the total income and total expenses for the month, confirming that the accounts were balanced and calculating the specific surplus amount. Subsequently, they analyzed the proportion of each expense category for the month, discussed ways to optimize expenditures, and conducted preliminary planning and budget adjustments for potential increased costs in the following month.

events.name: Detailed Planning of the August Study Schedule
events.description: After completing the financial inventory, Lu Mingqiang took out the August calendar and a new notebook. Integrating the exam syllabus, existing materials, newly purchased books, and advice from seniors, he meticulously planned his study tasks for each day after work and on weekends in August, creating a detailed and actionable study schedule for the exam preparation.

events.name: Organize the study space and materials
events.description: Finally, he tidied up the desk in the study to ensure a clean learning environment. He checked the battery levels and network status of the desk lamp, computer, and phone, organizing the newly downloaded learning apps and bookmarked webpage links into a desktop folder. He neatly copied the "August Senior Technician Exam Preparation Schedule" and posted it on the wall directly in front of the desk.

events.name: Having a phone conversation with the master.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang called his master, Master Li, to briefly report on his exam preparation progress and plans. His master encouraged him to "stay calm and do well in the exam."

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to complete multiple month-end closing tasks.

结束状态.心情: With a sense of relief and clear objectives, July concluded successfully, and August's plans are well-defined, filled with fighting spirit.

2025-08.daily_overview: Continuing the tone of last month's family financial review, Lu Mingqiang began the first workday of August. On this day, he wrapped up his interests, planned new learning goals, planted seeds of health reflection through online browsing, and maintained his core training.

events.name: Family displays the completed kite.
events.description: After nearly a month of working on it in his spare time, Lu Mingqiang completed his meticulously designed large swallow kite. After returning home from work, he carefully unfolded the finished product in the living room and explained in detail to his wife Wang Lijuan and their two children, Lu Zixuan and Lu Zihan, the kite’s skeletal structure, covering techniques, and the symbolism behind its patterns. Seeing the curiosity and anticipation in his family’s eyes, especially the eagerness of his eldest son Lu Zixuan, Lu Mingqiang felt a sense of satisfaction from the handmade creation and promised to find a suitable weekend to fly it.

events.name: Complete last month's household financial records
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang took out the family ledger and meticulously recorded the July income and expenditure data, which had been reviewed and confirmed with his wife the previous night, along with the preliminary budget plan for the next month, in neat handwriting. Following his usual routine, he transferred the month’s remaining balance into the family savings account via mobile banking. Seeing the numbers increase, he felt a sense of reassurance.

events.name: Accidentally came across health science popularization videos
events.description: While relaxing online, Lu Mingqiang came across an animated science video titled "The Hidden Dangers of Long-Term High-Salt Diets on Cardiovascular Health" on a short-video platform. The video vividly illustrated how excessive salt accumulates in blood vessels and leads to elevated blood pressure. As a Hainanese with a preference for strong flavors and a love for grilled fish, this content struck him with a visceral impact for the first time, prompting him to quietly save the video.

events.name: Develop a Preparation Plan for Senior Technician Examination
events.description: Considering his goals, Lu Mingqiang did not rest after work. Instead, he retrieved professional books such as "Power System Relay Protection" and "Electrical Equipment Installation and Debugging" from his study. He integrated a mobile app for electrician exam preparation downloaded on his phone and, based on the remaining approximately 20-day study period, meticulously planned a daily schedule of at least one hour of study. He allocated theoretical chapters to specific dates and prepared a dedicated notebook, determined to systematically advance his preparation.

events.name: Perform home-based core training
events.description: As part of his Friday routine, Lu Mingqiang performed a 20-minute home core workout one hour after dinner, including exercises such as planks and glute bridges, to strengthen his core muscles and prevent recurrence of lower back injuries.

起始状态.心情: Steady, with a bit of momentum from the plans set at the beginning of the month.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and slightly anticipatory, having completed multiple planned tasks.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the first day of the weekend, Lu Mingqiang juggled family plans, social engagements with friends, and personal study. A satisfying late-night snack brought both joy and discomfort, prompting him to reflect on his lifestyle habits, while an unexpected fever in his child disrupted his original plans.

events.name: Plan a Family Kite Flying Day
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang discussed with his family and ultimately decided on the afternoon of the following weekend as the kite-flying day. He carefully inspected all the connection points and the reel of the Swallow Kite to ensure everything was in perfect order. He also asked his wife to help prepare a picnic mat, drinking water, and some simple snacks, planning to hold a formal family kite-flying ceremony on the lawn of Wanlv Park.

events.name: Weekend Grilled Fish Gathering and Physical Discomfort
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang, as usual, went with his coworker Chen Jianguo, his friend from the sports team Lin Feng, and others to their regular street food stall. They chatted about work, family, and sports matches, creating a lively atmosphere. A considerable amount of beer and grilled fish was consumed. Unconsciously, Lu Mingqiang also ate more than usual. After returning home, he felt bloated and uncomfortable in his stomach, tossing and turning in bed, unable to fall asleep. When he woke up the next morning, he felt noticeably fatigued and lightheaded.

events.name: Continuous exam preparation and study
events.description: Despite it being the weekend, Lu Mingqiang still followed his plan by studying the first chapter of "Power System Relay Protection" and selected sections of "Electrical Equipment Installation and Commissioning." He enhanced his understanding by watching instructional videos on an app and took notes in his notebook.

events.name: Exchanging exam preparation experiences with colleagues
events.description: While having afternoon tea, Lu Mingqiang and his colleague Chen Jianguo not only chatted about daily life but also exchanged updates on their preparations for the Senior Technician certification exam. They discussed several complex fault cases encountered at work that were relevant to the exam, offering each other insights and ideas.

events.name: Sudden Incident of a Child's Fever
events.description: At noon, the second son, Lu Zihan, suddenly developed a fever with a temperature reaching 38.5 degrees Celsius. Lu Mingqiang and his wife hurriedly took the child to the community clinic, where he was diagnosed with a common cold and prescribed fever-reducing medication. They spent the entire afternoon at home caring for the child, which disrupted their originally planned exercise schedule.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, looking forward to the weekend but slightly concerned due to the child's illness.

结束状态.心情: The fatigue from physical discomfort and the regret over indulgent eating, compounded by the exhaustion of caring for children.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Sunday, Lu Mingqiang spent the day dealing with the aftereffects of yesterday's gathering and his child's recovery. His physical discomfort heightened his focus on health, prompting more proactive reflection. A family dinner discussion spread health awareness to the entire household, and he went to bed early due to fatigue.

events.name: Actively searching for health information
events.description: Affected by gastrointestinal discomfort and previous videos, Lu Mingqiang searched for keywords such as [late-night snacks and sleep quality] and [beer calories] on his phone during the lunch break, reading several articles from health-related public accounts. The articles pointed out that eating late at night and consuming alcohol could increase digestive burden and disrupt sleep cycles, which immediately reminded him of his frequent monthly grilled fish and beer gatherings.

events.name: Discussion on Health During Family Dinner
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang casually remarked, "There's been a lot of talk online lately about how eating too much salt is bad for health. Do we use a bit too much salt when cooking at home?" His wife, Wang Lijuan, chimed in, agreeing with him and adding that the children should also eat less fried food. This simple conversation brought the concept of "healthy eating" into the daily discussions of the Lu family for the first time, transforming it from an abstract idea into a tangible topic.

events.name: Preparation for Theoretical Study
events.description: In the evening, he studied the content regarding the installation standards for high-voltage equipment in "Electrical Equipment Installation and Commissioning" as planned, comparing and understanding it in conjunction with his own work experience.

events.name: Caring for a Child During Recovery
events.description: The second son, Lu Zihan, has recovered from his fever but still has a slight cough. Lu Mingqiang is staying at home to play with the child using building blocks, ensuring he drinks plenty of water and gets enough rest, while his wife is out shopping for household supplies.

起始状态.心情: Fatigued and feeling slightly unwell, but somewhat relieved as the child's condition has improved.

结束状态.心情: Lost in thought, health consciousness was awakened, and fatigue prompted a decision to retire early for recovery.

2025-08.daily_overview: As the new week began, Lu Mingqiang carried out his work routine, yet his inner thoughts were abundant. Reflections on health persisted, and career planning was formally placed on the family agenda, leading to significant decisions. Meanwhile, temporary overtime was required due to project demands.

events.name: Execute the task of replacing the electricity meter box.
events.description: Lu Mingqiang and his colleague Chen Jianguo carried out a full-day task of replacing electricity meter boxes in an old residential community in Xiuying District. The work was repetitive but required meticulous attention. They skillfully cut off the power, tested for electricity, dismantled the old boxes, installed new ones, and performed debugging to ensure electrical safety.

events.name: Presenting the entrepreneurial concept to my wife
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang formally proposed to his wife Wang Lijuan his entrepreneurial idea of owning his own repair workshop in the future. He described the vision of taking on jobs independently and enjoying flexible working hours. His wife expressed understanding of his aspirations but immediately raised rational concerns regarding startup capital, customer acquisition risks, and the current financial stability of their family. The two decided to conduct a detailed family financial stress test the following evening.

events.name: Seeking advice from the master on exam preparation issues
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang made a special trip to visit the retired Master Li. He not only sought advice on the practical difficulties of the senior technician exam but also borrowed Master Li's treasured old edition of electrical engineering notes. Master Li's encouragement gave him more confidence in his exam preparation.

events.name: Overtime work to handle urgent malfunctions
events.description: In the evening, they received a notice from the company that a client's store had experienced a sudden electrical circuit failure requiring urgent repair. Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo rushed to the scene, spending two hours troubleshooting and fixing the issue, which delayed their return home.

起始状态.心情: The usual calm of Monday, tinged with anticipation for the evening's conversation.

结束状态.心情: There is both the ease of opening up to family and a subtle concern about real-life issues, along with a slight fatigue from working overtime.

2025-08.daily_overview: A day of turning points. The repetitive labor during the day deepened professional burnout, while the evening's family financial stress test forced entrepreneurial dreams to confront reality. Family responsibilities overshadowed personal ambitions, and evening exercise was postponed due to emotional fluctuations.

events.name: The Value Inquiry in Repetitive Work
events.description: While replacing the electric meter box in an old residential building in Meilan District, the narrow corridor and repetitive motions stirred a hint of irritation in Lu Mingqiang. Staring at the unchanged procedures he had followed for over a decade, a thought flashed through his mind: "Day after day, year after year—is this all there is to my career?" Against the backdrop of putting his entrepreneurial aspirations on hold, this doubt about the meaning of his work felt particularly sharp.

events.name: Conduct a detailed review of household financial data
events.description: In the evening, the couple spread out all the bills and account books on the dining table in the living room. Wang Lijuan sorted out a list of fixed expenses: mortgage, car loan, education fees for their two children, food expenses, property management fees, utilities, and so on. Lu Mingqiang, on the other hand, calculated the total amount of their existing savings. Using a calculator, they added up each item one by one and arrived at the minimum monthly expenditure required to maintain their family's current standard of living.

events.name: Simulated Entrepreneurship Risk Stress Test
events.description: Based on the calculated fixed expenses, they began to simulate the worst-case scenario: assuming Lu Mingqiang resigns to start a business, with no stable income for the initial months or even a year, relying solely on Wang Lijuan's part-time income and savings. The calculation results clearly show that the family savings can only support basic living expenses for a maximum of 3–4 months, indicating a very weak ability to withstand risks.

events.name: Reaching a family consensus on postponing entrepreneurship.
events.description: Faced with stark numbers, the two reached a rational consensus after a brief silence: for the stability of their family and the future of their two children, they must temporarily postpone their entrepreneurial plans. Simultaneously, they decided to prioritize adjusting their family's financial goal for the coming year to [enforce savings and significantly increase the emergency fund]. Wang Lijuan comforted Lu Mingqiang, who appeared somewhat disheartened, encouraging him to first focus on obtaining certifications to enhance his skills.

events.name: Exam Preparation Study
events.description: Despite his mixed feelings, Lu Mingqiang persisted in completing his study tasks for the evening, reviewing the content from the previous two days and working on chapter exercises, albeit with lower efficiency.

events.name: Cancelled core training due to low mood.
events.description: The originally scheduled evening core training was voluntarily canceled due to Lu Mingqiang's heavy mood, opting for an early bedtime to adjust his mindset.

起始状态.心情: Starting the day with lingering unease from last night's discussion.

结束状态.心情: Heavy, rational yet tinged with a sense of loss, entrepreneurial passion is suppressed by the weight of real-world responsibilities, deciding to sleep early to recover.

2025-08.daily_overview: After postponing his decision to start a business, Lu Mingqiang digested and adjusted, shifting his focus toward making breakthroughs within the existing framework. Health awareness translated into action and refusal, while a friend's unexpected visit disrupted his evening plans.

events.name: Professional Reality Reflections During the Commute
events.description: On his way to work, Lu Mingqiang rode his electric bike, replaying the financial data from the previous night in his mind. He realized that his weariness from repetitive tasks was real, but family responsibilities and economic realities were a stronger anchor, keeping him firmly in his current position. He began to convince himself that accepting a temporary delay was the most pragmatic choice.

events.name: Continue the replacement work of the electricity meter box.
events.description: The work was similar to yesterday's, involving the replacement of an electrical meter box in another residential community. During the lunch break, I chatted with Chen Jianguo about our children's summer vacation plans, temporarily setting aside the worries.

events.name: Discuss specific savings adjustment measures
events.description: After dinner, the couple continued discussing how to achieve [forced savings]. The preliminary plan includes: Lu Mingqiang preparing more actively for exams to strive for a salary increase; Wang Lijuan considering taking on additional part-time shifts; reducing non-essential expenses (such as dining out); and setting a fixed monthly savings amount while opening a dedicated account.

events.name: First Time Politely Declining a Grilled Fish Gathering
events.description: At the end of the workday, Chen Jianguo suggested going to the street food stall as usual. Lu Mingqiang, recalling his recent stomach discomfort and health-related articles, hesitated for a moment. He politely declined, citing [recent stomach issues and a desire to take better care of his health], and chose to head straight home for a light dinner. This was the first time he had turned down such a social late-night meal due to health concerns.

events.name: Exam Preparation Review and Error Correction Organization
events.description: In the evening, he reviewed the content learned in the previous days, completed chapter exercises through a mobile app, and organized the incorrect questions in a notebook, leading to a recovery in efficiency.

events.name: A friend dropped by unexpectedly.
events.description: In the evening, Wu Gang, a middle school classmate, paid an unexpected visit. They chatted for half an hour about recent updates and work, which delayed dinner time. However, Lu Mingqiang politely declined the invitation to dine out.

起始状态.心情: Slightly dull, but attempting to accept reality.

结束状态.心情: Calming down, beginning to focus on feasible new plans, with minor distractions from social interactions.

2025-08.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang sought advice from his father and gained support, which helped him calm his mindset. Sharing his work experience allowed him to recognize his own value, paving the way for a change in his state of mind. Meanwhile, he stayed up late reviewing due to his dedication to studying.

events.name: App pushes more health information
events.description: Due to his previous browsing history, Lu Mingqiang's mobile app homepage displayed more recommendations related to [Hainan Traditional Diet Improvement] and [Health Check Indicators for Middle-Aged Men]. While browsing, he unconsciously compared these with his favorite grilled fish, which intensified his inner conflict.

events.name: Seeking Advice from Father
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang went to his parents' house for dinner. After the meal, he had tea alone with his father, Lu Jianguo, on the balcony, discussing his career confusion and family financial pressures. Drawing from his decades of experience as an electrician, his father offered guidance, emphasizing the importance of stability for technical workers in supporting their families. He encouraged Lu Mingqiang to focus first on obtaining his senior technician certification, which represented the most reliable path to advancement within the existing framework. His father's words brought him a sense of reassurance.

events.name: Plan New Directions for Career Advancement
events.description: After returning from his parents' home, Lu Mingqiang felt much calmer. He took out his notebook and, incorporating his father's advice, planned his direction for the next year: 1. Devote full effort to preparing for the Senior Technician certification; 2. Take the initiative to undertake more complex tasks at work; 3. Pay attention to internal training opportunities within the company. He decided to temporarily set aside his entrepreneurial dream and focus on building a solid foundation first.

events.name: Attend the monthly safety meeting and share experiences.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang attended the company's monthly safety meeting. During the sharing session, at the team leader's request, he drew on his years of experience to explain in detail to his colleagues several practical techniques for quickly identifying wire aging and ensuring safe operations when replacing old meter boxes. The new apprentice, Zhao Qiang, took careful notes.

events.name: Gain family recognition
events.description: In the evening, upon returning home, Lu Mingqiang brought up the matter of sharing his experience during the day at the dinner table, with a hint of subtle pride in his words. His wife, Wang Lijuan, praised him for his wealth of experience and called him a role model for the younger generation, which made Lu Mingqiang feel a sense of satisfaction from being needed.

events.name: Staying up late to review and prepare for challenging exam topics
events.description: Due to the difficulty of the exam preparation material, Lu Mingqiang spent an extra hour reviewing the chapter on relay protection in the evening, which caused his bedtime to be delayed.

起始状态.心情: It was easier than yesterday, with a direction to seek help.

结束状态.心情: After receiving affirmation from elders and family recognition, the sense of value has somewhat recovered, but staying up late has caused slight fatigue.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Friday, after completing a week's work, Lu Mingqiang spent a cozy family movie night with his family. This small activity served as an emotional bond, and due to the pleasant weather, an evening walk was spontaneously added.

events.name: Execute the task of replacing the last day of this week.
events.description: Working in a residential area in Qiongshan District, the weather was scorching hot. During the lunch break, I ate a boxed meal under the shade of a tree. In the afternoon, I encountered a household with severely aged wiring, which required extra time for careful inspection and replacement to ensure safety.

events.name: Discussing Dietary Health with My Wife Again
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang proactively mentioned that he had been experiencing some gastrointestinal discomfort recently and shared some health knowledge he had come across. The two discussed how to improve their family's diet, such as making dinners lighter, preparing healthy snacks, and addressing social needs when going out for late-night snacks.

events.name: Preparing for a Home Theater Night
events.description: In the afternoon, Wang Lijuan purchased popcorn ingredients and Qingbuliang dessert materials as planned. After dinner, Lu Mingqiang checked the television and audio equipment to ensure smooth screen projection; Wang Lijuan popped the corn and prepared chilled Qingbuliang in the kitchen; the two children helped portion out the snacks.

events.name: Enjoy Family Movie Time
events.description: At half past seven in the evening, the whole family squeezed onto the living room sofa, turned off the main lights, and began watching the animated film downloaded by Lu Mingqiang. Everyone shared popcorn and qingbuliang while watching, filling the living room with the children's laughter and discussions.

events.name: Warm Moments After Watching a Film
events.description: After the movie ended, the children excitedly discussed the plot. Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan tidied up while listening, exchanging a smile as they felt a rare warmth and satisfaction after a busy week.

events.name: Evening Family Walk
events.description: Before dinner, as the weather was cool, the whole family took a 15-minute walk near the residential area to relax, and Lu Mingqiang took this opportunity to relieve his work fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, especially the family activities in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Warmth, contentment, and the sense of security brought by family bonds.
