2025-08.daily_overview: On Saturday, Lu Mingqiang accompanied his wife to visit an art exhibition, which enhanced their mutual understanding despite his limited knowledge of art. Faced with an invitation for a late-night snack, he heeded the health warning and released his emotions through high-intensity exercise. He also went to bed early due to fatigue from the exhibition.

events.name: Accompanying my wife to visit an art exhibition.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang accompanied his wife Wang Lijuan on a bus to the city art museum to visit a modern art exhibition. He patiently followed along, listening to his wife explain her understanding of colors and composition, although he found most of the abstract paintings confusing and felt a slight ache in his legs after standing for two hours.

events.name: Candid Exchange Following the Visit
events.description: On the way home, Wang Lijuan excitedly shared her feelings about a piece of artwork. Lu Mingqiang candidly said, "To be honest, I didn't quite understand it, but after hearing your explanation, I think it's quite interesting." During dinner, the two had a relaxed discussion about "what is beauty." Lu Mingqiang remarked, "I think the Hainanese chicken rice you make is much more beautiful than those paintings," which made his wife laugh.

events.name: Hesitation in the Face of an Invitation to Grilled Fish
events.description: Workmate Chen Jianguo suggested in the WeChat group that they should gather as usual in the evening. Upon seeing the message, Lu Mingqiang recalled recent health warnings and his own gastrointestinal discomfort. He struggled intensely between [friendship] and [health concerns], ultimately replying [I'll check my schedule later] instead of immediately agreeing as he usually would.

events.name: Release emotions through high-intensity exercise
events.description: To alleviate the recent accumulation of professional frustrations and the feeling of being [trapped], Lu Mingqiang went to the squash court alone in the afternoon and played for nearly two hours. The intense, sweat-drenched exercise allowed him to temporarily clear his mind, with physical exhaustion replacing mental fatigue, leaving him in a much more relaxed state of mind.

events.name: Difficult Chapters for Exam Preparation and Study
events.description: In the evening, he focused on studying the more challenging setting calculation section of relay protection, repeatedly watching animated demonstrations on the app to aid comprehension. However, due to fatigue from the day, his learning efficiency was somewhat limited.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a hint of curiosity about accompanying his wife to the exhibition.

结束状态.心情: The exhilaration after exercise and the tranquility after spending time with family, yet still feeling conflicted about social choices, and deciding to sleep early due to exhibition fatigue.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday was fulfilling: Family time was heartwarming, and the call with my brother marked a pause in my entrepreneurial journey. The seaside run and sunrise symbolized the beginning of a mindset adjustment, while the family gathering led to slightly more food intake than usual.

events.name: Weekend Family Gathering and Life Communication
events.description: Lu Mingqiang and his family went to his parents' home for a meal. During the casual conversation after dinner, he mentioned that he could never get the barley water quite right when he cooked it. His mother, Chen Xiuying, pointed out with a smile that he used too little water and cooked it too thick. She then shared some tips, such as the proper ratio of barley to water, how to control the heat, and adding dried tangerine peel to enhance the flavor. This exchange about the details of daily life made him feel warm and touched. During the meal, he ate quite a bit of Hainanese chicken rice and felt slightly full afterward.

events.name: Formally notifying elder brother of the decision to postpone the entrepreneurial venture.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang made a long phone call to his elder brother Lu Minghua in Shenzhen. He candidly shared the market research findings, his own lack of experience, and the reality of the family's weak ability to withstand risks. Ultimately, he rationally expressed his decision to postpone his entrepreneurial plans for the time being, focusing first on obtaining the Senior Technician certification and accumulating resources. Although his brother felt regretful, he expressed understanding and support.

events.name: Running by the Sea to Adjust One's Mindset
events.description: To adjust his downcast mood after postponing his entrepreneurial plans, Lu Mingqiang decided to resume his morning runs. He planned a route from his home to the seaside at Baishamen Park, found his running shoes and sportswear, and set an alarm for the next morning. However, due to fatigue from a dinner gathering, he switched to a 3-kilometer evening jog instead.

events.name: Intensive Exam Preparation Review
events.description: He spent the entire weekend intensively reviewing the weak chapters of theoretical books such as "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering," took extensive notes, and achieved relatively high efficiency.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to enjoy Family Day

结束状态.心情: After communicating with family and elder brothers, I feel more at ease and have decided to look forward. A slight weight gain occurred after the gathering.

2025-08.daily_overview: In the new week, Lu Mingqiang threw himself into work with mixed emotions. The sense of professional burnout had not dissipated as he sought to reposition his value within the routine trajectory, while also dealing with urgent client demands through impromptu overtime work late into the night.

events.name: Continue the task of replacing the electric meter box.
events.description: This week's task was carried out in another old residential community in Meilan District. Drawing from last week's experience, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo optimized the placement of tools, which improved work efficiency.

events.name: Psychological Adjustment After a Deferred Decision
events.description: After returning home from work, Lu Mingqiang sat alone in the living room, his heart filled with mixed emotions. On one hand, he felt relieved for having made a prudent decision; on the other hand, he was weighed down by the disappointment and reluctance of putting his dreams on hold. He began to reflect on whether he had been too conservative and how to rediscover meaning in his work within his current position.

events.name: Engage in in-depth communication with one's spouse about inner feelings
events.description: After dinner, he candidly expressed this inner conflict to his wife, Wang Lijuan. She expressed complete understanding, reassured him that family stability was the top priority at the moment, and encouraged him to continue excelling in his current job, suggesting he could reconsider when future opportunities were ripe. This in-depth conversation alleviated some of his pressure.

events.name: Exam Preparation and Study
events.description: In the evening, he studied the content of electrical equipment debugging and troubleshooting as planned, and verified it by combining his own maintenance cases.

events.name: Overtime work to handle emergency customer repairs
events.description: In the evening, we received a call from client Li Jianguo, reporting a sudden circuit failure at his electrical appliance repair shop that was affecting business operations. Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo rushed to the scene, spent three hours troubleshooting and repairing the issue, and returned home close to midnight.

起始状态.心情: The usual calm of Monday, tinged with a sense of aimlessness after goals were left unfulfilled.

结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat relieved after confiding, but professional identity remains at a low ebb, exhausted from overtime work.

2025-08.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang initiated his mental adjustment through morning runs and the cleansing experience of a seaside sunrise. In terms of action, he resumed healthy habits and declined unhealthy social engagements, demonstrating his determination to translate reflection into practice, while also feeling slightly fatigued due to staying up late the previous night.

events.name: Running along the beach at dawn to watch the sunrise.
events.description: Before dawn, Lu Mingqiang silenced his alarm clock and got up, jogging to Baishamen Park. He ran along the coastal path, watching the sun slowly rise from the horizon, its golden light spreading across the sea. He paused to take a deep breath, letting the salty air and sea breeze sweep away the restlessness within him, finding a long-lost sense of peace.

events.name: Re-evaluate the pragmatic plan
events.description: The clarity brought by his morning runs made his mindset more pragmatic. He redefined his future priorities: 1. Devote full effort to preparing for the Senior Technician certification; 2. Accumulate client resources and build a technical reputation at work; 3. Transform his entrepreneurial aspirations into long-term skill development goals.

events.name: Routine electric meter box replacement work
events.description: I work in a residential area near Haisheng Road in Xiuying District, which is close to the company. During the lunch break, I had a meal with Chen Jianguo at a nearby small restaurant, discussing arrangements for our children's summer vacation.

events.name: Once again firmly declining the grilled fish gathering
events.description: After work, Chen Jianguo once again suggested going to a food stall. This time, Lu Mingqiang did not hesitate much and politely declined for the same reason, heading straight home for a light dinner. This marked the first time he had consecutively turned down such invitations since enhancing his health awareness.

events.name: Canceling evening study due to drowsiness
events.description: Due to staying up late the previous day, Lu Mingqiang felt noticeably drowsy. He canceled his exam preparation study for the evening and chose to go to bed early to restore his energy.

2025-08.daily_overview: The fatigue from repetitive work reached a minor peak, but conversations with coworkers allowed him to view his job from the perspective of "ensuring the lights of countless households," paving the way for a renewed sense of value. Meanwhile, indoor exercise served as a substitute due to the thunderstorm weather.

events.name: The second-to-last day of the electricity meter box replacement task.
events.description: On duty in Longhua District. The repetitive labor over consecutive days left Lu Mingqiang with noticeable physical fatigue and mental weariness, yet he mustered his spirits to ensure every installation complied with the standards.

events.name: Discussing Work Value with Colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang confided in Chen Jianguo about his recent career confusion, asking how to find a sense of value in the repetitive work. After a moment of thought, Chen Jianguo replied, "If you handle every task efficiently, avoid accidents, and ensure that households don’t experience power outages, isn’t our work quite meaningful?" These words left Lu Mingqiang deep in thought.

events.name: Preparation for Mock Tests
events.description: In the evening, he completed a comprehensive mock test covering the content of the previous ten days, carefully analyzed the incorrect questions and weak points, and clarified the focus for subsequent review.

events.name: Core training moved indoors due to thunderstorms
events.description: The original plan was to go for a run in the evening, but due to an afternoon thunderstorm, it was changed to a 20-minute core workout at home, maintaining the habit of preventing lower back injuries.

结束状态.心情: Tired but slightly inspired, with a subtle shift in perspective towards work, and exercise bringing some relaxation.

2025-08.daily_overview: The centralized replacement tasks have come to a temporary end, but an emergency power outage in his own residential community pulled Lu Mingqiang away from his routine. The intersection of professional skills and daily life brewed an opportunity for a sense of value, while the inspection work also caused him to return home late.

events.name: Complete the task of replacing the electric meter box.
events.description: The last day of consecutive task rotations. In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo returned to the company warehouse, where they inventoried, organized, and maintained the tools and equipment used over the past ten days, and provided a brief oral report to the team leader.

events.name: Received notice of emergency power outage repair in the residential area.
events.description: While at work, Lu Mingqiang received an urgent call from Wang Jianguo, the property manager of his residential community. He was informed that due to aging electrical lines, the community was experiencing intermittent power outages during peak electricity usage hours, leading to numerous resident complaints. Wang Jianguo requested the company to carry out emergency repairs as soon as possible. Lu Mingqiang immediately reported the situation to his supervisor, Zhang Tou.

events.name: Conduct preliminary investigation and formulate emergency repair plan
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang did not go home. Instead, he went directly with Chen Jianguo to the residential area experiencing the power failure. Leveraging their familiarity with the layout of the community, they quickly inspected the distribution boxes and main power lines, confirming that the issue was caused by poor contact in the aging main line under high load conditions. Subsequently, they communicated with the property management, formulated an emergency repair plan to replace the aging sections of the line, and coordinated with the company to arrange the necessary materials.

events.name: Focus your mindset on realistic goals.
events.description: After several days of adjustment, Lu Mingqiang's mindset had gradually stabilized. In the evening, he went online again to confirm the application information for the senior technician certification. He reminded himself that even without starting a business, becoming a top expert in the industry could also help him realize his value and provide better security for his family.

events.name: A simple meal with family after returning late from fieldwork
events.description: The survey work continued until 8 p.m. After returning home, I had a simple noodle dinner with my family, feeling slightly hungry but controlling my diet.

起始状态.心情: The sense of relief after completing a task

结束状态.心情: Focused due to unexpected work demands, feeling that professional skills are urgently needed, and returning home late with slight fatigue.

state.今日运动: The work involves heavy physical labor, equivalent to moderate-intensity exercise; additional walking is required for survey work.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, cool and windless at night.

2025-08.daily_overview: After experiencing confusion about his professional value, Lu Mingqiang genuinely felt a sense of accomplishment from "applying his knowledge to benefit his neighbors" by participating in resolving a power outage in his community. This incident dispelled some of his burnout, brought him a new sense of identity, and prompted him to adjust his daily routine to align with this renewed state.

events.name: Participating in emergency power restoration in the residential community
events.description: To minimize the impact on residents' daytime electricity usage, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo carried out the power outage operation during the off-peak hours that night (after 22:00). They skillfully replaced the aging mainline sections and re-tightened all the connections. Drawing on years of experience, Lu Mingqiang efficiently and accurately completed the most complex wiring tasks.

events.name: Complete the test and restore power supply.
events.description: After completing the emergency repairs, Lu Mingqiang conducted rigorous insulation and load tests on the replaced lines, confirming that everything was functioning properly. Around 23:00, the power was restored to the residential area. They continued to monitor the system for another half hour to ensure stable operation.

events.name: Receive immediate gratitude from the neighborhood.
events.description: Even though it was late at night, some neighbors who were still awake saw them working from their windows. When the power was restored, someone posted a message in the homeowners' group thanking the workers from the power company for their hard work, and Property Manager Wang also expressed his gratitude repeatedly. Though exhausted, this direct, altruistic sense of accomplishment was something rarely experienced in their routine daily work.

events.name: Develop pragmatic dietary adjustment strategies
events.description: After half a month of reflection, Lu Mingqiang decided against extreme abstinence and instead formulated a pragmatic strategy: reducing the frequency of going out for heavy-flavored late-night snacks from 3–4 times per week to 1–2 times; trying to finish eating before 9 p.m.; and having fruit or drinking milk at home if hungry in the evening.

events.name: Brief Core Home Workout After Repair
events.description: After returning home, despite feeling exhausted, Lu Mingqiang still performed a brief 10-minute core workout to maintain his routine, then washed up and rested.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with some preparation for the emergency repair task tonight.

结束状态.心情: Tired yet filled with a sense of accomplishment, professional value has significantly rebounded, achieved by adjusting bedtime within the appropriate range.

state.今日运动: Nighttime emergency repair work constitutes moderate-intensity physical labor; 10-minute home core training.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Sunday, his day off, Lu Mingqiang spent the day at home. In the morning, he had breakfast with his family. In the afternoon, he rested at home due to the hot weather. He organized the records of his participation in the emergency power repair work in the residential community over the weekend, preparing for his work report on Monday. In the evening, he searched online for career development information and reflected on his professional prospects. At the same time, he received a thank-you call from the property manager, feeling that his professional skills had gained recognition from the neighbors.

events.name: Morning Family Breakfast
events.description: Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan enjoyed breakfast with their two children, having Hainan rice noodles and qingbuliang. The children excitedly discussed their summer vacation adventures, while Lu Mingqiang briefly outlined his plans for the day, creating a warm and harmonious family atmosphere.

events.name: Afternoon Family Rest
events.description: Due to the intense summer heat in Haikou, the entire family took a midday rest at home. Lu Mingqiang watched some television news to stay informed about the local weather and current affairs, then took a short nap to regain his energy.

events.name: Prepare for Monday's Work Report
events.description: Lu Mingqiang spent the afternoon carefully recalling and organizing the specific details, causes of the fault, and measures taken during the weekend's emergency power repair in the residential community. He drafted a simple written record to provide a detailed report to Team Leader Zhang after work tomorrow, ensuring the completion of the work cycle.

events.name: Evening Core Training
events.description: To maintain core strength, Lu Mingqiang completed a 15-minute core workout in the evening, including planks and glute bridges, feeling stable in condition but slightly fatigued.

events.name: Property Manager's Appreciation
events.description: In the evening, Director Wang of the Property Service Center specifically called Lu Mingqiang to express gratitude for his voluntary participation in the emergency power repair in the residential community over the weekend. He praised Lu for his excellent technical skills and swift response, and explicitly stated that he would be the first to call upon for any future power-related issues in the community. Lu Mingqiang responded modestly, feeling inwardly that his professional expertise had been put to practical use and recognized by his neighbors.

events.name: Search online for career development
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang sat in front of the computer. With recent confusion about his career development, he unconsciously typed keywords such as "electrician career development," "skill enhancement," and "advanced technician prospects" into the search engine. He browsed related articles and industry forums, attempting to find some answers or direction for his uncertainty. This process left him both enlightened and deep in thought.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight reflection on work

结束状态.心情: Some gains have been made, but the professional perplexities have not entirely dissipated.

state.今日运动: Core Training 15 Minutes

2025-08.daily_overview: On Monday, a workday, Lu Mingqiang went to work as usual and reported the emergency repair situation to his team leader. In the evening, while playing a friendly squash match with his friend Lin Feng, he accidentally sprained his right wrist, forcing him to interrupt the game and go to the hospital emergency room. He was diagnosed with a ligament sprain and required to wear a brace. His friend accompanied him to the hospital and took him home. Upon learning about the incident, his family expressed their concern.

events.name: Go to work and report on work.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang arrived at the company for work on time. He first provided Team Leader Zhang with a detailed report on the emergency repair work carried out in the residential area over the weekend, including the cause of the malfunction and the measures taken. He also submitted a written record, thereby completing the work closure. Team Leader Zhang commended him for his efficiency and sense of responsibility.

events.name: Midday Colleague Exchange
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang ate boxed meals with his closest coworker, Chen Jianguo. He couldn't help but briefly mention that he had been feeling a bit "unmotivated" at work lately, as the tasks were too repetitive. Chen Jianguo expressed understanding but also comforted him by saying, "Isn't that just how it is in our line of work? Stability is what matters." Although this didn't completely resolve Lu Mingqiang's concerns, it gave him a sense of resonance.

events.name: Commuting After Work and Family Dinner
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang drove his family car and returned home ten minutes later. His wife, Wang Lijuan, had already prepared dinner. The family gathered around the table to eat, with the children sharing amusing stories from school. Lu Mingqiang appeared somewhat fatigued but did not mention any discomfort in his wrist (as it had not yet occurred). Due to the emotional impact of the injury, he consumed more comfort food during the meal.

events.name: Pre-match Warm-up for Squash
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang went as scheduled to the squash club he frequented and met up with his playing partner Lin Feng. The two engaged in pre-match warm-ups and brief technical exchanges, preparing for their weekly friendly match. Lu Mingqiang felt his condition was normal and did not notice anything unusual.

events.name: Wrist Sprain in Squash
events.description: During the squash match against Lin Feng, Lu Mingqiang attempted to save a sideline shot, causing his movement to suddenly become awkward. This resulted in a sharp pain and a cracking sound in his right wrist, leaving him unable to exert any force on the spot. The match was forced to halt as he clutched his wrist, his expression filled with agony.

events.name: Emergency Medical Diagnosis
events.description: Lin Feng immediately accompanied Lu Mingqiang to the emergency department of a nearby hospital. After examination, the doctor diagnosed it as a sprain of the right wrist ligament, requiring the use of a brace for at least two weeks, and prescribed anti-inflammatory and pain-relief medication. The doctor also provided detailed instructions on precautions to be taken during the recovery period.

events.name: Purchase protective gear and follow medical advice.
events.description: At the pharmacy near the hospital, Lu Mingqiang purchased the wrist brace prescribed by the doctor. He carefully listened to the pharmacist's instructions on wearing methods and rehabilitation precautions, ensuring he understood the required duration of immobilization and the follow-up examination requirements.

events.name: Return and Exchange of Golf Balls
events.description: Lin Feng drove Lu Mingqiang home. During the journey, Lin Feng felt deeply remorseful, repeatedly reminding him of the precautions for recovery and suggesting that he switch to low-impact exercises during his rehabilitation. Although in pain, Lu Mingqiang expressed gratitude for Lin Feng's help and reflected on his own lack of awareness regarding sports protection.

events.name: Informing Family Members About the Injury
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang explained the wrist injury to his wife Wang Lijuan and their two children, showing them the protective brace. Both his wife and children were very concerned. He reassured his family and discussed the potential short-term impacts on household chores and work. His wife expressed that she would take on more household responsibilities.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to face the workday

结束状态.心情: In pain and worried, but grateful for the support of friends and family.

state.今日运动: Squash Match (Interrupted Due to Injury)

2025-08.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Lu Mingqiang took sick leave due to a wrist injury. He reported his injury and discussed work adjustments with his team leader over the phone. Afterwards, he tried to adapt to one-handed living at home and took a light walk. In the afternoon, he discussed concerns about healthy eating with his wife. In the evening, he planned exercise routines for his recovery period and called his mentor to seek advice on technical issues.

events.name: Report the injury to the squad leader.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang reported his wrist sprain to Squad Leader Zhang via phone, communicating the doctor's diagnosis and the need to wear a brace for two weeks. Squad Leader Zhang expressed understanding, arranging for him to temporarily switch to a position with lighter wrist strain or assistive duties in the near future, and advised him to rest well.

events.name: Adapted for One-Handed Household Tasks
events.description: With the assistance of his wife Wang Lijuan, Lu Mingqiang attempted to complete some simple household chores using his left hand, such as tidying up the table and clearing dishes. He found his movements clumsy but gradually adapted, while his wife patiently helped him, fostering a harmonious atmosphere of family collaboration.

events.name: Discomfort During Attempted Rehabilitation Activities
events.description: In the morning, when Lu Mingqiang attempted to perform light wrist movements, he accidentally touched the injured area, causing slight pain. However, it was not serious, and he decided to approach his recovery with greater caution.

events.name: An Afternoon Stroll in the Residential Area
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang put on his protective gear and, accompanied by his family, took a slow walk for about 20 minutes in a park near his residential community. He carefully maintained his balance to avoid bumping his injured wrist, assessed his physical condition, and began adapting to the rhythm of life with one hand.

events.name: Communicating with My Wife About Healthy Eating
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang discussed his recent feelings with his wife, Wang Lijuan, mentioning the physical discomfort he experienced after late-night gatherings and his concerns about healthy eating. His wife expressed understanding and support, suggesting that he could consider reducing the frequency of such gatherings or trying to control his food intake and drink less during them. This conversation made Lu Mingqiang feel the support of his family and prompted him to start thinking about specific adjustments.

events.name: Plan Rehabilitation Exercises
events.description: Following the doctor's advice, Lu Mingqiang began planning his exercise regimen during the recovery period. He decided to engage in low-impact aerobic activities, such as jogging, while wearing protective gear to maintain his physical fitness. The initial plan involved starting with short-distance jogging, with the location chosen as the rubberized track at Wanlü Park.

events.name: Please ask the master about technical issues.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang called the retired and rehired Master Li to seek advice on several challenging issues regarding complex relay protection coordination encountered while preparing for the senior technician certification. Drawing on his extensive experience, Master Li provided explanations in plain language. Lu Mingqiang carefully noted down the key points and felt greatly enlightened.

起始状态.心情: Uncomfortable but determined to respond positively

结束状态.心情: Slight comfort as the rehabilitation plan takes initial shape.

state.今日运动: A 20-minute walk in the residential area

2025-08.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Lu Mingqiang returned to work, taking on lighter assisting duties. After work, he stayed late due to urgent tasks, which led to a later bedtime, but he still persisted with his core training. In the evening, he consulted fellow players for advice on running during the recovery period and began researching home UPS power supplies due to the previous day's power outage in his residential complex.

events.name: Supportive Work
events.description: After arriving at the company, Lu Mingqiang was assigned to perform supportive tasks with minimal wrist strain, such as organizing tools and recording data. Although he was not accustomed to such work, he carried it out diligently. His colleagues also expressed concern about his injury.

events.name: Urgent Overtime Task
events.description: In the afternoon, the company received an urgent repair task. Lu Mingqiang was required to assist with documentation and coordination, which caused his workday to be extended by one hour. He felt exhausted but fulfilled his duties responsibly.

events.name: Adhere to Core Training
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang was extremely exhausted, but he still persisted in completing the day's core training plan. Although he shortened the duration to 15 minutes, he ensured the quality of the movements to maintain his core strength.

events.name: Consultation on Running Recommendations During Recovery Period
events.description: Lu Mingqiang contacted his friend and fellow fitness enthusiast Lin Feng via WeChat to inform him about his wrist injury and inquire about safe jogging training during the recovery period. Based on his experience, Lin Feng provided specific advice on pre-run warm-ups, pace control, post-run stretching, and how to avoid wrist vibrations. He also recommended Wanlvyuan as an ideal location for jogging.

events.name: Research on Household UPS Power Supply
events.description: Inspired by the recent power outage in his residential complex, Lu Mingqiang utilized his evening rest time to search online and compare the performance, price, and user reviews of various brands and models of small household uninterruptible power supplies (UPS). Drawing on his professional electrical knowledge, he assessed the power requirements (primarily to ensure the operation of the refrigerator and router) and preliminarily identified several candidate models.

events.name: Adaptive Walking
events.description: In the evening, feeling that his physical condition was acceptable, Lu Mingqiang decided to conduct adaptive exercise alone. Wearing protective gear, he took a walk of approximately 30 minutes within the residential area and the surrounding streets. Throughout the walk, he focused on maintaining balance, avoiding collisions that could injure his arm, and observed the fresh air after the rain.

起始状态.心情: Tired but persevering

结束状态.心情: Enriched, with new plans for family safety and health.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Thursday, Lu Mingqiang completed the review of the theoretical learning phase and constructed a knowledge framework. In the early morning, he went for his first slow jog during the recovery period, feeling well and briefly exchanging greetings with fellow runners. After work, he conducted a comprehensive inspection of the household electrical circuits and marked potential risk points. In the evening, he joined a local photography community recommended by his brother-in-law, expanding into a new hobby.

events.name: First Slow Jog During Recovery Period
events.description: In the early morning, Lu Mingqiang went to the Wanlüyuan Plastic Track for his first adaptive jog. He strictly controlled his pace, running at an extremely slow speed for about 2 kilometers with ease, focusing entirely on maintaining steady breathing and stride to avoid wrist vibrations. After the run, he felt good with no pain, confirming that his body was gradually adapting. Along the way, he encountered fellow runner Chen Bin and briefly exchanged rehabilitation experiences.

events.name: Review of Theoretical Learning Phase
events.description: During work breaks in the day and in the evenings, Lu Mingqiang no longer studied new content. Instead, he quickly reviewed all his exam preparation notes, error logs, and key points from textbooks from start to finish, establishing a clear knowledge framework to lay a solid theoretical foundation for the upcoming practical training phase.

events.name: Check the home electrical circuit
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang conducted a comprehensive and meticulous inspection of the incoming service line, distribution panel, room outlets, and electrical wiring in his own residence using professional tools. He identified several potential risk points (such as an aging outlet), marked them, and planned to address them at a later time.

events.name: Brother-in-law recommends photography community.
events.description: Lu Mingqiang's brother-in-law, Chen Zhiqiang, recommended the "Haikou Photography Enthusiasts" WeChat group to him on WeChat, noting that the community atmosphere was relaxed and suitable for beginners. He also shared the group's QR code. Out of curiosity and a desire to expand his hobbies, Lu Mingqiang scanned the QR code and applied to join the group.

events.name: Join a Photography Community
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang's request to join the group was approved. Following the group rules, he updated his profile name (e.g., "Lu Mingqiang - Electrician") and began browsing through the group's historical messages to gain a preliminary understanding of the community's atmosphere and activities.

events.name: Family Evening Communication
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang shared with his wife and children the details of his electrical circuit inspection and his experience of joining a photography community. His eldest son, Lu Zixuan, expressed admiration for his father's professional inspection, while his wife supported his pursuit of a new hobby.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the progress of recovery.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, making progress in learning and trying new things.

2025-08.daily_overview: On a Friday workday, Lu Mingqiang briefly discussed job burnout with his coworkers during the lunch break. After work, he reviewed the practical operation manual and proactively suggested a healthy dinner gathering as an alternative to a late-night snack invitation. In the evening, he browsed works in photography communities, studied basic knowledge, and went to bed early due to his child's minor discomfort.

events.name: Lunch Break Colleague Exchange
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang and his coworker Chen Jianguo discussed a recent complex circuit fault while eating boxed lunches. They combined practical cases with theoretical knowledge, and Lu Mingqiang felt somewhat inspired, but he couldn't help briefly mentioning his sense of "tedium" toward repetitive work. Chen Jianguo expressed understanding but was unable to fully resolve his concerns.

events.name: Review practical operations after work.
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang took out the electrical engineering practical manual in his home study, focusing on reviewing the standard troubleshooting procedures for high-voltage lines and distribution boxes. Drawing on his years of work experience, he noted down key steps and precautions in his notebook to prepare for the practical exam.

events.name: Propose a healthy meal gathering.
events.description: After finishing work, colleague Chen Jianguo suggested going for grilled fish as a late-night snack. Lu Mingqiang, recalling his health plan, proactively proposed, "How about having afternoon tea with dad on the weekend, or eating something light after exercising?" He explained his intention to adjust his dietary frequency. Chen Jianguo expressed understanding and support, making Lu Mingqiang feel more confident about the feasibility of adjusting his social habits.

events.name: Browse photography communities
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang used his break time to browse through the historical messages and recent shares in the "Haikou Light and Shadow" group. He primarily reviewed the various photography works shared by group members, including landscapes, portraits, and street snapshots, while also paying attention to the shooting locations discussed by everyone (such as Wanlü Park and Qilou Old Street) and basic photography terminology.

events.name: Learn the Basics of Photography
events.description: While browsing, Lu Mingqiang began to understand the meanings of some photography terms such as "aperture" and "shutter speed." He quietly noted down several active members who frequently shared practical tips and saved a few of his favorite works for reference.

events.name: Children with mild discomfort should rest early.
events.description: Before bedtime, the second son Lu Zihan had a slight cough. Lu Mingqiang and his wife decided that the whole family should rest early. After reading with the children, he went to bed ahead of time to take care of the family.

起始状态.心情: Mindset on Regular Workdays

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, adhering to the health plan, and developing interest in new hobbies.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Saturday, his day off, Lu Mingqiang had a morning tea gathering with his collector friend Chen Jianguo, where he expressed his work fatigue and received comfort, while discussing new insights on career development. In the afternoon, he went for a recovery jog, slightly increasing the distance. In the evening, he discussed the budget for purchasing a UPS with his wife and continued to observe photography communities, focusing on themes of everyday urban life.

events.name: Preparing for a Tea Gathering
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang organized several distinctive liquor bottles he had recently collected, preparing to take them to share with Chen Jianguo. He confirmed the time and location of their afternoon meeting (the familiar Dad's Tea Shop they often visited) with Chen Jianguo via WeChat.

events.name: Drive to the tea shop
events.description: Lu Mingqiang drove his family car from home to a tea shop. Along the way, he enjoyed the street scenes of Haikou and pondered how to confide in his friend later.

events.name: Tea Talk on Career Development
events.description: Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo met at a tea shop, where they ordered traditional Hainan-style tea and dim sum. The two first displayed and discussed their respective collections of liquor bottles, exchanging insights on collecting. Subsequently, Lu Mingqiang candidly shared his recent feelings of burnout regarding work and his decision to postpone his entrepreneurial plans. Drawing from his own experience of running a hardware store, Chen Jianguo shared the risks and pressures of doing business. He affirmed the stability that Lu Mingqiang’s solid craftsmanship provided, offering comfort and guidance, and they also discussed new avenues for skill enhancement.

events.name: Returned home after the tea gathering.
events.description: After the tea gathering concluded, Lu Mingqiang bid farewell to Chen Jianguo, and they each departed. Lu Mingqiang drove back home, feeling somewhat more at ease than before.

events.name: Recovery Jogging
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang went to Wanlv Park again for a jog. He attempted to slightly increase the distance to 2.5 kilometers while paying closer attention to stabilizing his wrists and coordinating his body movements. After finishing the run, he assessed the sensations in his wrists and body, confirming there was no discomfort and that his physical fitness was gradually recovering.

events.name: Discuss the UPS Purchase Budget
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang informed his wife Wang Lijuan about the plan to purchase a UPS and the preliminary budget (approximately 1,000-1,500 yuan). Together, they reviewed the family's income and expenditure budget for the following month and decided to allocate the funds from their savings to enhance household electricity safety and convenience, reflecting financial conservatism and pragmatism.

events.name: Continue observing the photography community.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang continued to lurk in the photography community. He noticed that the group regularly held a "Photo of the Week" sharing activity and was particularly interested in works documenting the local daily life of Haikou, traditional architecture (such as old-fashioned tea shops), and scenes of children flying kites. He began contemplating how he could attempt similar photography using his mobile phone.

events.name: Neighborhood Mutual Assistance
events.description: While taking a walk in the neighborhood in the evening, Wang Shu (Wang Jianguo) asked Lu Mingqiang for advice regarding a loose socket in his home. After a brief inspection, Lu Mingqiang recommended replacing the socket. Wang Shu expressed his gratitude, and the neighborly relationship grew even warmer.

起始状态.心情: Relax, looking forward to communicating with friends.

结束状态.心情: Solace is found in the soothing words of friends and the support of family.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Sunday, his day off, Lu Mingqiang went to the electronics market in the morning to purchase and install a household UPS to enhance his family's resilience against risks. He encountered a minor issue during installation but resolved it smoothly. In the afternoon, he conducted parent-child education on electrical safety and browsed photography communities for inspiration. In the evening, due to fatigue, his review efficiency was low, so he decided to adjust his learning strategy.

events.name: Purchase of a Home UPS
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang went alone to a large appliance market in Longhua District, Haikou City. He visited several stores, inspected the UPS units in person, inquired with the shop owners about specific parameters and warranty policies, and ultimately used his professional judgment to select a cost-effective, appropriately powered small household UPS. After negotiating the price, he completed the payment and transported the device home by himself.

events.name: Install and test the UPS
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang selected an appropriate installation location near the home's distribution box. He skillfully cut off the power, connected the wiring, and linked the UPS output to dedicated outlets for the refrigerator and router. During installation, a minor issue of loose wiring arose, but he quickly identified and resolved it. He then conducted a power-on test to ensure the devices operated normally and the switching function worked effectively, thereby enhancing the stability of the household power supply.

events.name: Parent-Child Education on Electrical Safety
events.description: After installing the UPS, Lu Mingqiang called his eldest son Lu Zixuan to his side. Using tools such as a voltage tester and an old power strip, along with the results from the recent household circuit inspection, he vividly demonstrated electrical safety knowledge. This included explaining the dangers of electricity as a "tiger" and the importance of not touching electrical appliances with wet hands. He transformed a professional inspection into an engaging parent-child educational session.

events.name: Browse Photography Communities for Inspiration
events.description: Lu Mingqiang began to browse the photo community's group albums and shared links with greater focus. He showed particular interest in photographic works that documented the local daily life, traditional architecture, and family scenes of Haikou. He started contemplating which similar angles he could attempt to capture using his mobile phone and saved several reference images for inspiration.

events.name: Family Dinner Explains UPS
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang explained to his wife Wang Lijuan and their children what the newly installed UPS was and its functions (the refrigerator would continue to operate for a while during the next power outage, and the internet connection would not be immediately lost). His family expressed support for his professional expertise and consideration for the household, while the children found it quite novel.

events.name: Adjusting Strategies After Review Setbacks
events.description: While reviewing the specifications for cable laying and terminal installation in the evening, Lu Mingqiang felt extremely fatigued due to the busyness of the day, making it difficult to concentrate and leading to a strong sense of weariness. He struggled to read for half an hour, feeling that his efficiency was low, and decided to pause. He then considered adjusting his theoretical study to weekend daytime hours when his energy levels are better.

起始状态.心情: Positive, planning to complete household affairs

结束状态.心情: Tired but satisfied with the completion of household tasks, study plans need adjustment.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Sunday, Lu Mingqiang took his family to Wanlv Park for a family activity of kite flying and picnicking, enjoying outdoor parent-child time. While flying kites, the strings got tangled, but they spent time untangling them. In the morning, he went for a recovery jog, increasing the distance to 3 kilometers. In the evening, he completed core training and reviewed the photography community, showing interest in offline activities.

events.name: Recovery Jogging
events.description: In the early morning, Lu Mingqiang went for a 3-kilometer jog in Wanlü Park. He maintained a relaxed running pace with a steady speed, using this time to observe the morning exercisers and scenery in the park. This allowed him to relax both physically and mentally, and he felt that his physical fitness and wrist condition were steadily improving.

events.name: Prepare supplies for family activities
events.description: After jogging, Lu Mingqiang returned home to inspect and arrange the large swallow kite he had made, ensuring that the kite frame was sturdy and the bridle lines were intact. Meanwhile, he and his wife, Wang Lijuan, washed fruits and prepared simple snacks and drinking water, making material preparations for the family picnic.

events.name: Drive to Wanlv Park
events.description: Lu Mingqiang drove the family car, taking his wife and two sons from home to Wanlv Park. Along the way, the children were filled with anticipation, and the family discussed plans for flying kites and having a picnic, creating a cheerful atmosphere.

events.name: Flying Kites and Picnicking in Wanlvyuan Park
events.description: Upon arriving at the large lawn of Wanlü Park, Lu Mingqiang and his wife spread out a picnic mat and arranged the food. Drawing on his experience and skill, he successfully launched the swallow-shaped kite high into the sky in the gentle breeze. However, the kite string unexpectedly became tangled midway, and he patiently spent time untangling it while explaining control techniques to his eldest son, Lu Zixuan. During breaks from flying the kite, the family gathered around to share snacks, enjoying the breeze and sunshine, while their younger son played on the grass, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Wrapping up and heading home
events.description: As evening approached, Lu Mingqiang slowly reeled in the kite to retrieve it safely. He then packed up the items with his family, ensuring the lawn remained tidy. After driving back home, his wife shared the photos in the family WeChat group after dinner, while Lu Mingqiang carefully stored the kite away.

events.name: Complete core training
events.description: After his family had gone to rest for the evening, Lu Mingqiang completed his fourth core training session of the week in the living room. He felt that training had become a part of his life and was satisfied with the improvement in his core strength.

events.name: Review of the Photography Community
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang reviewed the activity in the photography community and gained a clear understanding of the group's atmosphere: technical discussions were lively yet friendly, with weekly announcements for offline photoshoot events. He decided to continue observing for the time being, but internally, he had already developed a preliminary interest in participating in future offline activities. He planned to prepare questions first and speak up at an appropriate time.

起始状态.心情: Happy, looking forward to family activities.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, with family happiness and good progress in personal recovery.

state.今日运动: Jog for 3 kilometers, core training for 15 minutes.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Monday, a workday, Lu Mingqiang discussed case studies with his colleagues during the lunch break to deepen his learning. After work, he took a recovery walk and attempted light wrist exercises. In the evening, he shared his photography work for the first time in a photography community, receiving interactions that enhanced his interest, and he also received private messages asking for technical advice. Together with his wife, he established a family study schedule to balance exam preparation and childcare responsibilities.

events.name: Lunch Break Case Discussion
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang discussed a recent complex circuit fault with his coworker Chen Jianguo. While eating their boxed lunches, they talked about the fault symptoms, troubleshooting approaches, and the final solution. Lu Mingqiang connected the key points of their discussion with the theoretical knowledge he had been reviewing, which deepened his understanding.

events.name: Rehabilitation Walking and Light Activities
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang felt his physical strength had somewhat recovered, so he extended his daily walking time to 40 minutes. During his walks, he attempted to perform very gentle, non-weighted shoulder and wrist movements while wearing protective gear, aiming to promote blood circulation, prevent joint stiffness, and carefully avoid any pain.

events.name: First Sharing in the Photography Community
events.description: In the evening, after mentally preparing himself, Lu Mingqiang uploaded a previously taken night shot of the Century Bridge to the photography community group, with a brief description: "A shot of the Century Bridge from a few days ago, testing out the light trail effect." Shortly after posting, several active group members left comments praising the angle and asking for the shooting parameters. Lu Mingqiang read the replies with a mix of nervousness and anticipation.

events.name: Community Interaction and Private Messages
events.description: Lu Mingqiang politely responded to the questions and comments from the group members. He shared the approximate parameters used during the shooting (such as shutter speed and ISO) and expressed gratitude for everyone's likes and encouragement. Subsequently, he received a private message from a group member seeking advice on the application of electrical knowledge in photography lighting, which made him feel recognized and encouraged.

events.name: Establish a family study schedule
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan held a detailed discussion in the living room regarding the family study schedule for the new semester. They established the time slots for Lu Mingqiang to review electrical engineering knowledge each evening, the periods for their two children to complete homework and reading, as well as weekend family activities. They also clarified the division of responsibilities: the wife will supervise the children’s homework, while Lu Mingqiang will be responsible for tutoring and his own studies.

events.name: Reflecting on Community Experience
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang recalled his experience sharing in the photography community during the day. Although it was just a small interaction, this non-utilitarian exchange based on a shared hobby brought him joy and strengthened his interest and confidence in continuing to explore photography.

起始状态.心情: Mindset on Regular Workdays

结束状态.心情: Enrichment, progress in learning, and new hobbies bringing joy.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Lu Mingqiang organized his exam preparation materials and formulated a review plan after work. While reviewing, he identified and corrected errors. In the evening, he went for a recovery jog, maintaining a steady distance of 3 kilometers. He provided feedback on his photography community experience to his brother-in-law via WeChat and reviewed safety operation procedures, reinforcing his memory by relating them to personal experiences.

events.name: Organize study materials for exam preparation
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang spent time organizing his review materials for the advanced electrician technician certification exam in his study. He sorted the textbooks, notes, and past exam papers into categories and developed a detailed outline of his study plan for the next few months to ensure an orderly preparation process.

events.name: Review and Correction of Errors Found
events.description: During the review process, Lu Mingqiang discovered a calculation error in his previous notes. He immediately corrected it and restudied the relevant section, which deepened his understanding of the knowledge point and made him feel an improvement in learning efficiency.

events.name: Recovery Jogging
events.description: After the rain stopped in the evening, Lu Mingqiang went for a jog in Wanlv Garden. He ran about 3 kilometers, focusing on adjusting his breathing rhythm and attempting small arm swings to test his wrist's endurance. The entire process was carried out with comfort and without causing pain, and he felt that the condition of his wrist continued to improve.

events.name: Providing Feedback on Community Sentiments to Brother-in-Law
events.description: Lu Mingqiang shared his initial impressions of joining the photography community with his brother-in-law Chen Zhiqiang via WeChat, expressing gratitude for the recommendation and discussing some interesting content he had seen in the group, as well as his first experience of sharing. His brother-in-law encouraged him to participate more actively and expand his social circle.

events.name: Review safety operating procedures.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang reviewed the safety operation procedures section of the practical manual. Reflecting on a minor arc flash incident he had witnessed (which did not result in serious injuries), he analyzed which safety details the operators had neglected at that time. He then correlated these lessons with the written procedures to reinforce his memory and understanding.

events.name: Family Evening Time
events.description: Before bedtime, Lu Mingqiang read picture books with the children while his wife handled household chores. He briefly shared his review progress, and the family atmosphere remained calm.

起始状态.心情: Focus, plan learning tasks

结束状态.心情: Steady, with a clear exam preparation plan and smooth recovery.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Wednesday, a workday, Lu Mingqiang completed his practical review summary for the week and identified areas of weakness. After work, he had a video call with his fitness coach, Lin Feng, to report on his rehabilitation progress and received positive feedback. In the evening, due to the hot weather, he briefly went shopping with his family at a mall to escape the heat and relaxed by watching a TV program.

events.name: Practical Review Summary
events.description: Lu Mingqiang utilized his work breaks and evening hours to summarize his review of practical skills for the week. He organized his review notes and insights from comparing cases into key points, and marked the knowledge areas he still found unclear or needed to consult experienced mentors about, preparing for the next phase of review or practical application.

events.name: Video Call Rehabilitation Report
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang had a video call via WeChat with his fitness coach and fellow badminton player Lin Feng, reporting on his recent walking, jogging, and light activities. Lin Feng affirmed Lu Mingqiang’s approach and once again reminded him to prioritize safety, avoiding any movements that might strain the injured area, and suggested gradually increasing the exercise intensity.

events.name: Family Shopping Mall Escaping the Heat
events.description: Due to the hot weather, the family decided to go to a nearby shopping mall after dinner to escape the heat. They did some brief shopping, purchasing daily necessities. The children played in the mall's play area, while Lu Mingqiang and his wife enjoyed the air-conditioned environment and relaxed.

events.name: Watching Television Programs
events.description: After returning home, the whole family watched a local TV program in the living room. The children were captivated by the show's content, while Lu Mingqiang and his wife chatted about daily life as they watched, enjoying a relaxing evening together.

events.name: Prepare for the next day's work
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang checked the toolbox to ensure all the tools needed for the next day's work were in place and briefly planned the tasks to prepare for potential emergency repair needs.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, preparation workday

结束状态.心情: Relax, the recovery is progressing well and the family time is heartwarming.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Thursday, Lu Mingqiang enrolled in an advanced technician exam preparation intensive course, adjusted his schedule to ensure participation, and celebrated excitedly with his wife. After work, he helped his neighbor Uncle Wang resolve a circuit tripping issue, strengthening neighborhood relations. In the evening, he went for a recovery jog, increasing the distance to 3.5 kilometers, and felt good. At night, he purchased new school stationery for the children.

events.name: Register for the Pre-Exam Intensive Course
events.description: Lu Mingqiang went to the Training Center of the Haikou Human Resources and Social Security Bureau to inquire about and formally enroll in the pre-exam intensive training course for senior electrician technicians. He paid the tuition fee and received the course schedule and teaching materials. Based on the course arrangement, he adjusted his work and family schedule for the following month to ensure full attendance, demonstrating his firm commitment to achieving the certification goal.

events.name: Celebrating with My Wife
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang excitedly told his wife Wang Lijuan about his successful registration. They celebrated briefly, and his wife felt proud of him, supporting his study plan.

events.name: Helping neighbors resolve circuit breaker trips
events.description: In the evening, neighbor Uncle Wang (Wang Jianguo) knocked on Lu Mingqiang's door for help, as frequent circuit breaker trips in his kitchen were affecting his cooking. Without hesitation, Lu Mingqiang took his toolbox and went to Uncle Wang's house. He carefully inspected the circuit, identified the cause of the fault as an internal short circuit in an old socket, and skillfully replaced it with a new one. He also checked the other wiring to ensure there were no hidden hazards.

events.name: Neighborhood Appreciation
events.description: After the circuit returned to normal, Uncle Wang was extremely grateful and insisted on giving Lu Mingqiang a bag of longan he had grown himself as a token of appreciation. The two exchanged a few pleasantries at the door, and Lu Mingqiang felt the warmth of neighborly support, which further deepened their relationship.

events.name: Recovery Jogging
events.description: In the evening after the rain, Lu Mingqiang went for a recovery jog, maintaining a steady distance of 3.5 kilometers. He felt that his physical fitness and wrist condition were steadily improving, allowing him to run with greater ease. He began to enjoy the sense of pleasure brought by exercise and the tranquil atmosphere of the park.

events.name: Purchasing School Supplies for the New Semester
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang stopped by a stationery store near his home to purchase school supplies for the new semester for his eldest son, Lu Zixuan, and his second son, Lu Zihan. The items included exercise books, pencils, erasers, and schoolbags. He carefully selected each product, ensuring they were both practical and aligned with his children's preferences.

events.name: Family Sharing
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang distributed the longan to his family to taste and briefly recounted to his wife the incident of helping Uncle Wang repair the electrical circuit. His wife expressed support for his willingness to help others, while the children excitedly examined the new stationery.

起始状态.心情: Positive, with important arrangements.

结束状态.心情: A strong sense of accomplishment, neighborly mutual assistance, and progress in rehabilitation bring satisfaction.

2025-08.daily_overview: On a Friday workday, during his lunch break, Lu Mingqiang had a candid conversation with his coworker Chen Jianguo about his health adjustment plan, gaining support and making a bet on jogging performance to add some fun. After work, he reviewed theoretical knowledge and discussed the community lighting maintenance plan with the property management due to an entrusted request. In the evening, he browsed a photography community to learn new techniques.

events.name: Health Communication and Betting During Noon Break
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to approach his coworker Chen Jianguo and candidly discussed his recent feelings of physical fatigue, expressing a desire to cut back on late-night greasy snacks and heavy drinking. He suggested that they could instead meet more often on weekend afternoons for traditional tea or have light meals after exercising. Chen Jianguo expressed understanding and support, agreeing to give it a try together. The two also made a friendly bet on who could improve their jogging pace more by next month, adding an element of fun to their commitment.

events.name: Review theoretical knowledge
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang reviewed electrical engineering theory at home, focusing on overcoming several weak knowledge points. He took detailed notes based on the content of online courses to prepare for the intensive training class.

events.name: Property Management Discusses Maintenance Plans

Utilizing his professional knowledge and experience, Lu Mingqiang provided preliminary recommendations, demonstrating deep trust in his expertise.

events.name: Browse photography communities
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang continued browsing the photography community, paying attention to the composition and lighting techniques shared by fellow members. He quietly studied and saved some practical tutorials, planning to try shooting over the weekend.

events.name: Family Dinner
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang mentioned to his wife the property commission and the bet with his co-workers, and his wife felt proud of him. The children shared interesting stories from school, and the family conversation was relaxed and pleasant.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Saturday, his day off, Lu Mingqiang spent the afternoon drinking traditional Hainan tea with his coworkers instead of having a late-night snack, as part of his commitment to a healthier lifestyle. In the evening, he attended a planned grilled fish gathering with friends but proactively requested less oil and spice. Throughout the day, he organized the family study area and took his family for a walk on the beach to maintain physical fitness. Picking up seashells along the way brought joy to the children.

events.name: Afternoon Tea with Colleagues
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to invite his coworker Chen Jianguo and another friend to have tea and snacks at a traditional tea house near his home. They chatted about work and family in a relaxed atmosphere. Lu Mingqiang found that afternoon gatherings could also strengthen bonds, and by avoiding excessive calorie and alcohol intake late at night, they felt healthier.

events.name: Organize the Home Study Area
events.description: Upon returning home, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan worked together to set up a quiet and bright study area in a corner of the living room. They arranged a desk and a desk lamp, neatly organized the newly purchased school supplies and the children’s books, creating a conducive learning atmosphere for the upcoming new semester.

events.name: Family Beach Walk Collecting Shells
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang and his family went for a walk near Holiday Beach. He accompanied his children as they strolled slowly along the sand, feeling the sea breeze. Although he could not participate in running or jumping due to his wrist recovery, he maintained his basic physical fitness through prolonged outdoor activities. The children picked up some beautiful seashells and were very happy, while Lu Mingqiang also enjoyed the family time.

events.name: Planned Grilled Fish Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang arranged with several friends (such as Chen Jie and Chen Bin) to have their second planned grilled fish gathering of the month over a weekend dinner. He ordered grilled fish but specifically requested less oil and spice, pairing it with more vegetables. During the meal, he briefly explained to his friends the reasons for adjusting his dietary habits, and they expressed their understanding.

events.name: Family Sharing Recognition
events.description: After returning home from the gathering, during dinner, Lu Mingqiang shared with his wife and children the recent recognition he had received in the community and his experiences of helping neighbors. He felt that his professional skills were not only useful at work but could also tangibly assist those around him, filling him with a deep sense of accomplishment.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy your day off.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, healthy social interactions and family affairs are well managed.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last day of August, Lu Mingqiang reviewed his monthly progress: completed a recovery jog test, summarized exam preparations, saw initial results from dietary adjustments, and communicated new semester rules with family. The day focused on relaxation and reflection, preparing for the upcoming month while strictly maintaining a healthy state.

events.name: Rehabilitation Jogging Test
events.description: In the early morning, Lu Mingqiang conducted a 4-kilometer jog test as an assessment nearing the end of his recovery period. He carefully controlled the intensity, paying close attention to the feedback from his wrist and body throughout the run. After completing the jog, he felt well without any pain, confirming that the rehabilitation training had achieved the expected results and that he could gradually resume regular exercise.

events.name: Review and Summary of Exam Preparation
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang reviewed and summarized his entire August exam preparation process, organizing his study notes and error logs. He adjusted his mindset to make final preparations for the upcoming intensive training course and the exam, feeling satisfied with himself for persevering through the study plan.

events.name: Review of Healthy Dietary Adjustments
events.description: Looking back over the entire month of August, Lu Mingqiang was satisfied with his success in reducing the frequency of late-night grilled fish gatherings from three or four times a month to just one or two. He believed that this gradual, non-extreme approach was easier to maintain, serving as a good start to improving his healthy lifestyle, and he planned to continue this practice next month.

events.name: Communication on Home Study Rules
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan sat down with their two children to formally discuss the academic expectations for the new semester and the newly established family study schedule. Lu Mingqiang encouraged his elder son to study diligently and promised to make time to help him with his homework. He also explained to his younger son the importance of maintaining quiet while his older brother was studying. A family consensus was reached.

events.name: Maintaining Core Training Habits
events.description: Lu Mingqiang reviewed the core training records for August, expressed satisfaction with the improvement in core strength, and decided to maintain the habit of performing home core training three to four times per week as a long-term practice. He completed the final session of the month that evening.

events.name: Monthly Personal Review
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang reviewed his life in August alone in his study: professionally, he regained a sense of value through community service; health-wise, his wrist recovered and he adjusted his diet; in terms of interests, he joined a photography community; and family-wise, he strengthened parent-child interactions. He felt that his life was fulfilling and progressing, ready to welcome the new month.

起始状态.心情: Reflection, Preparation Summary

结束状态.心情: Calm and content, satisfied with the monthly progress, and looking forward to the future.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the first day of the new semester, the family's routine officially changed as their second son, Lu Zihan, entered elementary school. During the day, Wang Lijuan, the wife, took on the primary responsibility of handling the school registration tasks, while Lu Mingqiang remained concerned about their child's new beginning while at work. In the evening, the family held a meeting to pragmatically outline their life and division of responsibilities for the coming months, collectively facing the challenges and adjustments brought by the era of having "two elementary school students."

events.name: First Day of School: Mother Sends Her Son to School
events.description: In the morning, Wang Lijuan, the wife, got up early to prepare a new backpack and stationery for her second son, Lu Zihan. She accompanied him to the elementary school for registration and attended the opening ceremony. Before heading out to work, Lu Mingqiang patted his younger son on the shoulder and encouraged him with his usual pragmatic words: "Listen to your teacher at school and study hard. Dad will check your new textbooks tonight." He then hurried off to the company. Throughout the day, Wang Lijuan handled various enrollment matters at the school and settled her child into the new class.

events.name: Evening Family Meeting: Establishing New Schedules and Division of Responsibilities
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang presided over a brief family meeting. He took out a piece of paper and, together with his wife and eldest son, devised a new family schedule based on the children’s school hours and his own work schedule. The meeting clarified that Wang Lijuan would be primarily responsible for daytime transportation, household management, and communication with school teachers, while Lu Mingqiang would handle homework supervision and review after dinner, as well as weekend family activity planning. The eldest son, Lu Zixuan, was also assigned the role of "little teacher," assisting his younger brother in adapting to elementary school life. The meeting concluded in a practical and harmonious atmosphere, laying the groundwork for the family’s new phase of operation.

events.name: Adaptive jogging to maintain physical fitness during the recovery period
events.description: After work in the evening, Lu Mingqiang performed a 30-minute adaptive jog on the Wanlüyuan trail, strictly controlling his pace to avoid stress on his wrist. This is his routine exercise for maintaining cardiovascular function during his wrist rehabilitation period.

起始状态.心情: Calm, yet earnest and expectant for the new phase.

结束状态.心情: Steadfast, feeling at ease due to a clear family plan.

state.今日运动: Adaptive jogging for 30 minutes

2025-09.daily_overview: On a busy workday, Lu Mingqiang was moved by the familiar industrial landscape during his commute and began consciously using his phone to capture the "geometric aesthetics" in his work. In the evenings, he restrained his social desires, dedicating more time to tutoring his two children in their studies, especially his younger son who had just started school. Simultaneously, he began scientifically planning the recovery path for his wrist injury to resume physical activities.

events.name: Declining a Late-Night Grilled Fish Invitation
events.description: Around nine in the evening, Lu Mingqiang received a WeChat message from his badminton friend Lin Feng inviting him for grilled fish. Considering he had an urgent high-voltage line repair task early the next morning at work, which required intense concentration and ample physical energy, he hesitated briefly before replying: "Thanks, Lin Feng, but I have emergency repair work early tomorrow and need to conserve my energy. Next time we play, I'll treat you to congee." Lin Feng quickly replied, expressing understanding, and they agreed on a time for their next game. Lu Mingqiang put down his phone. Though he felt a bit concerned about disappointing his friend, he knew clearly that work safety came first.

events.name: Evening Tutoring: Focus on Introduction to the Second Son
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang first quickly checked the completion of his eldest son Lu Zixuan’s homework. Then, he moved a small stool to sit beside his younger son Lu Zihan, who had just started primary school, and patiently taught him how to take out the corresponding textbooks and exercise books from his schoolbag. Holding his son’s small hand, he guided him stroke by stroke in writing pinyin, repeatedly emphasizing, "Sit up straight and hold the pen steadily." The entire process was carried out with patience and meticulousness until Lu Zihan could independently complete the simple writing exercises for his first day.

events.name: Capturing Light and Shadow During Commute
events.description: On the way to the construction site in Xiuying District in the morning, I passed by a substation that I see every day. The morning light was just right today, casting clear shadows of the steel framework under the sun. Lu Mingqiang slowed down to take a longer look, thinking about the stability of the structure and the orderly arrangement of the circuits. During the lunch break, he deliberately made a detour to the back of the company warehouse and took several close-up photos of parts of the substation and cable connectors from a low angle with his phone, focusing on the metallic reflections and the interwoven lines. He found this sense of "neat and powerful order" quite intriguing.

events.name: Planning for a Safe Resumption of Sports Activities
events.description: The rehabilitation period for the wrist has passed, and I feel good about it myself. After dinner, Lu Mingqiang used a notebook to briefly plan his upcoming exercise recovery schedule: maintain brisk walking after dinner in the first week; start attempting jogging in the second week, beginning with 2 kilometers; wait at least another month for squash training, and wear a wrist guard during the initial recovery phase. He also consulted his friend and fellow player Lin Feng via WeChat to understand the intensity control and safety precautions to consider when transitioning from jogging to squash.

events.name: Exam Preparation Review: Basic Knowledge of Power Systems
events.description: After helping his child with homework in the evening, Lu Mingqiang set aside half an hour to open his review materials for the senior electrician technician certification. He focused on reviewing the basic components of power systems and common types of faults, and sketched a few simple system diagrams in his notebook to deepen his understanding.

events.name: Working overtime temporarily due to work pressure to handle an urgent malfunction.
events.description: In the afternoon, the company received an urgent repair call from a client. Lu Mingqiang was temporarily dispatched to handle a short circuit issue at a distribution box, which delayed his off-duty time by one hour and added some work pressure.

起始状态.心情: Focus, preparing for a day of work and study guidance.

结束状态.心情: Full and slightly weary, contemplating due to overtime work and planning tasks.
