2025-09.daily_overview: A typical workday, filled with work and exam preparation. During the day, routine installation tasks were handled at the construction site, dealing with the inconveniences brought by intermittent rain. In the evening, exam review proceeded as planned, while efforts were made to maintain relationships with fellow players after declining an invitation the previous day. The rhythm of life was compact and orderly.

events.name: Daily Work: Indoor Equipment Inspection on Rainy Days
events.description: Today's work task involves equipment installation and preliminary debugging in the power distribution room of a newly built residential complex. An unexpected afternoon thunderstorm halted outdoor operations, prompting Lu Mingqiang and his colleague Chen Jianguo to shift their focus to inspecting the wiring integrity and insulation of the already installed indoor equipment. While working, Lu Mingqiang explained to his apprentice Zhao Qiang, who was following closely, the safety protocols for construction during rainy weather and the key points of indoor operations.

events.name: Exam Preparation Study: A Preliminary Exploration of Relay Protection Principles
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang continued his study for the senior technician certification exam, focusing on the basic principles of relay protection. He referred to the training materials and circuit diagrams found online, attempting to understand how various protective relays operate. When encountering several challenging points, he circled them with a red pen, planning to seek advice from his father over the weekend.

events.name: Actively maintain social relationships
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang remembered that he had turned down Lin Feng the previous night, so he proactively sent him a WeChat message: "Lin Feng, the weather tomorrow looks decent. How about a match at the usual spot in the evening? My wrist has improved quite a bit, but I'll still need to take it easy." He soon received a positive reply. This kind of proactive invitation not only maintained their friendship but also kept social interactions within his planned schedule.

events.name: Feeling slightly down due to the rainy weather, I went to bed early to adjust.
events.description: The continuous rainy and damp weather made Lu Mingqiang feel somewhat gloomy. Coupled with work pressure, he decided to go to bed early to regain energy and avoid excessive fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to embrace the day's work.

结束状态.心情: Smooth, completed the established learning and social maintenance tasks, but the weather affected the mood.

2025-09.daily_overview: Work proceeded as usual, with Lu Mingqiang demonstrating his consistent meticulousness while installing the distribution cabinet. The focus in the evening remained on family, as he systematically taught his younger son how to organize his schoolbag, bringing the methodical approach of a skilled technician into family education.

events.name: Teach the child to systematically organize the schoolbag.
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang did not rush to check homework. Instead, he first taught Lu Zihan how to organize his schoolbag. He emptied everything from the bag and, like setting up a "small project," demonstrated step by step: "Look, Hanhan, the Chinese textbook is the largest, so it goes at the bottom; the math book goes on top; the homework notebooks should be placed separately in this layer; and the pencil case should go on the side for easy access." He had his son practice the process twice on his own until Lu Zihan could basically complete it independently in the correct order. Lu Mingqiang nodded with satisfaction, feeling that developing good habits was more important than getting a single problem right.

events.name: Daily Work: Installation and Commissioning of Power Distribution Cabinets
events.description: Today's task involves installing new low-voltage distribution cabinets for a commercial building. Lu Mingqiang is responsible for leading the connection and fastening of the busbars inside the cabinets. He repeatedly uses a torque wrench to verify the tightness of each screw and emphasizes to his apprentice Zhao Qiang: "We cannot afford to be careless in such areas. If it's too loose, it will overheat; if it's too tight, the threads may strip. The force must be just right."

events.name: Exam Preparation Study: Organizing Difficult Issues in Relay Protection
events.description: Making use of fragmented time in the evening, Lu Mingqiang neatly copied several difficult points about relay protection that he had encountered while reading a few days ago onto a sticky note, planning to take it to his father's house on Saturday for guidance.

events.name: Started planning a weekend morning run with running buddies, and my mood improved.
events.description: As the weather cleared up, Lu Mingqiang's mood improved. He proactively contacted his running partner Chen Bin and tentatively arranged a morning run for Saturday to prepare for resuming his exercise routine.

起始状态.心情: Stable, methodical

结束状态.心情: Satisfied, feeling gratified to see my son acquire a new skill.

2025-09.daily_overview: A busy Friday. Lu Mingqiang identified and alerted his neighbor to an electrical safety hazard during work, demonstrating the integration of professional integrity into daily life. After work, during a meal with his colleagues, he proactively promoted healthy eating habits, reflecting the internalization of health awareness. Meanwhile, the monthly milestone for family finances arrived, with his salary deposited and the beginning-of-month savings plan set in motion.

events.name: Reminder on Safe Air Conditioner Installation for Neighbors
events.description: On his way home from work, Lu Mingqiang noticed that the newly installed outdoor unit of his neighbor Uncle Wang's air conditioner was placed too close to the window, and the power cord was tangled and messy. He knocked on Uncle Wang's door and politely pointed out, "Uncle Wang, your outdoor unit is installed too close to the window. In summer, the hot air won't be able to dissipate properly, which could easily damage the machine and increase electricity consumption. It would also be safer to protect these wires with a conduit." He then briefly explained some energy-saving tips for cleaning the air conditioner's filter. Uncle Wang repeatedly thanked him and said he would immediately contact the installer to make the necessary adjustments.

events.name: Regular Exercise Alleviates Work-Related Strain
events.description: After over a month of consistently taking brisk walks after dinner and performing simple core strength exercises, Lu Mingqiang felt that the occasional recurrence of lower back soreness had significantly diminished, and the fatigue accumulated from a day's work had also eased. While washing up in the evening, he performed several side planks in front of the mirror, sensing an improvement in his core strength. This reinforced his determination to persist with his exercise routine.

events.name: Team Dinner: Proactively Advocating for Healthy Eating
events.description: On Friday evening, after the team completed an urgent repair task, Team Leader Zhang invited everyone to dinner. When ordering, everyone habitually leaned toward spicy and heavy flavors. Lu Mingqiang glanced at the menu and proactively suggested, "The weather has been dry lately, so let's have something light. How about steamed sea fish and garlic stir-fried greens? It's good for our health." The workers agreed, finding his suggestion reasonable. During the meal, Lu Mingqiang also showed more restraint than usual, drinking only one bottle of beer before switching to tea.

events.name: Monthly Salary Payment Verification
events.description: The phone chimed with a text message notification. Lu Mingqiang checked it and saw that it was a notice about his September salary being deposited. He carefully verified the net amount received, which was largely consistent with his expectations. This marked the starting point for the family's monthly financial planning.

events.name: The wife had a preliminary communication with the homeroom teacher.
events.description: While picking up Lu Zihan, Wang Lijuan took advantage of the after-school interval to have a brief conversation with the homeroom teacher, inquiring about the child's adaptation during the first week at school, focusing primarily on classroom concentration and interactions with classmates. The teacher provided generally positive feedback. Wang Lijuan left her contact information for more in-depth communication in the future.

events.name: Confirm the Investment Effectiveness of Household Backup Power Supply
events.description: During dinner, the residential complex experienced a brief power outage lasting ten minutes due to a circuit malfunction. The small UPS that Lu Mingqiang had previously installed for his home successfully activated, ensuring the continuous operation of the refrigerator and Wi-Fi router. After the power was restored, he checked the UPS operation log and confirmed that the investment had achieved the expected results, which gave him a sense of reassurance.

events.name: Industrial Composition Attempts in the Workplace
events.description: During a break at a construction site that day, Lu Mingqiang was drawn to a yellow tower crane that had paused its operation. He walked to a safe distance and aimed his phone at the crane's massive mechanical arm and cabin, experimenting with different compositions to highlight the complexity and strength of its structure. He particularly liked a low-angle shot, where the steel framework cut through the blue sky, appearing exceptionally tall and upright.

起始状态.心情: Maintain a calm mindset to welcome the end of the workday.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and content, pleased with healthy dietary choices and the understanding of friends.

state.今日运动: Take a 20-minute light walk after the team dinner.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the rest day, with the theme of 'Planning and Adjustment,' Lu Mingqiang systematically handled household finances (enforced savings and expenditure review), helped his second son formulate a study plan, and visited the community hospital for a formal follow-up examination of his wrist rehabilitation, where he received professional exercise restrictions and rehabilitation guidance. Based on this, he developed a rigorous 'Exercise Restart Plan' and made preparations for tomorrow's family activity.

events.name: Implement monthly forced savings
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang logged into the mobile banking app and skillfully transferred 3,000 yuan from his salary card to the family’s dedicated savings account, completing the mandatory savings for September. This was part of the family financial discipline he and his wife had agreed upon at the beginning of the year.

events.name: Reviewing Household Expenditure Trends
events.description: After completing the transfer, Lu Mingqiang pulled up the expense categorization report for the past three months (June, July, and August) in his accounting app. He focused on several major categories, including 'Education,' 'Dining,' and 'Daily Shopping.' It was evident that the education expenses showed a slight peak at the end of August due to purchasing school supplies for his second child's enrollment, while dining expenses were slightly higher during the summer vacation in July and August because the children ate at home more frequently.

events.name: Record Key Points for Budget Review
events.description: He briefly recorded the observed changes in expenditures in his phone's memo, particularly the potential sustained increase in education-related expenses following the second child's enrollment and the characteristic higher utility bills during summer, as a basis for discussion at the end-of-month family financial meeting.

events.name: Initial Discovery of Financial Communication with Wife
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang showed his wife Wang Lijuan the expense chart on his phone and shared his observations: "Lijuan, look, after Hanhan starts school, this part of the spending definitely needs to be kept stable. Also, with the hot weather, the water and electricity bills are high. Let's carefully review everything again at the end of the month to see if there are any areas where we can save." Wang Lijuan agreed and added some of her own observations from daily purchases.

events.name: Establish a Daily Study Schedule for the Second Son
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and Lu Zihan used colored markers to draw a simple table on an A4 paper, indicating that the time after school until before dinner from Monday to Friday was designated as "homework time," and the time after dinner was "review and reading time." Lu Mingqiang explained to his son, "Just like Dad has to work according to a schedule, studying also needs to be structured. Let's give it a try starting next week."

events.name: Wrist Injury Follow-up Examination and Obtaining Professional Advice
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lu Mingqiang went to the community hospital for a follow-up examination of his wrist. After the examination, the doctor confirmed that the ligament had largely healed but explicitly stated, "For the next two months, you must avoid sports that require sudden wrist exertion, such as squash. Running can be gradually resumed, but both distance and speed should be controlled initially." The doctor also taught him several rehabilitation exercises to enhance wrist stability.

events.name: Develop a Progressive Exercise Resumption Plan
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang carefully considered the doctor's prohibition, his own 60-hour workweek, and family time. He then wrote a plan on a piece of paper placed on the coffee table: For the first week, take a 30-minute brisk walk after dinner each day, plus 10 minutes of wrist rehabilitation exercises. For the second week, attempt to jog 2-3 kilometers every other day. Squash is to be suspended at least until mid-November, and consultation with a doctor is required before resuming.

events.name: Planning Tomorrow's Family Kite-Flying Activity
events.description: After checking the weather forecast and confirming that Sunday would be sunny, Lu Mingqiang discussed with his wife and decided to take the children to Wanlü Park to fly kites the following afternoon. In the evening, he retrieved his traditional swallow-shaped kite from the storage room, carefully inspected the bamboo frame for any cracks, checked the silk covering for integrity, and untangled the kite string. He also prepared a picnic mat, water, and snacks.

起始状态.心情: Relax and prepare to handle a series of planning-related matters.

结束状态.心情: Meticulous and expectant, having completed multiple plans and looking forward to tomorrow's family activities.

state.今日运动: 10 minutes of round-trip walking to and from the community hospital and wrist rehabilitation training

date_attribute.weather: The sky is clear and boundless, with a gentle breeze blowing.

2025-09.daily_overview: A pure family day. The whole family went to Wanlü Park to fly kites and have a picnic, fulfilling the promise made to the children. Lu Mingqiang temporarily set aside the pressures of work and exam preparation. While teaching the children kite-flying skills and enjoying the joy of family time, he also relived happy childhood memories. Family bonds were strengthened in this relaxed atmosphere.

events.name: Family Kite Flying and Picnic at Wanlvyuan Park
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang drove his family to Wanlü Park. While assembling a swallow-shaped kite, he explained to his two sons how to judge wind direction and master the techniques of handling the kite string. He first demonstrated how to launch the kite into the sky, and after it stabilized, he guided his elder son Lu Zixuan step by step in controlling the string. The younger son, Lu Zihan, excitedly chased the kite’s shadow across the lawn. His wife, Wang Lijuan, spread out a picnic blanket and recorded the interaction between the father and sons with her phone. Watching the kite soaring in the sky, Lu Mingqiang was reminded of the time when his own father took him to fly kites by the seaside in his childhood.

events.name: Picnic Time and Family Bonding
events.description: During a break from flying kites, the family sat on a picnic mat to rest, sharing fruits and snacks. The children chattered away about amusing stories from school, while Lu Mingqiang and his wife chatted about family matters and anecdotes from work. The sun was warm, and a gentle breeze brushed against their faces, immersing the whole family in a rare moment of leisure and joy.

events.name: Activity Wrap-up and Return Trip
events.description: As the wind gradually subsided in the evening, Lu Mingqiang skillfully reeled the kite back in. He guided the two children in helping to collect the trash, keeping the lawn tidy. Then, the family drove home contentedly, filled with joy and a hint of fatigue.

events.name: Tidying Up and Family Dinner
events.description: Upon returning home, Lu Mingqiang carefully wiped the kite clean, inspected it to ensure it was in good condition, and then stored it back in the storage room. Wang Lijuan prepared a simple dinner. At the dinner table, everyone continued to relish the joyful moments of the afternoon with great enthusiasm. Lu Mingqiang felt that this activity had effectively helped the whole family relax, particularly alleviating the children's tension at the beginning of the new school term.

起始状态.心情: Lighthearted and cheerful, looking forward to family activities

结束状态.心情: Pleasant and content, having enjoyed high-quality family time.

state.今日运动: Flying kites and taking a walk in Wanlvyuan Park for about 2 hours.

2025-09.daily_overview: As the new week begins, life returns to the routines of work and study. In the evening, an impromptu gathering with old classmates leaves Lu Mingqiang slightly torn between friendship and his commitment to healthy habits, but his wife's understanding puts him at ease. Meanwhile, an important long-term family plan—his parents' ruby wedding anniversary celebration—is brought onto the agenda, and he has an initial discussion with his older brother about it.

events.name: A Small Gathering of Old Classmates and the Habit of "Making Exceptions"
events.description: One evening, Wu Gang, a junior high school classmate whom Lu Mingqiang hadn't seen in a long time, suddenly invited him for a small gathering. The two chatted particularly well at their usual street food stall, reminiscing from their student days to their current family and children. Wu Gang enthusiastically ordered grilled fish and beer. Lu Mingqiang initially wanted to decline, but out of respect for their old friendship and the enjoyable conversation, he ultimately couldn't hold back and ended up having a few drinks with him. After returning home, he said somewhat regretfully to his wife, Wang Lijuan, "I couldn't control myself again." Wang Lijuan smiled and comforted him, "It's fine once in a while. Take it slow, and don't put too much pressure on yourself."

events.name: Discussing the Ruby Wedding Anniversary Celebration for Parents with My Brother
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang communicated in detail with his elder brother Lu Minghua in Shenzhen via WeChat, deciding to hold a celebration for their parents' 40th wedding anniversary (Ruby Wedding) during this year's National Day holiday. The two brothers preliminarily agreed on the approximate budget, scale (inviting only close relatives and friends), and format (family dinner), and clarified their division of labor: Lu Mingqiang is responsible for contacting restaurants in Haikou and notifying local relatives; Lu Minghua is responsible for purchasing gifts and covering the majority of the expenses.

events.name: Mild gastrointestinal discomfort due to dietary habits during gatherings
events.description: After the late-night gathering, Lu Mingqiang felt some discomfort in his stomach and intestines, likely due to the grilled fish and beer, and decided to pay attention to dietary adjustments the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calmness, returning to a working state.

结束状态.心情: Slightly complex, with the joy of reuniting with old friends, a slight annoyance at making an exception, and a sense of steadiness from the certainty of a major family matter.

2025-09.daily_overview: Daily work proceeds in an orderly manner. In the familiar company warehouse, Lu Mingqiang, from the perspective of a skilled worker, discovers the beauty of order and light and shadow hidden among the scattered tools and parts, quietly documenting them. In the evening, while helping his child with homework, he pays more attention to writing standards. A notification on his phone reminds him that tomorrow is Teachers' Day, bringing to mind two important teacher figures in his life.

events.name: Homework Tutoring: Emphasize Neat Handwriting
events.description: While checking homework in the evening, Lu Mingqiang noticed that his second son, Lu Zihan, had written somewhat sloppily. Instead of criticizing him, he sat down beside his son, held his hand, and demonstrated on a blank sheet of paper: "Writing is like connecting wires—every stroke must be precise, and you shouldn’t rush. Look, this horizontal stroke should be level, and this vertical stroke should be straight." He had Lu Zihan practice a few lines until there was improvement and encouraged him to stay focused.

events.name: Discovering Still Life Light and Shadow in the Warehouse
events.description: While searching for parts in the company's material warehouse in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang's gaze was drawn to a pile of old tools awaiting sorting, scattered cable connectors, and a beam of sunlight slanting in through a high window. The light illuminated the oil stains and wear marks on the metal surfaces, revealing a unique texture. He took out his phone, avoiding the others, and quickly snapped a few photos, focusing on the metallic reflections under the light and the interlaced shadows of the objects. He felt this had more of a "sense of story" than brand-new equipment.

events.name: Thinking of Teacher's Day greetings
events.description: While browsing his phone in the evening, Lu Mingqiang saw a push notification about Teachers' Day, which immediately reminded him of his aunt Wang Xiuying, who was once a primary school teacher, and his neighbor Uncle Wang (Wang Jianguo), a retired teacher living in the same community. He decided to make time the next day to send them his best wishes.

events.name: Adjusting diet due to gastrointestinal discomfort and going to bed early for recovery.
events.description: Due to the effects of the gathering the night before, Lu Mingqiang maintained a light diet today and went to bed early to aid his body's recovery, preventing the accumulation of work fatigue.

起始状态.心情: Stable

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, carrying thoughts of the elders

2025-09.daily_overview: On Teacher's Day, during a break from work, Lu Mingqiang sincerely extended his blessings to two important teacher-like figures in his life—his aunt and their neighbor Uncle Wang—and received warm responses in return. This exchange of gratitude allowed him to experience a warmth of neighborly affection that transcends blood ties. In the evening, he continued his practical preparations for the senior technician examination.

events.name: Telephone Greetings to Aunt Wang Xiuying
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang made a phone call to his aunt Wang Xiuying under the shade of a tree near the construction site. After the call connected, he sincerely said, "Auntie, Happy Teacher's Day! Thank you for your guidance in the past and for always caring about us." He patiently listened to his aunt's concerned inquiries, provided a detailed update on the recent situation of his two children, and reminded her to take care of her health. The call lasted over ten minutes, filled with a warm atmosphere.

events.name: WeChat Greetings to Uncle Wang, Our Neighbor
events.description: After hanging up the call with his aunt, Lu Mingqiang immediately sent a WeChat message to his neighbor Uncle Wang (Wang Jianguo): "Uncle Wang, Happy Teachers' Day! Thank you for always taking care of our family." After sending the message, he continued with his afternoon work.

events.name: Received Uncle Wang's warm-hearted reply and invitation
events.description: Soon, Uncle Wang replied on WeChat: "Thank you, Mingqiang! It's you young people who work hard. I owe you for reminding me about the air conditioner last time. Come over for tea when you have a chance—I've recently gotten some good tea leaves." Reading the reply, Lu Mingqiang felt a warmth in his heart and decided to make time to visit over the weekend.

events.name: Sharing Neighborhood Warmth with My Wife
events.description: When returning home for dinner in the evening, Lu Mingqiang mentioned to his wife his interactions with his aunt and Uncle Wang during the day. He remarked with emotion, "A near neighbor is better than a distant relative. Uncle Wang is such a kind person." He then discussed with his wife the idea of visiting Uncle Wang's home over the weekend and bringing some fruit as a gesture.

events.name: Practical Preparation: Applying for Relay Protection Commissioning Practice
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang requested permission from the squad leader to practice operating the old relay protection tester in the training room. Following the review materials and examination syllabus, he repeatedly practiced the procedures for setting and verifying current and time parameters, recording the operational data and results at each step until he could independently and accurately complete a standard debugging process.

events.name: Begin a three-day minor household electrical circuit repair project (Day 1)
events.description: Lu Mingqiang decided to utilize the evening time to begin a three-day minor home electrical circuit repair project, inspecting and reinforcing the old sockets in the house to enhance electrical safety. Today, the preliminary inspection of the living room section was completed.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a heart of gratitude

结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, finding joy in expressing gratitude and receiving positive feedback.

2025-09.daily_overview: Exam preparation has entered a more specific implementation phase. Lu Mingqiang enrolled in an online systematic course to make his studies more structured. At the same time, he proactively contacted his running partners and planned to resume his morning runs, which had been suspended due to an injury—a crucial step in his exercise recovery plan. In the evenings, he continued targeted revision and began guiding his child to develop habits of previewing and reviewing lessons.

events.name: Guide children to establish the habit of previewing and reviewing.
events.description: When tutoring Lu Zihan with his homework, Lu Mingqiang does more than just check for completion. He asks his son to take out the Chinese textbook and try to recite the pinyin learned that day. Then, they flip through the new lesson to be studied the next day together. He uses simple language to describe the story in the text, sparking the child's interest. "Let's take a look before we study each day and reflect after we learn, just like how Dad checks the blueprint before repairing a machine and tests it after finishing."

events.name: Contact running partners to plan restarting morning runs.
events.description: Feeling that his wrist had fully recovered, Lu Mingqiang proactively contacted his running partner Chen Bin via WeChat: "Brother Bin, my wrist is all better now. This Saturday morning, Wanlü Park, a recovery jog, are you in?" Chen Bin quickly replied with his agreement, and the two arranged a specific time and meeting place.

events.name: Targeted Review and Error Correction Organization
events.description: Based on the issues revealed in the recent mock test, Lu Mingqiang utilized his evenings to focus on reviewing the two weak chapters: Power Electronics and Motor Drives. He neatly transcribed the incorrectly answered questions and the easily confused knowledge points into a dedicated notebook, adding his own understanding and corrected answers.

events.name: Register for the Online System Course for Senior Electrician Technician
events.description: After comparing and inquiring on a vocational training website, Lu Mingqiang selected an online systematic course for the Senior Electrician Technician Examination and paid the tuition fee. He downloaded the course syllabus and the first batch of study materials, planning to start systematic review from this weekend by following the course schedule.

events.name: Minor Household Electrical Circuit Repair Project (Day Two)
events.description: Continued with the minor home electrical circuit repair project. Today, I inspected and replaced two old outlets in the kitchen, ensuring proper grounding. The task took approximately one hour.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, ready to execute multiple plans.

结束状态.心情: Methodical and steady, feeling reassured about the progress of the plan.

state.今日运动: One hour of light activity in household circuit maintenance.

2025-09.daily_overview: Another busy Friday. Lu Mingqiang received a new project assignment at work. After work, his gathering with his colleague Chen Jianguo over "laoba tea" turned into a dedicated session for the two fathers to share their parenting concerns. In the evening, he openly shared with his family the "successes" and "exceptions" in adjusting his social habits, gaining the support of the entire family. Meanwhile, an internal mock exam tested the results of his recent studies.

events.name: Sharing insights on habit adjustment with family members
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang proactively brought up the recent gatherings, including successfully declining Lin Feng's invitation and the previous exception of drinking with Wu Gang. His eldest son, Lu Zixuan, asked curiously, "Dad, why do you sometimes go and sometimes not?" Lu Mingqiang patted his son's head and answered honestly, "Dad wants to take better care of his health so he can spend more time playing ball and flying kites with you in the future. That means eating less greasy food and getting more rest." His wife and children all expressed their support, which strengthened his determination to continue making adjustments.

events.name: Daily work: Clocking off with coworkers
events.description: After completing a day's work of installing meter boxes at the power engineering company, Lu Mingqiang and his partner Chen Jianguo carefully counted and packed up their tools, tidied the engineering vehicle compartment in an orderly manner, and prepared to get off work.

events.name: Drinking afternoon tea with coworkers and sharing parenting experiences.
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo did not head straight home. Instead, as usual, they went to the familiar old-fashioned tea shop near the company. Over two cups of black tea and a few plates of snacks, their conversation quickly shifted from the construction challenges encountered that day to the more troubling topic of their children's education. Chen Jianguo shared his concerns about his eldest daughter, who had just entered middle school and was beginning to show signs of rebellion and talking back. Lu Mingqiang, in turn, discussed how he was guiding his younger son, who had just started primary school, to adapt to academic life. The two exchanged advice, sighing that "raising children is even more taxing than troubleshooting circuit faults," yet they found solace and relaxation in their shared experiences.

events.name: Received the survey task for old residential area renovation.
events.description: On the construction site, Foreman Zhang verbally informed Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo that they would need to conduct a preliminary survey for an electric meter box renovation project in an old residential community tomorrow (Saturday) afternoon. He briefly explained the project background and key points to note.

events.name: Participate in the company's internal mock written examination
events.description: The company's Engineering Department organized an internal mock written exam for employees applying for the senior technician qualification. Lu Mingqiang participated in the test to assess the results of his previous stage of review. After the exam, he felt uncertain about some questions but also clearly identified several knowledge gaps, which made his subsequent review more targeted.

events.name: Completion of Minor Household Circuit Repair Project (Day 3)
events.description: Completed a minor household electrical circuit repair project. Inspected the bedroom circuits today and taught my eldest son, Lu Zixuan, some basic electrical safety knowledge. The project is now concluded, and the overall electrical safety awareness of the entire family has been enhanced.

events.name: Staying up late to study due to the pressure of mock exams.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang stayed up late to review in order to address his shortcomings from the mock exam, focusing on analyzing his mistakes, which resulted in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Steady, welcoming Friday.

结束状态.心情: Slightly tired yet fulfilled, warmed by family support, and steadied by a clear direction for review.

2025-09.daily_overview: A fulfilling day off. In the early morning, I resumed my morning run with fellow runners, rediscovering the joy of exercise. During the day, I attended an advanced technician intensive course, absorbing new knowledge. In the evening, I drove to seek advice from my retired electrician father on practical challenges. Through the exchange between two generations of technical workers, I resolved my confusions and enjoyed a warm family dinner. After returning home in the evening, I organized my learning gains to prepare for tackling technical challenges.

events.name: Encourage children to attempt completing their homework independently.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang was reading in the study and asked his second son, Lu Zihan, to try completing a portion of his math homework independently. He sat nearby, only offering gentle hints when his son scratched his head in hesitation for a long time. After completion, he carefully reviewed the work, praised the well-done parts, and analyzed the reasons for the mistakes together with his son.

events.name: Resuming morning runs with running partners
events.description: On Saturday morning, Lu Mingqiang met Chen Bin at Wanlü Park for a slow run of approximately five kilometers. This was his first formal run since recovering from a wrist injury, so he strictly controlled his pace and distance. During the run, the two chatted as they jogged. Chen Bin shared interesting anecdotes from his logistics work, while Lu Mingqiang discussed his progress in exam preparation and his child’s education. After the exercise, he felt refreshed both physically and mentally, with no discomfort in his wrist.

events.name: Participate in the Senior Technician Weekend Intensive Course
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang attended a weekend intensive course for the Senior Electrician Technician Certificate. During the class, the instructor provided a detailed explanation of the complex logic involved in the coordinated debugging of relay protection systems. Lu Mingqiang listened attentively and noted down several operational challenges and theoretical questions.

events.name: Drive to my parents' home to seek advice from my father.
events.description: After class in the evening, Lu Mingqiang drove directly to his parents' home in Meilan District. He brought along his class notes and blueprints, intending to consult his father, Lu Jianguo, an experienced electrician, about the questions he hadn't fully understood during the day.

events.name: Consulting Father on Difficulties in Relay Protection Commissioning
events.description: In the living room of his parents' home, Lu Mingqiang spread out the blueprints and raised questions to his father about protection setting coordination and common causes of misoperation. Putting on his reading glasses, his father drew on decades of field experience to explain in detail using plain language and practical examples. He also shared several "folk methods" not found in the blueprints for quickly troubleshooting faults and corrected one of Lu Mingqiang's misunderstandings. The exchange between father and son was both professional and focused.

events.name: A Warm Dinner with Parents
events.description: After the prayer session ended, Chen Xiuying, the mother, had already prepared the meal. The family gathered around the table to eat. During the meal, the mother inquired about her grandson's studies, while the father asked Lu Mingqiang about his recent work. Everyone chatted as they ate, creating a harmonious atmosphere.

events.name: Return home to organize key learning points
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang drove home. Upon arriving, he did not take a break but immediately reorganized and supplemented the key points and corrected understandings he had learned from his father into his exam preparation notebook. This was to reinforce his memory and prepare for subsequent practical exercises and the exam.

events.name: Listen to the Online Sprint Lecture
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang used his phone to listen to an online intensive lecture for the senior technician exam, taking notes on the latest exam points and test-taking techniques emphasized by the lecturer. He felt he had a clearer grasp of the exam's direction.

起始状态.心情: A positive day, looking forward to the fulfillment of exercise and learning.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and confident, I am invigorated by solving technical challenges and feeling the support of my family.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5 kilometers

2025-09.daily_overview: The theme for Sunday was 'Planning and Preparation.' Lu Mingqiang proactively managed his social arrangements for the upcoming week and reinforced his healthy habits. He reviewed the development of study habits over the past two weeks with his second son, offering affirmation and encouragement. Additionally, he conducted an on-site inspection of a restaurant to finalize key details for his parents' wedding anniversary celebration.

events.name: Proactively plan social activities for next week
events.description: On Sunday evening, Lu Mingqiang checked the calendar on his phone and thought about his schedule for the upcoming week. He proactively sent WeChat messages to his coworker Chen Jianguo and his badminton partner Lin Feng, making arrangements in advance for tea on Saturday afternoon and porridge after their Wednesday game. He decided in his mind that if he encountered any last-minute invitations for late-night gatherings in the future, unless under special circumstances, he would prioritize declining them politely with reasons such as "I have to wake up early for work tomorrow" or "I've already promised to spend time with my child."

events.name: Reviewing Study Habit Formation with the Second Son
events.description: Before bedtime, Lu Mingqiang and Lu Zihan sat together to review their performance over the past two weeks in areas such as organizing schoolbags, completing homework on time, and maintaining proper sitting posture. He acknowledged his son's progress: "Hanhan, look how neatly you've organized your schoolbag now!" At the same time, he pointed out areas where handwriting could be improved and encouraged him to continue working hard next week, gradually turning good habits into second nature.

events.name: On-site inspection of the parents' celebration restaurant
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang drove alone to conduct on-site inspections of several time-honored restaurants in Haikou, renowned for their authentic Hainanese cuisine and high cost-effectiveness. He compared factors such as the ambiance, private room sizes, menu offerings, and pricing, ultimately selecting a highly reputed restaurant located near the Qilou Old Street. On the spot, he discussed with the manager the arrangements for booking the entire venue during the National Day holiday and paid a deposit, officially securing the location for his parents’ ruby wedding anniversary celebration.

events.name: Evening walks maintain exercise during the recovery period
events.description: After inspecting the restaurant in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang conducted a 40-minute brisk walk at Wanlv Park, combined with wrist rehabilitation training, strictly adhering to the exercise restart plan.

起始状态.心情: Relax and prepare to handle weekend wrap-up and planning tasks.

结束状态.心情: Meticulous and composed, with an enhanced sense of control over life due to advance planning.

state.今日运动: 40 minutes of brisk walking, 10 minutes of wrist rehabilitation training

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of a new week, Lu Mingqiang, as a key technical expert, took the lead in a preliminary survey for the renovation project of old residential electricity meter boxes. Working closely with his colleagues and property management, he demonstrated solid professional skills and a responsible attitude. Meanwhile, his personal hobby—the concept of crafting a large traditional swallow-shaped kite—gradually took shape in his mind, serving as a relaxing diversion during his spare time.

events.name: Leading the Survey for Electrical Meter Box Renovation in Old Residential Communities
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang, along with foreman Zhang Tou and coworker Chen Jianguo, went to the target old residential area for an on-site inspection. Drawing on his extensive experience, he carefully examined the location of the electric meter boxes in each unit, the aging condition and routing of the existing wiring, and focused on assessing the safety risks posed by the narrow construction space and tangled wiring. During the inspection, he pointed out several wiring nodes with the highest potential hazards. On-site, he fully communicated with Foreman Zhang, Chen Jianguo, and Property Manager Wang, preliminarily determining key matters such as the construction plan, required special materials, coordination of power outage periods, and emphasized the importance of safety measures.

events.name: Preparing for the afternoon site inspection
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang carefully inspected and prepared the tools needed for the afternoon survey at his workstation: a voltage tester, insulated gloves, a tape measure, a high-intensity flashlight, a notebook, and a camera (for documenting the site conditions). He also printed a basic floor plan of the residential complex and made preliminary markings on it.

events.name: Designing and crafting a large traditional swallow kite
events.description: During his evening rest, Lu Mingqiang recalled the various kites in the sky at Wanlü Park on Sunday, which sparked the idea of crafting a larger and more refined traditional swallow-shaped kite. He fetched paper and a pen, began sketching a draft, and initially determined a wingspan of 1.6 meters. He also considered using lighter and more resilient silk cloth along with sturdier bamboo strips for the frame, planning to adorn the kite's surface with traditional auspicious cloud patterns. This creative process brought him a sense of relaxation and joy.

events.name: Perform Walking and Wrist Rehabilitation Exercises
events.description: After work in the evening, Lu Mingqiang took a 40-minute brisk walk on the Wanlüyuan Trail at a pace of 8-9 minutes per kilometer, and completed a 10-minute wrist rehabilitation training, such as grip ball exercises, to promote full recovery of the wrist.

起始状态.心情: Stay focused and get ready to embrace new work challenges.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and accomplished due to having led the preliminary work of the project, which gave a sense of self-worth, while also being filled with anticipation for new ideas.

state.今日运动: 40 minutes of brisk walking, 10 minutes of wrist rehabilitation training, and approximately 1 hour of surveying stairs in old residential communities.

date_attribute.weather: Partly cloudy with sunny intervals, muggy weather.

2025-09.daily_overview: With a clear focus on the work, centered around the renovation project of electrical meter boxes in old residential communities, Lu Mingqiang, as a key technical member, participated in all preliminary tasks from on-site inspections to material preparation. He demonstrated a meticulous and rigorous work style, all while being in the recovery period for a wrist injury.

events.name: On-site inspection of electricity meter boxes in old residential communities
events.description: Lu Mingqiang, along with Team Leader Zhang Jianguo and coworker Chen Jianguo, visited the old residential community scheduled for renovation. Drawing on his extensive on-site experience, he focused on inspecting the degree of rust on the electricity meter box casings, the load and aging condition of the internal wiring, as well as the impact of the narrow corridor spaces on construction. He engaged in on-site discussions with Team Leader Zhang and Chen Jianguo regarding technical challenges, safety risks, and estimated working hours. They preliminarily identified several units with the most severe issues that required priority attention.

events.name: Inventory and Preparation of Construction Materials
events.description: Upon returning to the company, Lu Mingqiang proactively went to the warehouse based on his site inspection impressions. Following the standard construction checklist, he counted and collected materials such as new meter boxes, wires of various specifications, circuit breakers, and insulating tape. He also individually inspected personal and team tools, including the electric drill, multimeter, and wire stripper, to ensure they were in good condition and fully charged, guaranteeing a smooth start to the work the following day.

events.name: Evening Wrist Rehabilitation Training
events.description: Perform a daily 10-minute wrist stability exercise at home using a grip ball for grasping and flexion-extension movements to promote ligament recovery and avoid excessive stress on the wrist.

events.name: Organize On-site Records and Requirements List
events.description: At home in the evening, Lu Mingqiang did not rest immediately. He opened the notes he had taken during the day and, relying on his memory, sketched circuit diagrams of several complex units in his notebook, marking key problem areas. He assisted Team Leader Zhang in organizing the scattered survey information into a well-structured record and drafted a preliminary list of material requirements to facilitate the subsequent development of a formal construction plan.

events.name: Evening Study Review
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Ming forced himself to concentrate and reviewed the sections on power distribution system design and safety regulations in electrical engineering theory for half an hour. He connected the actual cases investigated during the day with the textbook knowledge to deepen his understanding.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with some anticipation for the new project, yet tinged with caution during the recovery period.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, having completed the preliminary preparations for the project and rehabilitation training, with a hint of thoughtful fatigue.

state.今日运动: Occupational physical labor, 10-minute wrist rehabilitation training

2025-09.daily_overview: Amidst the drizzling rain, the project construction proceeded under intense pressure. Meanwhile, a chance observation opened the door for Lu Mingqiang to examine his daily work environment from a new perspective, and the slight increase in stress affected his diet.

events.name: Discovering Industrial Aesthetics in the Rain
events.description: After completing the repair of a distribution box outdoors in the morning, a light drizzle continued to fall. While packing up his tools, Lu Mingqiang inadvertently noticed rainwater meandering across the surface of the gray metal box, forming crystal-clear droplets that refracted the blurred light and shadows of the surrounding environment. This typically cold industrial component now possessed an unexpected texture. He crouched down, took out his phone, and captured several close-up photos using macro mode, hoping to preserve this momentary discovery.

events.name: First Day of Electric Meter Box Renovation Faces Challenges
events.description: In the afternoon, the team officially entered the old residential community to begin replacing the electrical meter boxes. While removing the first old box, Lu Mingqiang discovered that the situation was more complex than anticipated: the insulation layer of the entry wiring in the hallway was severely brittle, and the space felt narrower than during the initial survey. He immediately called for a halt, deciding to personally handle this most complicated unit. He instructed his apprentice Zhao Qiang to observe from the side, explaining how to safely strip and label the old wiring in confined spaces.

events.name: High-standard drill for daily work orders
events.description: Midway through his work, Lu Mingqiang received an urgent order to replace an air switch for a long-term client. He did not treat the task carelessly just because it seemed simple; instead, he regarded it as a practical training opportunity. Following the exact procedures and standards of a senior technician assessment, he carried out each step—from power outage and electrical testing to installation and final inspection—with clarity and deliberation. Throughout the process, he had Zhao Qiang observe closely, explaining the theoretical basis and safety precautions for every action.

events.name: Practical exam preparation during work breaks
events.description: During a brief break in the installation work at a substation, with the permission of Foreman Zhang, Lu Mingqiang utilized idle equipment on-site to simulate the examination item of secondary circuit wiring for high-voltage cabinets. He meticulously followed the standard procedures he had in mind, silently rehearsed the logic for troubleshooting, and closely integrated theory with practice.

events.name: Late-night snacking due to stress
events.description: After dinner, due to project pressure, Lu Mingqiang felt somewhat anxious and unconsciously ate more snacks, such as peanuts and biscuits, as a form of emotional relief.

events.name: Communicating with Wife about Child's Recent Situation
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang asked his wife Wang Lijuan whether their younger son Lu Zihan, who had just started elementary school, was adjusting to the new environment. Wang Lijuan mentioned that the child was a bit shy, but the homeroom teacher was very patient. After hearing this, Lu Mingqiang nodded and decided to spend more time with his younger son over the weekend.

起始状态.心情: Focused, preparing for the first day of construction, feeling slightly pressured.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary yet content, there is both the sense of accomplishment from completing a challenge and the subtle delight of discovering new perspectives, though a lingering feeling of pressure remains.

state.今日运动: The work involves a significant amount of heavy manual labor.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a splendid sunset glow in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: An ordinary workday took a turn due to a stunning sunset scene, prompting Lu Mingqiang to consciously transform a professional setting into a photographic creation for the first time. The unexpectedly positive feedback he received touched him deeply.

events.name: Arranged a weekend morning run with running buddies.
events.description: During his lunch break at work, Lu Mingqiang received a WeChat message from his running buddy Chen Bin, inviting him to continue their run at Wanlü Park next Saturday morning. He readily agreed and confirmed the time and meeting location, as this had become a regular routine for him to maintain his physical fitness and relax his mind during his exam preparation period.

events.name: Astonished by the grid's interplay of light and shadow under the sunset
events.description: After work in the evening, I rode my bicycle back from Xiuying District to Longhua District. When I reached an open area, it was sunset, and the golden afterglow poured down unobstructed, penetrating the crisscrossing grid structures of power lines and utility poles, casting complex and powerful elongated shadows on the ground. This industrial landscape, which I pass by daily, unexpectedly revealed a striking beauty of order and rhythm under the specific light, compelling Lu Mingqiang to stop his bike involuntarily.

events.name: Stop to take industrial-style photos
events.description: He was deeply captivated by the scene before him and immediately took out his phone. Unlike yesterday, when he had taken photos casually, he now consciously sought out angles: crouching down to let the shadow of the utility pole stretch longer, turning sideways to capture the silhouette of the structure against the setting sun. He took more than a dozen consecutive shots, focusing on the interplay of lines, light, shadow, and structure.

events.name: Selecting photos after dinner
events.description: After dinner, without pausing to rest, he sat at his desk and opened his phone's photo album, carefully comparing all the pictures taken that evening. He repeatedly zoomed in to examine the details, comparing the visual impact of different compositions, and finally selected the photo with the strongest contrast of light and shadow and the most aesthetically pleasing interplay of lines.

events.name: Share works to photography group
events.description: He titled this selected photo "The Net" and posted it in a local photography enthusiasts' WeChat group he had accidentally joined a few months earlier, adding a brief note: [Saw this on my way home from work—thought the lines and shadows were quite interesting.]

events.name: Received positive feedback from group members
events.description: After posting the photo, he checked his phone from time to time. Group members gradually liked and commented: [Industrial style is so cool!], [Never thought a utility pole could look like this], [Great capture of light and shadow!]. These unfamiliar acknowledgments took him somewhat by surprise.

events.name: New insights arise within the mind.
events.description: Reading these responses stirred a wave of emotion in Lu Mingqiang. He suddenly realized that the professional environment he inhabited day after day, which he sometimes found monotonous and burdensome, actually contained a unique visual beauty that could be appreciated by others. This opened a new window for him to observe the familiar world, bringing a sense of pure spiritual satisfaction distinct from the fulfillment of completing tasks.

起始状态.心情: Usually, following the routine, with a slight relief from yesterday's pressure.

结束状态.心情: Joyful and filled with new discoveries, the interest in photography was officially ignited, and the mental state was uplifted.

state.今日运动: Commuting by bicycle, 10-minute wrist rehabilitation training

2025-09.daily_overview: Amidst the tight schedule of project construction and exam preparation, the lingering freshness brought by photography remains, yet it is gradually being replaced by more pressing practical pressures, with rehabilitation training being postponed due to a busy workload.

events.name: Continue the construction of the electric meter box renovation.
events.description: Devoting the entire day to the renovation of meter boxes in old residential communities, Lu Mingqiang was primarily responsible for the technically challenging tasks of line connection and debugging. He personally guided Zhao Qiang through standardized wiring operations, repeatedly emphasizing the importance of phase inspection and insulation treatment.

events.name: Browsing through the photography group messages during the lunch break.
events.description: During lunch, he opened the photography WeChat group again and saw a few more comments under the post titled "The Net" that he had shared the previous night. He silently read them for a while, made no reply, but the corners of his mouth unconsciously lifted into a slight smile. Then he turned off his phone and continued eating.

events.name: Rehabilitation training was suspended due to a busy work schedule.
events.description: Feeling extremely exhausted after work, Lu Mingqiang decided to skip the wrist rehabilitation training for the day and rest directly to cope with the heavier workload tomorrow.

events.name: Research Project Drawings
events.description: After work, he did not go home immediately but stayed in the company office to review the original electrical circuit drawings of the residential complex under construction. Based on the practical issues encountered on-site in recent days, he marked up a copy of the drawings and contemplated how to optimize the routing of circuits for subsequent units to avoid the identified risk points.

events.name: Evening Theoretical Review
events.description: After returning home, he studied the [Circuit Design and Analysis] module according to his exam preparation plan. While watching instructional videos, he sketched simple home circuit diagrams in his notebook and attempted to mark potential areas of wiring aging risks in his own home, thereby integrating theory and practice more closely.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a touch of yesterday's excitement, yet slightly fatigued.

结束状态.心情: Focused, slightly fatigued, but the review has been fruitful, with a slight sense of guilt over the postponement of rehabilitation training.

state.今日运动: The work involves a significant amount of heavy manual labor.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and sunny, with a gentle morning breeze.

2025-09.daily_overview: The day off began with a regular morning run, balancing family shopping with the preparation of materials for personal interests, maintaining a well-paced rhythm of life.

events.name: Weekend Morning Run
events.description: Early in the morning, Lu Mingqiang met Chen Bin as scheduled for a morning run at Wanlü Park. Jogging along the lakeside, their conversation shifted from work-related trivialities to their children's education. Chen Bin mentioned that his child had signed up for a basketball class, while Lu Mingqiang shared his experience in tutoring his eldest son with homework. Running had become a pleasant time for him to release work-related stress and maintain social connections.

events.name: Purchasing Household Daily Necessities
events.description: After his morning run, Lu Mingqiang stopped by the vegetable market near his home. Following the list sent by his wife Wang Lijuan, he purchased ingredients for the weekend and some daily necessities.

events.name: Procuring Materials for Kite Making
events.description: In the afternoon, he went alone to the traditional bamboo and wood material shop on Bo'ai South Road. He inquired carefully with the shop owner about the origin and toughness of the moso bamboo, meticulously selecting several pieces of uniform thickness and longer bamboo nodes. Additionally, he purchased a new bamboo-splitting knife, sandpaper of various grits, and sturdy binding thread, making thorough material preparations for resuming his kite-making hobby.

events.name: Accompanying children
events.description: In the evening, he checked the homework of his two children, particularly the math problems of his eldest son. After finishing that, he spent some time playing with building blocks on the floor with his younger son, Lu Zihan, listening to the child describe his new friends at kindergarten in his tender, young voice.

events.name: Resume Wrist Rehabilitation Training
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang made up for the wrist rehabilitation training that had been postponed the previous day, performing 10 minutes of grip strength exercises and flexion-extension movements to maintain recovery progress.

起始状态.心情: Relax, look forward to weekend activities, and restore energy.

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, enjoying family time, feeling physically and mentally refreshed after exercise.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5 kilometers, 10 minutes of wrist rehabilitation training.

2025-09.daily_overview: Sunday is a time for organization and planning. Lu Mingqiang systematically sorted out his newly discovered photography hobby, utilized his professional skills to prepare for family security in advance, and exchanged exercise insights with his running companions.

events.name: Organize Industrial Theme Photography Works
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang transferred dozens of photos he had taken intentionally or unintentionally over the past few weeks—featuring substations, cranes, warehouse machinery, and other subjects—from his phone and old mobile device to an old laptop at home. He browsed and categorized them one by one, contemplating which compositions could be improved and which scenes were worth revisiting for dedicated photography. This organization marked the transition of his photography practice from [casual snapping] to the stage of [conscious collection and reflection].

events.name: Phone conversation with fellow runner Chen Bin to exchange exercise insights
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang called Chen Bin to discuss the transition plan from brisk walking to jogging. Chen Bin shared his experience and encouraged him to gradually increase the intensity. The two agreed to try a joint jogging session next weekend.

events.name: Integrate exam preparation with work practice
events.description: In the afternoon, he reviewed the "Code for Installation and Acceptance of Low-Voltage Power Distribution Systems" in conjunction with the ongoing electricity meter box renovation project. He compared the steps actually applied in the project and the challenges encountered with the provisions of the code one by one, adding new case analyses to his error notebook, thereby enriching the content of his exam preparation with practical substance.

events.name: Plan the home electrical circuit inspection and repair scheme.
events.description: Looking at the aging wiring in the old residential community, Lu Mingqiang was reminded that his own home had also been lived in for many years. He took the time in the evening to sketch a simple diagram of the socket and lighting circuits in the main rooms of his house, planning to conduct a systematic inspection at a later date, especially in damp and high-load areas such as the kitchen and bathroom.

events.name: Talking on the Phone with Father
events.description: Before going to bed, he called his father Lu Jianguo. In addition to greeting him, he also briefly consulted about an issue he encountered in a renovation project regarding the handling of old-fashioned grounding wires. His father provided experiential advice and once again encouraged him to prepare well for the exam.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely, preparing to attend to personal matters, feeling a slight weekend languor.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, completed a series of planning and organizing tasks, and social interactions brought a sense of positivity.

2025-09.daily_overview: As the project entered a critical phase, the workload and psychological pressure increased simultaneously. For the first time, Lu Mingqiang clearly felt the dual burden from both work and exam preparation, leading to irregular eating habits.

events.name: On-site confirmation of the final construction plan
events.description: Early in the morning, Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, and Zhao Qiang arrived at the residential community ahead of schedule. Based on their construction experience from the previous days, they conducted a final detailed survey of the wiring in the remaining units. Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo quickly finalized the installation plans and personnel assignments for the last few complex units, and clarified the key safety operation points and technical standards for Zhao Qiang for the day.

events.name: High-intensity construction
events.description: The entire day was spent in intense construction work. Lu Mingqiang needed to simultaneously oversee the core technical installations, guide apprentices, and be ready to address any unexpected minor malfunctions. The sweltering weather made the narrow stairwell even more unbearable, with sweat continuously soaking through his work uniform.

events.name: Recognize an increase in one's own stress.
events.description: That afternoon, while making a connection, he was momentarily distracted by thoughts of the chapters he needed to review that evening and nearly connected the wires in the wrong order. Fortunately, he caught the mistake in time. This gave him a start, making him realize that his late-night study sessions had begun to take a toll. The combination of intense daytime work and insufficient rest was starting to wear him down, and he felt a noticeable psychological burden.

events.name: Detect abnormal apprentice status
events.description: He also noticed that Zhao Qiang, who was usually inquisitive, spoke much less today and seemed somewhat absent-minded when passing tools. Lu Mingqiang intended to ask about it, but at that moment he was busy dealing with a tricky connection, so he temporarily set aside his doubts.

events.name: Overeating at dinner due to stress.
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang unconsciously ate half a bowl more rice and additional dishes than usual as a way to vent his emotions due to work pressure.

起始状态.心情: Tense, preparing for a challenging day, with rising anxiety.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fatigued and noticeably stressed, with some difficulty concentrating, and slightly frustrated by the loss of control over eating habits.

state.今日运动: High-intensity physical labor

2025-09.daily_overview: Under sustained work pressure, Lu Mingqiang began proactively engaging in multi-dimensional self-regulation: deepening his photography hobby, paying attention to colleagues' well-being, and experiencing sleep issues for the first time due to overwork.

events.name: Try simple photo editing.
events.description: Before heading to work, he took advantage of the early morning time to open the previously taken photos of "The Net" and another picture of a substation using a mobile photo-editing app. He learned to adjust the contrast and sharpness, making the lines more prominent and the shadows deeper. Although it was just a simple operation, seeing the improvement in the photos gave him a sense of joy from hands-on creation.

events.name: Lead the core installation work
events.description: At the construction site, Lu Mingqiang was responsible for laying the main circuit and positioning and installing the new meter box. He skillfully threaded cables through conduits and crimped terminals, with each movement executed cleanly and efficiently. Meanwhile, he directed Zhao Qiang to assist in organizing the cables, seizing every opportunity to explain the key technical points involved.

events.name: Voluntarily applying for overtime to handle difficult tasks
events.description: Due to severe aging of wiring in some floors, the overall progress has fallen behind schedule. After discussing with Chen Jianguo, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to apply to Team Leader Zhang for permission to return to the residential complex during the evening hours when household electricity usage is relatively low. Their plan was to partially replace and reinforce several of the most problematic main circuits to ensure the foundational safety of subsequent installations.

events.name: Discussed with my wife about inspecting the household electrical circuits.
events.description: After returning home from working overtime, though exhausted, he mentioned to his wife Wang Lijuan his idea of checking the household electrical circuits. Upon hearing it was for safety reasons, Wang Lijuan immediately expressed her support, and they agreed to carry out the inspection the next evening after he gets off work.

events.name: First experience of difficulty falling asleep
events.description: Lying in bed, his body was exhausted, yet his mind remained unusually active. The details of the day's construction work, unresolved wiring issues, and theoretical knowledge points for his upcoming exam spun through his thoughts like a revolving lantern, causing him to toss and turn for a long time without being able to fall asleep. This pronounced difficulty in falling asleep was a rare experience for him in recent years.

起始状态.心情: Under pressure, I tried to adjust with new interests, but my mind remained tense.

结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted to the extreme, yet mentally anxious, finding it difficult to relax, and troubled by insomnia.

state.今日运动: High-intensity physical labor, evening overtime work

2025-09.daily_overview: After receiving clear signals of overwork from his body, Lu Mingqiang began to consciously adjust himself while properly managing multiple responsibilities in work, family safety, and personal social interactions, demonstrating practical life management skills.

events.name: Daytime Work: Electricity Meter Installation and Testing
events.description: Today's main task is to connect the electricity meters of each household to the new cabinet. Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo work in coordination, with him taking charge of technical oversight, meticulously checking the firmness and phase alignment of every connection. After completing each unit, he uses a multimeter to conduct continuity and voltage tests, ensuring that everything is foolproof.

events.name: Consciously engage in work-related stress reduction.
events.description: Having slept poorly the night before, he felt somewhat sluggish in his reactions during the day. Recognizing the issue, he forced himself to close his eyes and rest for twenty minutes during the lunch break. Later in the afternoon, during work intervals, he found a quiet corner to take several deep breaths, attempting to ease his tense nerves.

events.name: Guiding apprentices in practical operations
events.description: In a relatively simple unit, Lu Mingqiang had Zhao Qiang stand at the main operating position to independently complete the installation of the new electrical meter box and the connection of the household wiring. He and Chen Jianguo supervised the entire process from the side, only offering reminders or corrections on key steps and details, allowing Zhao Qiang to gain valuable hands-on experience in independent operation.

events.name: Declining a Colleague's Invitation to Supper
events.description: After work, his colleague Chen Jianguo invited him to have grilled fish and beer together in the evening to vent about the project pressure. Considering his sleep issues, Lu Mingqiang, though eager to relax, politely declined, saying he needed to go home early to rest.

events.name: Help neighbor Uncle Wang inspect and repair the hallway light.
events.description: On his way home, Lu Mingqiang encountered his neighbor Wang Jianguo, who reported that the hallway light was not working. Lu Mingqiang proactively offered to help and, upon inspection, found that the bulb had aged. He immediately replaced it with a new one. Uncle Wang repeatedly expressed his gratitude, and the neighborly relationship grew even more harmonious.

events.name: Inspect and repair the electrical circuits at home.
events.description: After dinner, he took out the multimeter, voltage tester, and other tools he had brought back from the company and proceeded to inspect the sockets and exposed wiring in the living room and kitchen. As expected, behind a frequently used socket in the kitchen, he found a section of wire with darkened insulation that had become slightly brittle. After turning off the main power switch, he skillfully cut away the aged section, connected it with a new wire, and properly insulated the joint.

events.name: Explaining Electrical Safety to My Wife
events.description: After completing the repairs, he called his wife to the kitchen, showed her the old wires that had been replaced, explained the risks of potential short circuits or even fires, and reminded her not to use high-power appliances like rice cookers and microwrons simultaneously on a single outlet. Wang Lijuan nodded earnestly and took note of his advice.

events.name: Engage in pre-sleep relaxation
events.description: After handling family affairs, he reduced the time spent on his phone. Before bed, he specifically soaked his feet in hot water, hoping it would improve his sleep.

起始状态.心情: Fatigued and in low spirits, but determined to take proactive steps to adjust, with slight aftereffects from yesterday's insomnia.

结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat relieved (having resolved a potential hazard at home and helped a neighbor), I actively relaxed and achieved a calm state of mind, satisfied with the adjustment outcome.

state.今日运动: Moderate-intensity physical work

2025-09.daily_overview: As the project nears its conclusion, Lu Mingqiang successfully resolved the key technical challenges, demonstrating his core value. Simultaneously, he began accepting new social invitations outside of work, seeking to broaden the horizons of his life.

events.name: System Power-On Debugging and Fault Troubleshooting
events.description: Today, the newly renovated entire electric meter box system underwent power-on commissioning. Lu Mingqiang was responsible for closing the circuit breaker and monitoring the overall parameters. After discovering abnormal readings from two household meters, he remained calm and led Zhao Qiang in adopting a segmented troubleshooting method. They conducted tests sequentially from the main distribution box to the individual household boxes, ultimately pinpointing the issue to a poor connection caused by oxidation at an old wiring joint. Lu Mingqiang then guided Zhao Qiang in completing the replacement.

events.name: Record and summarize failure cases
events.description: After successfully troubleshooting the issue, Lu Mingqiang did not let it go at that. He meticulously recorded the symptoms of the malfunction, his troubleshooting logic, theoretical basis, and the final solution in his phone's memo. He planned to compile this case into his study notes as an accumulation of practical experience.

events.name: Accept the running partner's invitation to watch the performance.
events.description: During the lunch break, his running friend Chen Bin sent him a WeChat message, enthusiastically inviting him to watch a performance by a local band at a livehouse on Friday evening, mentioning that a few other friends would also be joining. Lu Mingqiang had always kept his distance from such noisy venues, but out of trust in Chen Bin and a desire to try a different way to relax, he hesitated for a moment before agreeing.

events.name: Initial improvement in sleep quality
events.description: Thanks to the proactive relaxation and early rest the night before, he fell asleep more easily this night compared to the previous one. Although the quality of sleep was still not at its best, he could feel his energy recovering somewhat during the day.

events.name: Begin making the kite frame.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, he took advantage of a bit of spare time to work on the bamboo purchased over the weekend on the balcony. Using a bamboo-splitting knife, he split the bamboo into strips of appropriate thickness. He then carefully heated and bent the strips over an alcohol lamp, initially shaping the outlines of the wings and body of the swallow kite, and used weights to press and set the forms.

events.name: Attempt to transition from walking to jogging.
events.description: After work in the evening, Lu Mingqiang tried jogging for the first time, running 2 kilometers near the residential area at a relatively slow pace to test the recovery of his wrist. He felt good with no discomfort.

起始状态.心情: Stable, with a slight improvement in spirits, looking forward to trying a slow jog in the evening.

结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled, finding a sense of achievement in solving work challenges, harboring a subtle anticipation for new activities, and experiencing positivity from the attempt at jogging.

state.今日运动: Moderate-intensity physical activity, try jogging 2 kilometers.

2025-09.daily_overview: The main project has been completed and is now entering the finishing and review stage. After enduring prolonged pressure, Lu Mingqiang began to deeply reflect on the importance of health and rest, and gathered with fellow workers to celebrate.

events.name: Household-by-household power-on testing and re-inspection
events.description: Lu Mingqiang led the team in conducting final household-by-household power-on tests and circuit inspections for all units where the meter boxes had been replaced. They identified and repaired two minor interface looseness issues caused by oversight during installation, and updated the construction records to ensure zero defects in project quality.

events.name: Comprehensive Safety Review and Site Cleanup
events.description: After completing the tests, Lu Mingqiang carefully rechecked the reliability of the grounding for each electrical meter box, ensured that the locks were properly installed, and verified the clarity of the safety signs. Finally, he urged Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang to thoroughly clean up all discarded wires, packaging materials, and other debris from the construction site, achieving a "clean site upon completion" in line with the company's highest standards for safe and civilized construction.

events.name: Reflecting on the Balance Between Work and Rest
events.description: On the ride back to the company, Lu Mingqiang reflected on the past few days—from the mounting pressure and sleepless nights to the process of proactively adjusting himself. He deeply realized that for heavy manual laborers like himself, knowing how to rest is just as important as being able to work. He decided to pay closer attention to the signals his body sends in the future and incorporate proactive relaxation into his daily routine.

events.name: Celebrating the completion of the project with colleagues over a casual drink.
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, and Zhao Qiang went to a nearby food stall for a small gathering to celebrate the successful completion of the project. They ordered grilled fish and beer, chatting casually. Lu Mingqiang drank moderately but kept an eye on the time to avoid affecting his schedule for the next day.

起始状态.心情: Relax, the project is about to conclude, with a hint of pre-celebration ease.

结束状态.心情: Ease and enlightened openness after reflection, the project concluded smoothly, and social gatherings brought delight.

state.今日运动: Moderate-intensity physical work
