2025-09.daily_overview: Over the weekend, Lu Mingqiang tried a novel experience that broke away from his daily routine. From initial discomfort to gradually immersing himself in it, the spectrum of his leisure life has been broadened.

events.name: Confirming a fixed morning run with running partners
events.description: During their morning run, Lu Mingqiang took the initiative to suggest to Chen Bin that they make their Saturday morning runs a regular activity to serve as a health pillar during their exam preparation period. Chen Bin gladly agreed, and the two also arranged to try a new route the following Saturday.

events.name: Attend a livehouse rock performance
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang changed into casual clothes and met up with Chen Bin and several of his young friends to head to the livehouse. As soon as he entered, the deafening music, dazzling lights, and the crowded, restless crowd made him extremely uncomfortable, even making him consider leaving. Chen Bin enthusiastically introduced the band to him, but he could only manage a reluctant nod.

events.name: From Discomfort to Gradual Acceptance
events.description: As the performance progressed, the atmosphere at the venue grew increasingly electric. Although Lu Mingqiang couldn't clearly make out the lyrics, he gradually became captivated by the musicians' wholehearted performance, the powerful rhythm, and the audience's rapturous chorus. He began nodding slightly to the beat, his feet unconsciously tapping along, experiencing a raw emotional release that was entirely different from his usual quiet life.

events.name: Night Talk After the Performance
events.description: After the performance, he and Chen Bin had a bowl of qingbu liang at a roadside stall. Lu Mingqiang said candidly, "At first, I really wanted to leave—it was too noisy. But later, I felt... well, it was quite cathartic, similar to shouting a couple of times after a tiring day of work." Chen Bin laughed heartily and shared his own reasons for enjoying the live atmosphere.

events.name: Continue making the kite frame.
events.description: Returning home while it was still early, he continued to refine the bamboo strips that had been initially shaped during the day. Using sandpaper, he carefully smoothed out every splinter to ensure they were smooth and would not prick the skin. Then, following traditional mortise and tenon techniques, he attempted a preliminary assembly of the wing and body components.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed, yet somewhat curious and apprehensive about the new experience in the evening.

结束状态.心情: The excitement has not completely subsided; there is a sense of having tried something new and broadened one's experiences, accompanied by slight fatigue yet satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 5 kilometers

2025-09.daily_overview: A day of mingled joy and reflection, with sustained positive feedback in my photography hobby while facing personnel changes in the work team, and an attempt at morning jogging.

events.name: Try morning jogging.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang completed a 5-kilometer jog alone in Wanlv Park, maintaining a steady pace of 7 minutes per kilometer. He experienced no discomfort in his wrist, indicating the completion of his wrist rehabilitation and the formal restoration of his athletic ability.

events.name: Share more photography works and insights
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang shared three additional industrial-style photos he had recently curated and was quite satisfied with (including the one of the distribution box in the rain), along with brief thoughts on the shots, in a photography enthusiasts' WeChat group. This time, he accompanied the photos with slightly more text: [A few shots taken at the workplace, experimenting with different lighting.]

events.name: Received recognition from fellow photography enthusiasts
events.description: After the photos were posted, they received an even more enthusiastic response than last time. The group members not only gave likes but also commented specifically on the composition and texture. Some asked him what equipment he used to take the photos, expressing appreciation for his ability to "find beauty in everyday life." These professional affirmations greatly encouraged him, prompting him to seriously consider which specific industrial scenes he could photograph next.

events.name: Apprentice Zhao Qiang has submitted his resignation.
events.description: While eating fast food by the construction site at noon, Zhao Qiang finally mustered the courage to quietly tell Lu Mingqiang that he planned to work until the end of the year before resigning and returning to his hometown in Hunan. His family had been urging him to go back for a blind date and hoped he could stay closer to home. After hearing this, Lu Mingqiang fell silent for a few seconds. Though he felt a sense of loss and reluctance, he expressed understanding and patted Zhao Qiang on the shoulder, saying, "As long as you’ve made up your mind, just finish the work at hand well—that way, you’ll have something to show for it when you go back."

events.name: Reporting Personnel Changes to Superiors
events.description: During a break in the afternoon work, Lu Mingqiang approached Team Leader Zhang and verbally reported that Zhao Qiang would resign by the end of the year. Team Leader Zhang frowned but did not say much. He simply instructed Lu Mingqiang to mentor Zhao Qiang more closely in the remaining time, teaching him as much as possible, while the team would begin considering a replacement candidate in advance.

events.name: Reflecting on Staff Turnover with Colleagues
events.description: When getting off work, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo discussed this matter. Both sighed, lamenting that young people nowadays have many ideas, unlike them who had stuck to their jobs for so many years. They agreed to try to teach Zhao Qiang some more core technical points before he leaves.

events.name: Discuss this matter with my wife.
events.description: During dinner, Lu Mingqiang mentioned Zhao Qiang's intention to resign to his wife Wang Lijuan. After hearing this, Wang Lijuan said, "It's normal for young people. Don't take it too much to heart and tire yourself out." The simple comfort made Lu Mingqiang feel a bit better.

events.name: Conduct pre-exam mock self-assessment
events.description: In the evening, he conducted a strictly timed full-scale mock written exam at home according to the official test schedule. After completing it, he checked the answers, analyzed the incorrect questions, and made slight adjustments to the focus of his final sprint review for the last few days, feeling a bit more confident as a result.

起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to the feedback and exercise attempts of the new day.

结束状态.心情: Complex, the joy of photography intertwined with the sentiment of an impending farewell at work, while the success of jogging brings confidence.

state.今日运动: Morning jogging for 5 kilometers

2025-09.daily_overview: The renovation project for old residential communities has been officially completed, marking the end of this phase of work. Lu Mingqiang's work state has shifted from high intensity to finalization and handover, while his personal interests and family matters are also being attended to in parallel.

events.name: Project Completion and Site Cleanup
events.description: After completing all the remaining debugging tasks in the morning, Lu Mingqiang organized Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang to load all the tools and the small amount of leftover materials from the site onto the vehicle, transport them back to the company warehouse, and conduct a thorough inventory check, returning and registering each item. He formally reported to Team Leader Zhang that the renovation project for the old residential area's electricity meter boxes had been completed on time and in accordance with quality standards.

events.name: Study Summary of the Intensive Exam Preparation Course
events.description: In the afternoon, when work was not busy, he took the opportunity to watch the last recorded lesson from last week's sprint course on his phone. After returning home in the evening, he organized all the course handouts, his own notes, and the thick collection of incorrect questions from the past four weeks into categories and placed them in a dedicated folder, preparing for the final self-review before the exam.

events.name: Complete the kite drawing and conduct a test flight.
events.description: After dinner, he colored the silk fabric of the swallow kite using the traditional blue-and-white color scheme and attached decorative elements. Upon completion, he took his two children to an open space downstairs for a brief test flight. The kite soared smoothly into the air, eliciting cheers and excitement from the children. Lu Mingqiang felt a sense of accomplishment and the joy of family bonding.

events.name: Call parents to confirm weekend dinner gathering.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang called his parents. His mother, Chen Xiuying, happily mentioned over the phone that she had prepared his favorite dishes, while his father reminded him again not to be nervous about the exam. The conversation made Lu Mingqiang feel warm and reassured.

起始状态.心情: Feeling relaxed, project pressure relieved, looking forward to family activities.

结束状态.心情: Stability, completing multiple concluding tasks in an orderly manner, with family joy bringing a sense of fulfillment.

state.今日运动: Light physical work

2025-09.daily_overview: September concluded with harvest and planning: work received material recognition, the family strengthened management and cohesion through meetings, personal state returned to stability and anticipation after busyness, and exercise fully resumed.

events.name: 5-kilometer morning jog
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang completed a 5-kilometer jog at Wanlvyuan Park, maintaining a steady pace of 6.5 minutes per kilometer. His breathing was well-controlled, and he experienced no discomfort in his wrists, indicating a full recovery of his athletic capacity.

events.name: Final Project Acceptance and Handover
events.description: In the morning, Manager Liu and Team Leader Zhang from the company visited the renovated residential community for the final inspection. After a thorough examination, the project quality was approved. Subsequently, Lu Mingqiang accompanied Property Director Wang to visit several households, providing on-site answers to residents' questions regarding the use of the new electricity meters. The residents responded positively, and the project was successfully handed over.

events.name: Received project performance bonus
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang, who was packing up his tools, received a mobile banking message notifying him of a 1,500-yuan bonus deposit. He knew it was the performance bonus for the old residential area renovation project, an acknowledgment of his and his team's technical skills and hard work. Looking at the message, he felt a sense of relief and satisfaction.

events.name: Sharing joy with wife and planning the bonus
events.description: When he returned home from work for dinner, Lu Mingqiang told his wife Wang Lijuan the news about receiving a bonus. Both of them were very happy. After a brief discussion, they decided to deposit 800 yuan into the mandatory savings account set aside for a round-the-island tour, and allocate 700 yuan as the family's short-term reserve fund, to be used for potential children's education expenses or minor emergencies.

events.name: Preside over monthly family meetings
events.description: After dinner, the family of four gathered in the living room. Lu Mingqiang, acting like a small meeting facilitator, first presented the preliminary route map for a short self-driving trip to Wenchang during the National Day holiday to the children together with his wife, and discussed the budget. Next, his wife reported the family's expenses for the month, noting that the savings plan was being implemented well. Then, they reviewed the implementation of the new schedule for [Family Study Time] and praised the children's progress. Finally, Lu Mingqiang, drawing on his professional knowledge, reminded the family to be cautious about electricity safety during the dry autumn season.

events.name: Mindset Adjustment on the Day Before the Exam
events.description: After the meeting, Lu Mingqiang did not look at any new review materials. He simply went through his core notes and error correction book, quickly reviewing the knowledge framework. He told himself that all necessary preparations had been made, and what he needed now was a calm mindset and adequate rest.

events.name: A Brief Video with Colleague Chen Jianguo
events.description: Before going to bed, Chen Jianguo initiated a video call, and the two casually chatted about project bonuses and National Day plans. Chen Jianguo jokingly insisted that he treat everyone to a meal after finishing the exam, to which Lu Mingqiang agreed with a smile. This brief and relaxed exchange brought a close to the busy month of September.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, with a sense of relief from the project's completion, feeling confident about the morning run.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and full of anticipation, work is recognized, family plans are clear, physical recovery is progressing well, and there is a positive outlook for tomorrow (October) and the upcoming holidays.

state.今日运动: A 5-kilometer morning jog

2025-10.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang calmly completed the Senior Technician in Electrical Engineering examination. After the exam, he celebrated briefly with his family. Due to excitement, he went to bed slightly later than usual, transitioning from a state of tension to one of release.

events.name: Heading to the Examination Hall
events.description: Drive to the test site at 7 a.m., arrive 40 minutes early, and do mental adjustments in a quiet corner.

events.name: Theoretical Examination
events.description: Starting at 9 a.m., the questions are within the review scope. Answer carefully, use work experience to infer uncertain calculation problems, and complete the check on time.

events.name: Lunch Break and Family Support
events.description: At noon, my wife called to express her concern, informing me that my mother had prepared Hainanese chicken rice, and the family's care helped alleviate my fatigue.

events.name: Practical Operation and Oral Defense Examination
events.description: In the afternoon, simulated troubleshooting in the distribution room of an old residential community, proficiently used tools, and clearly explained the safety and cost-effectiveness of the solution based on practical cases.

events.name: A sense of relief after the exam
events.description: After 4 p.m., I walked out of the examination hall, let out a long sigh of relief, sent a WeChat message to my wife to let her know I was safe, and sat on the edge of a flower bed reflecting on the exam.

events.name: Simple Family Celebration
events.description: Returning home in the evening, I enjoyed the Hainanese chicken rice and grilled fish prepared by my mother. I described the exam process, and my father patted my shoulder in encouragement. After the meal, I took the initiative to clear the dishes.

events.name: Post-Exam Excitement Chat
events.description: I chatted with my wife about the details of the exam before bed and fell asleep a bit later due to excitement.

起始状态.心情: Focused, calm, and determined to prove oneself.

结束状态.心情: A sense of relief, satisfaction mixed with exhaustion, and a touch of excitement.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first rest day after the exam, Lu Mingqiang organized his belongings, went for a long run, and enjoyed family time. With a smooth physical and mental transition, he began contemplating his new life.

events.name: Post-Exam Organization and Relaxation
events.description: Waking up naturally in the morning, I rise leisurely, put my tools and study materials back in place, brew a strong cup of tea, and watch the morning exercises from the balcony, feeling calm and relaxed inside.

events.name: Long-Distance Training with Running Partners
events.description: At 9 a.m., I completed a 7-kilometer jog with Chen Bin at Wanlv Park. We chatted about work and family while running, and I felt refreshed after sweating.

events.name: Family Morning Tea and Weekend Planning
events.description: After the run, I had Hainan noodles with Chen Bin. Back home, I drank old dad tea with my wife and discussed inviting our apprentice Zhao Qiang for a meal next week.

events.name: Leisure Afternoons and the Budding of Interests
events.description: In the afternoon, I browsed industrial photography works online, which sparked my interest in scenes of electrical facilities; I also enjoyed quality time with my second son while playing with building blocks.

events.name: Calling Parents
events.description: In the evening, I called my parents to let them know I was safe and provided a detailed account of the exam situation. My mother reminded me to get plenty of rest.

events.name: Plan Adjustment Due to Rainfall
events.description: The originally planned evening walk was canceled due to intermittent rain, so we switched to watching TV at home to relax.

起始状态.心情: Relax, unwind, and enjoy a task-free morning.

结束状态.心情: Feeling physically and mentally refreshed, looking forward to the future with ease.

2025-10.daily_overview: After returning to work following the exam, Lu Mingqiang was entrusted with key technical responsibilities for the project, which heightened his sense of duty. While managing his child's educational matters, his life gradually returned to a balance between work and family.

events.name: First Pre-Shift Meeting After the Examination
events.description: At the pre-shift meeting, Team Leader Zhang announced that Lu Mingqiang would lead the technical construction of the complex building. Manager Liu patted his shoulder in encouragement, earning praise from fellow workers and enhancing his professional recognition.

events.name: Study the drawings of the new project
events.description: Spread out the electrical drawings in the project office, carefully study the complex pipelines, and preliminarily mark the pipeline routes and equipment locations.

events.name: Received notice of parent-teacher conference
events.description: During the lunch break, I received a notice about the parent-teacher conference for my eldest child. After confirming there were no urgent tasks, I reported it to the team leader and informed my wife via WeChat.

events.name: Dietary Adjustments Show Initial Results
events.description: Reflecting on the habit of having a light and early dinner, I noticed an improvement in sleep quality and increased energy for climbing utility poles, leading to the decision to maintain this practice long-term.

events.name: Evening Parent-Child Interaction
events.description: After dinner, I checked the homework of my eldest son and identified challenging points in the math word problems, which I noted down for discussion during the upcoming parent-teacher meeting. I then spent time reading picture books with my younger son.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to project pressure
events.description: Before going to bed, I felt slightly anxious due to the significant responsibility of the new project, but it was alleviated after briefly confiding in my wife.

起始状态.心情: Full of drive for the new job and looking forward to challenges.

结束状态.心情: A great responsibility with strong motivation, tinged with a hint of anxiety.

2025-10.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang refined the construction plan for the new project, reviewed the key points of the exam, and temporarily set aside exercise due to work pressure, demonstrating a commitment to continuous learning and professional competence.

events.name: Refine the construction plan
events.description: Refine the construction plan at the project office, considering pipeline modifications that do not affect residents' electricity usage, estimate the time and manpower required for each process, and identify challenges in connecting the old and new systems.

events.name: Post-Exam Knowledge Point Reflection
events.description: During the lunch break, I recalled the ambiguous points from the theoretical exam, noted down questions regarding the latest electrical safety standard parameters, and planned to verify them at a later time.

events.name: Check equipment parameters
events.description: In the afternoon, verify the cable specifications, smart meter box models, circuit breaker parameters, and other details to ensure they match the drawings and on-site requirements.

events.name: Informal Communication with Coworkers
events.description: Before leaving work, coworker Chen Jianguo invited Lu Mingqiang for a late-night snack, but Lu declined due to dietary adjustments and project pressure, agreeing to meet up next time instead.

events.name: Postponing exercise due to fatigue
events.description: The originally planned evening run was canceled due to work fatigue and strong winds, and was replaced with rest at home.

events.name: Family Dinner and Simple Communication
events.description: When returning home for dinner, I discussed the parent-teacher meeting and project challenges with my wife, receiving attentive listening and comfort.

起始状态.心情: Focus, contemplate technical challenges

结束状态.心情: Deep work reflections, tiring yet fulfilling.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the Information Gathering and Communication Day, Lu Mingqiang consolidated project requirements, attended a parent-teacher meeting to obtain educational information, and had dinner with co-workers to maintain relationships.

events.name: Integrated Project Requirements List
events.description: Compile the equipment parameters, material specifications, and personnel requirements into a detailed table to ensure clarity and comprehensiveness.

events.name: Project Kick-off Communication Meeting
events.description: Attended a meeting with core project team members in the afternoon to report on technical challenges, construction plans, and risks, and to confirm the handover of work interfaces.

events.name: A Farewell Plan for the Apprentice
events.description: Before leaving work, I invited my apprentice Zhao Qiang via WeChat to come to my home for a farewell dinner on Saturday. Zhao Qiang gratefully accepted.

events.name: A small gathering before the farewell with coworkers.
events.description: After work, I had a casual dinner with Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang at a restaurant near the company, introduced the project overview, and solicited their cooperation intentions.

events.name: Attending the Parent-Teacher Conference for the Eldest Child
events.description: Attend the parent-teacher conference at 7:30 PM, take notes on the teacher's remarks, have a separate discussion with the math teacher regarding difficulties in understanding word problems, and obtain practical guidance suggestions.

events.name: Slept slightly later due to a gathering.
events.description: After the parent-teacher meeting, I had a slightly later bedtime due to dining and chatting with colleagues.

起始状态.心情: Organized and prepared to handle multiple matters

结束状态.心情: A fruitful harvest, a stronger sense of responsibility

2025-10.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang submitted the project report, sought guidance from his mentor to resolve difficulties, planned a home study corner, declined late-night snacks due to health reasons, and demonstrated strong execution.

events.name: Please ask the master to solve the difficult problem.
events.description: During a work break, I called Master Li to describe the difficulties in connecting the old and new pipelines. I received an experience-based transitional solution and safety reminders, which I documented in detailed notes.

events.name: Submit the preliminary project planning report
events.description: Integrate the drawings, requirement lists, personnel arrangements, and master suggestions into a report and submit it to Team Leader Zhang through the work system.

events.name: Planning a "Study Corner" with My Wife
events.description: During dinner, I discussed with my wife and decided to clear the clutter in the corner of the living room, move a desk, and buy a lamp to create a study area for our eldest son.

events.name: Received an invitation from coworkers for a late-night meal.
events.description: Chen Jianguo invited Lu Mingqiang for a late-night snack in the evening, but Lu Mingqiang declined candidly due to health reasons, explaining that he needed to avoid late-night snacks for recuperation.

events.name: Outdoor activities canceled due to light rain.
events.description: The originally planned evening walk was canceled due to light rain, and it was replaced with simple shoulder and neck stretches at home.

events.name: Reading and Relaxation Before Sleep
events.description: Relax by reading kite-making forum posts before bed.

起始状态.心情: With clear objectives, ready to solve problems

结束状态.心情: Issues resolved, tasks accomplished, family plans taking shape, steady progress achieved.

2025-10.daily_overview: On Friday, advance the preparation of project materials, select gifts for the farewell banquet, engage in light running, and contact fellow players to resume playing squash, maintaining a balanced rhythm of life.

events.name: Project Material Application and Coordination
events.description: Go to the warehouse to apply for the first batch of general materials and tools, confirm the arrival time of key components with procurement colleagues, and ensure the construction progress.

events.name: Selecting Gifts for a Wedding Banquet
events.description: After work, go to the hardware store to select a high-quality insulated screwdriver set, and have it packaged as a commemorative gift for apprentice Zhao Qiang.

events.name: Friday Easy Run
events.description: After returning home, change into running shoes and go for a light 3-kilometer run on the nearby streets around the residential area to relieve the stiffness in your shoulders, neck, and lower back from prolonged desk work.

events.name: Confirm tomorrow's schedule with my wife.
events.description: After running, I organized the refrigerator ingredients with my wife and confirmed the division of tasks for tomorrow: Lu Mingqiang will purchase supplies for the study corner and meet friends, while my wife will prepare the ingredients. In the afternoon, we will set up the study corner, and in the evening, we will host Zhao Qiang.

events.name: Attempt to contact fellow players.
events.description: Before going to bed, I contacted my squash partner Lin Feng via WeChat to arrange a restorative squash practice match next Wednesday, and he readily agreed.

events.name: Stayed up slightly late due to shopping.
events.description: To prepare gifts and ingredients, the bedtime was slightly later.

起始状态.心情: As the weekend approaches, the mood becomes relaxed, and matters are arranged in an orderly manner.

结束状态.心情: Prepare for a fulfilling weekend with a touch of anticipation.

2025-10.daily_overview: On a fulfilling Saturday, Lu Mingqiang attended to family matters, engaged in leisure and social activities, checked and passed his exam results, shared the joy, set up a study corner, and hosted a farewell dinner, fully demonstrating his sense of emotional responsibility.

events.name: Procurement of Learning Supplies
events.description: In the morning, I took my eldest son with my wife to a home furnishing market and a stationery store to purchase an eye-protection desk lamp, a poster of the map of China, multiplication table stickers, and stationery. Our eldest son happily selected a notebook.

events.name: Having Dad's Tea with Old Classmates
events.description: After the procurement, I met with my junior high school classmate Wu Gang at a local tea shop. We chatted about work, exam preparations, family, and children, reminisced about fun memories from junior high school, and enjoyed a leisurely time together.

events.name: Check Examination Results
events.description: In the afternoon, I returned home and logged into the Vocational Skills Appraisal website using my computer. The query results showed a score of 85 for the theoretical exam, 90 for the practical exam, and an overall pass. I clenched my fist in a silent celebration.

events.name: Sharing the Joy of Success
events.description: I called my wife to share the good news, and she joyfully congratulated me. I then called my parents and my master separately to inform them. My father said it was good, my mother reminded me to take care of my health, and my master cautioned me against complacency and impatience.

events.name: Setting Up a Home Learning Corner
events.description: The whole family mobilized to clear clutter from the corners, moving desks and chairs to clean them thoroughly, installing desk lamps and securing wires, putting up maps and formula charts, arranging stationery, with Lu Mingqiang emphasizing to his eldest son the importance of studying hard.

events.name: Farewell for My Apprentice Zhao Qiang
events.description: In the evening, Zhao Qiang visited with some fruits. His wife prepared Hainanese chicken rice, Qingbuliang (a traditional Hainan dessert), boiled prawns, and grilled fish. During the meal, Lu Mingqiang shared his work experience, advising on technical proficiency and steady conduct. After dinner, he gifted a set of screwdrivers.

events.name: Commence a restorative training program
events.description: After seeing Zhao Qiang off, I used a mobile app to search for core recovery exercises targeting the waist and abdomen, such as the plank and bird-dog pose. I noted down the key points and planned to purchase a yoga mat to try them out.

events.name: Staying up late for celebration
events.description: Celebratory banquets and the joy of success lead to later bedtimes.

起始状态.心情: Relax and get ready to enjoy Family Day and complete your plans.

结束状态.心情: Extreme satisfaction and joy, a sense of accomplishment, and family warmth are intertwined.

2025-10.daily_overview: Sunday focuses on recovery through exercise. Lu Mingqiang achieved a breakthrough in long-distance running, cautiously resumed playing squash, handled follow-up matters related to exams, and life entered a new post-exam routine.

events.name: Breakthrough in Long-Distance Slow Running
events.description: In the early morning, Chen Bin and I completed an 8-kilometer slow run at Wanlv Park. We slowed down the pace to focus on completing the distance. The last two kilometers were challenging, but we succeeded and celebrated our progress in endurance with a high-five.

events.name: Internal Company Commendation Notice
events.description: While resting at home in the morning, I saw a commendation notice in the work group for passing the exam, and colleagues offered their congratulations.

events.name: Cautious Squash Recovery Training
events.description: Played squash with Lin Feng at the court in the afternoon, focusing on controlling shot power and movement range, relying on footwork to direct placement, feeling the body's feedback, and enjoying a pleasant mood.

events.name: Thorough Stretching and Assessment After Exercise
events.description: After playing, perform a 15-minute full-body stretch, especially focusing on the wrists, lower back, and legs. Ensure there is no abnormal pain, and decide to maintain a weekly restorative practice session.

events.name: Evening Research Online Courses
events.description: In the evening, log into the online training platform to browse the advanced electrician courses, understand the content and fees, and prepare for further study.

events.name: Casual Reflections with My Wife
events.description: Before going to bed, I chatted with my wife about the farewell dinner and expressed how difficult it is for young people to venture out into the world. My wife praised me, saying I was doing a decent job as a mentor.

events.name: Going to bed early due to exercise fatigue
events.description: Fatigue after exercise, rest by going to bed early.

起始状态.心情: Energetic and ready to take on athletic challenges

结束状态.心情: Feeling refreshed after exercise, satisfied with the recovery process, and maintaining a steady mindset.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 8 kilometers, followed by one hour of recovery squash practice (including stretching).

2025-10.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Lu Mingqiang returned to work inspections, developed an interest in industrial lighting, systematically reviewed exams, and for the first time engaged in parent-child reading at the home learning corner, balancing work, study, and family life.

events.name: Routine Equipment Inspection
events.description: Dispatched to inspect the distribution room of a commercial project, checking cable joint temperatures, switch statuses, and instrument readings to ensure normal operation.

events.name: Discoveries of Light and Shadow in the Workplace
events.description: During the inspection break, sunlight streamed through the air vent, casting geometric shadows on the cable trays and distribution cabinets. Captivated by the scene, I took photos from different angles with my phone.

events.name: Sharing and Receiving Feedback
events.description: After work, I used software to enhance the contrast of the photo and posted it in the local photography enthusiasts' WeChat group. It received likes and comments praising its industrial aesthetic, which was a pleasant surprise.

events.name: Systematic Exam Review
events.description: After dinner, use the laptop to review the exam, reanalyze the logic of the faulty circuit, evaluate the defense responses, summarize strengths and weaknesses, and list questions that need verification.

events.name: First "Learning Corner" Parent-Child Reading Session
events.description: The eldest son was doing homework at the new study corner, while Lu Mingqiang accompanied him by reading an electrician's manual, using everyday examples to guide his son in understanding math word problems, with good results.

events.name: Slept slightly late due to sultry heat and fatigue.
events.description: The sultry weather resulted in slightly poorer sleep quality and a later bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to engage in routine work.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home (next to the study corner)
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and Joyful, Achieving Multi-Dimensional Balance in Life

2025-10.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang received a skill bonus, which prompted him to consider family security. He conducted his first waist and abdominal recovery training and discussed insurance planning with his wife, reflecting a shift in his financial mindset toward risk management.

events.name: Received Skill Enhancement Bonus
events.description: I received a call from the finance department this morning, informing me that I passed the exam and would receive a 2,000-yuan bonus, which will be credited along with this month's salary. This news brought me great joy.

events.name: First Waist and Abdominal Recovery Training
events.description: In the evening, I laid out a yoga mat in the living room and followed an app video to perform basic exercises such as the plank (40 seconds) and bird-dog pose, activating muscle assessment responses. The lower back experienced slight soreness and tightness without pain.

events.name: Discussing Family Protection with My Wife
events.description: After training, I sat in the living room with my wife and proposed using the bonus to research family insurance. My wife supported the idea, believing it's wise to be prepared.

events.name: Plan to visit my aunt and seek her advice.
events.description: Decided to visit Aunt Wang Xiuying tomorrow evening to seek her opinion on insurance matters, and my wife suggested bringing Qingbu Liang as a gift.

events.name: Preliminary Screening of Online Courses
events.description: Before going to bed, use your phone to research online courses, download apps to review course outlines and instructor backgrounds, and select two or three options.

events.name: Outdoor running canceled due to light rain.
events.description: The originally planned evening run was canceled due to intermittent light rain, and was replaced with core training at home.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a small anticipation for the bonus.

结束状态.心情: Deep thinking, new family planning directions, and more specific and well-defined responsibilities.

2025-10.daily_overview: Lu Mingqiang actively collected insurance information, candidly explained his health reasons to his coworkers, drove to visit his aunt for advice, demonstrating his pragmatic approach and emphasis on family.

events.name: Honest Explanation of Dietary Habits
events.description: During the lunch break, fellow worker Chen Jianguo jokingly asked the reason for declining the late-night snack. Lu Mingqiang frankly explained in the construction site rest shed that it was due to a waist injury and lack of physical strength. Chen Jianguo expressed understanding.

events.name: Actively gather insurance knowledge
events.description: Before leaving work, search for keywords related to home insurance on your phone, read educational articles to understand the basic categories and be aware of sales pitfalls.

events.name: Visiting Aunt Wang Xiuying
events.description: After work, I drove for half an hour to my aunt's house in Qiongshan District with some qingbuliang, where we drank tea, chatted, and I took the opportunity to seek her advice on insurance ideas.

events.name: Seeking practical advice from elders
events.description: Aunt offered practical advice: carefully review the terms, prioritize based on urgency and importance, first ensure coverage for the primary breadwinner Lu Mingqiang, then for other family members.

events.name: Recommend discussing the suggestion with family members.

events.name: Received an overtime notice at short notice.

2025-11.daily_overview: This was a Sunday centered around rest and socializing. The morning run arrived as scheduled, bringing a minor disagreement over breakfast choices, but the tolerance among friends kept everything on track. When he saw his running companion Chen Bin achieve his marathon goal, Lu Mingqiang felt genuinely happy for him. From online congratulations to offline celebrations, their friendship deepened amid the aroma of grilled fish and stories of running. Family time was immersed in the afterglow of a short trip, and the affirmation from his wife and children made his sense of responsibility and fulfillment as the family's "pillar" even more tangible.

events.name: Morning run and breakfast with running buddies
events.description: On Sunday morning, Lu Mingqiang met his running partner Chen Bin as scheduled for a morning jog at Baishamen Park. The morning breeze was slightly cool. After completing their planned route, Chen Bin suggested going to their usual spot for Hainan rice noodles. Lu Mingqiang hesitated for a moment, explaining that he had been paying more attention to eating lighter recently and wanted to switch to qingbuliang or simple congee instead. Although Chen Bin felt that Hainan rice noodles were the perfect match after a run, he smiled and patted Lu Mingqiang on the shoulder, saying, "Alright, it's up to you. I'll try something different too." The two then went to another dessert shop together.

events.name: Online Congratulations for Marathon Runners' Achievements
events.description: One afternoon, while resting at home, Lu Mingqiang came across Chen Bin's shared half-marathon completion certificate and photos from the race. He immediately commented below the post, [Impressive! Proud of you, brother!] Feeling that the comment was not enough, he proactively called Chen Bin. During the call, he sincerely congratulated Chen Bin. As he listened to Chen Bin describe the feeling of crossing the finish line, Lu Mingqiang felt as if he were there himself, deeply moved by the sense of accomplishment and joy.

events.name: Propose and arrange a celebratory dinner gathering.
events.description: While congratulating him over the phone, Lu Mingqiang naturally suggested, "A phone call alone isn't enough for such a big occasion. We should properly [make up for it] offline and celebrate!" Chen Bin readily agreed, and the two quickly decided to go that very evening to their most frequented and most authentic grilled fish restaurant.

events.name: Grilled Fish Restaurant Celebration Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang and Chen Bin met at a grilled fish restaurant. Chen Bin excitedly recounted the details of the race—how he adjusted his pace, which slope felt challenging, and his emotions during the final sprint. Lu Mingqiang listened attentively, nodding from time to time, and shared his own insights on controlling breathing and rhythm during long-distance running. The conversation extended from running to recent work and family matters, and the two enthusiastically discussed the possibility of challenging a longer-distance race together next year, creating a lively and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: End of Gathering and Farewell
events.description: The dinner gathering concluded close to nine in the evening, and the two bid farewell at the entrance of the restaurant. Lu Mingqiang reminded Chen Bin, "You just finished a high-intensity run, so make sure to rest well these next couple of days." Chen Bin replied with a smile, "You too. See you for our run next week." Watching Chen Bin walk away, Lu Mingqiang felt a deep sense of satisfaction. This complete interaction, moving from online to offline, had strengthened and solidified the friendship that had blossomed through their shared passion for running.

events.name: Reviewing travel photos with family
events.description: After returning home, Lu Mingqiang projected the photos from his phone of last week's trip to Qionghai onto the television, reviewing them together with his wife Wang Lijuan and their two children. As she watched, his wife smiled and said, "We had such a great time on this trip; you planned it quite well." The children also pointed excitedly at the photos of the beach and the museum, chattering animatedly. Listening to his family's praise, a warm feeling and a sense of accomplishment welled up in Lu Mingqiang's heart. As the planner and leader of family activities, he felt a greater sense of responsibility and value.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the weekend morning run.

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, warm, and content with family and friendship relationships.

2025-11.daily_overview: Monday's work began with sharing and preparation. Lu Mingqiang privately shared with his coworkers the joy of his article receiving widespread recognition, a sense of fulfillment that became tangible during casual chats at the tea shop. He remained meticulous, sending the article to his friend and coworker Chen Jianguo for technical proofreading. Challenges at work soon followed, as a difficult fault in an old residential complex was assigned to him. He calmly accepted the task, notified his apprentice to prepare, and shifted the classroom of passing down experience from theory to the unknown field of tomorrow.

events.name: Share online recognition with coworkers
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang invited Chen Jianguo, the coworker who initially encouraged him to post, to a small gathering at a traditional tea shop near their workplace. Unable to contain his excitement, he whispered to Chen Jianguo about how his technical article had been featured and recommended on the [Electrician's Home] forum. "I never expected so many people would read it, and even experienced masters left comments to discuss it," he said. Chen Jianguo was delighted for him, taking a sip of tea before replying, "This shows you wrote something meaningful. In the future, whenever you have insights, you should share them more often."

events.name: Please have colleagues proofread the technical article.
events.description: After their small gathering, Lu Mingqiang sent the electronic version of the article to Chen Jianguo via WeChat, leaving a message: "Old Chen, you're the expert. Please help me review it from a practical perspective to see if there are any unclear or incorrect parts. I'm worried about potential errors that might mislead others." In the evening, he received feedback from Chen Jianguo. Regarding several details about the insulation assessment of old circuits, Lu Mingqiang carefully made additions and revisions to make the article more rigorous.

events.name: Accept challenging fault tasks and notify the apprentice.
events.description: In the afternoon, the team leader Zhang Tou called Lu Mingqiang aside and assigned him a task: to take his apprentice Zhao Qiang to an old residential complex built in the 1990s the next day to troubleshoot a persistent issue of frequent tripping in a distribution cabinet. The client reported that someone had previously inspected the problem but failed to resolve it. Lu Mingqiang listened carefully to the description of the fault background and had a preliminary idea of several troubleshooting approaches in mind. Returning to his workstation, he said to Zhao Qiang, who was organizing tools: "Xiao Zhao, we have a tough nut to crack tomorrow—we're heading to an old residential area. Think about how you would approach the investigation if it were up to you, and I'll test you on-site tomorrow." Zhao Qiang nodded in response, feeling both nervous and excited.

events.name: Overtime work for handling urgent repair requests.
events.description: Before leaving work, Lu Mingqiang received a call from Property Manager Wang, who reported a sudden power outage in one of the residential buildings, suspected to be caused by aging wiring. He immediately rushed to the scene and, after investigation, found that the issue was poor contact in the main switch. It took him over an hour to repair the problem, which caused him to return home late.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with the focus of starting a week's work

结束状态.心情: Tired but fulfilled, with a slight anticipation for tomorrow's teaching tasks.

2025-11.daily_overview: Tuesday was fully dedicated to a vivid on-site teaching session. Lu Mingqiang led his apprentice Zhao Qiang into an old residential community. Faced with intricate wiring, he did not intervene directly but instead guided his apprentice to think and troubleshoot, gradually approaching the root cause. From theoretical analysis to the use of instruments, he provided hands-on instruction, ultimately successfully locating and resolving an insulation fault caused by dampness. In the evening, he brought home the satisfaction of passing on technical expertise to share with his family. On the same day, he also completed the final practical assessment for the senior technician certification, earning official recognition for his professional competence once again.

events.name: On-site Investigation and Guided Thinking
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang and Zhao Qiang arrived at the fault site. The power distribution room in this old residential area was narrow and dimly lit, with the circuit diagrams long lost and wiring as messy as a spider web. Instead of rushing to start work, Lu Mingqiang first asked Zhao Qiang to carefully observe the surroundings, then inquired, "Xiao Zhao, tell me, what do you think might be the cause? What’s your troubleshooting approach?"

events.name: Systematically investigate common possibilities
events.description: Zhao Qiang listed common causes such as overload, short circuit, and poor contact with some nervousness. Lu Mingqiang nodded: "That's right. Let's start with the simplest possibilities and eliminate them one by one." Under his guidance, Zhao Qiang used tools like a multimeter to test each possibility, but all results came back normal. With the common paths blocked, Zhao Qiang found himself scratching his head in puzzlement.

events.name: Demonstrate Advanced Troubleshooting Techniques
events.description: Seeing his apprentice stuck, Lu Mingqiang took over the tools and began demonstrating personally. "When obvious issues are ruled out, we need to consider more hidden ones. For example, in old houses like this, water seepage in the walls can cause insulation aging and leakage in the wiring—it's a common problem," he said while skillfully using an insulation megger to conduct segment-by-segment testing of the circuits. He also taught Zhao Qiang how to interpret the subtle current fluctuations on the meter. After nearly two hours of meticulous work, the fault was finally pinpointed to an old concealed wire deeply embedded in the damp wall.

events.name: Guidance for Repair and Testing
events.description: After locating the fault point, Lu Mingqiang directed Zhao Qiang to assist in carefully replacing the severely aged insulation section of the line. Upon completion, instead of leaving immediately, they conducted a one-hour full-load test on the repaired distribution cabinet to confirm that the tripping issue was completely resolved and the system was operating smoothly.

events.name: Summary of On-site Teaching
events.description: While packing up the tools, Zhao Qiang remarked with emotion, "Master Lu, today's trip was more practical than all the training courses I took last month, especially the troubleshooting approach you taught, which involves segment-by-segment inspection." Lu Mingqiang patted him on the shoulder and said with satisfaction, "Just remember it. In our line of work, methodology and experience can sometimes be more important than tools. And above all, safety always comes first."

events.name: Report Work to the Class Monitor
events.description: After returning to the company in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang reported to Team Leader Zhang in detail the entire process of fault handling, the root cause, and the solution. He specifically mentioned that his apprentice Zhao Qiang had shown diligence in learning and good practical skills during the process. Team Leader Zhang expressed satisfaction upon hearing the report.

events.name: Sharing Work Satisfaction with Family
events.description: During dinner at home that evening, his wife Wang Lijuan asked if his workday had gone smoothly. Lu Mingqiang briefly recounted the process of guiding his apprentice to solve a difficult problem, his tone carrying a hint of barely noticeable pride. [Seeing young people able to learn something gives me a greater sense of accomplishment than completing a task myself.] His wife smiled and placed a serving of food into his bowl.

events.name: Complete the practical assessment for senior technicians.
events.description: According to the previous arrangement, Lu Mingqiang went to the Vocational Skills Appraisal Center this afternoon and completed the final stage of the Senior Electrician Technician certification—the practical skills assessment. Faced with complex tasks such as simulated circuit fault troubleshooting and PLC programming and debugging, he remained calm and composed. Relying on his solid practical experience over the years, he successfully completed all the tasks, clearing the final hurdle to obtain the certificate.

起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to embrace technical challenges

结束状态.心情: Tired yet filled with a sense of accomplishment, feeling gratified by the apprentice's growth.

2025-11.daily_overview: Wednesday's daytime work was filled with challenges. Lu Mingqiang successfully resolved a complex equipment malfunction at the industrial park, once again demonstrating his solid technical expertise. After the intense work, he did not choose to rest but instead relieved stress through his weekly fixed squash session. From focused swings to the rush of hot water, the fatigue in his body was completely washed away. On his way home, the thoughtful gesture of bringing his wife a bowl of qingbuliang (a traditional Chinese dessert) revealed the reserved tenderness beneath this tough man's exterior. This day was a dual consumption of physical and mental energy, as well as a typical balance between work and life.

events.name: Handling Complex Malfunctions in Industrial Parks
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang was dispatched to an industrial park in Xiuying District to address an urgent breakdown of a critical production machine that had suddenly stopped working. The situation on-site was complex, involving multiple control circuits. Drawing on his experience, he methodically inspected the wiring and tested the components. After nearly three hours, he finally located and replaced a concealed, damaged relay, restoring the machine to its roaring operation. The client's manager shook his hand repeatedly in gratitude, as the solution had resolved a pressing production issue.

events.name: Brief rest after returning home from work
events.description: After finishing his work, Lu Mingqiang drove back to his home in Longhua District. Though physically somewhat fatigued, his spirits were lifted by the successful resolution of the problem. He changed out of his dust-covered work clothes, took a quick shower, and put on clean athletic wear to prepare for his evening squash session.

events.name: Go to the squash club.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang set out from home and drove to his regular squash club. The evening breeze outside the car window brushed against his face, bringing a sense of relaxation and anticipation. This Wednesday night game was his unwavering [personal time], serving as a crucial outlet to release the accumulated stress from a week of work.

events.name: Conducting solo squash training
events.description: In the squash court, Lu Mingqiang engaged in approximately one hour of high-intensity solo training. He focused entirely on the task at hand, putting his full effort into every swing and every rapid turn, with sweat soon soaking through his workout shirt. He channeled all the concentration and tension from dealing with the daytime malfunction into the rhythmic thuds of the racket striking the wall, releasing it completely in this manner.

events.name: Shower for relaxation after exercise
events.description: After playing ball, Lu Mingqiang took a refreshing hot shower in the club's locker room. The warm water washed away the sweat and muscle soreness, replacing them with a sense of relaxation throughout his body. His mind felt much clearer, as if the accumulated fatigue of the week had been carried away by the flowing water.

events.name: Buying dessert for my wife
events.description: On his way home from the club, Lu Mingqiang remembered that his wife Wang Lijuan had recently mentioned wanting to eat qingbuliang. He deliberately took a slight detour, stopped at a well-reputed dessert shop, and bought a generously portioned serving of qingbuliang to take away.

events.name: Return home to spend the evening with family.
events.description: Lu Mingqiang returned home and handed the still-cool herbal dessert to his wife. ["I brought this for you,"] he said simply. His wife accepted it with pleasant surprise. While having their late-night snack, he briefly shared his experience of handling a malfunction that day and how he felt about playing basketball. The children were already asleep, leaving only the faint glow of the television and the soft murmur of their conversation in the living room, creating a warm and tranquil atmosphere.

events.name: Mild cold symptoms appear.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang felt a slight dryness and itchiness in his throat, likely caused by inhaling dust at the industrial park or getting caught in the rain during the day. He drank a glass of warm water and decided to rest early.

起始状态.心情: Stable, ready to handle daily tasks.

结束状态.心情: Relaxed and content, but with slight physical discomfort.

state.今日运动: One hour of high-intensity squash training

2025-11.daily_overview: Thursday was filled with small honors and the warmth of family. During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang organized a work-sharing session with his apprentices to prepare for the team handover. The afternoon team meeting brought a pleasant surprise: he received public recognition and a cash reward from the company for his technical article, marking a formal acknowledgment of his transition from a "skilled worker" to a "knowledge sharer." After work, he brought this joy and the bonus home, where he and his wife decided to use it to supplement their household expenses, which had become slightly tight due to insurance payments. In the evening, a dinner gathering with his colleague Chen Jianguo and their families continued their simple yet sincere friendship amid the aroma of grilled fish.

events.name: Lunch Break Work Sharing Session
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang invited Zhao Qiang and several other young workers to gather in the temporary rest area at the construction site. "Since Xiao Zhao will soon be moving to a new position, let's take this opportunity while he's still here to have him share his recent experience with the project he's been working on. This way, everyone can gain some understanding, which will be helpful in case anyone needs to take over in the future," he began simply. He encouraged the somewhat shy Zhao Qiang to share his insights, thereby promoting knowledge exchange within the work team.

events.name: Received company commendation and awards
events.description: At the weekly team meeting, Foreman Zhang specifically took out the technical article on neutral line faults submitted by Lu Mingqiang and read a passage aloud to everyone, saying: "Master Lu's article is very solidly written and is quite helpful for us in handling similar issues. The company has decided to award Comrade Lu Mingqiang a cash prize of 500 yuan in recognition of his contribution to the construction of the company's technical knowledge base!" Amid the envious and congratulatory gazes of his fellow workers, Lu Mingqiang stood up somewhat sheepishly to respond.

events.name: Receive cash rewards
events.description: After the regular meeting, Lu Mingqiang went to the finance office to sign the documents as per the procedure and received five brand-new hundred-yuan bills. Holding this thin stack of money, he felt it was heavier than when he received his usual salary—it was an acknowledgment of his abilities beyond his professional skills.

events.name: Hand over the bonus to the wife and discuss its use.
events.description: Returning home from work, Lu Mingqiang happily handed over his 500-yuan bonus to his wife, Wang Lijuan, and told her about the commendation he had received. His wife was also delighted. The couple sat on the sofa to discuss how to use this [windfall]. Recalling that they had just paid a substantial first installment for their family insurance this month and were feeling a bit tight on daily expenses, they quickly reached an agreement: "Perfect, this 500 yuan can be used to supplement this month's living expenses. We can buy some better groceries and not be too frugal with daily necessities."

events.name: Dinner gathering with coworkers' families
events.description: In the evening, the two families of Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo gathered for dinner as planned at a grilled fish restaurant near their residential community. The children played together, the women chatted about daily life, while Lu Mingqiang and Chen Jianguo discussed amusing anecdotes and technical issues from work over their meal. Lu Mingqiang maintained his habit of eating until he was [70% full] and shared his insights on healthy eating with his wife, who expressed her agreement. This simple dinner was filled with the warmth of family life and the closeness of friendship.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful

结束状态.心情: Feeling joyful and grounded, experiencing the recognition of work value and the support of family.

2025-11.daily_overview: Friday serves as the bridge between the workweek and the weekend. Lu Mingqiang began quantifying his exercise plan for the next month, demonstrating an advanced approach to health management. A renovation inquiry from his childhood friend Wang Hai brought their friendship from memories back to the practical level of mutual support. During a break from work, he finalized and officially submitted a technical article, bringing this round of knowledge output to a satisfying conclusion. The day's tasks were trivial yet necessary, laying the groundwork for the upcoming weekend.

events.name: Fine-tune the exercise plan for next month.
events.description: After getting up in the morning, Lu Mingqiang opened the notebook recording his running data and reviewed his progress for the month. Based on his physical sensations and the steady improvement in the data, he sketched out a simple training plan for the next month on paper: [Maintain running twice a week, with one run slightly increasing the distance to 12 kilometers and the other incorporating interval training; keep core training unchanged at three times per week.] The goal is to slightly enhance endurance while maintaining the current status.

events.name: Responding to Childhood Friend's Renovation Inquiry
events.description: At noon, Lu Mingqiang received a WeChat video call request from his childhood friend Wang Hai, who was in Shenzhen. It turned out that Wang Hai was preparing to renovate the kitchen and living room in his new home in Shenzhen. Through the video, he showed the rough house and consulted on how to arrange the electrical circuits safely and reasonably, as well as how to choose switches and sockets. Lu Mingqiang carefully examined the screen and, drawing on his experience with Hainan's humid climate, provided Wang Hai with specific suggestions on circuit design, wire gauge selection, and models of moisture-proof sockets. The two discussed for nearly half an hour.

events.name: Finalize and submit the technical article
events.description: Before the afternoon shift began, Lu Mingqiang took advantage of a brief moment of free time to open the technical article on his office computer and make final adjustments to the formatting. He added a striking title, his own name, and the date, then formally submitted it to his team leader, Zhang Tou, through the company's internal office system. In the submission notes, he wrote: [Team Leader Zhang, this is the organized article on the neutral line fault case from before. It has been reviewed by Chen Jianguo. Please take a look. If appropriate, perhaps it could be added to the company's database or used as reference material for new employee training.]

events.name: Start planning a round-the-island self-driving tour
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang browsed information about the route and scenic spots for a self-driving tour around Hainan Island on his phone, which was one of his five-year goals. He initially planned to take his family on this trip next summer and began discussing the general budget and schedule with his wife.

起始状态.心情: Stable, with a slight easing as the weekend approaches.

结束状态.心情: The sense of ease from completing tasks, and the excitement about future plans.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday is dedicated to sports and learning. The early morning long-distance run was completed at the seaside park, where Lu Mingqiang consciously tested his ability to combine endurance and speed. The evening core strength training has become a fixed weekend ritual for relaxation. His online exchange with his childhood friend Wang Hai transcends geographical boundaries, delving into cutting-edge topics such as smart homes and electrical safety. This demonstrates that he is not detached from the world but actively engages in thoughtful reflection by integrating his professional expertise.

events.name: Weekend Long Distance Running Training
events.description: On Saturday morning, with clear and pleasant weather, Lu Mingqiang returned to Baishamen Park for long-distance training. He completed 16 kilometers as planned and consciously attempted to slightly increase his pace during the final 3 kilometers to gauge the strain on his cardiovascular system and legs. Although he found it somewhat challenging toward the end, he successfully finished the session, gaining a clearer understanding of the coordination between his current endurance and speed.

events.name: Complete core strength training.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang laid out his yoga mat in the living room and completed a 45-minute core and strength training session as planned, including exercises such as planks, squats, and push-ups. His movements were already quite proficient, and both the duration and intensity of his training had stabilized. This had become a regular part of his Saturday evening routine to relax and build up energy for the upcoming week.

events.name: Discussing industry trends with childhood friends
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang saw that Wang Hai had shared links to several popular smart home devices in Shenzhen on WeChat. He clicked to take a look and then replied: [These gadgets are quite trendy, but when installing them at home, electrical safety comes first. For example, smart outlets that require constant power must have independent wiring, and their power capacity must be calculated clearly; otherwise, problems can easily arise.] The two briefly exchanged views on the safety of smart devices for home use. Lu Mingqiang expressed his cautious perspective, taking into account the current electrical conditions in some older residential areas in Haikou.

起始状态.心情: Relax, feeling motivated for the weekend long run.

结束状态.心情: Slightly weary but physically and mentally refreshed, with a sense of fulfillment from completing the plan.

2025-11.daily_overview: Sunday's theme revolved around warm interactions with family and friends. During dinner, I discussed my recent running progress with my wife and received her care and support. Upon learning the news that my kite-flying friend Chen Jie had welcomed a newborn son, Lu Mingqiang immediately extended his congratulations. He also discussed with his wife the idea of sending a practical baby gift set, reflecting a thoughtful and sincere gesture. Meanwhile, he was making a final push for the theoretical exam for senior technicians, thoroughly reviewing and revising his study notes to ensure nothing was overlooked.

events.name: Discussing Exercise Routines with My Wife
events.description: During Sunday's family dinner, Lu Mingqiang casually mentioned, "I've been feeling good about my running lately. I've been gradually increasing the mileage, and my body hasn't shown any discomfort." Upon hearing this, his wife Wang Lijuan picked up a piece of fish for him and said, "It's good to stick to exercise, but don't push yourself too hard. Your work is already tiring, so you should balance work and rest." The simple conversation was filled with the family's care.

events.name: Upon learning of my friend's good news, I sent my congratulations.
events.description: In the evening, while browsing his social media feed, Lu Mingqiang saw a photo of a baby's tiny feet posted by his fellow sports enthusiast Chen Jie, accompanied by the caption [Welcome to our family's newest member]. He immediately opened Chen Jie's WeChat and sent a brief but heartfelt message: [Congratulations, Brother Jie! Sister-in-law has worked hard! Wishing the baby health, happiness, and thriving growth!]

events.name: Discussing gift-giving matters with my wife
events.description: After sending the message, Lu Mingqiang said to his wife, who was clearing the dishes, "Chen Jie, the one who often flies kites with us, his wife just had a baby." His wife smiled upon hearing this, "That's wonderful news." Lu Mingqiang continued, "Yes, I was thinking if we should do something to congratulate them. Maybe send something practical." Wang Lijuan nodded, "We should. I'm good at picking baby supplies. Leave it to me—I'll choose a gift set." The two of them happily settled on the plan.

events.name: Read through and revise the review article
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang printed out the key and challenging articles he had previously compiled in preparation for the senior technician examination. Sitting at his desk, he carefully read through them from beginning to end. As he read, he used a pen to revise a few awkward sentences and correct two typos, ensuring the articles were logically coherent and accurately expressed, making final preparations for any potential theoretical defense or documentation archiving.

events.name: Temporarily suspend the running plan.
events.description: Feeling some muscle soreness, Lu Mingqiang decided to rest today, avoiding additional exercise to allow his body to recover.

起始状态.心情: Leisurely Sunday morning mood

结束状态.心情: Peaceful, with blessings for a friend's joyous occasion and the reassurance of completed tasks.

Wang Lijuan, the wife, took advantage of her free time to carefully select a gift for a friend's newborn, representing the couple's shared sentiments. Meanwhile, Lu Mingqiang, during his spare time, completed comprehensive simulation exercises for an online theoretical course over the weekend, systematically consolidating all key knowledge points. This solidly advanced his ongoing professional learning by another step.

events.name: The wife purchases baby gifts.
events.description: During the day, Wang Lijuan took advantage of a break from her part-time job to visit a reputable maternal and infant supplies store near her home. She carefully selected a practical gift set that included pure cotton newborn clothing, a bathing and skincare kit, and a soft blanket, taking into consideration both quality and practicality. This gift represented the couple’s congratulations to their friends on the new addition to their family.

events.name: Complete online course simulation exercises
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang followed his study plan and spent over two hours completing the final comprehensive simulation test on the online theoretical course platform for senior electrician technicians. This test simulated the entire process from receiving a repair order to completing the construction work. He carefully read the questions, analyzed the faults, selected solutions, and answered strictly in accordance with safety regulations, thereby systematically reviewing and consolidating all the theoretical knowledge he had recently learned.

events.name: Work pressure leads to staying up late.
events.description: Due to an urgent project the company received, Lu Mingqiang needed to work overtime to finalize the construction plan, which was not completed until late at night, resulting in a delayed bedtime.

2025-11.daily_overview: Tuesday was a blend of social interactions, health management, and work. During the lunch break, colleagues discussed moving the weekend gathering to daytime to accommodate Lu Mingqiang's need to spend evenings with his family, reflecting the mutual understanding among coworkers. Lu Mingqiang presented the prepared newborn gift, completing a gesture of friendship. More importantly, he proactively scheduled his annual health checkup. This decision marked a subtle yet significant shift from relying solely on "physical sensations" to seeking scientific data for health management.

events.name: Workmates discuss adjusting the gathering time.
events.description: During the lunch break, Chen Jianguo, Zhao Qiang, and several other coworkers chatted again about the weekend gathering. Chen Jianguo glanced at Lu Mingqiang and said with a smile, "Mingqiang, are you free during the day this weekend? As usual, let's have grilled fish—we'll set it for noon, so you can spend the evening peacefully with your wife and kids." Lu Mingqiang readily agreed, and everyone had grown accustomed to scheduling their gatherings with him during the daytime.

events.name: Sending Newborn Gifts
events.description: Lu Mingqiang informed Chen Jie via WeChat that the gift was ready and inquired about a convenient delivery method. Considering that Chen Jie’s home was not far away and that he had recently needed to care for a postpartum mother, making it inconvenient for him to go out, the two agreed to leave the gift box at the security office of Chen Jie’s residential community. After work, Lu Mingqiang dropped off the gift box on his way home, completing the delivery of this thoughtful gesture.

events.name: Decide and schedule an annual physical examination
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang received the annual physical examination notification email from the company's human resources department. Considering that he had not undergone a systematic health check for several years, and despite feeling well, he decided to take advantage of this company benefit due to his heavy workload and occasional reminders from his wife. He first called the human resources department to confirm the physical examination procedures and available hospitals. Following the instructions, he then contacted the Physical Examination Center of Haikou People's Hospital, scheduled a comprehensive physical examination package for the morning of December 8, and carefully noted down precautions such as fasting requirements.

events.name: Commence preparations for the three-day skills training.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang received a notice from his company that he would attend a three-day training on new technologies in electrical safety next week. He began to review relevant materials to prepare for the training.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful

结束状态.心情: Feeling somewhat relieved after handling a few trivial matters and making health arrangements for myself.

2025-11.daily_overview: On Wednesday morning, Lu Mingqiang conducted a running and core combination training session to enhance his physical stability, integrating health management into his daily routine. He received thanks from his friend Chen Jie for a gift and arranged to fly kites together in the future, allowing their friendship to continue into this new phase of life. In the evening, he remotely guided his childhood friend Wang Hai in resolving a circuit tripping issue at home. This technical support across thousands of miles provided a new way for their long-standing bond to reconnect in adulthood.

events.name: Morning Run Combined with Core Training
events.description: Waking up a bit earlier today, Lu Mingqiang completed a set of interval running training along the coastal boulevard to stimulate his cardiovascular system. After returning home, he did not rest immediately but instead added a 15-minute core strength training session on the floor mat, including three sets of planks and squats. He felt that these exercises indeed made his body more stable during long-distance running, delaying the onset of fatigue.

events.name: Received Friend's Gratitude and Agreed on Follow-up Arrangements
events.description: After receiving the gift, Chen Jie and his wife specifically sent a WeChat message to thank Lu Mingqiang and Wang Lijuan for their thoughtful gesture. Lu Mingqiang replied that it was no trouble at all and inquired about the well-being of the new mother and the baby. Chen Jie said everything was fine, but they were extremely busy. Lu Mingqiang typed with a smile: "When the baby is a bit older and the weather is nice, let's go fly kites together so he can see his dad's skills." The two agreed to stay in touch.

events.name: Remotely guiding a childhood friend to solve a household electrical circuit issue
events.description: In the evening, Wang Hai sent another video call for help, saying that whenever he turned on the air conditioner in his living room, the circuit breaker would trip. Lu Mingqiang instructed him to point his phone camera at the distribution box and the sockets, guiding him step by step to disconnect other circuits and test the air conditioner line separately. Eventually, they discovered that the issue was not with the air conditioner but an old wall socket that had an internal short circuit. Lu Mingqiang guided him to disconnect the line connected to that socket, resolving the fault. Wang Hai sighed with relief on the other end of the video, saying, "It still takes a professional to handle this."

起始状态.心情: Awake, ready to start morning exercises.

结束状态.心情: A slight sense of pleasure after helping others.
