2025-11.daily_overview: Thursday evening is dedicated to family finances and personal hobbies. Lu Mingqiang and his wife reviewed their monthly accounts together. Faced with a savings shortfall due to insurance expenses, they calmly discussed adjustments to the next month's budget. After concluding the financial matters, he immersed himself in his small world of bottle collecting—browsing forums, admiring his collection, and briefly exchanging thoughts with fellow collectors. This was his personal moment of mental relaxation, free from the need for words.

events.name: Monthly Financial Reconciliation with Spouse
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan sat by the coffee table in the living room, taking out the household account book and mobile payment records to review the family's income and expenses for November. They calculated each item one by one, including water, electricity, and gas bills, the educational expenses for their two children, daily groceries, and household supplies, confirming the total expenditure. As the first installment of the family insurance premium was paid at the beginning of the month, the savings for this month were indeed slightly less than originally planned.

events.name: Browse Wine Bottle Collection Information
events.description: After checking the accounts, Lu Mingqiang leaned back on the sofa and logged into his favorite bottle collection forum and several second-hand trading platforms on his phone. He leisurely browsed through new posts, admiring photos of various-shaped liquor bottles shared by collectors from different regions, with particular attention to whether there were any distinctive bottles produced by old local distilleries in Hainan.

events.name: Discover and collect wine bottles of interest.
events.description: While browsing, he came across several well-preserved vintage bottles of Hainan [Haikou Daqu] liquor, which had a simple and classic design that exuded a strong sense of history. Although he had no immediate plans to purchase them, he skillfully added the product links to his favorites, took clear screenshots, and saved the images in the [Liquor Bottle Collection] folder in his phone's photo album for future appreciation or study.

events.name: Briefly communicate with online Tibetan art enthusiasts
events.description: Seeing an online collector with a familiar ID (specifically Chen Jianguo, who runs a hardware store) post a newly acquired 1980s [Fenjiu] porcelain bottle, Lu Mingqiang gave the post a like and sent a private message: [This bottle shape is rare, and the condition is truly excellent.] The other party replied quickly, and the two briefly exchanged views on the ceramic firing techniques for liquor bottles from that era.

events.name: Organize and Relax
events.description: After browsing for about half an hour, Lu Mingqiang put down his phone, stood up, and stretched his stiff neck and shoulders. Only a floor lamp was on in the living room. His wife was reading in the bedroom, and the children were already asleep. This brief moment of quiet relaxation, entirely his own, made him feel exceptionally comfortable. He then went to freshen up and prepare for bed.

起始状态.心情: Ordinary Mind

结束状态.心情: Relaxation, tranquility, and spiritual fulfillment through hobbies

2025-11.daily_overview: On Friday, some interim achievements began to emerge. Lu Mingqiang ordered a new pair of running shoes as a reward for his commitment to health management. A phone call with his childhood friend Wang Hai led to plans for a reunion during the Spring Festival, bringing anticipation for both family bonds and friendship. The most significant moment arrived—he checked the results of the electrician senior technician examination and found that he had passed both the theoretical and practical sections. This marked the official achievement of a major career goal, with his long-term efforts receiving formal certification.

events.name: Buy new running shoes as a reward
events.description: Lu Mingqiang felt that he had been consistently exercising well lately and thought it was time to update his gear. During his break, he browsed an online flagship store and selected a pair of professional running shoes with a good reputation and high cost-effectiveness, placing an order. This served both as a replacement for his old shoes and as a small reward for his ongoing commitment to health management.

events.name: Arranging a Spring Festival gathering with childhood friends over a phone call.
events.description: In the evening, Wang Hai called for a casual chat. He mentioned his plan to return to Haikou for a few days before the Spring Festival to visit his parents. Lu Mingqiang was delighted to hear this and immediately said, "Then you must come over for a meal. I'll have your sister-in-law prepare some good dishes, and we can have a good drink... oh no, a good chat." He also called his two children over to greet "Uncle Wang Hai" through the phone, and they agreed to get together properly the next time they meet.

events.name: Inquire and confirm the passing of the senior technician examination.
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang logged into the official website of the Vocational Skills Appraisal Center with a hint of nervousness. He entered his ID number and exam admission ticket number to check his results. As the page loaded, two clear lines of text came into view: [Theoretical Score: Pass], [Practical Score: Pass]. He breathed a sigh of relief, and a strong sense of accomplishment washed over him—the goal of becoming a Senior Electrician Technician, which he had worked toward for months of preparation and effort, was finally settled and officially achieved at this moment.

events.name: Staying up late due to excitement.
events.description: Due to the joy of passing the exam, Lu Mingqiang talked with his wife for a while longer about future plans, which led to him going to bed later than usual.

起始状态.心情: The relaxed feeling of an ordinary Friday

结束状态.心情: Excited and filled with a sense of accomplishment, the joy of achieving long-term goals.

2025-11.daily_overview: Saturday was the day for a fitness test. Accompanied by his running partner Chen Bin, Lu Mingqiang conducted a rigorous 10-kilometer simulation test at Baishamen Park, strictly adhering to the target pace to comprehensively evaluate his recent training results. This served as a test of both his physical endurance and mental fortitude, providing authentic data for potential future competition plans.

events.name: Conduct a 10-kilometer simulated test run.
events.description: Early Saturday morning, Lu Mingqiang arrived at Baishamen Park as scheduled. His running partner, Chen Bin, also came specifically to serve as his [temporary coach] and timer. This run was different from his usual relaxed jogs or long-distance slow runs—it was a strict 10-kilometer simulation test. Lu Mingqiang put on his sports watch, set the target pace, and started running. Throughout the process, he focused on controlling his breathing and rhythm, strictly adhering to the planned pace. Although he struggled in the latter half, he persevered with Chen Bin’s encouragement. After crossing his self-designated finish line, he gasped for breath and looked at the time reported by Chen Bin, feeling both exhausted and satisfied. This test comprehensively assessed his current training level.

events.name: Complete core training for recovery
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang performed a set of light core training at home to aid muscle recovery and maintain training consistency.

起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous and expectant, ready to face the test.

结束状态.心情: The immense satisfaction and slight fatigue after completing a test.

state.今日运动: 10-kilometer simulation test run (at race pace) + 20 minutes of core training

2025-11.daily_overview: On the last day of November, the day was spent in reflection and harvest. Lu Mingqiang reviewed and confirmed the stability of his exercise habits, laying a foundation for the next month's plan. He received the good news that his collector friend Chen Jianguo's store was about to open, and he felt happy for his friend. In the evening, the month-end family financial review conducted with his wife was the highlight. They calmly analyzed income and expenses, adjusted the budget for the next month due to insurance expenditures, and planned the use of expected bonuses, demonstrating steady and pragmatic family financial management skills. On the same day, he visited the appraisal center and personally collected the Advanced Electrician Technician Qualification Certificate, a symbol of his professional milestone, bringing the month to a perfect close.

events.name: Review and consolidate exercise habits
events.description: Waking up in the morning, Lu Mingqiang reviewed his exercise log for November in his mind: he had basically completed two runs and three core training sessions each week, and his lower back no longer felt discomfort during work or daily life. He confirmed that these healthy habits had become integrated into his routine, requiring no deliberate reminders to maintain. Satisfied with this progress, he decided to continue the same rhythm in December.

events.name: Learning about a friend's entrepreneurial progress
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang received a call from his collector friend Chen Jianguo (owner of a hardware store). Chen Jianguo could hardly contain his excitement over the phone: "Mingqiang, the renovation of my new storefront is all done, and I've finalized the deals for the goods. Now I just need to pick an auspicious day for the grand opening! Thanks again for your advice on the electrical circuits and tools earlier!" Lu Mingqiang was genuinely happy for his friend and repeatedly offered his congratulations over the phone. He readily promised to attend the opening to show his support and cheer on the occasion.

events.name: Conducting end-of-month family financial review with spouse.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan sat down by the coffee table in the living room and took out the family ledger. They first verified the total income for the month, including Lu Mingqiang’s fixed salary, Wang Lijuan’s part-time earnings, and the 500-yuan technical bonus received mid-month, recording each item one by one.

events.name: Review all household expenditures for this month.
events.description: Next, they jointly reviewed all expenses for the month: regular living costs, children's tuition and miscellaneous fees, expenses for purchasing gifts for the newborn in Chen Jie's family, the cost of last week's short trip to Qionghai, and the largest expense—the initial premium for the family insurance paid at the beginning of the month. Each item was verified against receipts or payment records.

events.name: Analyze the savings situation and discuss it.
events.description: Considering the savings target for the [Family Risk Protection Fund] established in October, they calculated that due to this unplanned large expenditure on insurance, the actual savings for this month were indeed lower than expected. The two discussed the matter and agreed that this was a necessary investment in protection, and the short-term impact was acceptable.

events.name: Discuss and adjust the budget for next month.
events.description: Based on this month's review, the couple decided to slightly reduce the daily expense budget for December, primarily by exercising a bit more restraint on non-essential shopping and dining out, in order to make up for this month's savings shortfall and ensure the overall direction of the annual financial plan remains unchanged.

events.name: Planning the Utilization of Anticipated Revenue
events.description: Considering that the company may distribute project bonuses by the end of the year, the two agreed that if the bonuses are received, they will prioritize injecting them into the [Family Risk Protection Fund] account to accelerate the achievement of their savings goal. They also briefly discussed the specific operational steps to be taken once the bonuses are credited.

events.name: Update Household Financial Records
events.description: After the discussion, Wang Lijuan took charge of updating the family financial record book, clearly documenting the final November income and expenditure review results, the adjusted December budget draft, and the anticipated usage plan for the year-end bonus.

events.name: Receive the Senior Electrician Technician Certificate
events.description: That morning, Lu Mingqiang took some time to visit the Vocational Skill Appraisal Center once again. Carrying his ID card and the previously printed transcript, he underwent a brief verification at the service counter. The staff then solemnly handed him the brand-new [Senior Electrician Professional Qualification Certificate], emblazoned with the national emblem. Holding this substantial certificate and flipping through the pages bearing his name and scores, the months of effort and anticipation transformed into tangible proof at that moment. His heart swelled with an indescribable sense of accomplishment and confidence in the future.

起始状态.心情: Peaceful, preparing to handle end-of-month affairs

结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, substantial, and filled with a sense of accomplishment, the dual satisfaction brought by the monthly summary and professional gains.

2025-12.daily_overview: The new month began with a fulfilling morning run, during which Lu Mingqiang set a new personal best pace for the 5-kilometer distance, greatly boosting his confidence. After sharing the joy in the morning, he immersed himself in the site inspection for the power distribution cabinet renovation project. In the evening, he planned his training schedule, reflecting the vitality and structured approach characteristic of an initial healthy state.

events.name: Set a new personal best for the 5-kilometer run.
events.description: At 6:20 in the morning, Lu Mingqiang got up and performed dynamic stretching before driving to Baishamen Park. He completed a 5-kilometer morning run with an average pace of 5 minutes and 45 seconds per kilometer, breaking his personal record. His heart rate remained stable at 156 beats per minute. After the run, he thoroughly stretched and shared his joy with family and friends.

events.name: Post-Run Recovery and Sharing the Joy
events.description: While enjoying Hainan noodles at a breakfast shop, I shared a screenshot of my running data via WeChat with my wife Wang Lijuan and my badminton friend Lin Feng, receiving positive feedback and feeling delighted.

events.name: On-site Survey for Power Distribution Cabinet Renovation Project
events.description: In the morning, I went with my colleague Chen Jianguo to an electrical appliance repair shop in Meilan District to inspect the heat dissipation issue of an old power distribution cabinet. We proposed a preliminary solution involving the addition of cooling fans and optimization of the wiring. We then confirmed the construction details with the shop owner, Li Jianguo.

events.name: Material and Tool Preparation
events.description: Return to the company warehouse to inventory materials such as cables, cooling fans, and air switches, and inspect tools including hole cutters and multimeters to ensure smooth construction the following day.

events.name: Plan an evening running training session.
events.description: After dinner, I reviewed the data using a running app on my phone, contemplated incorporating interval training to consolidate my performance, and noted it in my memo—reflecting the planning nature of an ISTJ.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the new week.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and motivated, feeling fulfilled by the breakthrough in morning running and the smooth progress at work.

state.今日运动: 5km morning run (personal best pace: 5:45 per kilometer), followed by post-run stretching.

During the lunch break, he studied an online course. In the evening, he went for a recovery jog and exchanged ideas with fellow runners. However, he stayed up slightly late due to studying, reflecting a balance between work and learning.

events.name: Power Distribution Cabinet Retrofit: Safe Power Shutdown and Removal of Old Components
events.description: In the morning, the power outage operation was strictly executed. The old air switches and cables were removed, and accumulated dust was cleared to create a clean environment for installation. The work was carried out meticulously and safely.

events.name: Online Course Learning During the Lunch Break
events.description: After lunch, review the chapter on "Harmonic Control in Modern Power Distribution Systems" from the electrical engineering course and complete the practice exercises. Utilize fragmented time to advance long-term goals.

events.name: Recovery Jog and Data Review
events.description: A relaxed evening jog of 5 kilometers at a pace of 6 minutes and 30 seconds per kilometer, with a steady heart rate. Post-run stretching and checking APP data to promote muscle recovery.

events.name: Exchanging Training Experiences with Fellow Runners
events.description: Sharing jogging experiences with fellow runner Chen Bin via WeChat, exchanging insights on adjusting training intensity, and engaging in relaxed social interaction.

events.name: Staying up late to review coursework
events.description: To reinforce his learning, Lu Mingqiang spent an extra half hour reviewing the course materials in the evening, which led to him going to bed slightly later, reflecting his dedication to exam preparation.

起始状态.心情: Steady, ready to handle heavy physical work.

结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued but content, having completed the work and study plans.

2025-12.daily_overview: Wednesday is both a day for squash activities and a day for project breakthroughs. Lu Mingqiang addressed heat dissipation issues during the day, tried new tactics in squash in the evening and received health reminders. However, he experienced slight ankle discomfort during the match but recovered quickly, gaining valuable experience overall.

events.name: Power Distribution Cabinet Modification: Installation of Cooling Fans
events.description: Precisely install the cooling fan by drilling holes, test airflow to ensure effective heat dissipation, coordinate seamlessly with Chen Jianguo, and the core issue is about to be resolved.

events.name: Fixed Squash Activities and Tactical Dilemmas
events.description: In the evening, I had a squash match with Lin Feng. Initially, my defense was passive. During the halftime break, Lin Feng suggested trying a net interception tactic.

events.name: Seeking Change and Slight Discomfort in Competition
events.description: In the second half, new tactics were attempted. There were initial errors, but high-quality interceptions gradually emerged, enhancing the game's entertainment value. During the process, a slight ankle sprain occurred, but after a brief rest, it was no longer an issue, and the match continued.

events.name: Post-Match Communication and Health Reminders
events.description: After the match, Lin Feng taught Lu Mingqiang shoulder and back stretching exercises to prevent occupational strain. Lu Mingqiang listened attentively and decided to incorporate them into his daily routine.

events.name: Reflections on the Way Home
events.description: Driving home, I reflected on the match and health knowledge, paying attention to the prevention of strain injuries with an active mind.

起始状态.心情: Maintain a calm and composed mindset, knowing that today has been a fulfilling day.

结束状态.心情: Though defeated, they gained honor and achieved dual gains in skills and knowledge, with the slight ankle discomfort having already recovered.

2025-12.daily_overview: On a regular Tuesday, Lu Mingqiang found fulfillment in his structured routine. In the morning, he completed his final easy run before the competition. During the afternoon, he focused on work-related communication and organizing certificates. In the evening, he shared his phased learning achievements with his family, adding a touch of joy to an otherwise ordinary day.

events.name: Final Easy Run Before the Race
events.description: At 6:15 in the morning, Lu Mingqiang completed a 3-kilometer easy run near his residential community. He deliberately slowed his pace, with the primary aim of loosening his joints and activating his cardiovascular system, rather than pursuing intensity, to ensure his body remains relaxed ahead of tomorrow's 10-kilometer race.

events.name: Breakfast and Commuting
events.description: After finishing his run and returning home, Lu Mingqiang quickly took a shower and had a simple breakfast with his wife and children—plain rice porridge paired with salted duck eggs. At 7:40, as usual, he rode his electric bike and arrived at his company on Haisheng Road in Xiuying District in just 10 minutes.

events.name: Confirmation Before Hosting the Safety Review Meeting
events.description: During the morning work break, Lu Mingqiang found his foreman, Zhang Tou, in the rest shed at the construction site. He took out his phone and showed several prepared case photos, confirming the specific arrangements for the next day’s review meeting with the foreman and briefly explaining the key points of his presentation. Zhang Tou acknowledged his preparation and added a reminder about outdoor work safety during recent rainy and foggy weather, asking him to include it as well.

events.name: Download and back up the electronic certificate of completion.
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang logged into the online platform for senior electrician technician courses on his phone and saw the final rating of "Excellent." He carefully took a screenshot to save it, then logged into his company office computer to download the electronic certificate. He stored it separately on the computer hard drive, in his phone photo album, and backed it up on a cloud drive to ensure complete security.

events.name: Sharing Joy with Family
events.description: During dinner, there was a bowl of Qing Bu Liang, a traditional Chinese tonic soup, specially prepared by his wife on the table. Lu Mingqiang took out his phone and showed the electronic certificate of completion to his wife Wang Lijuan and their two children. He spoke calmly but with a hint of pride: "Look, Dad (I) passed, and with honors." His wife congratulated him with a smile, while their eldest son Lu Zixuan clamored to see it, and the younger son imitated by clapping his hands. The family shared this joy in a simple yet heartwarming moment. Lu Mingqiang particularly thanked his wife for taking on more household chores during his study period.

events.name: Evening Relaxation
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang helped his eldest son complete his homework, then browsed the electrical machinery forum for a while to see if there were any new posts. At 9:30, he washed up early and went to bed, conserving his energy for the competition and meeting the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for tomorrow's competition.

结束状态.心情: Satisfied and content, feeling warm from accomplishing learning goals and sharing with family.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Lu Mingqiang seamlessly switched between dual roles. In the morning, as a participant, he completed his first-ever 10-kilometer road race. In the afternoon, returning to the company, he transformed into a "lecturer," leading an in-depth safety review meeting, demonstrating his growth from a skilled worker to a knowledge sharer.

events.name: Participate in the Haikou 10K Road Running Race
events.description: In the early morning, Lu Mingqiang arrived at the starting point of Binhai Avenue. He met up with his pre-arranged colleague and running partner, Chen Bin. After the starting gun fired, he maintained a steady pace according to his own rhythm. Although he felt slightly fatigued midway due to recent work exhaustion, he ultimately completed the race smoothly in 1 hour and 2 minutes, earning the much-anticipated finisher's medal. After the race, he took a photo with Chen Bin in front of the backdrop, both wearing cheerful smiles.

events.name: Returning Home and Resting After the Competition
events.description: After the race, Lu Mingqiang felt soreness in his leg muscles. He slowly walked back to the parking area and rode his bike home. His wife had already prepared warm water and a simple breakfast. He took a hot shower to relieve his fatigue and showed his wife the finisher's medal. Since he still had to work in the afternoon, he did not rest for long.

events.name: Preside over the team safety review meeting
events.description: After the company's monthly safety training in the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang presided over a small debriefing session in the team break room. Using case photos he had prepared of short circuits caused by improper installation of distribution cabinets, he explained each risk point in detail to his colleagues, including Chen Jianguo and Zhao Qiang. He also shared industry accident analyses he had previously seen on forums, emphasizing the importance of "double-checking" and carrying emergency tools at all times. The colleagues engaged in a lively discussion, and Zhao Qiang shared an experience where he nearly suffered an electric shock due to negligence.

events.name: Compile meeting minutes and report
events.description: After the meeting, Lu Mingqiang recorded several new suggestions discussed by everyone (such as including insulating tape as standard equipment in each toolkit) and supplementary cases. He organized them into a brief summary using his phone's notepad app. Before leaving work, he sent it via WeChat to the team leader, Zhang Tou, with a message: [Team Leader Zhang, here is the summary of this afternoon's meeting. The discussion was quite active, and the situation mentioned by Zhao Qiang is also worth noting.] Zhang Tou quickly replied with a [thumbs-up] emoji.

events.name: Research Practical Operation Certification Process
events.description: In the evening, after putting his child to sleep, Lu Mingqiang used his phone to check the websites of the Hainan Provincial Human Resources and Social Security Bureau and the Skill Appraisal Center. He gained a preliminary understanding of the registration period (usually in March-April of the following year) for the practical certification of senior electrician technicians, the required materials to be submitted (such as work certificates, passed theoretical exam results, etc.), and the general content of the assessment. With a clearer plan in mind, he decided to focus next on strengthening his practical skills in complex troubleshooting and the application of new technologies.

起始状态.心情: Excited and slightly nervous, filled with anticipation for the competition.

结束状态.心情: Though physically exhausted, I felt spiritually fulfilled, experiencing both the sense of accomplishment from completing the race and the satisfaction of chairing meetings and helping others.

2025-12.daily_overview: It was an ordinary workday filled with neighborly warmth. After a busy day of emergency power repairs, Lu Mingqiang, on his way home from work, took a moment to help his neighbor Uncle Wang fix a faulty chandelier. With his professional skills, he earned sincere gratitude and a gift of homegrown fruit, making an ordinary day shine through mutual assistance.

events.name: Daily Work and Commuting
events.description: Lu Mingqiang's task for the day was to inspect and repair the distribution boxes in an old residential area—a meticulous and detailed job. Working alongside Chen Jianguo, he wrapped up shortly before 6 p.m. As usual, he rode his electric bike home, his shadow stretching long under the setting sun.

events.name: Encountering a Neighbor in Need of Help
events.description: As soon as he parked his car in the residential compound's shed, Lu Mingqiang saw his neighbor Uncle Wang (Wang Jianguo) standing at the entrance of the building unit, looking troubled as he held a light bulb in his hand. The moment Uncle Wang spotted him, it was as if he had found a savior: "Mingqiang, you're back just in time! The living room light at my place keeps flickering, and with my old bones, I don't dare to mess with it..."

events.name: Enthusiastically assisting with the inspection and repair of the chandelier.
events.description: Without a word, Lu Mingqiang followed Uncle Wang into the house. He first observed the flickering chandelier, then took out a voltage tester and a screwdriver from the tool pouch he always carried with him—a habit he had developed over the years, never leaving his tools behind. He asked Uncle Wang to turn off the main power switch, skillfully removed the lampshade, and discovered that a terminal screw on the lamp holder had come loose. He tightened it with the screwdriver and checked the other wiring.

events.name: Problem Resolution and Gratitude Reward
events.description: The switch was flipped, and the light came on. The chandelier shone steadily. Uncle Wang repeatedly expressed his gratitude, then turned and brought out a net bag of golden-yellow papayas from the kitchen: "These are ripe from our own tree, very sweet. You must take them!" Lu Mingqiang declined several times but eventually had to accept this weighty token of goodwill.

events.name: Neighborhood Chats and Farewells
events.description: The two chatted for a few more minutes at the stairwell entrance. Uncle Wang mentioned the recent drop in temperature and reminded Lu Mingqiang to dress warmly when going out for work. Lu Mingqiang, in turn, advised Uncle Wang that if any other old appliances at home had issues, he could call him anytime to take a look. After that, they bid each other farewell.

events.name: Share the experience with family.
events.description: Upon returning home, Lu Mingqiang handed the papayas to his wife and briefly mentioned the incident with the light repair. Wang Lijuan smiled and said, "Uncle Wang is such a kind person. These papayas look so sweet." The bag of papayas later became the family's after-dinner fruit for several days.

events.name: Random Event: Emotional Fluctuations Due to Work Pressure
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang recalled a tricky malfunction he had encountered during the day at work. Although it had been resolved, it had consumed a great deal of his energy, leaving him somewhat irritable. He stood alone on the balcony for a while, taking deep breaths to calm himself, and decided to adjust his work pace the next day.

起始状态.心情: Calm and ready to embrace the day's work.

结束状态.心情: Pleasant yet slightly weary, the simple joy derived from helping others alleviates much of the day's work fatigue, though a sense of pressure still lingers.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Friday, Lu Mingqiang made steady progress across multiple aspects of life: consolidating healthy habits, refining career plans, exploring family security solutions, and maintaining camaraderie with colleagues. Everything unfolded in a pragmatic and orderly manner, laying the groundwork for year-end wrap-ups and the start of the new year.

events.name: Compile Annual Work Achievements
events.description: During the lunch break, Lu Mingqiang created a new folder on his office computer and named it "2025 Work Summary." He sorted and placed his senior technician electronic certificate, screenshots of technical discussions from forums, photos documenting several critical repair projects, and customer acknowledgments (such as Mr. Li’s positive feedback on WeChat) into the folder, preparing for the company’s year-end summary meeting in a few days.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: In the afternoon, I continued to participate in the wiring work for a shopping mall's power capacity expansion project, serving as a technical backbone to guide Zhao Qiang in the installation of cable trays.

events.name: Purchase an Eye-Protection Desk Lamp
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang did not go directly home but took a detour to a hardware store near his residence where he often shopped. He carefully compared several desk lamps designed to protect eyesight and eventually selected a domestic brand known for its soft, adjustable lighting and favorable reputation. He specifically inquired about the warranty period before making the payment.

events.name: Practical Skills Enhancement in Planning
events.description: In the evening, after reviewing the practical operation certification requirements, Lu Mingqiang listed several key skills that needed to be strengthened in his notebook: the commissioning of intelligent power distribution systems, the standards for integrating new energy sources (such as photovoltaic), and more complex fault simulation and troubleshooting for relay protection. He planned to seek guidance from his mentor, Master Li, or the company's senior technicians during his spare time after the coming spring, and even considered paying out of pocket to attend some short-term training sessions.

events.name: Noise Event: Evening Run Canceled Due to Weather
events.description: The original plan was to go for an easy run in the evening, but with the light rain persisting, Lu Mingqiang decided to cancel the outdoor exercise and switch to core training at home to avoid catching a cold.

起始状态.心情: Focus and start thinking about year-end matters.

结束状态.心情: Enriched, feeling that I have done something substantial for my family and children, and having a clearer vision for future planning.

2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday was a day of high recognition for Lu Mingqiang's professional achievements. At the company's year-end summary meeting, he was publicly commended by the manager and received a bonus for obtaining an advanced certificate and sharing knowledge, while the praise from his team colleagues made him feel even more appreciated. This joy extended to his family life as well, where he and his wife began preliminary discussions on family risk protection.

events.name: Reviewing Career Development
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang did not sleep in. Instead, he sat in the living room, brewed a cup of tea, and quietly reflected on his work over the past few months since obtaining his senior technician certificate. He contemplated how to apply the newly learned theories to more complex projects and how to maintain high-quality client resources, such as Mr. Li, paving the way for his longer-term dream of establishing an independent studio.

events.name: Initial Contact with an Insurance Broker
events.description: In the morning, through an introduction from his coworker Chen Jianguo, he added the WeChat of a local insurance agent. He briefly introduced his family situation: a couple with two children, himself being the primary source of income, with an annual income of about 50,000 yuan, and expressed interest in learning about basic coverage. The agent indicated that they would first prepare several plans for reference.

events.name: Attended the company's year-end summary meeting and received commendation.
events.description: In the afternoon, the company held its year-end summary meeting. While delivering the annual review, Manager Liu specifically mentioned Lu Mingqiang: "[...Particular praise should be given to veteran masters like Lu Mingqiang, who not only possess outstanding technical skills and have obtained the Senior Technician certification, but also willingly share their knowledge on forums, fostering a learning atmosphere. This is truly the valuable asset of our company.]" Following this, Manager Liu presented Lu Mingqiang with a "Skill Enhancement Award" red envelope on the spot, which was met with applause from the entire audience.

events.name: Team dinner celebration
events.description: After the summary meeting ended, several close coworkers in the work team playfully urged Lu Mingqiang to treat everyone to a meal. They gathered for dinner at a food stall near the company. Team leader Zhang raised his beer glass and said, "Mingqiang, you're the pillar of our team. We'll still be counting on you to guide everyone in the future!" Chen Jianguo and others also offered their congratulations, creating a lively atmosphere. Lu Mingqiang, who was not particularly articulate, simply smiled and clinked glasses with everyone.

events.name: Share the Joy with Family
events.description: Returning home in the evening with a slight buzz, Lu Mingqiang handed the red envelope to his wife and shared the news of his commendation. His wife, Wang Lijuan, was delighted. Although their two children did not fully understand, they smiled along with their parents’ joy. At that moment, Lu Mingqiang felt that all his hard work had been worth it.

events.name: Commence research on energy-saving air conditioners.
events.description: Having received a bonus, Lu Mingqiang began to consider replacing the bedroom air conditioner that had been in use for nearly ten years, which was both noisy and energy-consuming. Lying in bed, he searched on his phone for "1.5 horsepower inverter energy-saving air conditioner," browsing JD.com and Suning.com. He focused on mainstream domestic brands like Gree and Midea, with the price range set between 5,000 and 7,000 yuan.

events.name: Initial discussion with wife about insurance
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang told his wife about contacting an insurance agent. Wang Lijuan was somewhat surprised but expressed support: "It's time to consider it; you are now the pillar of the family." The two discussed that it would be best for the premium not to exceed three to four thousand yuan per year, as anything higher would cause financial strain.

起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a slight anticipation for the afternoon meeting.

结束状态.心情: Proud, excited, and warm, with a peak sense of professional accomplishment and a strong feeling of family support.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday is family day. Lu Mingqiang kept his promise and took the whole family for a picnic and kite-flying at Wanlü Park, enjoying rare quality time together. Watching the children run and laugh on the grass, he deeply felt the tangible happiness of family life, which further strengthened his determination to work steadily and protect this sense of peace.

events.name: Family Outdoor Activity Day
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang drove his wife and two children to Wanlv Park. He brought along a traditional swallow kite he had made himself and the picnic food prepared by his wife—Hainan chicken rice balls, fruits, and water. On the open lawn in the park, he taught the two children how to fly the kite. The eldest son, Lu Zixuan, learned quickly, while the younger son, Lu Zihan happily chased after it nearby. His wife, Wang Lijuan, spread out the picnic mat and captured the joyful moments of the family.

events.name: Bumped into fellow badminton player Lin Feng
events.description: While flying the kite, Lu Mingqiang happened to meet his badminton friend Lin Feng, who had also come to the park for a run. After a brief exchange of greetings, Lin Feng praised Lu Mingqiang for his well-made kite and arranged to meet him at the squash court next Wednesday.

events.name: Cherish Family Time
events.description: At noon, the family had a picnic on the lawn. The children, tired from playing, ate with particular relish. Lu Mingqiang and his wife watched the children while chatting about everyday matters, feeling that the fatigue from a week's work was dispelled by the warm sunshine and the laughter of their family.

events.name: Lunch Break and Evening Organization
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, the children took a nap, and Lu Mingqiang also rested for a while. In the evening, he helped his son with homework and prepared the toolkit needed for work the next day.

events.name: Random Event: Afternoon Walk as a Low-Intensity Activity
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang took a 20-minute walk alone in the residential area to aid digestion and relax his mind. This is a new habit he has recently started to adopt.

起始状态.心情: Lighthearted and joyful, looking forward to family activities.

结束状态.心情: Happiness and contentment, immersed in the warm atmosphere of family reunion.

state.今日运动: Strolling in the park, flying a kite (light activity), and taking a 20-minute walk in the afternoon.

2025-12.daily_overview: Monday marked a return to the work routine. Lu Mingqiang completed his final guidance session for his apprentice Zhao Qiang at work and carefully prepared a farewell gift after clocking out. In the evening, he and his wife pragmatically planned the use of their bonus, reflecting their small family's steady financial management style.

events.name: Daily Work: The Last Collaboration with Zhao Qiang
events.description: Today's task is a routine inspection. Lu Mingqiang intentionally allowed his apprentice Zhao Qiang, who is about to leave his position, to independently handle most of the operations. Lu observed from the side, only stepping in at the end to review and provide key reminders. He acknowledged Zhao Qiang's growth over the past few years: "You've checked the lines very thoroughly, much better than when you first started. Keep up the good work when you return, and never forget that safety always comes first."

events.name: Buying a farewell gift
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang went to that hardware store he frequented. He carefully selected a set of common electrical tools, including a multimeter, high-quality screwdrivers, and wire strippers, and asked the shopkeeper to package them in a gift box. He thought this would be the most practical gift for Zhao Qiang, who was planning to return to his hometown to develop his career.

events.name: Discussing the Use of the Bonus with My Wife
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang and his wife Wang Lijuan sat down to discuss how to use the skill bonus. They reached an agreement: the majority (approximately 70%) would be deposited into the family savings account; the remaining portion would supplement this month's household expenses (including the upcoming purchase of an air conditioner); Lu Mingqiang himself could set aside a few hundred yuan for his hobby of collecting wine bottles. His wife also teased, "Don't spend it all on bottles—buy me a bouquet of flowers once in a while." Lu Mingqiang responded with a good-natured smile.

events.name: Noise event: staying up late to prepare a report due to work
events.description: Just before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang received a last-minute notice from his team leader that he needed to prepare a brief report for a project scheduled for the next day. He stayed up until 23:50 to complete it, which delayed his sleep time.

2025-12.daily_overview: Tuesday evening was filled with the warmth of farewell. Lu Mingqiang, along with his workshop colleagues and mentor, bid farewell to his apprentice Zhao Qiang. Amidst the exchange of gifts, words of advice, and shared drinks, the bond between colleagues and master and apprentice was fully displayed. After returning home, a late-night conversation with his wife made him cherish the stability of his current life even more.

events.name: Daily Work
events.description: During the day, work proceeded as usual. Zhao Qiang had already completed the resignation procedures but still came to work today for the final handover. Lu Mingqiang sent him some electronic copies of technical notes he had compiled.

events.name: Farewell Banquet for Zhao Qiang
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, Squad Leader Zhang, and specially invited master craftsman Li Shifu gathered at a familiar Hunan restaurant to bid farewell to Zhao Qiang. During the meal, Lu Mingqiang presented a wrapped toolkit to Zhao Qiang and said earnestly, "Tools are the means of livelihood, and this set is easy to handle. If you encounter difficulties after returning, feel free to call anytime." Zhao Qiang was deeply moved and repeatedly expressed his gratitude. Li Shifu also lamented how time flies and advised the young man to stay grounded no matter which field he works in. Everyone reminisced about the fun times they had climbing utility poles and carrying out emergency repairs in the rain, creating a lively yet slightly sentimental atmosphere.

events.name: Returning Home and Reflecting with My Wife
events.description: Returning home slightly tipsy, Lu Mingqiang found his wife still awake. After washing up, he spoke with her about the farewell: "That kid Zhao Qiang was actually quite reluctant to leave. But everyone has their own aspirations; it's good for him to go back and develop there." He paused, looking at their sleeping child, and said softly, "Still, it's best for us to be like this—the whole family together, safe and stable." Wang Lijuan gave his hand a gentle squeeze.

events.name: Cross-day event initiation: Participation in cross-day work projects
events.description: Before going to bed, Lu Mingqiang received a notice from the company that he would participate in a three-day emergency power repair project starting the next day, which would require him to get up early and potentially work overtime.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Touched and warm, feeling sorrowful about the parting, yet even more deeply satisfied with the stable family life that is possessed.

2025-12.daily_overview: Wednesday evening was a time when family affection intertwined with planning. Lu Mingqiang and his family went to his parents' house for a warm, home-cooked meal. After dinner, a deep conversation with his father on the balcony helped ground his vague dream of starting a studio, transforming it into a clear and pragmatic action plan for the next two to three years, and earning his father's valuable approval.

events.name: Daily Work: First Day Participating in an Emergency Repair Project
events.description: During the day, he was busy dealing with an urgent power failure at a factory. The workload was intense, and as a key technical expert, Lu Mingqiang worked from morning till night with almost no time to rest.

events.name: Going to my parents' house for dinner.
events.description: After work, Lu Mingqiang picked up his wife and child and headed to his parents' home in Meilan District. His mother, Chen Xiuying, had prepared a table of Hainan home-style dishes, including poached chicken, Chinese lettuce with dace in black bean sauce, and winter melon conch soup—all of Lu Mingqiang's favorites. The family gathered around the table to eat, chatting about their child's studies and the recent weather, creating a warm and joyful atmosphere.

events.name: Night Chat with Father on the Balcony
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang accompanied his father to brew tea on the balcony. His father asked about his future plans. This time, Lu Mingqiang did not speak in generalities but clearly articulated his thoughts: "Dad, I've thought it through. The studio is a long-term goal, so there's no rush. Over the next two or three years, I plan to take on more challenging projects at the company to firmly establish the reputation of 'Master Lu' in the industry. At the same time, I'll maintain good relationships with long-term clients like Boss Li. Once my skills, reputation, and client resources are all in place, I'll consider the next step." His father listened quietly and nodded slowly: "Mm, that's the right way to think. The path must be taken step by step. You're thinking further ahead than I did back in the day. If you need any support from the family, just say so." Receiving his father's approval made Lu Mingqiang feel even more assured.

events.name: Returning Home and Follow-up Arrangements
events.description: On the way home, the children fell asleep in the car. Lu Mingqiang discussed his conversation with his father with his wife, who expressed support for his plan. He intends to organize this idea into more concrete steps over the weekend.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to family reunion, but feeling exhausted from work.

结束状态.心情: With a clear mind and full of confidence, feeling uplifted by the father's recognition and clear direction, yet physically fatigued.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Thursday, Lu Mingqiang made steady progress on multiple fronts of life: consolidating healthy habits, refining career plans, exploring family security options, and maintaining friendships with colleagues. Everything unfolded in a practical and orderly manner, laying the groundwork for year-end wrap-ups and the start of the new year.

events.name: Daily Work: Emergency Repair Project Day Two
events.description: Continuing to participate in the emergency repair project, the fault was basically resolved today, but finishing work and safety inspections needed to be completed. Lu Mingqiang worked until 7 p.m. before getting off work.

events.name: Complete core strength training.
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang completed a 10-minute core strength training session (including planks, crunches, etc.) on the living room mat. Having persisted for nearly two months, he felt that his waist had indeed become stronger during work and playing basketball, and he decided to maintain this habit in the long term.

events.name: Refine short-term career planning objectives
events.description: He took out his notebook and concretized the ideas he would present before his father. He wrote: "1. Strive to lead a smart power distribution renovation project next year. 2. Proactively contact important clients such as Boss Li and three to five others once per quarter. 3. Maintain at least one high-quality sharing per month on the forum."

events.name: Received the preliminary insurance proposal
events.description: The insurance broker sent two preliminary proposals via WeChat: one is a term critical illness insurance with a coverage of 300,000 yuan, and the other is a comprehensive accident insurance with a coverage of 500,000 yuan. The combined annual premium for both policies is approximately 3,200 yuan. Lu Mingqiang briefly reviewed them and plans to study them carefully with his wife over the weekend.

events.name: Discussing a year-end gathering with colleagues
events.description: Before going to bed, he sent a message in the "Three Musketeers" WeChat group (Lu Mingqiang, Chen Jianguo, Zhang Jianguo): "The year is almost over. Which day this weekend works for everyone? Let's have some grilled fish at the usual spot?" Chen Jianguo quickly replied, "Saturday evening works for me. I'm free." Zhang Jianguo also agreed. The time was set just like that.

起始状态.心情: Calm, but with a noticeable sense of work fatigue.

结束状态.心情: Feeling reassured by the systematic and step-by-step implementation of various plans.

2025-12.daily_overview: Friday is a day for in-depth communication with his wife. Lu Mingqiang thoroughly discussed his carefully considered career development plan with her and received her full support. This consensus within the family serves as the most solid foundation for his future endeavors. Meanwhile, consumption decisions aimed at improving the family's quality of life have also been made.

events.name: Wrapping up daily work
events.description: The emergency repair project has concluded. Today's main tasks involved organizing tools and drafting the project completion report, with the work pace slowing down.

events.name: Engage in in-depth communication with my wife regarding future plans.
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Lu Mingqiang showed his notebook to his wife Wang Lijuan and explained his three-year plan in detail. After listening attentively, Wang Lijuan said, "You've thought this through thoroughly, and I support you. Don't worry about the household matters and the children—I'll take care of them. Just don't push yourself too hard; your health is the most important thing." With his wife's understanding and support, the final weight was lifted from Lu Mingqiang's heart. The two also briefly calculated that, according to this plan, the family income should see steady, modest growth in the coming years, though significant expenses would still require careful consideration.

events.name: Select and purchase energy-efficient air conditioners.
events.description: After the discussion, Lu Mingqiang decided to purchase a Gree inverter air conditioner with first-class energy efficiency based on his previous research. He placed the order on Suning.com via his mobile phone, applied the e-commerce voucher he had previously obtained, and paid a final amount of 5,850 yuan. He carefully filled in the installation address and scheduled the installation for Saturday morning.

events.name: Noise event: Going to bed early due to physical discomfort
events.description: Possibly due to fatigue from consecutive overtime work, Lu Mingqiang felt a slight headache and decided to go to bed earlier than usual to regain his energy.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Feeling secure and motivated, the consensus reached within the family brings a strong sense of stability and a powerful driving force for moving forward.

2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday was a highly efficient and fulfilling day. In the morning, Lu Mingqiang utilized his professional expertise to oversee the installation of a new air conditioner, thereby enhancing the quality of home life. In the evening, he enjoyed a year-end gathering with two close colleagues, sharing work experiences and personal stories over grilled fish and beer. They engaged in heartfelt conversations about the future, further strengthening their valuable camaraderie.

events.name: Supervise the installation of new air conditioners.
events.description: In the morning, the installation technician arrived on schedule. Lu Mingqiang did not remain idle; he attentively observed the entire process. When the technician installed the outdoor unit bracket, he reminded him to add two more expansion screws to ensure safety during Haikou's typhoon season. While connecting the refrigerant pipes, he checked the sealing integrity. Thanks to his professional supervision, the installation was completed quickly and in compliance with standards. After installation, a test run was conducted, showing rapid cooling and heating with minimal noise, which left Lu Mingqiang very satisfied.

events.name: Disposal of Old Air Conditioners
events.description: After removing the old air conditioner, he contacted Master Wang, the scrap collector in the community, and sold it for 300 yuan. Master Wang also helped carry the old unit downstairs.

events.name: Family members experience the new air conditioner.
events.description: At noon, the whole family took a nap in the bedroom with the newly installed air conditioner running. Wang Lijuan, the wife, remarked, "It's so quiet and cools down quickly. This money was well spent." Lu Mingqiang then took the opportunity to explain how inverter air conditioners save more electricity and can recoup some of the electricity costs in the long run.

events.name: Year-End Gathering of Colleagues
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang rode his electric bike to the familiar food stall. Chen Jianguo and Zhang Jianguo had already arrived. The three of them ordered grilled fish, stir-fried rice noodles, and a few side dishes, along with several bottles of ice-cold beer. The conversation shifted from Zhao Qiang's resignation to their year-end bonuses, then to their children's schooling and potential projects for the next year. Zhang Jianguo mentioned a strange motor malfunction, and fueled by the alcohol, the three of them discussed it at length, eventually agreeing that it was likely a bearing issue. There were no workplace hierarchies here, only the relaxation and open conversation among friends.

events.name: Returning home to discuss New Year goods purchases with my wife
events.description: Around nine o'clock, the small gathering ended, and Lu Mingqiang returned home. His wife was making a list, so they sat on the sofa together, discussing what New Year goods they needed to purchase over the weekend: candies, dried goods, new clothes for the children, Spring Festival couplets, and "福" (fortune) characters. They estimated the expenses to be around 1,500 yuan.

起始状态.心情: Looking forward to both the installation of the new air conditioner and the evening gathering.

结束状态.心情: Content and joyful, there is both the sense of accomplishment from improving family life quality and the feeling of relief after having a heartfelt conversation with good friends.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday is a typical Chinese family preparation day. The entire Lu Mingqiang family mobilized to complete the year-end shopping and New Year home decorations, keeping themselves thoroughly busy. At the same time, he also led a significant upgrade in the family's financial planning—reviewing and preliminarily selecting a family insurance plan together with his wife, marking the establishment of risk management awareness.

events.name: Interacting with Neighbors
events.description: When going out in the morning, he ran into Uncle Wang, who, upon hearing that his family was planning a thorough cleaning, proactively lent him his own sturdier A-frame ladder. In the afternoon upon returning, Lu Mingqiang conveniently fixed a faulty power strip for Uncle Wang's household. The relationship between the two families grew even more harmonious.

events.name: The whole family goes out to purchase New Year goods.
events.description: In the morning, Lu Mingqiang drove his family to a large supermarket. His wife was responsible for selecting food and daily necessities according to the shopping list, while Lu Mingqiang took charge of pushing the cart and carrying heavy items. The two children excitedly picked out their favorite snacks and New Year decorations. The shopping cart was piled high, and the final bill came to over 1,680 yuan.

events.name: Decorating the Home for the New Year
events.description: In the afternoon, the whole family sprang into action. Lu Mingqiang stepped onto a ladder to put up Spring Festival couplets and high window decorations, while his wife set the dining table and arranged the living room. Their two children helped by pasting low window decorations and hanging small lanterns. Soon, the house was filled with a festive and lively atmosphere for the New Year.

events.name: Reviewing Insurance Plans with My Wife
events.description: In the evening, after the children had fallen asleep, Lu Mingqiang and his wife took out their phones to carefully review the details of the insurance plan sent by their broker. They focused on comparing the types of diseases covered, the exemption clauses, and the payment terms. Wang Lijuan raised a question: "Is 300,000 yuan in critical illness insurance enough if a serious illness actually occurs?" Lu Mingqiang explained: "This is just the foundation; we can add more coverage later. The annual premium is 3,200 yuan, and with our annual income of 50,000 yuan, we can still afford it." The two calculated that the monthly cost would be less than 300 yuan and found it acceptable.

events.name: Initially Select Insurance and Schedule Contract Signing
events.description: After more than an hour of discussion, the couple decided to choose the basic combination of "critical illness + accident" insurance. Lu Mingqiang immediately contacted the insurance agent via WeChat, expressing his general approval of the plan. He also confirmed some details regarding the health declaration, such as whether his occasional lumbar muscle strain needed to be disclosed, and scheduled an appointment to sign the contract at the agent's office on the evening of December 30.

events.name: Renovate the study corner and tutor the child.
events.description: After settling the insurance matter, Lu Mingqiang borrowed an A-frame ladder to move an old desk from a corner of the living room. He personally installed the newly purchased eye-protecting desk lamp and connected it to the power source. He then called his eldest son, Lu Zixuan, over and said, "From now on, this will be your dedicated study desk. The lamp’s brightness can be adjusted, so take good care of it." The father and son moved the schoolbag and some books together. Lu Mingqiang sat nearby, watching his son do homework under the new lamp. The light was indeed comfortable and not harsh on the eyes.

起始状态.心情: Full of energy, ready to embrace a busy and fulfilling day of family affairs.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home (next to the newly arranged study corner)
结束状态.心情: Tired but immensely satisfied, he completed several important household tasks, especially the progress made on insurance matters, which made him feel that he had erected a safer umbrella for his family.

state.今日运动: Household Labor (Moving and Arranging)

2025-12.daily_overview: On Monday, work entered the true year-end closing phase. While completing his daily inspections, Lu Mingqiang also began preparing for his personal year-end summary—organizing family photos. At the same time, family insurance matters reached the final confirmation stage, and he was meticulously preparing the signing materials.

events.name: Daily Work: Year-End Safety Inspection
events.description: Today's task involves conducting a year-end safety inspection of the company's warehouse and the distribution rooms of several completed projects, and filling out the inspection checklist. The work pace was slightly slower than usual.

events.name: Organize annual family photos
events.description: In the evening, Lu Mingqiang browsed through his photo album on his phone and began selecting representative photos: the family portrait from the Spring Festival, flying kites with the children, the medal from a 10-kilometer race, a screenshot of his senior technician certificate, a gathering with coworkers, the installation of a new air conditioner, the New Year decorations at home… He specifically created a new album titled "2025 Highlights" and added forty to fifty photos to it.

events.name: Prepare Insurance Contract Signing Materials
events.description: Upon the broker's reminder, Lu Mingqiang retrieved his and his wife's identification cards, marriage certificate, and bank cards, and took clear photos of them to store on his phone. He also carefully recalled their past medical histories. Aside from his occasional lumbar muscle strain and his wife's childbirth records, there were essentially no major issues, and he prepared to disclose this information truthfully.

events.name: Noise incident: Late-night sleep disturbance due to an impromptu gathering of friends
events.description: In the evening, Wu Gang, a junior high school classmate, suddenly called Lu Mingqiang and invited him to have some "laoba tea" to catch up on recent events. Lu Mingqiang accepted the invitation, and the two chatted until 11 p.m. before returning home, which resulted in a delayed bedtime.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.心情: Organized, preparing for the upcoming annual tasks (insurance, summaries), but feeling somewhat relaxed after socializing.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Tuesday evening, Lu Mingqiang did something of long-term significance for his family—officially signing the family insurance contract and paying the first premium. This means that this conservative and stable small family has formally established a basic financial defense against risks, with a substantial enhancement in their sense of security.

events.name: Wrapping Up Daily Work
events.description: After finishing the last bit of paperwork, we can basically relax and wait for the New Year's holiday.

events.name: Adhere to core strength training.
events.description: Before dinner, he still completed a 10-minute core workout, which has become as natural a habit for him as brushing his teeth.

events.name: Formally sign the insurance contract
events.description: At 7:30 p.m., Lu Mingqiang arrived at the insurance broker's small office as scheduled. The broker explained the printed contract terms clause by clause, particularly the exclusions and waiting periods. Lu Mingqiang reviewed the document carefully and, after confirming everything was correct, signed his name in the policyholder section.

events.name: Pay the initial premium
events.description: After signing, he immediately transferred the first year's premium of 3,218 yuan to the insurance company's designated account via mobile banking. Shortly after, he received a text message confirming the successful payment and an electronic policy. Holding the thin contract in his hand, he felt much more at ease.

events.name: Random Event: Easy Run Recovery Training
events.description: After signing the contract and returning home, Lu Mingqiang went for a 5-kilometer easy run in his residential area at a pace of about 8 minutes per kilometer as part of his post-race recovery, feeling that his body was gradually adapting.

起始状态.心情: Calm, with a hint of solemnity before the completion of important matters.

结束状态.心情: Feeling at ease and reassured, having completed a crucial safeguard for the family, with a heightened sense of responsibility and security.

2025-12.daily_overview: On the last day of 2025, the evening drew to a close amidst warmth and cherished memories. Lu Mingqiang led his family through a retrospective of the year’s endeavors, growth, and joyful moments with a self-made digital photo album. In the gentle glow of the lights and the closeness of his loved ones, he genuinely felt the fulfillment and happiness brought by steadfast efforts, and he embraced the new year with hopeful anticipation.

events.name: Create an annual electronic photo album
events.description: In the afternoon, Lu Mingqiang used a video editing app on his phone to arrange the photos from the "2025 Highlights" album in chronological order. He added a soothing and heartwarming piece of light music and included subtitles reading "Our 2025" at the beginning and "Happy New Year" at the end. Though the process was simple, it was infused with his deep affection and appreciation for his family.

events.name: Enjoy the New Year's Eve dinner
events.description: Wang Lijuan, the wife, prepared a lavish dinner: Hainanese chicken rice, qingbuliang (a traditional Hainan dessert), boiled prawns, and several home-style stir-fried dishes. The whole family gathered around the table, chatting while enjoying the meal. Lu Mingqiang, rarely seen doing so, served his wife some food and praised her cooking skills. The children shared amusing stories from school, filling the room with laughter and joy.

events.name: Family Video Review
events.description: After dinner, Lu Mingqiang connected his phone to the television and cast the electronic photo album he had created onto the screen. As familiar scenes appeared one after another—himself covered in grease while repairing a car, lying in bed with a back injury, the expression on his face as he crossed the finish line in a race, a smiling face holding a certificate, flushed cheeks at a gathering with coworkers, children running with kites, the night view from the balcony of his parents' home, the installation of a new air conditioner, vibrant Spring Festival couplets…the entire family fell silent, immersed in memories. His wife occasionally pointed at a photo and said, "Look at your silly expression," while the children excitedly pointed out themselves.

events.name: Awaiting the New Year, Emotional Resonance
events.description: As the photo album finished playing, it was nearly midnight. Lu Mingqiang had his arm around his wife's shoulders, with their two children nestled close by. No one spoke, yet a powerful emotional connection filled the air. Looking at his family beside him, Lu Mingqiang reflected on the past year—from obtaining certifications to planning for the future, from health management to family security—each step had been taken with steady determination. His heart swelled with affirmation for the struggles of the past and a firm hope for the life ahead. The countdown from the New Year’s Eve gala echoed from the television, and the whole family softly counted along: "5, 4, 3, 2, 1... Happy New Year!"

起始状态.心情: Calm, tinged with a touch of sentimentality toward the year-end reflections.

结束状态.心情: Deeply affectionate, content, and filled with hope, the year concludes perfectly amidst the warmth of family, with eager anticipation for the new year ahead.
